29a5(rgyud 'grel): shud d+ha sarba d+harma pri kri ta pa ri shud d+ho haM/ sa pa sbyar a pa yan ta ra swA hA// 'phags ma sgrol ma chags pa thams cad 'joms ma zhes bya ba'i las kyi yan lag blo 'phel bar byed pa'i cho ga'i le'u ste bco lnga pa rdzogs so//
29a6(rgyud 'grel): rje btsun 'phags ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo// rnal 'byor bar chad bsrung ba'i phyir// dben pa'i phyogs chags chags dang // maN+Dal gnyis dong mchod sogs gnyis// bsham bya rje btsun rten yang bsham// stan bde ba la gnas
29b1(rgyud 'grel): sems can la// snying rje che bskyed 'di rnams ni// rje btsun gnas dgod dam bcas nas// de yis gtor ma gtang bar bya// de nas snying kha'i 'od zer gyis// thun mong khyad par spyan drangs te// mchod pa cha res mchod par bya// de nas bdag gi spyi bor a//
29b2(rgyud 'grel): de las zla ba de stengs te// gsum po yongasu gyur pa las// rje btsun zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma// mi 'jigs ud pal g.yas dang g.yon// sna tshogs rin chen rgyan gyis brgyan// mgul chungs gdub bu do shal can// sku gsung thugs mtshan
29b3(rgyud 'grel): ye shes sems// skye mched rnams dag dbu rgyan mdzes// phyag gi bdud rtsi bdag rgyas par// bsam zhing gsang sngags gdon par bya// phyi yi phyag rgya rdzas kyis bsdu// nang gi nang du bsdu bya'i tshe// bsgrub bya bsdus shing bcing par bsam// de
29b4(rgyud 'grel): nas gtor ma gcig shos btang // 'gro ba yi mchog bcom ldan ma// zhal bzangs bdag la gzigs par bsam// de nas bstod dang bzlas pa bya// des ni 'jigs pa kun skyob 'gyur// oM na ma ar+yA pi lo ko tai shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi swa tA ya/
29b5(rgyud 'grel): ma hA swa tA ya/ ma hA kA ru ni kA ya// tad ya thA/ oM tA re tud tA re tu re sarba duSh+TAn/ pra duSh+TA nA ma ma kI te/ d+h+waM b+ha/ staM b+ha ya/ mo hA ya/ ban d+ha ya/ hUM hUM hUM/ phaT phaT dzaH/ sarbe duSh+Ta ra staM b+ha ni tA raM swA hA/
29b6(rgyud 'grel): 'phags ma sgrol ma bde ba thams cad sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i las kyi yan lag chom rkun btsang ba'i cho ga'i le'u ste bcu drug pa rdzogs so// / rje btsun ma 'phags ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshalo// bag med la sogs pa rnams la
30a1(rgyud 'grel): gdug pa'i yid ldan dud 'gro'i rigs// yid dang bltas dang mche ba rang // reg pa'i sgo nas 'tshe bar byed// grog po ri phug dog mo'i sgor// lha khang 'jam rdzab mi sdug gzugs// ri bzar 'dzeg dang dud 'gros
30a2(rgyud 'grel): 'tshe// mtsho 'gram 'dug sogs gnod pa'i rtags// glu la dga' dang nub mo na// yan lag mi bde lus lci zhing // shu ba g.yon pa bas ljags dang // 'brum bu la sogs thebs las 'byung // mi dga' ba dang za 'phrug dang /
30a3(rgyud 'grel): sha mdog nyams dang me ras dang // res 'ga' chu grang blugs bzhin dang // bas ljags sha bkra 'byung ba yin// sha 'phrig spring dang bems por 'dug/ mig ni tsha zhing zlum pa dang // smin ma la sogs kyi 'gyur te// lag sor
30a4(rgyud 'grel): skams par gyur pa'o// lus la dri ba 'byung 'gyur zhing // chu bur dang ni nya lgangs can// rnag dang chu ser rul dri mnam// ro stong dag kyang zug par 'gyur// phyi yi sha skam mdog 'tshor zhing // sha yi mdangs med zug dang bcas// gos kyang
30a5(rgyud 'grel): mdangs dang bral 'gyur te// glog pa char yag ma bzhi no// de dag bsrung bar bya ba'i phyir// lha yi sbyor bar gnas pa yis// gu gul bla rtsi shu dag dang // ru rta btsan dug shing kun dang // da lis rnams la gsang sngags che// 'bum phrag gsum
30a6(rgyud 'grel): bsnyen byas pa yi// de bsrung bla rtsi mi bskyod sbyar// gnas lngar byug cing bkru bar bya// 'di ni sbyor ba zab mo ste/ i la ri dgas ji bzhin du// gang la bsrung ba 'dis brgyan pa// de la sdang ldan 'bros par 'gyur// gnyis pa la ni shu dag dang // bla rtsi
30b1(rgyud 'grel): r+yan+ya gu gul dang // mu ze ro ras rgyu tshil dang // shi ba'i dri chen phag pa'i brgyad// sgrog sgra dang ni ma du dang // ma yi bcud dang rus pa phye// mi bcud kyis bsdus ri lu ste// snga ma gnyis 'gyur bsnyen pa yis// dbang po'i sgo rnams bdug bya ste/ nyi ma ma
30b2(rgyud 'grel): 'od la mun pa bzhin// dug can rnams ni nam du'ang // nga ban+d+ha nus pa ma yino// gsum pa la ni gsum 'gyur to// gong ma'i rdzas kyis sbyor ba dang // k+ShiM yi dug dang bdud rtsi bsten// 'bar ba'i me yis nags tshal bzhin// des gzhan nang
30b3(rgyud 'grel): rnams tshig pa 'gyur// bzhi pa la ni bye ba ste// gong ma'i rdzas kyis sbyor ba dang // klu'i dug drang rnam rgyal brten// rtsa mig dag kyang bsal bar bya// nyi mas gangs bzhin de 'jom so// lnga pa la yang de bzhin te// khyad par du na a ru ra// dri chu ba rtsi
30b4(rgyud 'grel): brtan par bya// rdo rje yis ni rin chen bzhin// thogs pa med par 'jigs par 'gyur// A~M t+tA re ted two rA tu re ku le kul+le/ sarba shat+sAd+ya dak+Sha ya bak+Sha ya~M/ hUM hUM nA ga stam pa ya// mo ha ya/ ban d+ha ya/ ya ra suM ne r+yA ba nA hUM hU~M phaT phaT sId+d+ha/
30b5(rgyud 'grel): rje btsun ma 'phags ma sgrol ma rnaM par rgyal ma zhes bya ba'i las kyi yan lag klu nang byos pa'i cho ga'i le'u skye bcu 'dun pa rtogs so// rje btsun 'phags ma sgrol ma phyag 'tshal lo// mi ya~M dbang po la sogs pas// shin
30b6(rgyud 'grel): tu dam par bsdams pa rnams// rab tu thar bar bya ba'i phyir/ kha lang lci bas dkyil 'khor bya// dbus su phyag mtshan sa bon bcas// de la de nyid spyan drangs la// mchod pa mngon du 'gro ba yis// dang po bsnyen pa rdzogs par bya// de nas sbyor
31a1(rgyud 'grel): gzhan rab spangs de// bcom ldan mchod nas brgya phrag brgyad// gsol ba'i mchod pa dang bcas pas// legs par bzlas na grol bar 'gyur// na mo rang na tra yA ya/ na ma ar+yA ba lo ko ti shwa ra ya/ bo d+ha
31a2(rgyud 'grel): swa tA ya/ ma hA swa tA ya/ ma hA ka ru NA kA ya/ trang yA thA ro dzu ka d+har+m+mi/ nir ya te/ tA re tA ra yA b+ha ga ba ti tud tA re/ b+h+ra ma b+ha ya/ mo tsi ne tu re swA hA// 'phags ma sgrol ma sdug bsngal thams cad bsreg pa'i las kyi yan
31a3(rgyud 'grel): lag khri mon las thar par byed pa'i cho ga'i le'u ste bco brgyad pa rdzogs so// / rje btsun ma 'phags ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo// gang gis gang la rab bsngags pa// dngos grub de nyid bsgrub pa'i phyir// mig dang lho dang
31a4(rgyud 'grel): dad mkhris pa rnams// rin tshon ga'u'i nang du gzhug/ bdud rtsi 'khyil pas bsrung byas nas// 'grub par byed pa'i bsnyen pa brtsam// chog par shes nas pad rtsar sba// dag pa'i mig las dben par 'gyur// na mo rang na tra yA ya/ ne ma ar+yA ba lo
31a5(rgyud 'grel): kI te shwa rA ya/ b+h+yo d+hi swatwA swA/ mA hA satwA ya ad+haka ru NIk+ShI ya/ ta ya thA/ oM tI d+hA re d+hA ra dza ya/ dza ya~M dza swe/ tud d+ha re dza ya d+hAd+hId+hA re s+yAH/ 'phags ma sgrob ma la dngos grub khrims cad ste bangar byed ma zhes bya ba'i
31a6(rgyud 'grel): kyil yan lag mi snang ba'i cho ga'i le'u ste bcu dgu pa rdzogs so// / rje btsun 'phags ma sgros ma la phyag 'tshalo// mthong ba'i chos la 'og min du// 'phags rnams spyod yul dang gcig cing // yid kyi shugs kyis bskyod
31b1(rgyud 'grel): byed pa// zangs dang lcags dang gser dag las// 'bar ba'i ral gri byas nas su// yu ba gzhung dang so rim bzhin// gnyis dang bcu gcig sor du ldan// a li ka l-i g.yas g.yon te// yig ge bcu pa dbus su'o// gnas skabs gsum du sku sogs
31b2(rgyud 'grel): gsum// sgra dang me stag 'od 'phro ba// rab 'bring stegs dang ldan pa las// chags med yid kyis bskyod byas te// 'dab gshog rgyas pa'i bya bzhin du// gang dang gang du bsams pa yi// zhing khams ngag tu 'dod pa'i don// thams cad de yi dbang du 'gyur//
31b3(rgyud 'grel): I tA re tud tA re tu re a mo g+ha sid d+hi/ khang g+he pri sid d+hi/ lo ka a lo ka/ tiSh+Tha rang na tsa la tsa l-i/ hUM hUM baM baM a tIstA swA hA// 'phags ma sgrol ma yongs su rdzogs par byed pa zhes bya ba'i las kyi yan lag mchog sgrub
31b4(rgyud 'grel): 'i le'u nyi shu pa rdzogs so// / rje btsun 'phags ma sgrol myu la phyag 'tshalo// gser sogs rab mdzes snod dag tu// 'o ma mar dang sran chan dang // la phug mngar dang mai tog spos// dag pa'i chu dang chang la
31b5(rgyud 'grel): sogs// sku gsung thugs kyi yi ge yis// spangs nas 'byung po rnams la sbyin// oM a ko ro mu khaM sarba d+harma naM/ Ar+ya nud pan nad tring // A~M A hUM phaT swA hA// / gtor ma'i cho ga'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gcig pa
31b6(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs so// / rje btsun ma 'phags ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshalo// mtsho 'am khron pa 'bab chu gtsang // bcom ldan mchog sbyin bdud rtsi yis// gdung bral 'phags pa'i rang bzhin du// bsgyur nas gsang sngags rgyal po ni//
32a1(rgyud 'grel): bdun phrag gsum gyis yid dgas rnams// rab tu tshim pa'i cho ga bya// oM tA re tud tA re tu re sarba pre ti b+h+yaHswAhA// chu sbyin pa'i cho ga'i le'u ste nya shu rtsa gnyis pa rdzogs s+ho//
32a2(rgyud 'grel): rje btsun 'phags ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshol lo// dri zhim dkar ba'i sa rnams la// rigs lngar sbyangs nas de'i rang bzhin// de la mchog rten gdab byas la// de dag gnas su dam tshig ste// de la ye shes de dbang bskur// de la byin brlab de nas
32a3(rgyud 'grel): mchod// rab tu gnas byas de nas ni// dag pa'i gnas su bzhugs par bya// oM tA rI tud tA re tu raM sarba tA thA ga ta hI da ya a d+hiSh+Thi te swA hA// tsha tsha gdab pa'i cho ga'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gsum pa rdzogs so// /
32a4(rgyud 'grel): rje btsun 'phags ma sgrol ma lnga phyag 'tshalo// gso sbyong dag la gnas pa yi s+ho// ka ti ka yaM thal ba la// stot+ta phrag bAn+d+ha yi bsnyen pa bya// chu shes spyod yul yang ngo la// d+hi dbang phyed g.yas seng ge'i tshul// rtse gcig 'dod pa'i don brnags te/
32a5(rgyud 'grel): 'dod pa'i lha dang dus gsum gyi// skye ba'i gnas rnams ston par mdzad// oM tA re tud tA ra tu re tad+ya thA/ oM mug shi r-i pra mA dan de kha rgo ya sha/ shau ma d+ha rA rtsa ra phye/ mo hA ri s+pho hA// dan ti la swA hA// / dus gsum brtag pa'i
32a6(rgyud 'grel): cho ga'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa rdzogs so// / rje btsun 'phags ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo// sbrum ma dang ni mgo 'jug log/ mo skam bu ni skyed byed dang // sri bu bsrung dang 'byung po bzlog/ las gang byed pa'i lhar gyur bya// dang po go/
32b1(rgyud 'grel): rotsA na dang // yung ba ba bla'i ril bu la// rnag tshwa byas la sngags bris la// bdud rtsi lnga dang 'bru sna lnga// rin chen lnga dang 'bru sna lnga// bum par bcug la gsang sngags 'di// nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas byin brlab// sngags chus nam phyed yol ba'i dus/
32b2(rgyud 'grel): mchod pa byas la sbrum ma de// khrus byas bde bar btsa' zhing 'byung // gnyis pa mar dag lag 'thil du// gzhan la gsang sngags nyi shu gcig/ bzlas la mgo lus pa ga byug/ de ltar byas na bde bar skye// gsum pa'o de tse yi 'brum//
32b3(rgyud 'grel): phye ma dag dong ba dam rI ser// 'o ma bsros la bum par blugs// gsang sngags nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas// zla mtshan byung dus tha ma'i tshe// blung na myur du bu dag skye// bzhi pa 'phrul skyes byis po de// khrus byas bde bar 'tsho bar 'gyur/
32b4(rgyud 'grel): pA gsang sngags de nyid kyis// yungs dkar nyi shu gcig bsngags nas// gdong bu brabs nas 'byung po ldog/ oM tA ra ni tA ra ya// oM mai tsa ni mo tsa ni ya/ oM mo ka sha ni mau ka sha ya~M/ dza ba bar d+hi swA hA// / bskyed cing
32b5(rgyud 'grel): bsring ba la sogs pa'i tshiga'i li'u skye nyi shu lnga pa rdzogs so// / 'dre gshegs skyed mdzad rje btsun gyi// rnal 'byor byang chub yan lag bzang // thabs kyi khyad par mdor bsdus pa// zhi ba la sogs las bzhi'i
32b6(rgyud 'grel): tshul// bdag gzhan don kun bsgrub byed pa// thugs rje chu skyes las byung ba'i// sbrang rtsi 'di ni bdag gis bzhis// 'gro la phan phyir 'dir bkod do// de las byung ba'i dge ba yis// 'gro ba ma lus byang chub che// sku gsum rang bzhin mtha
33a1(rgyud 'grel): byin pa// myur ba nyid du thob par shog/ rje btsun 'phags ma sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'i las kyi yan lag dang bcas pa mdor bsdus pa zhes bya ba/ kha che'i slob dpon nyi ma sbas pa zhes bya bas mdzang
33a2(rgyud 'grel): pardzogs so// / rgyu gar gyi mkhan po many+dzu shrI dang / bod kyi li tse ba mal gyo blo gros grags bAs bi kra ma shI la'i gtsug lag khang chen po de nyid du bsgyur cing zhus te gtan lo phab pa'o// / rgya gar skad du/ b+ha gA ba ti ta
33a3(rgyud 'grel): rA de bI e kA paM sha ti stong tra no byi kaM/ bod skad du/ bcom ldan 'das ma sgrol ma la bstod pa nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'i sgrub thabs/ 'phags ma sgrol ma'i zhabs la phyag 'tshalo// dus gsum rgyal ba skyed mdzad sum// shes rab pha rol phyin bdag
33a4(rgyud 'grel): nyid// sna tshogs sprul pas kun skyob ma// lha mo cho ga de'i zhabs btung bshad// de nyid skyabs song sems bzang blos// sras bcas rgyal bas yongs bskor ba'i// 'phags ma nyid mdun mkhar bzhugs mchod// sdig bsngal bsod noms
33a5(rgyud 'grel): ngas rdzogs byas// rnam ngag sngags kyi dri bsal la// sku gsung thugs dngos bskyang dang rdzogs// cho ga ji bzhin ji snyed par// ma 'khrugs 'khrul pa med par bsgom// 'phags ma sgrol ma che nyid sku// yangs gyur 'dod sbyin sna tshogs gzugs
33a6(rgyud 'grel): sna tshogs// t+ya nor bu'i tshul bzhin du// gdul ba'i dbang can yongs gyur lta// ye shes gzhug cing byin brlabs la// dbang bskur mchod cing rgyas gdab bya// 'od zer 'byor pas 'gro skyes dang // dngos grub blangs te bzlas par bya//
33b1(rgyud 'grel): phyag 'tshal sgrol ma myur+ya dpa' mo// spyan ni sta cig glog dang 'dra ma// 'jig rten gsum mgon chu skyes zhal gyi// ge sar phye ba las ni byung ma// spyan ras gzigs mgon thugs rje ma// chu skyes zhal gyi ge sar las// chu 'dzin las skyes glog 'gyu
33b2(rgyud 'grel): bzhin// byung bas rab dga'i sgrol ma bsgom// mkha' dkyil gser mdog chu skyes gdan// zhal gcig phyag brgyad chos sgrogs dang // mnga' gzhu 'khor lo ral gri dung // rdo rje zhags bcos me tog brgyan// de'i 'phrin las gzhan gyi mthu// phyir/
33b3(rgyud 'grel): bzlog bstan phyir lha mo bsnyen// bsgrub bya'i rdzas la dkyil 'khor bya// debus ho khung drag gzugs dgod// snying khar rtsibs brgyad spel tshig sngags// man ngag bzhi bkod blo gus drang // smyu gu snying gtang lta sbyor gyis// stong byed rten phral yang
33b4(rgyud 'grel): yang gzhug/ 9 'khros pas mchod rten ni// nag po khri 'phang bzhi ldan brtsig/ rgod gsung sna dang mgul dang thos// snom pa'i sdung byed shes par bya// rgyan mi 'chad pa'i lha sbyor gyis// dgug gzhug bstims nas mnan byo ste// mtshan ma
33b5(rgyud 'grel): rnyed nas sa sa bsreg/ rang gnas slar yang rtse tiswa mnan// nus ldan stong gis gcig brnags kyang // mtshon tshe'i sbyor ba slar nyes bzhin// bdag nyid bdag gis phung bar byed// mchod bstod snying rjes mi btang ces// oM tA re tung
33b6(rgyud 'grel): dA re d+ha re ma ma rak+Sha rak+Sha swA hA/ oM tA re tu re tA re che ge mo g+ha hA g+h+ri hA/ ban d+ha ban d+ha/ ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ bi d+ha na sa ya/ bi d+ha na sa ya/ a ma kaM ma ra ya phaT ma ra ya tu re hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA// oM tA re tud tA re tu ro ma hA pany+tsa yak+Sha stem b+ha
34a1(rgyud 'grel): ya hU~M ba dril ma ra ya phaT/ su ku wa b+h+yo// rje btsun ma sgrol ma myur mdapa' mo zhes bya ba'i smras thangs rdzogs so// phyag 'amam ldan ka'i zla bkun du// gang ba brgyan bcugs pa rin du/
34a2(rgyud 'grel): skar ma stong phrag tshogs pa rnams kyi// rab tu phye ba'i 'od rab 'bar ma// ston zla brgya'i zhal mdangs mnga'// stong phrag skar mas rab phye bo'i// bkrag 'dzin gzi mdangs yid 'ong ma// mi shes mun sel bsgom par bya// ji bzhin cho gas rab sbrul yuM//
34a3(rgyud 'grel): zhal gsum dkar sngo gser mdog can// bcu gnyis phyag mnga' mnyam gzhag dang // kha T+wAM 'khor lo rin chen nyid// rdo rje me tog phreng 'dzin g.yas// ril pa uta pal dril bu dang // bum+ba pa dang ni po ti g.yon// sna tshogs lha mo rgyan gyis pas//
34a4(rgyud 'grel): sku spros gsung bzlas phyag mtshan thugs// rang rang rje.oM 'thun 'phrin las sgrub// thun mong thun mong ma yin pas// mnyam gzhag rjes 'gro rtse gcig bya// 'phrin las yams nad zhi bya'i phyir// dkar phyogs maN+Dal dgod// dbus su yum bcas
34a5(rgyud 'grel): 'od dpag med// phyogs mtshams rigs bzhi yum bzhi dgod // khor yug phyogs skyong bcas dkyil 'khor// ma lus rgyan gyis mdzes par bya// mchod dang gtor ma sngon song bas// gso sbyong ldan pas gsang sngags bzlas// khri phrag
34a6(rgyud 'grel): mchod gtor ldan pas 'bum// bzlas te lha yi sbyor ldan pas// nang sogs zhi bya gtsang spros so// yams bdag mang po tshim par bya// oM tA re tud dA re tu re sarba b+ha d+h+ya pra sha ma ni shan ti ku ru swA hA// rje btsun ma sgrol ma ston zla lta bu zhes
34b1(rgyud 'grel): bya ba'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so// / phyag 'tshal ser sngo chu nas skyes kyi// pad+ma phyag ni rnam par brgyan ma// sbyin pa brtson 'grus dka' thub zhi ba// bzod pa bsam gtan spyod yul nyid ma// shes rab bdag nyid par phyin lnga// yongs rdzog
34b2(rgyud 'grel): 'phags mchog bzhin// rim gnyis bsgom zhing bzlas byas te// rgya cher mchod bstong bsngags par bya// pang nyid shu l-i dkrung gser mdog zhal// gcig mnga' phreng bA ral gri madra'// rdo rje dbyig gu dar sbyangs lpags// pad+mo rnaM bu gzhu 'dzin
34b3(rgyud 'grel): btsu'o// rjes mthun chog sngon song bas// tshe srings 'gro mo las ngogs snang bsgrub// gzhan drug tshe yang bsrungs nas ni// tshe dpag med bzhug mchod bskyong gsos+ho// oM t+tA d+ha d+he ma.a sud+d+ho// Sh+T+r-i/ b+hid+d+ha ra b+hUd+hA \u0f7f/ ma sA pra d+ha d+hi hU~M
34b4(rgyud 'grel): hU~M/ mo'i ngas kyis brtan brgyad// sus rgyas sumang ngos tshe yi pa y-i// rmA s+yA ts+tshin+da rtsa gcig kyi spyod // k+sha shwe d+he sa tshe 'dzim// rje hrIn+d+ra ma smosas pa hU~M b+h+yon mas Sh+Ta sgru /
34b5(rgyud 'grel): spya bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug gtor// mtha' yas rnam par ba spyod ma// myi lus par hU~M sbyin pa zab pa'i// rgyal ba'i sras shin du basbyin ma// gtsug ting ying brtson na sa san+tanA// dud dkyu che smran
34b6(rgyud 'grel): rgyal// pha ros byin sum tshangs rdzogs pas// bdag nyid che rnams kyis mchod ba sgom/ gser mdog chu skyes ri mo can// zag med chags med rnam gnon zhing // gser ro ltar brjid phyag pa'i mchos// mchog sbyin phreng ba ril pa dpyi// de
35a1(rgyud 'grel): srog g.yo rnam 'jil ba// khar rga ne tra a k+Sho b+hU// gar na su kha gcig po skyes// ma s+t+rai bai ro tsa na sbyar// lha mor yid brtan mang bzlas nas// gnas lngar gdab cing khong du sbyin// rtse gcig lta la mtsho sgras khrug
35a2(rgyud 'grel): rang bzhin bcos sogs sel don med// oM tA ra tud tA re t+tA re na maHsha re sha re bai sha re sarba b+hid+ba g+ha Da swA hA/ rje btsun sgrol ma gtsug tor rgyal ma zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so// / phyag 'tshal tud tA ra hU~M yi gaus/
35a3(rgyud 'grel): 'dod dang phyogs dang na mkha' gang ma// 'jig rten gsum po zhabs kyis mnan te// lus pa med par 'gugs par nus ma// mthu chen sngags kyi hUM sgra yis// khams gsum rgyas 'gengs srid gsum gnon// kun bdag bkug nas
35a4(rgyud 'grel): dbang sdud ma// dbang bsgyur che nyid rnam par bsgom// zla steng rdo rje'i zhabs gnon zhing // skyabs sbyin gser gyi pad lcug 'dzin// ting 'dzin mchog bzhugs 'gro skyobs mas// ma chags gdul bya kun skyong mdzad// phrin las bsgrub phyir lhar
35a5(rgyud 'grel): bsnyen pa// ras la rtsibs bzhi 'khor lo bri// bsgrub bya'i gzugs srog ming dang ldan// wa shi ku ru khrag gis bri// oM gsum rim pa'i rgyal mo'i dbus// skye mched gsal rdzogs spra tshil gzugs// lha mos bsdus te snying khar gzhug/
35a6(rgyud 'grel): dus gsum dus drug seng ldeng bsreg/ sgo gnyis zangs ma'i thur mas bri// sa bon 'ong ngam pa shug drag gi/ lcags kyus bkug ste zhags pas bcings// sgra g.yengs gcer bu rkang 'dud bsam// dur khrod rdzas gsum rdo rje'i chus// sbyar te
35b1(rgyud 'grel): skyugs bcus sbyin par bya// de rdzas ke tshe ming dang bcas// dbang sdung yang kyi sbyin sreg bya// bdun blag zhag ni gcig dang gnyis de bzhin bdun gyis mi mo dang // ma pa b+hU ma sogs dbang sbyar// oM d+ha re d+hA tA re d+ha re khe b+ha ya~M b+ha so swA ti
35b2(rgyud 'grel): sau u kro si baM shr-I kA ra swo a mu kA s+yA d+hA ma g+hA D+hA ni ra ha tra tsa ma na khi Sh+TAHsi dau tA da ho/ sbyinau i skr-i d+hA mA/ ma rdza kA/ d+b+ha tA laM ba na/ bi ru tI pa laM Na ba ts+tsha tAM/ rang ni taM bA la ne/ dad+hA me ne hi/ guM to ni/ ku su rbo ra dza/ ya ti ba sa ne ti/ ba lan bAd+d+ha
35b3(rgyud 'grel): phu ra sa kri te/ oM ts+yai tri tsI tri/ br-i lo l-i bi lo l-i swAhA/ a mu kaM sa d+ha nA~M ba ri pa tIm+me nga sa ma ye swAhUM/ A~M ku ru kul+le hrIHswA hA// 'bum phrag rnal 'byor rtse gcig gis// me tog bdug pa bza' btang dag/ byin na brgya byin yang dbang byed//
35b4(rgyud 'grel): me tog dmar po'i sbyin sreg gces// yungs kari skyes bu mchog laM bsngags// 'khar ba'i snod du sbrang rtsi mar// sngags dang bcas gus dus gsum du// mchod dang bcas pas dAn rnams 'grub// kham+b+ha por ramA ni dung phor du// sbyang
35b5(rgyud 'grel): sogs la brgya rtsa brgyad // bzlas so mig byug dgra ba~M yang // bu sdug bzhin du sems par 'gyur// dur khrod gnas su snod chen ni// pad+ma dkar dang chen po'i snum// brgyad dang bcu bzhi bsgrub byas pa'i// mig sman gyis ni gzhan dga' byed
35b6(rgyud 'grel): rje btsun ma sgrol ma sring gsum 'gugs pa'i sbubs thabs rdzogs so// / phyag 'tshal brgya byin me lha tshangs pa// rlung lha sna tshogs dbang phyug mchod ma// 'byung po ro langs dri za rnams dang // gnod sbyin tshogs
36a1(rgyud 'grel): kyis mdun nas bstod ma// 'jig rten las 'dus 'jig rten b+hi// che rnams dbang phyug dpal ldan ma// 'jigs chen sdig sbyong sring zhi'i// dngos grub ster mdzad mkhas pas bsgom// pad+ma nyi ma la gnas dmar// zhal
36a2(rgyud 'grel): gcig phyag bzhi rdo rje gri// sdigs 'dzub zhags rnams rjes mthun sgrub// lha tshogs kun la skyob spel ma// las sgrub 'gro le phan yid kyis// dben par dkyil 'khor bzang bya ste// bgegs bsal phrin las gtor ma sbyin// lha mo spyan drangs
36a3(rgyud 'grel): mchod bstod gsol// brgya rtsa brgya bzlas bsgom par bcas// gnas gsum lus ngag yad sdig skyon// sdig gzugs bsam la byab par bya// de rjes dkyil bkrung dang bsreg par bya// lus bkru dang 'jam skyes sdung dang skyes// mkha' la rgyu
36a4(rgyud 'grel): dang rtsod las rgyal// dAn skyugs rgal sogs ltas mthong nas// sdig ldan gzhan yang sbyang bar bya// na mo rang na tra yA ya// na ma ar+yA ba lo kau shwa ra ya/ bo d+hi satwa ya/ ma hA sa twA ya/ ma hA kA ru naM ka kA ya/ oM trA~M re tud tA re tuM re ma ma sa t+yA pA pa/
36a5(rgyud 'grel): sho d+ha ya/ sho d+ha ya/ bi sho d+ha ya bi sho d+ha ya/ sarba b+ha ba sa mun d+ho ts+tsha shwa ra ya swA hA// dngos sam gzugs sam gzugs brnyan la// mi dge kun bsdus stobs bzhir bcas// 'phags pa'i sku gsung thugs bden pas// bdag dang 'gro kun
36a6(rgyud 'grel): smyig bsal ba// rje btsun ma sgrol ma sdig pa las rnam par rgyal ba'i sgrib thabs rdzogs so// / phyag 'tshal trad ces bya dang phaT kyis// pha rol 'khrul 'khor rab tu 'joms ma// g.yas bskum g.yon brkyang zhabs kyis
36b1(rgyud 'grel): mnan te// me 'bar 'khrugs ma shin tu 'bar ma// ma lus chos 'joms lha mo che// trad phaT sgra yis pha rol gnon// pad+ma gser dang nyi ma la// g.yas bskum g.yon brkyang sdang stabs mdzes// tsham rngam gnag cing khros pa'i bzhin//
36b2(rgyud 'grel): na bza' ser mnabs lto 'gros brgyan// phyag bzhi 'khor lo ral gri dang // skye gnas steng zhags sdig 'dzub mdzad// rjes mthun las kyi 'chi bslus la// de las gong mar 'pho bar bya// phyi nang gsang bas 'gro ba la// sgrog sbyin
36b3(rgyud 'grel): tshogs bsags mchod rten bsgrub// lha mo 'dod sbyin yid kyi lhas// sgo gnyis 'jug ldog rlung sbyangs la// gnyug mar gnas pa'i yi ge gsum// gcig tu sdus te steng du 'phang // hig ka sau lam phye taM gyis drangs// 'og min long skyong
36b4(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs skur gyur// dri med chos sku las ma g.yos// sna tshogs gnas su sbrul sku 'phro// rje btsu ni sgrol ma gzhan 'joms 'pho ba zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so// / phyag 'tshal dkon mchog gsum mtshon
36b5(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya// sor mos thugs khar rnam par brgyan ma// ma lus phyogs kyi 'khor los brgyan pa'i// rang gi 'od kyi tshogs rnams 'khrug ma// sangs rgyas chos las legs skyes shing // dge 'dun kun skyong brtse chen ma// phyogs dang phyogs bral
36b6(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo'i bdag/ rang skyes 'od kyis kun skyes bsgom// pad+ma dmar dang zla steng du// ban d+hu ltar dmar phyag bzhi ma// gnyis dang gnyis pas rab dga' yi// rang bzhi na mya ngan med shing 'dzin// rjes mthun las kyi don grubo cing // de
37a1(rgyud 'grel): las mchod tshogs sngon 'gro bas// bsnyen cing bsgrubs nas tshogs bsags te// de nyid gsum gyi byin gyis brlang // byin brlabs ma brlabs yon tan skyon// shes bsal mi gsal bsrung byas te// yongs
37a2(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs maN+Dal gsum pa'i tshang // maN+Dal stegs bzhugs dus bzang brtag/ mchod stod gsol gdab gtor ma sbyin// lha'i rnal 'byor rdzogs ldan pas// dkyil 'khor bris te bum par ni// dbang bskur phyir ni lha rnams bsgrub/ oM
37a3(rgyud 'grel): sarba ta thA ga ta a b+hi she ka sa ma ya shri ye hUM/ bum pa las bzlas pa'o// b+h+rUM aM dz+r-IM khaM hUM bskyed la// slar yang phyags mtshan lha sbyor bas// rigs lnga bsgoms te dbang mchog bskur// khrus byas dris byug kun rdzogs sbyar// oM sarba ta thA
37a4(rgyud 'grel): ga ta kA ya bi sho d+ha na hUM swA hA// sku phyi ba'i sngags so// oM A hUM dzA hUM dzA hUM baM hiHsku gsung thugs byin gyis brlab pa dang // ye shes pa spyan drangs pa'i sngags so// de nas man ngag ldan pa yis// mchod gnas sngags bzlas spyan phye la/ slar
37a5(rgyud 'grel): yang rab tu rgyas pa'i las// mcho cing sbyin sreg bcas mnga' gsol// A~M a tI rI puSh+pe d+hU pe d+hi pa g+han d+he ni pe d+he badz+ra hUM mchod pa'i sngags so// A~M tsak+Shu tsak+Shu sa man ta tsak+Shu bi sho d+ha ya swA hA// thur mas spyan dbye ba'i sngagaso// A~M suM pr-i tiSh+Tha badz+ra
37a6(rgyud 'grel): ya swA hA// me tog la bzlas pa dang gtor mo'i sngags so// A~M hUM hraM su khaM badz+ra b+ha ba shri du d+hiSh+Ti bu khaM/ bzhugs nas maN+Dal dbul ba'i sngags so// zhi ba'i sprin bsreg las kun byed// bstan skyong mchod pos srung bar byed// bsrung 'khor ldan
37b1(rgyud 'grel): byas gnod med byed// gtor ma rgyas byin rgyas par byed// mchog gi mnga' gsol rab gnas kyis// byin brlabs 'bar dang rgyun rings gnas// gang 'dod dpal ster mthu stobs 'phel// gang bsgrubs de 'drar sangs rgyas 'gyur// rje
37b2(rgyud 'grel): btsun sgrol ma mchog stsol ba zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so// / phyag 'tshal tu ri 'jigs pa chen mo// bdud kyi dpa' bo rnam par 'joms ma// chu skyes zhal ni khro gnyer ldan mdzad// dgra
37b3(rgyud 'grel): bo thams cad rab tu gsong ma// 'jigs cheni las skyob 'jigs chen mo// dpa' bo las kyang ches dpa' mo// khros pas dgra gsong dgra chen dgra// dbang skur kun sbyin dbang bdagra bsgom// pad+mar zla steng chu srin gdan// gser mdog dkyil
37b4(rgyud 'grel): dkrung phyed zhal gcig/ a sho ka dang rin chen mchog/ pad+mar bum pas dbang mchog ster// rjes mthun las byas nyon mongs kun sel dbang bsgrub bya// rigs gsum las skyes smon byas te// cho gso sbu gur snying po drang // nyi zla nas
37b5(rgyud 'grel): mkha' sbrang rtsi bcung // lhan cig skyes zhes mi 'bral bsgom// zag dang bcas las zag pa med// zhi ba 'od gsal dmigs bral dag/ mkhas pas lus dang lus med las// me tog rtsi 'am til mar ltar// thabs ldan thabs legs
37b6(rgyud 'grel): legs blangs brten// mthar ni yongs dag mkha' mnyam nyid// rje btsun sgrol ma bdud 'joms dbang ster ma zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so// / phyag 'tshal rab tu dga' bas brjid pa'i// dbu rgyan 'od kyi
38a1(rgyud 'grel): phreng ba spe lA ma// bzhad pa rab bzhad tu tA ra yis// bdud dang 'jig rten dbang du mdzad ma// ting 'dzin dam pas thugs bltam ste// dgyes shing dges pas rol pa'i sngabs// dbu rgyan lnga ye lha 'od kyis// bzhad cing
38a2(rgyud 'grel): rab bzhad bsgom par bya// pad dmar zla steng byi ru'i mdog/ zhal gcig phyag bzhi dang po gnyis// spyi bor bcings dang ral gri 'phyar// a sho ka yi yal ga 'dzin// rjes mthun las rnams sgrub mdzad ma// mnyes byas du mas gsol ba btag
38a3(rgyud 'grel): bgegs bsal gtor ma ston byin la// sa bslang stegs bu bzang po bya// ri rab steng nas gzhal yas khang // bum pa lnga ljon mchod bstod gsol// dam tshigs bskyed la rdzogs par bsgrub// 'bum phrag gsum du bzlas par bya// mig
38a4(rgyud 'grel): gnyis nyi ma zla ba yis// phyogs kun bsregs nas lha mo yI// dkyil 'khor dam pa mkha' la blta// badz+ra u ts+tsha Ta hUM brjod la// 'khyil pa'i sngags brjod gom por brgyar// rngam par byas te dra gur bya// 'byung chen lha mo dbang bzhag
38a5(rgyud 'grel): nas// dkyil 'khor mchog ni rgyas par bris// phyogs bzhi nas gus tshig bzhi yis// gsol btab dam tshig ye shes kyi// dkyil 'khor bskyed dang gzhug sogs bya// bu dang bla ma'i dris lan brjod// maN+Dal sngon song so shing sbyin//
38a6(rgyud 'grel): sngags bcas nyal bas rmi brta DA la// lha yid kun lda na rdul tshon dgod// mchod bstod bsgom zhing bzlas sogs bya// oM d+hA rod badz+ra sa ma ye swA hA// gsang bar gdams te mna' dor la// byin brlabs chu sbyin gdongs g.yogs nas// me tog
38b1(rgyud 'grel): dor te dkyil 'khor gzhug/ rtags ldan brtan pa phyag rgya gdab// oM ta re tud tA re tu re tsi ta maN+Dal badz+ra sa ma ya Sh+To// dkyil 'khor brtan cing gsol btab la// sangs rgyas kun bzhug lha mo yi// rnal 'byor kun ldan ye shes lnga'i// dbang
38b2(rgyud 'grel): bskur slob ma mchog lnga sbyinA// oM aH/ badz+ra o d+hA r+yA sha dz+nyA nA a b+hI shiny+tsa ma~M/ oM badz+ra sa ma d+hi dz+nyA nA rang na A b+h+r-i shiny+tsa maM// oM badz+ra pratI be k+Sha dz+nyA na a b+hI shIn+tu maM/ oM kri t+ya a muSh+TAn+na dz+nyA nA te badz+ra sa b+hI shIny+tsA maM/ A tsakra A mo g+ha dz+nyA na A
38b3(rgyud 'grel): b+hi shiny+tsA me/ de nas rdo rje sbyin te// oM badz+ra sa ma yai Sh+To A b+hi shriny+tsA maM/ de nas rgyan+da dang bsrung ba byin+da la/ oM badz+ra rak+Sha rak+Sha hUM a b+hi shuny+tsi maM/ lung brtan cing dbugs phyung la// oM tI re tud tA re tu re sid d+ha sa myA ya Sh+To sta b+ha bA a b+hi
38b4(rgyud 'grel): shiny+tsi ma/ rdo rje slob dpon nyid du dbang bskur la/ oM te re tud tA re tu re he he a b+hi shiny+tsa maM/ phyir mo ldog par dbang bskur la/ oM badz+ra be war ti a b+hi shi ka b+hi shiny+tsA mi/ chos kyi rgyal por dbang bskur la/ oM d+harma rA dza pra ti swA hA/
38b5(rgyud 'grel): rjesu snang ba'i dbang bskur la// oM badz+ra A nu dz+nyA a b+hi shIny+tsa hUM// 'di dag slob ma'i dbang dwa sde// phal cher bum pa la gnas phyir// bum pa'i dbang du brjod pa yin// dang po sa ni thob par byed// de bzhin gsang ba shes rab kyi
38b6(rgyud 'grel): dbang bskur sa bcu ye shes dang // sku gsung thob byed bla ma'i zha ba// bdud rtsi bzhi pas rdo rje 'dzin// rje btsun sgrol ma mya ngan sel byed kyi dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i yan lag ces bya ba rdzogs so// / phyag 'tshal sa
39a1(rgyud 'grel): bzhi skyong ba'i tshogs rnams// thams cad 'gugs par nus ma nyid ma// khro gnyer g.yo ba'i yi ge hUM gis// phongs pa thams cad rab tu sgrol ma// dpal ldan sa skyong phyogs rnams dang // phyogs bral ma lus 'gugs byed
39a2(rgyud 'grel): ma||de nyid snying po ra ba g.yos paso// phongs pa mtha' dag sel mdzad bsgom// rjes mthun cho gas las bsgrubs nas// padi nyi la bzhugs g.yas brkyang rol// man mdog zhal gcig phyag gnyis g.yas// lcags kyu gza' 'gugs zhags
39a3(rgyud 'grel): rnams 'ching // dpal mo bsnyen pas 'gro phan yid// brgya rtsa brgyad ni gus bsgom la// pad+ma 'am bil 'bras de bzhin du// ka ra bi ra'i mes mchod bya// bum bzang snod du lnga phrag lnga// rin chen gzug sgras snying po gzhug/ gang 'dod gzhir ni bge
39a4(rgyud 'grel): bsal la// lha mo nor gyi dbang phyug bsten// mA~M d+hA re t+yA d+hA ri tu re dza~M b+he mo hrI swAhA// rje btsun sgrol ma 'gro ba 'gugs shing phongs pa sel ma zhes bya ba'i sgrub thubs rdzogs so// / phyag 'tshal zla ba'i dum bus dbu rgyan// brgyan
39a5(rgyud 'grel): pa thams cad rab tu 'bar ma// ral pa'i khrod nas 'od dpag med las// rtag par shin tu 'od ni mdzag ma// gang gis gsol btab bkra shis dang // dge legs rgyas mdzad zla tshes brgyan// 'od dpag med las 'od mdzegs pas// bsod
39a6(rgyud 'grel): nams 'od dpung 'bar mdzad bsgom// mtshan mas rjes mthun las bsgrubs nas// slar yang chu skyes ri bong can// rdo rje'i dkyil dkrung gis gnon dpal// gser mdog zhal gcig phyag brgyang blta// rtse gsum lcags kyu rdo rje gri/ rin chen
39b1(rgyud 'grel): lcags kyu dbyug gu gril ba// thugs rjes tshur gcod rjes 'dzin mA// rgyun mi 'chad par 'dod ster ma'o// shis pa'i phyogs su thub brtsigs te// dbusu taM ldan ud dpal bskor// bsreg rdzas g.yas dang mchod rdzas g.yon// 'o ma
39b2(rgyud 'grel): can shing sbrang rtsi mar// bsangs te sor sor byin gyis brlab// rin tshoni las byas tshad ldan gyi// dgang gzar blugs gzar rdo rje dril// bsangs te ku shas btsal bkral bya// rgyun bzhags bram ze'i mes sbar la// bsang zhing rlung yab kyi
39b3(rgyud 'grel): bskyod bya// 'bar ba'i ched du lan gsum gsum// bdag med byin za mchod gnas bstim// pad+ma'i 'dug stangs lan gnyis te// gsum gsum gyis ni lan bdun du// mar gyi dgang blugs gus pas sbyin// rnal 'byor ldan pas rtse gcig/
39b4(rgyud 'grel): A~M a ga ne ye a dri bya// A bi sa ma ya ra shri ye d+ya b+h+ya ka b+h+ra ma hA ka na swA hA// me ltas ngan na bgegs dgra bzlog/ bzang na gsol btab dngos grub blang // sdig ldan spangs nas gso sbyong can// gus shing snying rje ldan pas mchod// A~M
39b5(rgyud 'grel): b+hi b+ha k+Sha ag ne yau ma ma shan ti ku ru swA hA// rdo rjes dgang blugs zhalnga bsil bya// mchod bstod 'dod don gsol ba gdab// de rjes lha bskyed sogs mchod nas// dgang blugs phul la rdzas rnams mchod// na mo rang na tra yA ya/
39b6(rgyud 'grel): na mo ar+ya pa lo ki tai shwa ra ya// bo d+hi sa twa ya/ me hA swa tra/ ma hA ka ru ni kA ya/ oM tA re tu tA ra ma ma sha ti ku ru swA hA// dgang blugs dbul zhing mchod stong la// sla yang maM lha skyes rdzas dbul// mchod bstod gshegs shing
40a1(rgyud 'grel): byang chub bsngo// kun don 'phrin las thams cad 'grub// rje btsun sgrom ma bkra shis thams cad sbyin ma sbyin bsreg bya ba'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so// / phyag 'tshal skal pa
40a2(rgyud 'grel): tha ma'i me ltar// 'bar ba'i phreng ba dbus na gnas ma// g.yas brkyang g.yon bskum kun 'khor dga'i// dgra'i dpung ni rnam par 'joms ma// smin byed brlag byed dpa' mo ni// mi bzang me dpung dbus na brjod// brten byed
40a3(rgyud 'grel): sdang byed dga' mdzad cing 'joms byed drag gzugs can de bsgom// pad+ma dmAr dang nyi ma la// bzhengs pa'i dor stobs brkyang bskum ma// mi bzang ra gA lhor dmar mdog/ kun du 'phro zhing kun sreg mdzad// zhal gcig phyag bzhi
40a4(rgyud 'grel): mchu sman g.yo// ral gri mnga' dang 'khor lo gzhu// gcod 'bigs gshog cing bsnun byed las// bgegs dgra phra rab rdul mi gnas// gser mdog nor bu in tra dang // sbur long 'phags pa'i gdung thal dang // b+h+r-i ha ta dang
40a5(rgyud 'grel): gu gul dang // bdud rtsi lnga sogs sbyar ba'i spros// rnal 'byor ldan pas bdug byas na// stong phrag brgya bcu'i ma lus bgegs// nags mes shing skam ji bzhin 'joms// rim sogs dug sogs de bzhin no// bsgrub bya'i gzugs
40a6(rgyud 'grel): la lha mo yi// nga rgyal gyis bkug tsu bo mo'i shing // rtem phral ling ga btubs nas bsregs// bsnyen bsgrub las las go rim bzhin// 'bum phrag stong phrag brgya rtsa brgyad// bzlas te khro mo haM khung zhal// phul na gsum bdun nyi
40b1(rgyud 'grel): shu rtsa gcig/ zhag gis tshangs par gyur kyang gsod// oM tA re tud tA re tu re d+harma d+ha re hUM/ s+pho Da b+ha sni ku ru hUM hUM hUM phaT phaT phaHswAp+parje btsun sgrol ma yongasu smin pas dgra bgegs bzhom pa'i bsgrub thabs zhes bya ba rdzogaso//
40b2(rgyud 'grel): phyag 'tshal sa gzhi'i ngos la phyag gi/ 'thil gyis bskrun cing zhabs kyis rdung ma// khro gnyer g.yo ba'i yi ge hU~M gis// rim pa bdun po rnams ni 'gems mo// 'gugs byed bsnun byed rdung byed ma// yig mcho ga 'dzin rim gnyis
40b3(rgyud 'grel): bdun 'gems// lha mo nyid bsnyen gus pa yi// zhe sdang dang bral khro bas bsgrub// stag zil gnag mdog zhal gsum ma// g.yas dkar g.yon dmar khros pa'i zhal// thos pa'i dri shal rgyu mo gsol// sbrul brgyad kyis brgyan stag
40b4(rgyud 'grel): lpags gsol// phyag drug ral gri lcags kyu drung // dbyug gu de bzhin tha~Md khrag bkang // zhags pa'i tshangs pa'i mgo 'dzin ma// khams gsum rim bdun gcig char 'gems// rjes mthun las rnams ston song bas//
40b5(rgyud 'grel): dang dkar dris byug lho sbyor gyis// chu skyes gau sne R+Sha A~M dang A'o// mtha' rten 'dab brgyad 'khru brgyad bri// bden pazhi'i sbyin 'brel mtha' bskor dang // rigs lnga'i snying pos brgyan pa yi// sna tshogs rdo rje mdzes pa dang // a
40b6(rgyud 'grel): ka li mu khyud bskor// mthar byed sngags dang ral gri yi// ra ba phyi rol rim gnyis dgod// de nas 'bar ba'i ra ba ste// shis pa'i snag tshas mnyam gzhag bri// mchod cing ye shes 'khor lo gzhug/ nga rgyal ldan pas rgyas
41a1(rgyud 'grel): btab la// bdug pas bdug cing mgul du gdags// 'di yis mi bsrung gang yang med// rje btsun sgrol ma 'gugs byed mas bsrung ba'i 'khor lo bya ba'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so//
41a2(rgyud 'grel): phyag 'tshal bde ma dge ma zhi ma// mya ngan 'das zhing spyod yul nyid ma// swAhUM oM dang yang dag ldan ma// sdig pa chen po 'joms pa nyid ma// lha mo bde mas mtho ris sbyin// dge mas thar pa sbyin pa ste// de bzhin zhims rdzogs sang sa rgyus
41a3(rgyud 'grel): s+t+rIn+ti mdzad sdig 'joms bsgom par bya// pad+ma dkar dang zla ba lnga// rdo rje dkyil dkrung kun da'i mdog/ phreng ba mchod sbyin dbyig gu dang // pad+ma spyi thugs po ti 'dzin// rno ba'i bsnyen ldan khrus byas te/ bge Da bsal bsod na las spel phyiro//
41a4(rgyud 'grel): lho sbyor ldan dang rdzas tshang dang // dang dong snying rjes brtson pas yid // nyams dga'i phyogs stegs bu bca'// sna tshogs pad+ma 'dab bzhi ldan// rdo rje phreng mdzes bskor zhing // phyogs skyong bkra shis rtags ldan bri// ral gyi me long mda' dang
41a5(rgyud 'grel): du// rma byA tshon skud dung dkar sogs// ba d+yAr zla bre rgyal mtshan gdugs// mye tog phreng sogs mchod gtor baM shams// lha mo'i ting 'dzin las sprul pa// rin chen khang brtsegs rgya che nang // dngos gru'i mtsho skyes bcom ldan ma/
41a6(rgyud 'grel): chog gsum gyis ba skyeng gzhug mchod// ma mo rang na tra yA ya/ na maHir+ya ba ma ki te shwa ra ya/ bo d+hi swad+ha ya/ ma hA swa tra ya ma hA ki ru mi kA ya/ I ta re tu tA re tu re sarba gra he de sarba bya d+d+he/ sarba dur swa pa ni d+h+ya/ sarba pa paM pra sha ma ye swA hA/
41b1(rgyud 'grel): rig pa'i rgyal mo'i mthu' skor du// gzungs mdzes kyis ni brgya stong grangs// bskor zhing 'khro 'du'i 'od 'bar bas// gzhu ste bdud rtsi'i rdzing bur byas// dug srel sgros byab sdig gdon sogs// mi sdug gzugs su phyag byas khrus// rig sngags
41b2(rgyud 'grel): bkra shis bcas te gdon// rjes la mchod bstong bzod par gsol// lam gcig lan gsum lnga dang bdun// khrus byas nang sel gdon zhi byed// sdig 'joms don kun sgrub 'gyur te// rtag tu byas nas dngos grub thob// rje btsun
41b3(rgyud 'grel): sgrol ma zhi ba chen mo phye khrus kyi cho ga'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so// / phyag 'tshal kun nas bskor ra'i dga' ba'i// dgra'i dpung ni rab tu 'grems ma// yi ge bcu pa'i sngags ni bkod pa yis// rig pa hUM las sgrol ma
41b4(rgyud 'grel): nyid ma// yid gzhungs dran so Da kun nas bskor// mi shes dgra dpung rab 'joms ma// blo gros yi ge bcu dkod pas// hUM las snying zhi'i mun sgrol bsgom// pad+ma'i ge ser nyi ma la// sems dpa'i dkyil dkrung byi ru'i mdog/ dgra 'jom
41b5(rgyud 'grel): rtse gsum thags khar 'dzin// 'bras bcas shing rnams sdig 'dzub 'phyar// thugs kyi snying po rig pa mchog/ yi ge bcus bskor 'dod pa yi// dngos grub kun ster blo gros spel// thams cad snying gi dbus gnas ma'o// thugs rjel
41b6(rgyud 'grel): rang bzhin shes rab mchog/ gcig tu phan mdzad dngos grub sbyin// ji ltar gzhan blo spel de ltar// bdag gis blo mchog rgyas par mdzad// ngag gi dbang phyug zhi phra dmar// bdag gyur g.yas g.yon mdun du rgyab tu// yid gzhungs
42a1(rgyud 'grel): dran dang shes rab dang // blo 'phel lha mo bzhi bsgom bya// srid pa'i 'khor lo zla ba'i dbus// rnam snang sgrol ma las byung dngos// rtsa rig 'od kyis mun sel byed// mi smra'i sbyor bas gsang sngags bzlas//
42a2(rgyud 'grel): u ta re tud tA re tu re hriHma hA mA yAM ga pra dz+nyA b+hid+hi ma hA sa ra sa dz+ye na ma pra ti ta pa ri shung sangaHsarba d+harma pra ti ta pa ri shud d+ho ho/ sarba ma hA b+ha ya a b+ha yan ta ra swA hA// sman rnams sbyor bas bzlas nas ni// zla ba drug dang gsum mam
42a3(rgyud 'grel): gcig/ zos nas thos mang 'dzin pa dang // tshe ldan tshangs pa'i nga ro 'thob// de bzhin gser mdog dri ldan sngags// zla gcig zla gsum zla ba drug/ bsnyen pas yid zhungs dran ldan zhing // blo 'phel dag gi dbang phyug 'gyur// rje
42a4(rgyud 'grel): btsun sgrol ma dgra 'jom snga mas blo 'phel ba zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so// / phyag 'tshal tu re zhabs kyis brngubs pas// hUM gi rnam pa'i sa bon nyid ma// ri rab man d+hA ra dwang 'bigs byed//
42a5(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten gsum g.yo ba nyid ma// bde ldan lha mos zhabs brdabs pas// 'jig rten gsum g.yo 'jigs par byed// hUM yig sa bon las skyes mgon// ri rab kun spyod dbang sdud bsgom// rab dkar pad dbus nyi ma la// hU~M yig
42a6(rgyud 'grel): las skyes kun bde ster// sems dpa'i dkyil dkrung dmar ser mdzes// phyag gnyis ro bong 'dzin bsnams pa// de bsnyen dben par gtsang khang bsham// zhi mdzad lha la me tog gi/ maN+Dal mchod bcas gtor mar bcas// de bzhin gtum
42b1(rgyud 'grel): mo me mchod bcas// chom rkun lnga sogs snying brtseg pas// lha mo gtor ma 'dod byin la// yan lag dgu ldan mchod byas nas// zhi drag gnyis kar gsol ba gdab// snying kha'i 'od kyis sems can khams// kun bsgrubs slar
42b2(rgyud 'grel): yang thugs rje yi// oM lhas bsil zer te de steng taM// yongs gyur sngar gzugs lha mo yi// g.yas g.yon mi 'jigs ud pal can// sna tshogs rgyan mdzes lha rdzas kyi// mchod sprin dbus bzhugs che gus mchod// mgul
42b3(rgyud 'grel): rgyan gdub bu do shal 'dzin// 'bras bu gsum gyis na mkha' yi// tshon gzugs dang bltas gsal bar bya// phyag gi bdud rtsis bdag skyong par// bsams la gsang sngags lo grangs gdon// na mo ar+ya pa lo ki twe shwa ra ya/
42b4(rgyud 'grel): bo d+hi sA tA ya/ ma hA sA tA ya/ ma hA kA ru nai ka ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM tA re tud tA re tu r-i sar+b+ba duSh+yAna? pra duSh+TA na ma ma~M kr-i tan/ dze b+ha paM/ staM b+ha ya/ mo hA ya/ ban d+ha ban d+ha yA/ hUM hUM hUM phaT phaT phaT/ sarba s+t+waM b+ha ni tA re swA hA/ phyi'i phyag rgya
42b5(rgyud 'grel): zhabs 'og mnan// rlung gi dbugs kyis drangs te bsreg/ sgrub bya'i 'khor lo btsongs te dril// de skyong lha ni gtor mas bskrang // gang 'gro'i phyogasu dpal chen mo// zhal bzangs bdag la gzigs par bris me// de lo bstod dang bzla
42b6(rgyud 'grel): gsol bya// des ni 'jigs pa kun sgrub 'gyur// rje btsun ma sgrol ma bde ldan mas chom rkun bcing ba'i sgribs thabs rdzogs so// / phyag 'tshal lha'i mtsho'i rnam pa yi// ri dgas rtags can phyag
43a1(rgyud 'grel): nA bsnamaswa// ta ra gnyis brjod bcwa mi gas// dug rnams ma lus par na sel ma// 'apags mA lha'i ngang ba 'dzin ma// zag med pa rgyas dug sel ma// mnyes par byas dang sngags sbyar bas// dug rnams
43a2(rgyud 'grel): las rgyal bsgom par bya// pad+ma pa/ ra steng zla dbus su// 'dab bzang khri steng dkyil dkrung bzhugs// gnyis kyi spyi bor lcags kyu 'dzin// gzhan gnyis mchod sbyin po ti bsnams// lha mnyes rnal 'byor ldan pa yis// gdon rigs lnga yi dug
43a3(rgyud 'grel): brtags la// rdzas rigs lnga la gsang sngags lnga// 'bum phrag gsum bzlas gnas lngar byug/ oM tA re tud tA re tu ro ku ru ku l+le hriHsarba sha traM b+han k+Sha ya hUM hUM na gA staM paM ya b+haR+Sha ya b+han+d+ha ya raM yaM khaM suM ra re na re ba ne hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ dam tshig rdzas ni
43a4(rgyud 'grel): dang po la// gu gul gla rtsi shu dag dang // ru sta tsan dug shing khun nyid// glu zhin bskyong bcas sbyar ba'o// gnyis pa nyis 'gyur shu thag gla// ru rta gu gul mu zi nyid// ro ras rgya tshil gshin dri chen// phag bcud sgog sgyu ma hU ra~M// mi yi bcud dang
43a5(rgyud 'grel): rus pa'i phye// mi yi bcud sdus ril bu'o// snga ma'i nyis 'gyur bsnyen pa yis// rig pa nyid dang lha sbyor nyid// gsum pa la ni sum 'gyur nyid// gzhan yang klu dug bdud rtsi bsten// bzhi pa yang na bzhi 'gyur nyid// klu dug rnam rgyal brten/
43a6(rgyud 'grel): par bya// lnga pa lnga 'gyur a ru ra// mi bskyod gla rtsi khyad par brten// nyid 'od mun pa mi yis rdul// ji bzhin dug rnams 'joms par byed// rje btsun ma sgrol ma rnam par rgyal mas klu nad gso ba'i bsgrub thabs rdzogs so//
43b1(rgyud 'grel): phyag 'tshal lha'i tshogs rgya lho dang // lha dang mi 'am ci yis bsten ma// kun nas go cha dga' ba'i brjid kyis// rtsod dang rmi lam dran pa sel ma// sa gsum dbang pos rab mchod cing // kun nas dga' bskyod 'brar ba yis// gzi yis
43b2(rgyud 'grel): ltoltas na sdug bsngal spel// brtson pas dus drug bsgom par bya// pad+ma dkar dang nyi steng du// g.yas brkyang dkyil dkrung kun da'i mdog/ sna tshogs 'od phreng sku brgyan nas// me thab bsnams shing sdug bsngal bsreg/ bltas mthong bsnyen
43b3(rgyud 'grel): pas 'phags ma nyid// skyabs sbyor gzhan spangs nas ni// ba lang lci blugs dkyil 'khor bya// dbus su gsung thugs sku bskyed bya// de nyid spyan drangs mchod sngo 'gro// gsol btab snying brdzis sbyin pa gso// khri brtson lo grangs
43b4(rgyud 'grel): ban+d+ha rtsa brgyad// mchod bstod gsol ba ma yengs bya// na mo rang na tra yA ya/ na mo ar+ya ba lo ki twe shwa ra ya/ bo d+hi swa tra ya/ ma~M hA swa tra ya/ ma hA ka ru na~M kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ ra dza g+ha d+harmi/ nir yi tAM/ ta re ta ra ya/ b+ha ga ba te tud tA re b+hU ma b+ha ya/
43b5(rgyud 'grel): mo ts+yai t+tA swAd+d+ha// rje btsun ma sgrol ma sdug bsngal blo steg pasna khri m+b+han las thar ba'i sgru thungs rdzogs so// / phyag 'tshal nyi m+b+ha zla ba rgyas pa'i// spyan gnyis pos las 'od rab gisal ma/
43b6(rgyud 'grel): tAr mnyis porjod drung tA ro yos// shin tu dres pa'i rims ni sil ma// ye shes sna mo ye shes skyer// rab gsal bsgribs dang ma bsgribs gzigs// ngas 'gro dang ni sring ba'i nang / nyon mi ma bcas 'jobs bsgoms par bya
44a1(rgyud 'grel): 'dams skyes dmar steng zla ba la// sems dpa'i dkyil dkrung gser rnangs mngog/ phyag gnyis drugs kha gas bum lnga ma// mang 'joms dngos glu kun gyi mdzad// 'du blangs mig tu
44a2(rgyud 'grel): mkhris pa rnams// ri rab kyis bcas ga bur gzhug/ lha mo nyid sku gsung dang thugs// yi ge gsum bskyed bsrung ba'i mchog/ rig pa'i rgyal mo taM yig gis// myig smin bsdus nas kun mthong zhing // gzhan mthong mi mthong sbyin par byed//
44a3(rgyud 'grel): sbeskye byed gzungs ni 'bum phrag bzlas// na mo rang na tra yA ya/ na mo ar+ya pa lo ki te shwa ra ya/ b+ho d+hi sr-i tra ya/ ma hA swa tra ya/ ma hA kA ru Di kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM tA ri tA re tI rA ya/ dza ye dza ye/ tud tA ra dza ya/ b+h+yo hau tA re swA hA/
44a4(rgyud 'grel): rje btsun sgrol ma dngos grub 'byung bas mi snang bar byed pa'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so// / phyag 'tshal de nyid gsum rnams bkod pas// zhi ba'i mthu dang yang dag ldan ma// gdon dang ro langs
44a5(rgyud 'grel): gnod sbyin tshogs rnams// 'joms pa tu re rab mchog nyid ma// lha dang sngags dang ting 'dzin gyis// de nyid gsum bkod mthun chen mo// gnas gsum gnod pa'i tshogs 'joms ma// yi ge gnyis ldan bsgom par
44a6(rgyud 'grel): bya/ cho ga kun ldan rjes mthun pa'i// lha bsnyen mchod bzlas goms pa yis// de nyid gsum ni rtag tu dran// yongs rdzogs mkhas sbyong 'grub par 'gyur// ha skyes khyu mchog pad zla la// dkyil dkrung phyed bzhugs stag
44b1(rgyud 'grel): sham can// zhal gcig rnam thar spyan gsum phyag/ mu tig phreng dang mdung rtse gsum// skar mdog rab dkar mun sel byed// gsang sngags dgra yis srid gsum 'gengs// dug gsum mdung rtse gsum gyis bsnun//
44b2(rgyud 'grel): bsgrub la dngos grub kun rdzogs mdzod// de yis mkhas spyod mthong ster ma// lha bsnyen yid kyi shugs goms paso// zangs lcags gser la ral gri bya// tshad ldan+da A la~M bcu phreng brgyan// sngags pa sa rab 'brang
44b3(rgyud 'grel): tha mo'i rtags// sgra dang me stag 'od 'phro bar// mthong nas chags med yid kyis bskyod// de bzang 'dab gshog bya bzhin 'gro/ o tA re tud ta re tuM re a mo g+ha sid d+ha kharga pra sod d+hi/ lo kra a lo kau tASh+Tha rang na tsa la
44b4(rgyud 'grel): tsa la hUM hUM baM baM s+t+waM swA hA// rje btsun sgrol ma yongs su rdzogs byed mas mkha' spyod kyi sgrub thabs rdzogs so// / 'phags mchog lha mo yid bzhin dbang gyi rgyal
44b5(rgyud 'grel): po 'di/ nyi shu rtsa gcig bcas bstod pa'i rgyal po rjes sgrub thabs/ sgrol ma mngon 'byung le'u lnga brgya bdun cu par/ gang gsungs gsal byas de dges 'gro yid mun sel shog/
44b6(rgyud 'grel): bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub bra rje btsun 'phags ma sgrol ma la ji stong pa nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'i bsgrubs thabs rje btsun lha mo mchog nyid kyis skus rjes su bzung ba'o/ slob dpon chen po nyi ma
45a1(rgyud 'grel): zhabs kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// / dpal chos kyi rje ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas gsum par grags pa'i paN+Di ta
45a2(rgyud 'grel): chen po bsod snyoms pa khwa che shAkya shrI b+ha dra dang / lo tsa ba byams pa'i dpal gyis bong yul dbus kyi gtsug lag khang chen po sol nag thang po che dang
45a3(rgyud 'grel): pho brang dam pa khra 'brug gi gtsug lag khang du bsgyur ba'o// // / sarba maH
46a1(rgyud 'grel): sgrol ma'i bstod pa rnam dag gtsug nor yang sgrol mdzad ma rnams slob dpon nyi ma sbas pas mdzad pa bzhugs/
46b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya bi tA re e ka baM shang sto tra bi shud+d+ha tsu D+hA la Ni na ma/ bod skad du/ 'phags ma lha mo sgrol ma la bstod pa rnam ngag gtsug gi nor bu zhes bya ba/ mgon po thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa
46b2(rgyud 'grel): gas pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyag la phyag 'tshal lo// phyag 'tshal rab tu dpal ba'i sgrol ma// spos med rnam dag na mkha'i dkyil na// pad+ma gser mdog gdan la bzhugs pa'i// sku mdog dmar mo me'i 'od can// phyag 'tshal zhal
46b3(rgyud 'grel): cig phyag brgyad spyan rgyas// dga' ba'i phyag rgya dang po gnyis ni// rdo rje dril bu spyi bor bsnol nas// de 'og mnga' gzhu thugs dkar 'dzin ma// phyag 'tshal gsum pas 'khor lo bsnams te// bzhi pa shes rab ral gri 'debs tshul// g.yon gyi
46b4(rgyud 'grel): gsum pas thugaso kar dung 'dzin// bzhi pa la ni zhags pas brgyan ma// phyag 'tshal dkar mo zla mdangs sgrol ma// sku gsum rdzogs pa'i zhal gsum g.yas sngo// g.yon zhal 'dzam+bu chu bo'i gser mdog/ rten 'brel drag pa'i phyag ni bcu gnyis//
46b5(rgyud 'grel): phyag 'tshal dang po mnyam pa'i phyag rgya// gnyis pa na ni kha T+wAM ga bsnams// 'bar ba'i 'khor lo gsum pas legs 'dzin// bzhi pas yid bzhin no rU bsnams ma// phyag 'tshal lnga pas rdo rje rab 'chang // drug pa na ni me tog phreng 'dzin// g.yon
46b6(rgyud 'grel): gyi gnyis pa ril pa spyi blugs// nyon mongs dri ma ma lus 'khrung ma// phyag 'tshal gsum pas ud pal legs 'dzin// stong pa'i sgra sgrog bzhi pa dril bu// lnga pas gter gyi bum pa thog ma// drug pa po ti 'gro la chos ston// phyag 'tshal gser mdog
47a1(rgyud 'grel): can gyi sgrol ma// sna tshogs pad+ma nyi ma'i gdan la// rdo rje dkyil dkrung shin tu brjing mdzes// phyag bcu pha rol phyin bcu dag ma// phyag 'tshal dang po thugs dkar 'phreng 'dzin// gnyis pa na nI shes
47a2(rgyud 'grel): dz+ra kha gri// gsum pa mda' 'phen nyon mongs 'big ma// bzhi pa rdo rje lnga pa dbyug gu/ phyag 'tshal g.yon gyi dang po dar dbyangs// gnyis pa zhags pa gsum pa pad+ma// bzhi pa'i phyag gis dril bu dkrol ma// lnga pa na ni snying rje'i gzhu
47a3(rgyud 'grel): thogs// phyag 'tshal gtsug tor rgyal ba'i sgrol ma// chu skyes ser po dag gi steng na// zag med bde rgyas zla ba'i gdan steng // sems dpa'i dkyil dkrungs brtan par bzhugs ma// phyag 'tshal dge ma gser gyis mdog can// thugs rje'i rang
47a4(rgyud 'grel): bzhin 'gro la rab ster// zhal cig phyag bzhi bdud rnams 'joms ma// g.yas kyi dang po dngos grub mchog stsol// phyag 'tshal rgyan mi 'chad pa'i bsam gtan// 'og ma yis ni phreng ba 'dzin ma// g.yon gyi dang po phyag mtshan g+han d+he/
47a5(rgyud 'grel): gnyis pa rin chen dbyug gu bsnams ma// phyag 'tshal hUM sgra sgrogs pa'i sgrol ma// dri med zla ba'i gdan gyi steng na// nyon mongs skyen bral dag pa'i sku mdog/ btso ma g.ya' bral gser gyi mdangs ldan// phyag 'tshal dpa' mo shes
47a6(rgyud 'grel): rab bdag nyid// thugs rje'i 'khor bzhed par mnan nas// ma rungs 'dul phyir hUM gi sgra sgrogs// dus gsum srid pa'i g.yul los rgyal ma// phyag 'tshal bden pa dag pa'i phyag rgya// 'gro rnams thugs rjes rab tu gzung phyir// g.yas
47b1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i phyag gis skyab sbyin mdzad cing // g.yon pas pad+ma ser po 'dzin ma// phyag 'tshal rnam par rgyal ba'i sgrol ma// chu skyes dmar po rgyas pa'i steng na/ gti mug dag phyir nyi ma'i gdan bting // sems dpa'i dkyil dkrung 'gro la gzig
47b2(rgyud 'grel): ma/ phyag 'tshal lha dang drang song rnams kyis// khyod zhabs pad+ma spyi bor blang nas// thugs rje che mnga' khyod la rab stong / 'gro ba kun g+hi re nas gyur ma// phyag 'tshal pad+ma ra ga'i mdangs ldan// phyag bzhi g.yas kyi dang po na ni// rje
47b3(rgyud 'grel): rje 'phyar zhing de 'og ral gri/ g.yon pas sdigs mdzub zhags pa bsnams ma// phyag 'tshal rgol ba 'joms pa'i sgrol ma// pad+ma gser dang nyi ma'i gdan la// dpa' ba'i stang stabs 'gying bag g.yon rkyang // tshab rngam nag mo khros
47b4(rgyud 'grel): 'i bzhin 'phyar// phyag 'tshal na bza' gser mdog gyon nas// dbu skra gyen brdzes bltos 'gros rgyan te// rin chen cod paN mkha' la rab 'phyar// phyag zhabs rin chen gdu bus rgyam ma// phyag 'tshal phyag bzhi g.yas kyi dang
47b5(rgyud 'grel): po// 'khor lo 'dzin cing gnyis pa ral gri/ skye nas steng du zhags pa bsnams nas// g.yon gyi tha ma sdig 'dzub rab sngangs// phyag 'tsha lnga dbang mchogro gter ba'i sgrol ma// pad+ma dmar dang zla bo'i steng na// gdug pa 'dul phyir
47b6(rgyud 'grel): khro bo'i gdan steng // dkyil dkrungs phyed ma gser gyi mdog can// phyag 'tshal khro ba'i gnyer ma dang ldan// brjid pa'i sku mtsho ga zhal cig phyag bzhi// g.yas na mya ngan med pa'i yal ga/ gnyis pa rin chen bsnams shing
48a1(rgyud 'grel): mchog stsol// phyag 'tshal g.yon gyi dang po pad+ma// nyon mongs skyon gyis mgos phyir rnams// g.yon gyi tha ma bum pa legs thogs// 'gro ba kun la dbang mchog ster ma// phyag 'tshal seng ldeng nas
48a2(rgyud 'grel): gis sgrol ma// yi ge taM las 'khrungs pa'i lha mo// zhal cig phyag gnyis zhi ba'i gzugs can// chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes mtshon pas// phyag 'tshal skad dkyil me tog gis rgyan// mdzes ma g.yas rkyang zhabs la g.yon pas// thabs
48a3(rgyud 'grel): dang shes rab mi 'bral rab 'khyil// pad+ma zla ba'i steng na bzhugs ma// phyag 'tshal g.yas pas 'gro la mchog stsol// phyag g.yon ut+pal rgyan rnams yongs rdzogs// sngon ljang 'gying bag ra smai'i mdog can// gzhon nu spyan drang nu ma
48a4(rgyud 'grel): rgyas ma// phyag 'tshal 'khor lo bsgyur zhing 'dod pa// thams cad rab tu ster ba'i sgrol ma// yi ges las 'khrungs pa'i lha mo// zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa yi gzugs can// sku mdog pad+ma ra ga ltar dmar// pad+ma dmar dang zla ba'i
48a5(rgyud 'grel): gdanA la// rin chen la sogs rgyun gyis brgyan te// zhabs gnyis bgrang pa'i gyad kyis bzhugs ma// thubs dang shes rab mi 'bral phyag gnyis// dang pos rdo dril busnams te// rab tu 'ga' bas spyi bor bsnol ma// g.yas 'og
48a6(rgyud 'grel): gar gyi phyag rgya dang ldan// g.yon gyi gnyis po mi sho gaka yi// yal ga 'bras bur bcas pa bzung nas// 'gro ba kun gyi rin chen char rgyun// mchog sbyin phyag gis rab tu 'bib ma// las kun bsgrub phyir rta mchog dbu rgyan// sangs
48b1(rgyud 'grel): rgyus kun gyi rang bzhin nyid ma// phyag 'tshal mya ngan sal ba m+b+ha la ma// sna chags pad+ma par ba steng na// zla ba dkyil 'khor zhabs kyis man garol par 'dug snang 'byung bag mdzes ma// phyag 'tshal 'jug rten dbyung du mdzad ma/
48b2(rgyud 'grel): sku mdog pad+ma ra ga ltar dmar// gzhang pa'i gong rgyang tud tA re yi// 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal ma lus sel ma// phyag 'tshal zhal gcig phyag bzhi bdud 'dul// dang po gnyis ni spyi bor tha sbyar// g.yas 'og ral gri'i phyag rgya dang
48b3(rgyud 'grel): ljon// g.yon na mya ngan med pa'i yal ga/ phyag 'tshal 'gro ba 'gugs pa'i sgrol ma// gzi brjid phung po nyi ma'i steng na// pad+ma'i gdan la rol pas g.yas rkyang // 'gying bag nag mo dbang gi las mdzad// phyag 'tshal dpa'
48b4(rgyud 'grel): me gyad kyi cha byad // mtshan mo'i sbyin rum mun pa'i mdog can// shin tu 'jigs rung bdud dpung zil mnon// nor gyi char 'bebs 'phongs pa sel ma// phyag 'tshal yi ge hUM gi sbyor bas// phyogs mtshams rnams nas gza'
48b5(rgyud 'grel): chen 'gugs ma// zhal cig phyag gnyis g.yas na lcags kyu// g.yon nu rol pas zhags pa bsnams ma// phyag 'tshal bkra shis snang ba'i sgrol ma// sna tshogs pad+ma zla ba'i gdan+da lo// rdo rje dkyil dkrung gser gyi mdangs ldan//
48b6(rgyud 'grel): zhal gcig phyag brgyad zla tshes brgyan ma// phyag 'tshal g.yas kyis dang po rtse gsum// gnyis pa ni ni thugs rje'i lcags kyu// gsum pa'i rdo rjes bdud kyis dpung 'jims// bzhi pas shes rab ral gri bsnams ma// phyag 'tshal
49a1(rgyud 'grel): g.yon gyis nor bu blugs khar// longs spyod spel byir 'gro la gat+te ma// gnyis pa lcags kyu gsum pa dbyug su// bzhi pas nor gyi bum pa thogs ma// phyag 'tshal smin par byed pa'i sgrol ma// bskal pa'i mi
49a2(rgyud 'grel): ltar 'bar ba'i dbus na// pad+ma dmar dang nyi ma'i gdanA la// bzhengs pa'i dor thibs g.yos brkyang g.yon bskum// phyag 'tshal sku mdog shin tu mi zad// pad+ma ra ga lta bu dmar zhing // dpal ba'i cha byang zhal gcig phyag bzhi// dragra mo chen ma
49a3(rgyud 'grel): dgra dpung 'joms ma// phyag 'tshal g.yas kyi dang po ral gri// gnyis pa mda' yisra nyon mongs 'bigs ma// g.yon pas 'khor lo gnyis pas gzhu thogs// mchu dang sman ma khros pas gyen bzlog/ phyag 'tshal khro granyer g.yo ba'i sgrol ma// pad+ma
49a4(rgyud 'grel): dmar dang nyi ma'i gdan la// g.yas brkyang gar gyi mi yi ro mnan// sku mdog stang zil 'jig pa'i gzugs can// phyag 'tshal zhal dang smin ma rab bsdud// g.yas dkar g.yon dmar khro gnyer dang ljon// dmar ba'i spyan gsum sdang mig rab
49a5(rgyud 'grel): bgrod// mi'i rgyu ma zhal du gsol ma// phyag 'tshal sbrul dang stag go lpags pa// thod pa'i cod paN mgo bo'i do shul// ral gri lcags kyu dbyug gu bsnams ma// g.yon pa thod khrag zhags pa mgo bo// phyag 'tshal dge legs zhi ba'i
49a6(rgyud 'grel): sgrol ma// pad+ma dkar dang zla ba'i gdan la// rdo rje dkyil dkrung kun d+ha'i mdog can// zhal gcig phyag drug sdig pa 'joms ma// phyag 'tshal don rtags g.yas kyi dang po// rgyal ba'i spyod yul thugs dkar phreng 'dzin// gnyis pa legs
49b1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i phyag rgyas mchog sbyin// gsum pa'i phyag gis dbyug gu 'dzin ma// phyag 'tshal g.yon gyi dang po pad+ma// gnyis pa yi ni ril ba spyi blugs// gsum pa mdab rgyas ud pal steng na// 'gro ba'i lam ston po ti bsnams ma// phyag 'tshal
49b2(rgyud 'grel): chags pa 'joms pa sgrol ma// pad+ma dmar ser nyi ma'i gdan la// spros maud sems dpa' dkyil dkrung brjid mdzes// zhal gcig spyan gsum byi ru'i mdog can// phyag 'tshal hUM gIs rigs pa dang ldan// thabs drang shes rab 'brel
49b3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i phyag gnyis// g.yas na rtse gsum thugs khar bsnams nas// dgra bo'i lus la rab tu bsnams ma// phyag 'tshal g.yon pas sdig mdzub rab 'phyar// snying por bcas pa'i 'bras bu'i shing 'dzin// thugs gi snying po yi ge bcu
49b4(rgyud 'grel): pas// dgos pa'i dngos grub rab tu 'byung ma// phyag 'chil badre ba bsgrub pa'i sgrol ma// pad+ma dkar po 'bar ba'i steng na// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gdal ba'i gdan la// sems dpa'i dkyil dkrung dpal bar bzhugs ma// phyag 'tshal bde pa'i/
49b5(rgyud 'grel): sku mdog dmar serar+ya// zhal cig phyag gnyis hUM gi 'phrin las// 'jig rten bdun po dbang du bsdus nas// bde ba thams cad bsgrub pa mdzad ma// phyag 'tshal thogs med na mkha'i lus can// phyag gnyis thugs khar 'dzin pa'i phyag rgya//
49b6(rgyud 'grel): zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rab tu bsnams te// rin chen du ma'i rgyan gyis mdzes ma// phyag 'tshal rnam par rgyal ba'i sgrol ma// pad+ma dkar po'i steng du zla ba'i// dkyil 'khor dbus na 'dab bzang ngong ba'i// steng du sems dpa'i dkyil dkung ba
50a1(rgyud 'grel): ma// phyag 'tshal zag med bde chen rab rgyas// sku mdog dkar mo dung gi mdog can// zhal gcig phyag bzhi ha ra gnyis brjod// phaT gyi yi ges dug rnams sel ma// phyag 'tshal dga' ba'i phyag rgya dang ldan//
50a2(rgyud 'grel): zhal gcig spyi bor lcags kyu rab 'dzin// g.yas 'og mchog sbyin g.yon gyi gnyis pa// ut+pal steng na po ti bsnams ma// phyag 'tshal sdug bsngal bsreg byed sgrol ma// pad dkar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor steng na// bde ba'i 'dug stangs sems dpa'i
50a3(rgyud 'grel): dkyil dkrung // cung zad g.yas brkyang bar bzhugs ma// phyag 'tshal dkar mo kun d+ha'i mdangs ldan// sna tshogs dkar dmar 'od zer phreng bas// 'gying bgo sku la rab tu brgyan nas// 'gro ba'i nyon mongs rab tu sel ma// phyag 'tshal bden pa
50a4(rgyud 'grel): gnyis dag phyag rgya// phyag gnyis thugs khar 'bar thab bsnams nas// sdug bsngal ma lus sreg par mdzad cing // 'gro rnams thar pa'i lam la 'god mdzad// phyag 'tshal dngos grub 'byung gnas sgrol mA// sku mdogau dmar ser las kyi/
50a5(rgyud 'grel): rig mtshon// pad+ma dmar po'i steng du zla ba'i// dbus su sems dpa'i dkyil dkrung bzhugs ma// phyag 'tshal dpa' mo zhal gcig phyag gnyis// thabs dang shes rab dag pa'i phyag rgya// thugs khar gser gyi bum pa bsnams te// dngos grub
50a6(rgyud 'grel): grub ma lus pa ni ster ma// phyag 'tshal bum pa bzang dang nor bu// 'dod 'jo'i ba dang dpag bsam shing chen// khyod zhabs dran pas 'dod kun 'byung 'gyur// gang la ci 'dod ro ba bkong ma/ phyag 'tshal yongs su rdzogs byed sgrol ma//
50b1(rgyud 'grel): taM las skyes pa'i khyu mchog steng na// pad+ma zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gdan la// phyed dkyil rol pa'i 'dug stangs brjid mdzes// phyag 'tshal dkar mo zhal gcig spyan gsum// rnam par thar pa'i sgo la gzigs ma// zhe sdang ma spangs gnas su
50b2(rgyud 'grel): dug phyir// zur khro stag gi sham thabs bcings ma// phyag 'tshal g.yos na mu tig phreng 'dzin// thugs rje mi zad rab tu khro bas// phyag ni g.yon na rtse gsum mdung thogs// dug gsum 'khor ba'i rgyun la bsnun ma// zla ba yar ngo'i
50b3(rgyud 'grel): tshes brgyad dag la// gang gis rnam dag gtsug gi nor bu// bstod pa'i rgyal po gus pas blo yis// lan grangs nyi shu rtsa gcig brjod ni// rgyal po sbrul dang srin po mi rgod// me dang chu dang stag dang seng ge// 'jigs pa chen po brgyad la
50b4(rgyud 'grel): thar 'gyur// sbrul dang nad dang 'byung pos tshe ba// sdug bsngal yid mi bde las grol 'gyur// sdig pa chen po rnams dang skal ngan// 'khrug dang 'thab rtsod nyes pa mi 'byung // nyon mongs mya ngan gdung ba rnams sel// sa 'og gter
50b5(rgyud 'grel): mig sman ri lu// rkang mgyogs la sogs dngos grub brgyad thob// sku dang gsung thugs kyi dbang phyug/ rdzu 'phrul kun 'gro gnas la sogs pa'i// dbang phyug las la dka' ba ma yin// bdag por byed dang dga' 'gur sgrug
50b6(rgyud 'grel): pa// 'dod dgu 'byung ba'i dngos grub dam pa// de bzhin yon tan brgyad kyang thob 'gyur// sde bzhin nor bu dpag bsam shing dang // dpal ldan 'dod 'jo'i ba dang bum mchog/ bde ba dang bcas nor rnams grub 'gyur// mtshan mo
51a1(rgyud 'grel): rgyu dang lto 'phye 'byung po// sha za'i tshogs kyis glags rnyed mi 'gyur// tshangs pa khyab 'jug dbang phyug chen po// 'jig rten gsum gyi bdag po rnams kyi// 'dod pa'i don rnams bsgrub par byang
51a2(rgyud 'grel): byed cing // bar du gcod pa rnams ni sel 'gyur// mchog gi dngos grub thob par 'gyur zhing // gang du tshwa yi 'du byed bting dus// bde ba can gyi zhing du skye 'gyur// dngos grub 'byung nas rje btsun sgrol ma// lha mchog rnams la bdog
51a3(rgyud 'grel): gis bstod pas// dge ba dri med zla ba rgyas 'dra'i// 'od ltar dkar ba thob pa de ni// 'jig rten rtsod pa'i skyon dang bral nas// myur bar rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thob ste// sems can ma lus pa ni kun la// bde chen char pa 'bebs
51a4(rgyud 'grel): par shog shig/ sgrol ma mngon par 'byung ba'i rgyud le'u lnga brgya bdun cu rtsa gnyis las rnal 'byor bla na med pa'i rgyud kyi nang nas btus pa rnam dag gtsug gi nor bu zhes bya ba/ sa chen po la gnas pa'i slob dpon chen po
51a5(rgyud 'grel): nyi ma sbas pa'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so// /
52a1(rgyud 'grel): 'phags ma sgrol ma'i ngastong pa bzhugs
52b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ ar+ya ta re stong dra/ bod skad du/ 'phags ma sgrol ma la bstod pa// bcom ldan 'das 'jam pa'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo// sgrol mdzad 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho mthu' yas pa// stong
52b2(rgyud 'grel): pa las sgrol thugs rje'i rgyan yangs ma// bde gshegs yum gyur lha mo sgrol ma la/ lus ngag yid gsum gus pas phyag 'tshal lo// khyod kyi mdzad pa'i phrini las rgya che ba// ma lus brjod par sus kyang mi spobs te// che long
52b3(rgyud 'grel): rags pa rnam brgyad mang po sogs// ngo mtshar legs sbyang gtam snyan 'di skad thos// shin tu rmang byung yon tan rgya mtsho'i gter// dge tshogs nor bu dam pa ron chen gling // sna tshogs pad+mo'i tsha lnga rang bsung ngan// phreng mdzes
52b4(rgyud 'grel): tshig gi me tog mchod par bzhes// skal ldan rigs car lam mtshon med pa zhig/ rang yul ma sleb rnyi dgas rgyal pos bdas// khom ldan skyes pa gsum la skyabs 'gro byas// sgrol mas za seng ges gus phyag
52b5(rgyud 'grel): btsal// don gnyer 'gron la gdong dmar grangs ri'i mdog/ rdul 'dzag rab khros khro gnyer mche ba gtsigs// byin brlabs mthar thug gzungs sngags bstod po'i mthus// ma thag sa las skyabs// shang
52b6(rgyud 'grel): rkam khri la tshe zad brgya gzhag ste// log lha'i rgyal pos drang srong me lha mchod// thams cad mkhyen pas me tog phreng 'dzin mdzad// dngos su zhal bstan bdud rtsi'i char rgyun nga ba// yo dpon la'i sa lom du zhugs/
53a1(rgyud 'grel): 'jigs pa'i thang la mi rgod chom rkun byung // yi dam lha mos 'dzi'i med bde sar bskyal// drin lan ma brjed rten la mchod pa phul// gzugs mdzes bu mos phyi rol nags su phyin// dug sbrul gdug
53a2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i kha rlangs sprin ltar 'thibs// 'bras ldan ljon pa'i shing gi bsil grib la// spyi bor phyag gzhag mi bzad nad las thar// sbyin pa'i 'bras med dbul phongs rkun po'i mis// dkor mdzod blangs pas btson khang ra bar bcug/ dad
53a3(rgyud 'grel): ldan slob mas thugs dam rgyud bskul bas// thugs rje'i phyag gis lcags sgrog mdud pa bkrol// tsan+da go mi dge bsnyen 'phags pa mchog/ rgyal po'i chang pas gang+gA'i chu la sbyar// gus ldan zhes bcas pa'i sdeb sbyor gyis// 'dzum zhal
53a4(rgyud 'grel): dge mas sing+ge'i gling la bzhig/ rgyal brgyud lam 'khrul dur khrod gnas su 'khyams// log 'dren 'byung po'i gdon gyis zin gyur tshe// rigs pa'i rgyal po rigs sngags bcu bzlas pas// bar chang bdud kyi tshogs las rgyal bar gyur/
53a5(rgyud 'grel): seng ge glang chen me dang chom rkun dang // dug sbrul btson khang chu dang 'byung po'i gdon// 'dus byas rgya mtsho las 'bras 'jug ngogs can// byang sems klu dbang badren gnyis gtsug gi nor// pha rol phyin drug rin chen rgyan gyis spras//
53a6(rgyud 'grel): lnga bcu lhun grub phrin las gzi brjid can// 'jigs brgyad sgrol ma gzhan yang sems can gyi// phyi rol grub mtha' ngan pa log lta'i r-i// lung rigs rdo rje'i mtshon gyis bcom nas kyang // lus ngag yid gsum sku gsum
53b1(rgyud 'grel): dkon mchog gsum// yang dag mtha' bral lta ba ma rtogs na// tshig gi bsnyems pas don la mi snyogs te// sems kyi gnas lugs na mkha'i chos nyid la// ma rig 'khrul pa'i dra ba bsal du ga sol// bsod nams chung bas
53b2(rgyud 'grel): dge ba'i sems med cing // mi dge mun bsgribs yang dag lam ma rnyed// bdag 'dzin bdud kyi srid mtsho 'dir 'khyams rnams// bshes gnyen thabs mkhas gru gzings ded dpon can// chu bzhi'i pha rol yid 'od po tA la// bde
53b3(rgyud 'grel): mchog gnas chen lha yi pho brang du// 'gro kun yan lag bdun ldan chos spyod cing // nyer mkho'i yo byad dka' babs brgyad gnang nas// phrin las lha mos zhal bzhes ma bsnyel bar// bshes gnyen ngan pa'i bdud dang /
53b4(rgyud 'grel): mjal ba rnams// dal 'byor chud zos mi tshe stong zad cing // zas nor don med gsus su brlag gyur pa/ lus sems sdug bsngal chu yi rba rlabs kyis// nyon mongs 'khrul pa'i sems can ma lus dang // bka' 'bangs
53b5(rgyud 'grel): tha ma bdag cag thams cad la// rnam dgra thos bsam sgom gsum bstan du gsol// rnam dge thos bsam sgom gsumI bstan nas kyang // phan pa de'i dge ba'ang byang chub mchog tu bsngo// khyod kyi phrin las nyi ma'i dkyil
53b6(rgyud 'grel): 'khor de// chags sdang gti mug sprin gyi grib ma yis// bsgribs par ma gyur dpal ldan 'phags ma'i sku// dge tshogs sprin chen lhun po'i rtser bzhugs la// sa 'dzini sI la rta bdun rgyal po lta ro// lham med lhung nge gsal
54a1(rgyud 'grel): ba'i bkra shis shog/ gtsang bdag bde dang rtag pa nyid thob pa// skye rga na 'chi med pa chos kyi sku// brnyes gyur lhun gyis grub cing 'dus ma byas// bsam zhing brjod pa'i yul las 'das gyur kyang // chu nang
54a2(rgyud 'grel): zla ba nA mkha'i 'ja' bzhin du// sbrul skus 'gro don mdzad par smon lam 'debs// klu sgrub pad+mo'i gau sar la// nyi ma sbas pa bung ba yi// lang ling bdud rtsi'i dga' ston gyis// bu slob sbrang bu'i lus rgyas shog/
54a3(rgyud 'grel): kha che'i slob dpon nyi ma smras pas rje btsun sgrol ma la bstong pa rdzogs so//
54a4(rgyud 'grel): rgyagar gyi baN+Di ta.A d+hu kr-in+ti dang / thod kyimi tsA ba 'dan ma chu khrims seng ges bsgyur ba las// phyis dpalas sgra'i gtsug lag khang du dag par byas so// / san mdam
55a1(rgyud 'grel): phreng ba 'dzin pa'i bstod pa bzhugs//
55b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ sra ga d+hA ra sto tra/ bod skad du/ phreng ba 'dzin pa'i bstod pa/ 'phags ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo// nyi ma 'char ka'i snang ba ltar dmar lha mchog rnams kyi mgo yi gtsug gi nor
55b2(rgyud 'grel): bu'i dpal// phun sum tshogs pas dmar ba smug rtsigs lbo dngar bkod shin tu yun rings ma ldon 'dra'i// 'phags ma khyod zhabs dag la thal sbyar cod pan gyis mnan yan lag mchog tu bdag gisI ni// gus pas sbrul ma phongs
55b3(rgyud 'grel): skyabs bstod pa gser gyi me tog phreng ba rnams kyis mchod par bgyid// skal ngan du ba'i bzhin ldan rgal bar dka' bo'i sdug bsngal me la lus drag rnam ltung ba/ ci dang ci bya zhes rmongs lan cig min pa'i rtsom pa byas kyang 'bras
55b4(rgyud 'grel): dong bral ba sgo// mkha' la nyi zla'i dpal ni gzhan las mang du thos nas blta ba re ba bcas gyur pa'i// mig nyams gzhan gyi 'gro ba lta bu bdag ni sdig 'jo mas khyed la gus pro rten bu bgyid// khyed kyi thugs rje sems can los rnams
55b5(rgyud 'grel): kun la bye brag med par 'jug pa ma lags sam// de dag bzung bas bdag 'dra yang ni de dag nang du bzung bar 'gyur la gdon mi za// mtha' dag 'gro ba'i sdig pa'i mun par tsha zer can gzugs nus pa la do zla med// de lta/
55b6(rgyud 'grel): mod kyi kye ma bdag smad nyes byas ngan pas brjid cing sdug bsngal ldan pa nyid// skal pa zhan pa bdag smad smad pa zhig ste nyin phyed 'od zer gyis kyang mun ma sel// gangs can las byung 'jug ngogs chus dkrigs kha ba'i dum bu
56a1(rgyud 'grel): 'khrugs shing bsil ba dag tu skom// rin chen gling gi lam srang dang ni nor bu'i phug yangs khang pa dag gi nang du dbul// 'dzag rten kun gyi yum gcig ma khyod mgon du byas kyang mgon ma
56a2(rgyud 'grel): mchis so bcom ldan ma// nu ma'i rgyu las lAn mang dag tu rnam par du ba'i bu la ma yang skyo bar 'gyur// nyi ma so sngor dam pa ma yin don gnyer rnams la rab bskul pa yang khro ba 'dzin// 'jig rten gsum gyi re 'dod 'bras
56a3(rgyud 'grel): bus yangs ldan dpag bsam shing chen 'khri shing mchog ni khyod// mngon par don gnyer don rnams kun la stsol gyi nam yang rnam gyur de dag ci yang med// gang la nyon mongs tshogs kyis me 'bar lus can de dang de yi sgral
56a4(rgyud 'grel): ma nga nyid ces// bdag nyid zhal ba zhes dam bcas sdug bsngal 'og tu bying ba bdag la 'bras bu ldan par mdzod// srog chags rnams kyi sdug bsngal shugs ni rtsub cing zil gnon 'di dag ji snyed 'phel gyur pa// yang dag
56a5(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas theg par smon lam blo mdzad rnams kyi brtse ba'ang ngo snyed nyid// de ltar bstod pa'i tshig gi zol gyis cho nga'i sgra dag gsang 'thon sgrogs cing lag bsgreng la// gzhan dag gis kyang btang snyoms bya bar 'os pa
56a6(rgyud 'grel): min na yum gcig khyod kyis lta yang ci// gzhan dag rnams kyi mngon 'dod 'byor par don gnyer 'dod pa khyed las thob pa rnams mthong bzhin// mi dge las byung nang gi gdung ba rgyun chags bzod blags med pas
56b1(rgyud 'grel): shin tu yang yang sreg/ gal te kho bo sdig can lags na khyod la gus pa chen po 'di ni ci phyir 'phel// khyod nyid gcig pu'i mtshan gyis kyang ni thos dang dran pas 'phral la sdig pa sel bar byed// de lta na yang bdag gi bya ba'i khur
56b2(rgyud 'grel): ngag dor ba ji ltar lags zhes bden gsungs pa// nad pa 'chi bar 'gyur yang sman po'i snying rje rgya chen phan pa 'khon par dgyid dam cing // sgyu dang ser sna nga rgyal phrag dog rang sgron tha chad rnams kyis dus mnyam rim par
56b3(rgyud 'grel): yang // du ma dag gi thun mong char gyur tshogs khang rnga mo bzhin du bskor bar gyur pas na// khyed kyi zhabs pad mchod pa skad cig tsam yang ma rnyed gang de'i don du khyad par las// phongs pas yi ge dman par tshig 'di bkod do/
56b4(rgyud 'grel): bdag gi 'dod pa don med ma gyur cig/ dus mtha'i rlung rab 'khrugs pas dkrugs pa'i chu ni g.yo zhing 'gul ba'i rlung 'khor ral pa can// rab 'khrugs kun tu bskyod cing rba rlabs ngos brdabs sgyu grags lan brgyangs chen po
56b5(rgyud 'grel): sgrogs pa las// gru chag chu ru snying rje ngu ba'i cho de dang ldan g.yo ba med cing zhun gyur pa// lha mo khyod lnga bstod pa rnams kyis 'phral la chu gter 'gram du ring dga' thar bar 'gyur// du ba 'tshubs pa sbron 'dra khongs nas ra' byung me
56b6(rgyud 'grel): stag mkhar khyim nang du rnam par rgyu// 'phre zhing rab 'bar drag po'i 'bar byed shugs dag 'jug pa'i khang par mal stan la 'khod pa// thal sbar cod pan ldan pas khyed la btung byas ldepa ldib dag tu gsol ba 'debs pa rnams
57a1(rgyud 'grel): glog rab 'gyur ba'i brtse dga' rab 'bar chu 'dzin shugs kyis skad cig nyid la sgrib par byed// myos pa'i chu rgyas 'gram pa gnyis ka'i ngos la babs pas bung ba dag gi phreng ba can// hUM zhes
57a2(rgyud 'grel): bya bas bos par gyur pa'i glang chen zla bos zhe sdang me sbyar gnyis 'thung gi/ so rtse rab tu mtho ba'i khyogs la blangs pa'i lus can dag gis khyod rjes dran pa na// rtse mo che ldan mgo rtse'i rdzong la 'du gang cing rab tu dga' bas 'chi bad
57a3(rgyud 'grel): phyir zlog byed// mdungs rings drag po bsnun gsad mi yi mgo dang gsal shing dag gi khri shing dga' ston can// nags tshal ston par chom rkun lag gtses ral gri g.yo zhing brdeg par bzlas pas dregs rgyas pa// khro gnyer dang bcas
57a4(rgyud 'grel): smin 'khyogro zur mig gis bltas mig gis bltas mig can rnams ni khyed mtshan dpal gyi gzhi// gsal bar 'dri ba'i gnas la bsal ba'i smyu gu skyon med rnams kyis bran du skol bar byed// rab rno ster mo'i rtse ni rdo rje lta bu bsnun
57a5(rgyud 'grel): pas glang chen myos pa'i klang 'gems nas// khrag mang rab tu zags pas bkrus pa'i ral pa gsal po 'jigs rung ya ngas phrag pa khebs// khros te rgyang nas steng du mchod 'dod mtsho ba rnon po gtsigs pa'i kha can ri dgas
57a6(rgyud 'grel): dgra/ khyod la 'os pa'i bstod pa don ldan tshig dag bkod pas skrag ste log nas 'gro bar 'gyur// gdengs can rnam 'gyur du ba 'khyil dang mun pa'i dbyibs can gsal bar phud sgra dag gi tshogs// byed pa dang ldan kha gangs
57b1(rgyud 'grel): ro 'dzin thag pa gshin rje'i zhags 'dra che zhing g.yo ba dag/ sdig pa las byung slar yang khyod skyong bdag nyid khyod kyi yon tan bgrang ba lhur len pas// ud pal phreng ba'i rgyan gyis 'byor pa bung ba myos pa'i phreng bas dkris lhur
57b2(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin par 'gyur// rje bo'i smin ma bskyod pas 'jigs pa dag gis rgod cing 'i phyar bas pra mo la tso do gzings// g.yo zhing sgra sgrogs bran khon rnams kyis rtsub myor smra byed zhags pa'i mdud pa dram pos btsongs// bkres skom dag gis
57b3(rgyud 'grel): kha dang mgrin skams gang zhig 'phags ma sgrol ba'i zhabs la skyabs 'gro ba// de ni byams pa'i gnyen gyis sngags kyang mtha' med rgud pa de dag 'phrul du gtong bar 'gyur// sgyu ma sprul pa'i las kyi rim pas rnam par 'gyur ba dag
57b4(rgyud 'grel): gi cha byas shing // log pa'i gzugs tsam rjes su 'tshal pa'i mtshon cha'i 'od zer tsho gos ni rab tu mi bzad ldan// mi ro las bton rgyu ma'i thag pa'i tshogs kyi phreng bas rnam par spras pa'i srin po rnams// khyed rgyud las btus gsang
57b5(rgyud 'grel): sngags dran pas sdig pa phrogs pa'i srang ma gzor med byed par 'gyur// glang chen sgra sgrogs char sprin lus can myos byed chu bo'i rgyun dang ldan pas mun gtibs shing / mtshon cha 'od zer rnams ni glog rab 'gyu ltar rab gsal
57b6(rgyud 'grel): mda' yi char 'bab g.yul ngo 'gyed pa'i tshe// rnam par sdang ba'i dgra bo dpung pa'i stobs ni rab mchog ldan pa rnams kyis bkag gyur pa// khyod kyis dgra bo gsod pa'i dpa' bo gcig gis 'phral du dgra yi sa gzhi phye mar rlog/
58a1(rgyud 'grel): sdig spyong dag gis rjes 'brel phol mig tshabs can dag las rnag khrag rul pa rab 'dzag cing // sha lpags myags pa la chags rtsa ske'i bu gar 'gul ba'i srog chags kyis zos lus zang rnams//
58a2(rgyud 'grel): zhabs nye bar brten pa'i sman mchog ri lu goms par byed la gus shing chags pa yis// sa le sbram dang mtshungs pa'i lus dang pad mo dkar po ltar yangs mig dang ldan par 'gyur// gang gi rna ba'i snod na bla ma rnams kyis gnang ba'i
58a3(rgyud 'grel): man ngag slongs mo mi gnas shing // thos pa'i nor dang bral bas mkhas pa'i tshogs rnams dag tu lkugs pa nyid du khas len gang // de yang khyed la gus pa'i nus pas rgyan rnams thams cad mdzes byed 'byor par bcas pa yi// dgra
58a4(rgyud 'grel): bang phrug thob nas mi bdag 'dun sar rgol ba'i seng ge'i khri dag 'phrog par byed// sa gzhi mal stan rdul gyi lus bsgos skye dngos ras ral yan lag dag ni rnam par mngon// shig gis tshe dag rab gtsor gzhan gyis grong khyer
58a5(rgyud 'grel): mdun du gyo mor zas ni don gnyer ba// khyod brnyed bgyid la brtson pas na chung mchog gis bzung ba'i rta yab 'dzum gyis rab mdzes shing // myos pas long ba'i gnyis 'thus sos gtams gdugs gcig gyen du btegs pa'i sa
58a6(rgyud 'grel): gzhi 'dzin par 'gyur// g.yog dang las mtha' bzo dang dbang po gso ba'i thabs kyi rnam grangs dag gis rab skyo zhing // skye ba snga mar rab bsgrubs bsod nams bsags pa'i dge 'bras nor ni thob par ma gyur pa'i// nor med rnams
58b1(rgyud 'grel): kyis skye bo bkren pa'i yum gyur phongs las 'da' bar mdzad pa khyod las don// don du gnyer na slar yang gser gyi tshogs kyi gter dag sa las 'thon pa thob par 'gyur/ 'ob chad lngas ngo tshar gyur cing gos zang chung ma dag gi
58b2(rgyud 'grel): rab tu spyod par byed// bdag nyid gso phyir rang gi skye bo bu dang grogs po gnyen gyis ring du spangs pa yis// khyed la rang gi sdug bsngal zhus pas rang gi khyim thang bad med gsu ba'i sil sil sras// gnyid log sad par 'gyur zhi
58b3(rgyud 'grel): rta rmig rtso mos mtshoms bsgos khang khyim rnams kyi bdag po byed// 'khor lo phyogs kyi 'khor lo la sbyor bung meng mtshan brgyan 'di gzer g.yo zhing che ba dang // zla gam 5/ wAr rta mcho kA sA khA sto sangs rma bya'i mgrin
58b4(rgyud 'grel): ltar 'tsher// nor bu nyi ma'i 'od zer ltar gsal dri med yon tan mdzad 'dzin mdzod khengs dang // dmag dpon dpal sde ldan par bcom ldan 'das ma khyod kyi bka' dron cha shas pra las tshar dan tshwa yis dri zhim nor bu'i rdol
58b5(rgyud 'grel): mdzes mas dus btab rtse dga' la chags pas// sbu gu ma yi bde ba'i nyer spyang mgron du bya ba mngon par gsal ba rnye pe bsgrubs shing // ral gri 'od zer bye/ sngam shing dang 'ang dpung rgyan rol pa can// khyod
58b6(rgyud 'grel): kyi rigs drug reg 'dzin dbang po ma la ya yi me tog tshel du rang dgar 'gro/ nu ma'i thon 'khor do shal gyis brgyan mig dkyus ring po rna ba'i at+pal la ldan za 'bru gsar ba'i dris
59a1(rgyud 'grel): myos bung ba can// dril chung sgra yis rjes 'brel rab tu gsal bar rkang rngub yid 'ong sgra snyan sgrogs par byed// 'dod pas myos dga' gzhon nu ma rnams gus dang bcas par khyed mgon
59a2(rgyud 'grel): ldan pa don du gnyer// rdzi dra bu'i nang logs rin po ches spras gser gyi pang ldan ze 'bru rdo rje phreng ba can// yongs 'du'i ljon pa las 'phro dri bzongs dang ldan me tog rdul gyi bla bye mthor bres te// pi wang gling bu sgrogs mkhas lha yi
59a3(rgyud 'grel): grong gis dga' ma rnams kyis snyan par rab bsgrags pa'i// dga' ba'i skyed tshal bgrod pa khyod la mchod pa bgyid pas yun rings nyams su myong bar 'gyur// nang gi byed pa khyod la gtad pa'i bsod nams mthu ni rab 'bar yongs
59a4(rgyud 'grel): su smin pa yis// ga bur e la li shi shun pa a kra ru dang na la da phye'i dri ldan chu// 'dod pa'i dregs pas rab 'bur bud med nu ma'i skyibasu rba rlabs 'khyil gnas dal 'bab po// sman min chu yis zer ma dang ldan chu rtse mdzes
59a5(rgyud 'grel): ma dag dang lhan cig rtse bar 'gyur// tshig mtha'i gtso bo dul ba'i khur gyis cod pan dud pa rnams kyis bka' la phyag byas shing // mtho ris steng du lha yi glang chen khro khrol rgyan gyis sdud pa'i lus can la zhon te// spu long
59a6(rgyud 'grel): rab rgyas lus can bde sogs lag pa'i thag pa khyogs kyis rgyun tu bskyil gyur pa// khyed kyi spyan ras phog pas dgo byas lag pa rdo rje ldan pas lha yi sa skyong byed// gtsug gi rin chen rgyan gyis mnan bzhugs bde bar
59b1(rgyud 'grel): gshegs pa na mkha'i dpal 'byor bla bre can// nyi ma 'char ka bye ba lta bur rab gsal 'od zer rgyas pas 'jig rten gsum 'gengs shing // brtan par g.yas brkyang zhabs gcig gis mnan khur gyis tshangs dbang drag po khyad
59b2(rgyud 'grel): 'jug rnams dud pa'i// khyed skrod bsgoms pa skye ba la brtan rnams kyis srid pa'i 'jigs pa gcod pa'i slad du 'gyur// khro ba dang bcas mtshan cha'i 'od zer rab 'bar phyag dbyug cha yis na mkha'i khongs dag khyab// gdu
59b3(rgyud 'grel): bu'i gdengs can dgra gis gdengs ka mi zad mi 'phyogs spyod ldan sdang rnams skrag mdzad bzhad// cang te'u drag po tshabs cher brdungs pa'i tshe na ro langs rnams ni drag por pig rdo be cing // bag med rgyags pas tso co chen po
59b4(rgyud 'grel): sgrogs par byed pa'i drag mor la la dag gis mthong // l-i las ba spu re re las byung na mkha'i khyon gnas sa drang sa 'og dag na gnas// mtho ris la gnas tshangs dbang drag po la sogs pa dang lha dang grub pa dri zla ku// phyo/
59b5(rgyud 'grel): tshogs khyab pa'i 'od zer la bzhugs bde gshegs brgya phrag sprul pa mtha' yas dag gi sku// ngo mtshar 'jig rten gsum gyi phyag 'os brtan g.yo bkod pa'i dngos po ma lus de bor ro// la las rgya skyegs li khri'i chen dang
