59b6(rgyud 'grel): nyi zhon dmar ba nyid ltar shin tu dmar ba dang // de bzhin gzhan gyis snum zhing 'od ldan mthon mthing rdo bcags btags pa'i phye ma ltar sngo dang // la las 'o ma'i rgya mtsho bsrungs pa'i 'od ltar ches lhag dkar dang gser 'od lta bu
60a1(rgyud 'grel): ste/ khyed sku sna tshogs ngo bo nye bar bzhag pa dang 'brel dbye bas tha dad shel bzhin no// kun mkhyen ye shes sgron mas shes bya mtha' dag gsal byas de nyid dag gi dbang gcig pu// kun rig nyid dam de yi
60a2(rgyud 'grel): sras kyis khyod kyi yon tan tshogs kyi grangs ni mngon sum mkhyen// bdag 'dra gtor ma spyod pa sgrogs par lta bur kha gdangs ku tso che bar 'don pa gang // de ni mi bzang sdug bsngal gdung bas nad bskyed sems kyi rgud pa gzhang gang dag gi rgyu//
60a3(rgyud 'grel): bdag gi zhu ba gang lags de ni nangs kyis dang por khyed kyis khyad par du mkhyen te// 'on kyang lhag par de brjod ngal ba'i sgrub byed mi mkhas pa dag rang sems tshim pa'i rgyu// don shes zin yang mnyen 'dun byams pa'i mdun sdug bsngal
60a4(rgyud 'grel): ldan pas tshig gis sdug bsngal ni// dug bzhin skyugs par gyur na snying yang seng zhes byed cing rnam par gnas par tshor ba bzhon// dge legs kun dga'i rgya mtshor zla ba'i cha shas gsal po bsil ba'i gzigs par stsal du gsol//
60a5(rgyud 'grel): ye shes nyer bstan dag gis rgyas par mdzod cig thugs rjes sdig ldan nang gi mun pa sol// gang phyir 'gro ba dag na khyod bstod chu yis yid ni dag par byas pa kho bo la// skye dgu rnams kyi dge legs gnas ni don yod khyod kyi
60a6(rgyud 'grel): yon tan bstod tsam gcig pu mthong // khyod kyi yon tan tshogs kyi cha tsam bstod nus bdag gis 'di tsam zhes par ma nges pa'i// bsod nams bkra shis 'dod pa'i 'bras bu ro myang grol ba'i bar du spyad bya ba// gang thob pa de yi
60b1(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten 'di ni 'phags pa 'jig rten dbang phyug zhabs mthil bkra shis kyi// bde legs rtags can bde gshegs sras po'i sa gzhi bde ba can zhes bya de myur bgrod shog/ phreng ba 'dzin pa'i bstod pa pAN+Di ta chen po
60b2(rgyud 'grel): thams cad mkhyen pa'i bshes gnyen gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// 6// rgya gar skad du/ sr-i ga~M d+ha ra sto traM/ bod skad du/ me tog phreng 'dzin gyi bstod pa/
60b3(rgyud 'grel): rje btsun 'phags ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo// phongs skyabs 'phags ma sgrol ma khyed zhabs lha mchog rnams kyi mgo bo'i gtsug gi nor bu'i 'od// nyi ma 'char ka'i sdang ba lta bur dmar ba'i phun sum tshogs pa phog bla
60b4(rgyud 'grel): dmar ba ni// smug rtsi dmar ba gsol po bkod nas shin tu yun ring ma lon pa dang 'dra dag la// mgo btud spyi bor thal sbyar bkod pa bdag gis bstod gsar me tog phreng pas gus mchod bgyi// brgal bar dka' ba'i
60b5(rgyud 'grel): sdug bsngal me nang lus lhung skal ngan phyogs gang zhig la brten snyam pa// blun zhing ci ci bgyi snyam lan cig mya lags rtsom bgyi don ma mchis pas dub pa bdag/ mig nyams gzhan gyi 'gros kyis 'gro ba snang ba
60b6(rgyud 'grel): re bar bcas pas na mkha'i nyi zla yi// 'od ltar gzhan dag rnams las khums te sdig pa 'joms par mdzad pa khyod la brten par bgyid// khyod kyi thugs rje nges par sems can lam rnams kun la bye brag med par rib
61a1(rgyud 'grel): bzhugs shing // de dag gzung bas bdag 'dra'ang de dgra rnams kyi nang du gdon mi 'tshal bar gzung 'gyur ba// nus mthu 'gro ba mtha' dag sdig mun nyi ma'i gzugs la'ang ngo zla mchis pa
61a2(rgyud 'grel): ma lags mod// de ltar na yang kho bo sdug pa kye ma'o nyes byas ngan mkhas ngan pa rab tu brjid// nyi ma'i 'od zer gyis kyang mun pa rab tu mi gsal ri bo gangs can klung ngogs kyi// sheng shong kha ba'i dum grugs dkrigs pas
61a3(rgyud 'grel): bsil bar dbyar skom rin chen gling gi tshong khang gi/ nor bu'i phug yangs khang pa'i nang na dbul zhing 'jig rten kun gyi yum gcig bcom ldan 'das// khyod kyis mgon du bgyis kyang mgon ma mchis pas skal nyams bdag
61a4(rgyud 'grel): ni smad cing smad pa'i gnas// ma yang nu ma'i phyed du rnam pa mang du ngu ba'i bu la skyo bar 'gyur ba lags// nyi ma re re dam pa ma yin don du gnyer la bskos pa'i pha yang khros sel na// khyod ni 'jig rten gsum 'dod 'bras bu yangs
61a5(rgyud 'grel): pa dpag bsam ljon shing yal ga mchog tshon to// kun la mngon par 'dod don stsol yang khyod la nam yang rnam 'gyur 'ga' yang yong mi mnga'// gang dang gang zhig sdug bsngal tshogs mes lus bsregs de dang de ni nga yis
61a6(rgyud 'grel): bsgral lo zhes// nyid kyi dam bca' zhal bzhes sdug bsngal sa 'og bying ba bdag la 'bras bu bcas par mdzod// ji srid srog chags rnams kyi zil gnon rtsub ldan sdug bsngal shugs de 'phel ba de srid du// yang dag
61b1(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas theg par smon lam blo mnga' rnams la rjes brtse mnga' ba lags// yum gcig de ltar lag bsgreng bstod pa'i tshig zol cho de'i nga ro dpangs mthor 'don pa la// gzhan gyis kyang ni btang snyoms bya bar 'os
61b2(rgyud 'grel): na na khyed 'dras lta zhig blos ci 'tshal// khyod las gzhan dag rnams kyis mngon 'dod 'byor pa don gnyer ra 'dod pa rnyed pa ma khums na// nang gi gdung ba rgyun chags mi dga'i sa gzhi sran du med pas shin tu yang yang bsre/ gal
61b3(rgyud 'grel): tre kho bo sdig can lags na kho bo'i khyod gus chen po 'di dag ci'i phyir 'phel// bden gsung mtshan tsamA khums shing dran pa yis kyang khyod gcig kho nas nan gyi sdig sel ba// de yi phyir na khyod kyis kho bo'i bgyi ba'i khur du bor ba
61b4(rgyud 'grel): ji ltar legs pa gsungs// nad pa 'chi bar 'gyur na'ang sman pa snying rje rgya chen sman 'phrog gcod par bgyid de ci// gang gi phyir na 'gro na gnas rnga mo cha shus du ma'i thun mong ba lhur rgyo dang nau// ser sna nga rgyal la sogs rang skyon tha
61b5(rgyud 'grel): chad rnams kyis rim drang dus gcig bskul bas na// nyin cig zhabs kyi pad+ma mchod pa skad cig tsam yang ma rnyed de phyir khyad por du// bkren zhing phongs pa'i tshig dang yi ge bkod 'dis bdag la 'dod pa'i 'bras bu mchis par mdzod//
61b6(rgyud 'grel): lha mo gru chag chur bying snying rje dang bcas ngu ba'i cho nge g.yo med zhan pa rnams// khyod la mngon stong lhur blangs pa yis 'phral du rgya mtsho dus mtha'i rlung gyen 'tshubs pas chu// gtsubs pa'i chu rlabs g.yo zhing mgul pa rol pas dkrugs
62a1(rgyud 'grel): pas bteg pa'i chu rlabs 'gram ngogs la// brdabs pa'i sgra grags gang rgyangs can gyi pha rol 'gram du rang dga' nyams kyis brgal bar 'gyur// du ba 'khyil pa'i sprin nang 'thon zhing na mkha'i khyim
62a2(rgyud 'grel): du 'phro ba'i me stag can gyi me// me lce 'bar zhing 'phro ba'i shugs kyis nang du zhugs pa'i khyim na mal du nyal ba rnams// khyod la rab btud thal mo spyi bor sbyar zhing ljib ljipa gsol ba btab pas skad cig la// glog rab 'gyu ba'i
62a3(rgyud 'grel): sgeg pas dmar por gyur pa'i sprin gyi chu rlabs dag gis khebs par 'gyur// 'gram pa'i gdub bu myos pa'i chu yis gang ba gnyis ka la brten bung ba'i phreng ba yi// der dir sgra yis bab pa'i ban glang zla bos zhe sdang me lce
62a4(rgyud 'grel): sbar ba'i glang chen gyi// mche ba'i rtse mo lnga li mthon po'i steng du lus po gzhag pa'ang khyod rjes dran pa yis// ri bo mthon po'i zom rtse'i mkhar la 'dug pa bzhin du dga' zhing 'chi bdag phyir zlog bgyid// mdung rings bsnun/
62a5(rgyud 'grel): bsad mi yi mgo dang gsal zhing can gyi gtor ma'i ston bskyed 'brog stong du// rkun po log brtser bzung bas g.yo ba'i phub dang ral gris dregs pa shas chen 'thon 'gyur cig/ mig ni khro gnyer bcas shing smin 'khyor
62a6(rgyud 'grel): zur mig lta dang ldan rnams bran du bsgo byed pa// de ni khyod mtshon dpal gzhi bsam pa'i smyu gus skyo ba med cing gsal bar bris pa lags// rkang pa'i sbar mo rab rno rdo rje lta bus tshabs cher bsnun pas glang chen myos pa'i
62b1(rgyud 'grel): glung // bskams nas khrag mang zags pas bkrus pa'i ral pa'i sal po 'jigs rung ya ngas gnya' khebs shing // khros te rgyang nas mgo la 'dzin 'dod mche ba rnon po gtsigs pa'i kha tsan+da ri dgas dgra/ khyod kyi 'thad pa'i
62b2(rgyud 'grel): spyod pa bstod pa'i don tshig mkhas la skrag ste ldog nas 'gro ba lags// du ba 'khyil pa'i mun bI gzuDa can rnam 'gyur gdongs can phus 'debs grags pa'i 'gram dgang bar// bya ba'i ched du kha gdengs 'gyur ba'i lce can
62b3(rgyud 'grel): thog pa dang 'dra gshin rje'i zhags pa dang // sdig dbang gis phrad slar yang khyod kyi yon tan+da bgrang ba lhur len khyod bdag lhur byed pas// bung ba myos pa'i phreng ba'i gdub can ut+pal phreng ba'i rgyan gyis mdzes pa 'chang
62b4(rgyud 'grel): bar 'gyur// rje bos smin bskyod bskul te bkrabs pa rem zhing rtsubs pas tse tau drangs shing gzings gyur pa// go kho lo bskyod po'i tshig rtsub kyis spyos 'ching ba'i zhags pa rtsub mos nyer bcing bkres pa dang // skom pas mchu/
62b5(rgyud 'grel): dang mgul pa skems pa gang zhig 'phags ma sgrol ma'i zhabs la skyabs 'gro ba// de ni byams pa'i gnyen gyis spangs kyang ma rungs rgud pa de dag 'phral du spong bar 'gyur// sbyin po sgyu ma sprul pa las tshul gyis byas badren
62b6(rgyud 'grel): pa ma yin gzugs brtsams cha lugs tshul// rnam 'gyur du ma dag dang rjes 'tshas pa'i mtshan pa'i 'od zer chags kyis mi bzad cing // so ro bad+mas pa'i rgyu ma'i thi gu'i tshogs rig phreng ba'i dgong ba rnams kyang khyod
63a1(rgyud 'grel): rgyud las// btus pa'i gsang sngags dran pas sdig bsal bsrung ba pham pa med pa byed par 'gyur// chem chem sgra sgrogs char sprin lus can ban glang myos chu'i klung gis rgyun gyi mun gtibs
63a2(rgyud 'grel): shing // mtshon cha glog ltar 'gyu ba'i 'od zer dang ldan mda' yi char 'bab g.yul ngo 'gyed pa'i tshe// phye mar klag par byed cing dpung stobs che ba'i rnam par sdang ba rnams kyis bsgrags pa yang // khyod kyi spro ba gsol btab
63a3(rgyud 'grel): dpa' bo gcig gis dgra bo'i sa gzhi nan gyis 'thag par byed// sdig spyod rgyun chags las byung phol migo tshabs chen dag las rnag khrag rul pa zags pa yis// myags pa'i sha lpags dang 'brel rtsa sgo'i bu gar srog chags
63a4(rgyud 'grel): 'gul bas zos pas lus zad rnams// khyed kyi zhabs la bsnyon pa'i sman mo che gI ri lu goms par bsten lnga rab tu dga' ba yis// sa lce sbram dang 'dra ba'i lus dang ldan zhing pad+ma dkar po ltar yangs mig can 'gyur// grang gri rna
63a5(rgyud 'grel): ba'i snod du bla ma rnams kyis nyer sbyar mAn dog glang mo ma lhung zhing // thos pa'i nor dang bral bas mkhas pa'i 'tshogs sar lkugs pa nyid du khas len gang yin pa// de yang khyod la gus pa'i nus pa'i rgyan rnams kun gyi mdzes
63a6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i 'byor pa dang bcas pa'i// ngag gi dbang phyug thob nas mi bdag mdun sar rgol ba'i seng ge'i khri dag 'phrog par byed// ser nyal rdul gyi lus rgos rked ngos 'doms bkris ras ral yan lag rnam par mngon 'gyur zhing // shig
63b1(rgyud 'grel): gi tshe dag rab gcod gzhan gyi khyim sgor rdza chags dum bur zas dge slong ba yang // khyod mnyes bgyis pas na chung mchog rnams kyis g.yabs pa yi rnga yab kyis 'dzum mdzes pa'i sa// glang chen myos pa'i chu yis gdong ba'i
63b2(rgyud 'grel): mche ba btams shing gdugs gcig gyen du bteg pa 'dzin// skye bo bkren pa rnams kyis yum gcig zhabs 'bring dang ni so tshigs gzo yi spyod pa rnams// sbyong ba'i thabs kyis rnam grangs dag gis dub cing skye ba snga mar nyer
63b3(rgyud 'grel): blangs bsod nams kyis// nyer bsags dge 'bras nor ma thob dang nor bral rnams kyis 'phya las 'da' bar mdzad khyod la// gsol ba btab pas phyi nas nor dus las gter ni gser tshogs 'byung ba thob par 'gyur// 'tsho
63b4(rgyud 'grel): ba chad pas ngo tsha khyim thabs gos zad ma yis spyo bar byed cing bdag nyid ni// gso bar byed phyir gnyen 'dab bu dang gnyen bshes rnams kyis rkyong ring spangs par gyur pa yis// khyod la rang gi sdug bsngal zhus pas rung
63b5(rgyud 'grel): gi khyim thab bud med gdu bu'i sil sil sgras// gnyid log sad par 'gyur zhing rta rmig rtse mos mtshams brkos khang khyim rnams kyis bdag po byed// gal te khyod kyis bka' drin cha shas tsam zhig mchis na phyogs tshe
63b6(rgyud 'grel): khyab pa'i 'khor lo dang // bud med mtshan brgyan 'og pag chen po g.yo dang glang chen don po mche ba drug pa dang // rta mchog spu ni kha dog sngo bsangs rma bya'i mgrin ltar 'tsher dang yon tan dri med nor bu ni// nyi ltar mdangs
64a1(rgyud 'grel): ldan 'od can khyim bdag mdzod khengs blon po rdul phong dmag ldan 'byung bar 'gyur// khyod kyi rig pa'i grub pa thob pas tsan dran chu yis dri zhim nor bu'i rdo steng du// sbu gu ma yis dus 'das
64a2(rgyud 'grel): sdug pa dang rol rje su chags pas bde ba'i nyer spyang gsar// gus par sbyar zhing lag sbom mthon po ral glo'i 'od zer sngon pos dpung rgyan g.yo ba yi// rig 'dzin dbang po rang dgar gyur te mA la yA yi me tog skyed mos tshal
64a3(rgyud 'grel): du 'gro// nu ma'i than kor do shal gyis mnani mag dkyus ring pos rna ba'i ut+pal la 'gran zhing // skra bskyil man+da ra bas brgyangs pas ze 'bru sar pa'i dri yis myos pa'i bung ba dang ldan pa'i// lha yi bu mo rkang gdub rags pa'i
64a4(rgyud 'grel): sil snyan 'og pag sgra yi rgyun gyi shin tu dpangs// bskyed cing 'dod dran dregs dga' khyod mgon ldan pa dog la gus dang bcas pas gsol ba 'debs// rdzing bu'i nang logs rin po ches spras gser gyi pad mi tshe ze 'bru
64a5(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje'i tshogs ldan zhing // yongs 'du'i ljon shing skye zhing me tog ze 'bru dri zhim rdul gyi bla re mthor bres te// lha yi grong khyer rangs bgyid lha mo pi wang gling bu sgrogs pa mkhas pas sril snyan ni// snyan par bsgrags pa'i
64a6(rgyud 'grel): dga' tshal lha mi khyod la mchod pa bgyis pas yun rings myong bar 'gyur// sems rgyud khyod la gtad pas bsod nams mthu 'bar rnams ni mdzes ma dag dang lhan cig tu// ga pur e la li shi shing tsha a ka ru dang spang spos
64b1(rgyud 'grel): phye ma'i dri chu can// glong 'khor chu klong bud med stag gu'i nu ma 'dod pa'i dregs pas 'bur ba'i skyibs 'khyil ba/ dal 'bab gang+gA'i chu la chu rtsed chu ni drag tu 'thor bas rtsed mo byed par 'gyur// khyod kyi spyan ras mang du phog byas dag
64b2(rgyud 'grel): po'i bka' la lha gtso dul ba'i khur bu yis// cod pan 'dud pa rnams kyis phyag byas mtho rI swo steng na lha yi glang chen thal gong ni// khrol khrol rgyan gyis sdud pa la zhon lus kyi ba spu shas tshor langasau pa'i bde sogs sogs/
64b3(rgyud 'grel): ldag ring 'od li bar me bskyil cing chang ba rdo rje dang 'brel lha yi yul skyong // khyod sku gtsug gI rin chen rgyan gyis gdan bzhugs byede bar gshegs 'od mkha'i khyab bla re can// nyi ma sha rA ka bye ba lta bur ches gsal 'od zer dag
64b4(rgyud 'grel): gis 'jig rten gsum 'gongs shing // zhabs gcig g.yas brkyang gom stabs chen po'i brjid la tshangs dbang khyab 'jug drag po rnams 'dud pa// bsgoms pas skye ba la brten rnams kyi srid pa'i 'jigs pa rgyun ni gcod par
64b5(rgyud 'grel): bgyid par 'gyur// la la khro ba dang bcas phyag tshogs phyag cha rnams kyi 'od zer dag dang 'brel pa yis// namakha'o khongs khyad sbrul gyi gdub bu'i gdengs ka dag giso spyod pa mi 'phrog mi bzod pa'i// sdang rnams skrag mdzad gangad
64b6(rgyud 'grel): mo'i cang te'u drag po brdungs pas rlung bskyed tshe na ro langs ni// thal mo'i sgra chen sgrogs pas bsgyings shing bsnyems pa'i rol pa chen po'i tsa tse drag par khums// l-i las ba spu'i khung re nas byung na mkha' khyab pa'i sar gnas
65a1(rgyud 'grel): sa 'og mtho ris gnas// tshangs pa dbang po la sogs lha dang klu dang dri za mi dang grub pa rnams gnas shing // phyogs tshogs khyab pa'i 'od zer la bzhugs bde gshegs brgya phrag sprul pa mtha' yas kyis
65a2(rgyud 'grel): bkra dang // ngo mtshar khams gsum phyag 'os brtan dang g.yo bar gnas pa'i dngos po ma lus ngo bor khums// la las rgya skyegs li khri'i tshon 'dra nyi ma gzhon nu ches dmar lta bur dmar bar khums// de bzhin gzhan gyi dpal ldan
65a3(rgyud 'grel): n+ti snyal dum brtags pa'i phye ma 'thol 'drar sngon por khums// la las 'o ma'i rgya mtsho dkrugs dang zho bas ches lhag dkar dang gser 'od ltar khums te// khyod sku sna tshogs ngo bo shel bzhin nye bar gzhag pa dang 'brel dbye bas tha dad
65a4(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur// khyod kyi yon tan tshogs kyi grangs ni kun ye shes sgron mas rab tu gsal ba yi// shes bya mtha' dag de nyid dbang gcig thams cad mkhyen pa dngos dang de sros kyis mkhyen te// bdag 'dra bya rog sgrog ltar kha gdangs ku co 'don
65a5(rgyud 'grel): gang lags te dwe nI mi bzad pa'i// sdug bsngal rims nad dag gis bskyed pa'i nad can sems kyi rgyad la bzhad gad rgyu zhig lags// bdag gi zhu bo gang lags de ni nang gi dang por khyod kyi khyad par du mkhyen cing // de bklags brjod pa'i
65a6(rgyud 'grel): ngal ba'i tshul ni mi mkhas rang sems tshim pa'i bye brag lags mod kyi// 'on kyang sdug par don shes zin pa'i gnyen 'dun byams pa'i mdun du 'dug bzhin tshig dag gis// sdug bsngal phyung ste snying yang seng zhes byed la nyid du
65b1(rgyud 'grel): du 'gyur nas rnal mar gnas tshor bzhin// dge legs kun dga'i rgya mtshor zla ba'i cha shas gsal ma khyod bstod chu yis yid dgra par// bgyis pa bdag la tshim mdzad mthong ba stsol cig ye shes nyer bstan dag gis rgyas par mdzod//
65b2(rgyud 'grel): thugs rje shas ches nang gi mun sol gang phyir khyod kyi yon bstod pa tsam zhig kyang // don yod 'gro ba dag na skye dgu rnams kyi bde brtsegs gnas ni gcig pu lags par khums// khyod kyi yon tan tshogs kyi cha tsam bstod nas bdag
65b3(rgyud 'grel): gis 'di tsam zhes bya ma nges po'i// bsod noms bkra shis 'dod pa'i 'bras bu mngar ba ro myang ma grol bar du longs spyod pa// gang thob de yis 'jig rten 'di ni 'phags pa 'jig rten dbang phyug zhabs mthil bkra shis kyi// bde legs
65b4(rgyud 'grel): rtags can bde gshegs sras po'i grong khyer bde ba can zhes bya der myur 'gro shog// rje btsun 'phags ma sgrol ma'i bstod pa me tog phreng ba 'dzin pa zhes bya ba slob dpon chen po thams cad mkhyen
65b5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i bshes gnyen zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rtse gro cig tu byed pas mdzad pa rdzogs so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po ka ne ka bar+m+ma dang / bod kyi lo tsa ba pa tshab nyi ma grags kyi bsgyur ba las/ slad kyis baN+Di
65b6(rgyud 'grel): ta chen po ma Ni ka shI dz+nyA na'i zhal snga nas/ phyag lo tsi ba shAkya'i dge slong chos rje dpal gyis cung zad bcos te dag par byas so// / @#// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya tA ra sra ga d+hi ra sto tra/ bod skad du/
66a1(rgyud 'grel): 'phags ma sgrol ma'i me tog phreng ba 'dzin pa'i bstod pa// spar shar nyi ma snang ba dmar// lha mchog spyi gtsug nor du dmar// de 'byar kha dog de lA ni// chos sar gyis ni bslus pa 'dra// 'phags ma khyed
66a2(rgyud 'grel): kyi zhabs gnyis la// gus pa'i thal mo dbu rgyan gyis// de mdzes mgo yis phyag 'tshal lo// nyes byung dus spyi skyabs sa ma// de ni sgrol ma khyed yin no// bstod sar mo tog phreng ba 'dis// mchod la bdag gis phyag 'tshal lo// brgal
66a3(rgyud 'grel): mi nus pa'i sdug bsngal mo// de la rtag tu lus lhung gnas// skal pa ma ldan 'gro sa grang // rmongs pa badrag gis ji ltar bya// de ltar rtag tu smras nas ni// don med bdag ni stobs chung song // mkha' la nyi zla dpal ldan grags// de ni gzhan
66a4(rgyud 'grel): gyi smra ba thos// de thos long ba'i spyod pa ltar// mthong rten 'dod kyang gzhan khri med// sdig pa 'joms ma khyed la ni// bdag ni skyabs mthong 'dod lags so// sems can thams cad sgrol ba'i phyir// de la snying rje mi mdzad dam// ma
66a5(rgyud 'grel): lus par ni snying rje mdzad// de khongs bdag lta yod gyur na// khong la snying rje mdzad pa bzhin// bdag l-i de bzhin mdzad 'tshalo// nus pa med pas midzad dam// khyed bzhini nus gnyis pa ming // 'gro ba rnams kyi sdig mun pa// de
66a6(rgyud 'grel): 'joms pa la nyi ma 'dra// de ltar yin kyang sdug pa bdag/ mi dge las ni ma tshig pas// ngan las byas pas bdag ni 'gyod// skal ngan bdag la skal pa med// nyi ma shar yang mun pa gnag/ gang+gA'i chu ni shin tu bsil// de
66b1(rgyud 'grel): phyir 'gram du bsdud kyang ni// sgom yang btung rgyu ma rnyed do// rin chen sna tshogs yod pa'i gling // nor rnams kyis gang khyad pa la// der 'dug kyang ni bdag phangs pas// bcom ldan 'das ma khyed lnga ni// mgor 'dod kyang ni mgon
66b2(rgyud 'grel): mod bdag/ 'jig rten kun gyi yum gcig mo// mA la rtag tu ngus nis ni// nu ma'i don du bu spyod na// de la ma yang skyo bar 'gyur// mi rnyed nyin re slong gyur na// pha yang bu la khro bar byed// 'jig rten gsum gyi bsrungs kyang ri//
66b3(rgyud 'grel): khyed kyi 'bras bu gang bar byas// dpag bsam shing gi yal ga mchog/ de ni sgrol ma khyed yin no// thams cad la ni mo lus pa// sbyin pa khyod kyis khyab par byas// nyon mongs kun gyi mo des ri// bdag gi lus 'di rtag tu tshig/
66b4(rgyud 'grel): so 'og sdug bsngal de la nI// bdag gi lus 'dri nub tsamA na// sems can rnams kyi sdug bsngal ni// drag po 'phel bar gyur tsam na// khyod kyi dam bcas zhol ba zhes pa// bdag gi steng du grub par mdzod// rdzogs sangs rgyas
66b5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i smon lam ni// bdag gi sems la shar ba'i dris// sgrol mA phan 'dogs mdzad pa ri zhu// lag bsgreng bstong pa'i tshig brjid cing // don du dag po dus pa'i sa// gzhan la zhus kyang dor 'grub bo// khyeng lta bu la bdag gis zhus//
66b6(rgyud 'grel): kye ma sgrol ma khyed kyis ni// bdag spang bar ni mi gshe'o// khyod kyi spyan gyis gzigs tsam na// gang 'dod thams cad rnyed par 'gyur// mi bde mi bzod sdug bsngal ni// yang 'byung ngogs ni mi 'byung ngo // bdag ni sdig can yin
67a1(rgyud 'grel): gyur na// dad pa shin tu 'phel nas ni// khyed la dad pa skye mi ga sha'u// ming thos pa 'am dran pa yis// khyed kyi sdig pa dbang med 'phrog/ bdag don khyed kyi spangs pa de// bden par bdag la
67a2(rgyud 'grel): gsung bar zhu// khyed ni bden par gsung ldan ma// snying rje che ba'i sman pa yis// nad pa ma shi baR+Sha du ni// sman gyis phan 'dod che ru byed// sgyu ma ser sna nga rgyal sogs// ngan pa de rnams kyis khyer nas// re mos khyer bas dal
67a3(rgyud 'grel): skabs med// gnas pa'i spyi nor rnga mo bzhi ni// skad cig dal ba med pas ni// sgrol ma'i zhabs kyi pad ma laM// bdag gis mchod skabs ma rnyed do// des ni yi ge du tshig 'don// de bton pas ni phani 'dogs re// dus mtha' rlung gi
67a4(rgyud 'grel): g.yas su 'khyil// des ni gtsugs pa'i chu rlabs 'byung // g.yo zhing 'gul pas rol pas 'khrug/ de rgyab dba' rlabs 'gram du ni// brdabs pas sgra grags skad mdangs can// 'jigs byed rgya mtsho de las ni// gru chag nub pa'i skabs
67a5(rgyud 'grel): de la// snying rje ngu skad drag po bton// skad cig dran med bems bor gyur// lha mo khyod la bstod pa yis// bde bar rgya mtsho phrar bsgral lo// sprin nag skor zhing du ba'i nang // de la me stag can gyi mi// me lce cher 'bar khyim du ni// ngal nas
67a6(rgyud 'grel): mal du nyal ba'i mis// khyed la rab btung thal me sbyar// skad cig gi ni glog byung nas// myur bar sprin char gyis ni bskor// smyo byed glang chen 'gram gnyis la// 'dzag pa'i chu la reg nas ni// bung ba'i phreng ba bzhin du thal// de rnams
67b1(rgyud 'grel): kyis ni hUM sgra sgrogs// sgra de thos nas zhe sdang las// glang chen 'thab du byung mno nas// khros nas mche bas mi bteg nas// 'od li la ni bsdad pa bzhin// khyed dran tsam gyis 'cha ba bzlogs// par log ngargal nas rin
67b2(rgyud 'grel): chen rnyed// dwe steng mkhar du bsdad du phyin// mi med stong pa nags gseb du// shin tu rno ba'i mtshon rnams kyis// brgyab nas yod pa mi ro'i mgo/ tri shU la la gasdad ro mang // de 'dra nag gseb phyin tsa na// ral gri phub
67b3(rgyud 'grel): dang gzung nas ni// mnga' gzhu bkang nis byung ba rnams// zur mig lta zhing khros nas byung // rgol nas brdeg du byung tsam na// khyed bsams skyo me sbu gus bris// khyed ming gsal por bris ma thag/ dpal ldan khyim du bsdad phyi no/
67b4(rgyud 'grel): rkang pa sir mo ra ba rno bas// rdo rje lta bus rab tu brkos// smyo byed glang chen mgo khrag byung // 'jigs byed seng ge byung tsam nA// khyed pos bstod pa brjod pa yis// byed nas seng ge log nas thal// du ba 'khyil po'i 'jigs pa'i
67b5(rgyud 'grel): gzugs// 'jigs byed gdengs byed shan tu 'bar// rtag tu phung byed kha gdengs pa// lce chen ston po sbrul khro ba// gshin rje'i zhags pas bsgrigs pa'i mi// sdig pa'i dbang gis de ltar byung // de dus khyed kyi yon tan
67b6(rgyud 'grel): bsgrags// gus par dad par khyed la byas// sbrul de ut+pal phreng bar gyur// me tog mchod pa'i mi des thob// dpon gyis mig mtshams mgul dogs kyis// des breng dmag dpon rim pa yis// thag pas bsgrigs nas
68a1(rgyud 'grel): skra nas drung // rtsub mos bkral nus khrid tsam na// khol po de ni na cha che// tsa tso smra ba gtong 'dod nas// nye ba gnyen rnams kyis ni bor// ltogs nas skom nas mchu skams pa// sdug bsngal mtha' med
68a2(rgyud 'grel): byung tsam na// gang gris sgrol ma'i zhu bsde la skyabs// skad cig gis ni grol nas thar// sgyu ma byas pa'i gzugs mi legs// mi ro'i rgyu ma bus pa de// phreng ba mang bas ske la btags// sus kyang dgag du mi nus pa// de byung dus su khyod
68a3(rgyud 'grel): kyis bsngags// de brjod tsam gyis sdig po dag/ srin po'i dran pa med tsam na// de rnams kyis ni srung bar byed// 'brug byung ba yi sprin gyi gzugs// nga rgyal 'jigs pa rtsang po gsum// des ni mun pa gnag pa lnga// glog bzhin mtshon
68a4(rgyud 'grel): cha snang ba yis// mnga' yi chararA pa byung cim na// 'thub pa'i dus su bskor nas bkag/ shin tu stobs che dgra rnams kyis// khro zhing brdeg tu byung tsa na// sgrol ma khyed kyis stobs byin pas// dpa' bo gcig gis de rnams bcom// ras
68a5(rgyud 'grel): ris rnams ni rang dbang byas// sdig pas gang ba mjo bo'i gzugs// lus po sbyangs nas rnag dang khrag/ chu ser de rnams 'dzag pa ni// rtsa sha lpags pa phug pa nas// 'bru rnams kyis ni zos pa na// sgrol ma khyed kyi zhabs brten nas//
68a6(rgyud 'grel): rtag tu khyed la mos gus byas// mos gus de rang sman du gyur// gser gyi kha dog lus gyur nas// pad+ma dkar po rgyas pa'i spyan// des ni gzugs bzang lus thob bo// slob dpon rnams kyis bka' de la// rna ba snod du ma rung bas// thos
68b1(rgyud 'grel): nga'i nor ni phongs par gyur// bshes gnyen gseb du lkug pa de// khyod la mos gus bstod bgyis pas// gsung ldan seng khri 'phrog par byed// de 'phrogs pa yang rgyal po'i mdun// rgyan cha sna tshogs btags nas ni// gsung gi dab
68b2(rgyud 'grel): phyug seng khri sdod// sra la nyal bas rdul mas khengs// lus kyi kha dog du bar gyur// dug po gos kyi lus ma khyab// rtag tu shig dang sro mo gsod// gzhan gyi mdun du phor gog 'dzin// rtag tu slongs mo byed pa de// sgrol ma khyed la skyabs
68b3(rgyud 'grel): tsam na// nges par mdzes ma rgod mas ni// rnga yab mdzes bsra g.yab par byed// stobs chen glang po che rnams kyis// bdog por gyur nas gdun gcigs// ras ris tsam gyis rgyal por gyur// gzhan g.yog las dang yon tan dang // tshong dang
68b4(rgyud 'grel): thabs kyis nor tshol ba// tshe snga ma yis dge ba'i nor// ji ltar byas kyang nor med pa// su la bslangs kyang rnyed pa med// kye ma khyed la bslangs tsA na// sa gseb du ni nor rnyed nas// mi de phyug por gyur par byung // 'tsho ba med pas ngo
68b5(rgyud 'grel): tsha che// gos med pas ni chung mas brgal// phongs pa yin pas gonyen gyis bor// ster dgos man nas thag rings su// kye ma sgrol ma khyed la ni// rang gi sdug bsngal bstan tsam na// rta rnams rmeg pa sa la brko// de brkos sa
68b6(rgyud 'grel): yang khyim bskor nas// rang yid 'ong ba rgyal po'i khab// khyim der gnyid ni log pa las// mdzes ma rnams kyi lag brgyan grag/ des ni gnyid log sad po rnyed// phyogs bcur gyur pa'i 'khor lo ni// shin tu 'od zer ldan pa
69a1(rgyud 'grel): dag/ mtshan nyid ldan pa'i bud med dang // mche ba drug yod glang po che// rma bya'i ske yi kha dog ldan// de ltar sngo ba rta bzang dang // rin po che ni nyi ma'i 'od// dri ma med pa'i gter gyis bkang // dmyag gi dpa'
69a2(rgyud 'grel): bo mang ba dang // sgrol ma khyed kyis bka' drin gyis// 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por gyur// ma la ya yi ldum ro ru// nor bu rin po che yi rdo// de la tsan dan la sogs bskus// lha mo rnams kyang 'tshogs byas// 'gron sar mchod pa byas
69a3(rgyud 'grel): ba bzhin// shin tu cha gros nas rtsed mo brtses// sgrol ma khyed kyi rig pa grub// rig pa 'dzin pa'i lha dbang po'i// ral gri 'od zer ljang gus ni// lag bzang de la phog pa de// yang nas yang du gsor byed pa// gzugs bzang lha nau
69a4(rgyud 'grel): thob par 'gyur// mu tig phreng bas mdzes par btags// de btags nu ma'i bar du byung // rna bar uta pa la btags pa de// mig dang gang zag 'gram pa 'dra// thor tshugs man+da ra ba btags// dr-i zhim bung bas bor ma nus/
69a5(rgyud 'grel): rked par g.yer kha mdzes par btags// zhabs gnyis legs pa de la ni// sil sI la sgra dang g.yer kha btags// sgrol mu khyed la bslabs tsam na// 'dod pa'i lha la dga' pa tsame// de phyed lha mo bsnyen bkur byed// rdzing 'gram rin
69a6(rgyud 'grel): po che yis bskor// gser gyi pad+ma de la ni// ge sar rdo rje pha lam 'bar// pa ra dzA ga'i shing de ni// cung zad bkug pa dri zhim dmar// des na bla re bzhin du khyab// tam bu ra dang rnga la sogs// lha rnams kyis ni snyan par bsgrags
69b1(rgyud 'grel): sgrol ma khyod kyis bka' drin gyis// lha yi ldum rar yun rings rtses// bde ba shin tu nyams su myong // ga pur dang ni ka ko la// a ka ru dang spos dang dri// de rnams btags nas chur bsres pas// dri zhim chu rnams kyis ni brdeg/ lha
69b2(rgyud 'grel): me'i nu mo gnyis kyi bar// lha yi gtsang po chu 'gyogs des// phar rdeg tshur rdeg rtsed mo byed// lha mo mdzes pa de rnams dang // khyod kyi bka' drin bsod nams kyis// lha yul du ni rtsod mo myong // mtho ris gnas pa'i lha rnams kyi// /
69b3(rgyud 'grel): gus pas bka' ni spyi bos len// de len phyag ni byas nas su// glang po che la zhon pa la// rgyan cha btags pa'i gas dza dris// lag pa gnyis la gdu bu btags// des ni lho li bsgyings tsam na// bkag mi nus pa ba spu ldang // rdo rje pha
69b4(rgyud 'grel): lam lag brgyan btags// khyed kyi spyan gyis gzigs tsa ma na// lha yi dbang po brgya byin thob// lha yi swa ris bsrung ba byed// sangs rgyas bstan pa de la ni// rin chen me tog spyi bor gnas// na mkha' dpal gyi bla rIs khyab// nyi ma
69b5(rgyud 'grel): shar ka'i 'od 'dra ba// des ni 'jig rten gsum po bkang // g.yon bskum g.yas brkyang zhabs gcig gis// de mnan bkug pa tshangs pa dang // dbang phyug chen po khyab 'jugo// khyed kyi sku ni bsgoms bgyis pas// srid po'i 'jigs
69b6(rgyud 'grel): pa phyis mi 'byung // skye ba len pa chad nas yang // kha cig gis ni 'di ltar mthong // nags tshal phyag gis mtshon chas bzung // shin tu 'jigs pa stobs po che// nam mkha' khyab par lag gdub bu// de rnams 'jigs che sbrul du
70a1(rgyud 'grel): mthong // k+She ma'o khros nas sdug par byed// rgod pa'i sgra ni shin tu 'jigs// ma rus pa yi spyod pa byed// ro langs tI ting shAg+na ni brdung // 'jigs chen byed me skya chen smug/ kha cig gis ni mthong bra la// smyos
70a2(rgyud 'grel): mAM bi sU re re las// 'jig rten pa de 'tsho bar byed// bde bar gnas pa ro tshangs pa dang // lha yi dbang po brgya byin dang // dbang phyug chen po klu la sogs// lha dang mi dang grub thob dang // dri za gnod sbyin sbrul rnams dang // phyogs su rgyu ba'i 'khor
70a3(rgyud 'grel): yad/ khri ste bde gshegs khyim der gnas// kye ma rab tu rdzu 'phrul che// 'jig rten gsum gyis phyag byas po// kye ma 'gul ni 'gul gnas pa// sna tshogs lha med dngos po ni// kye ma sgrol mi khyed yin no// kha cig gis ni mthong ba la
70a4(rgyud 'grel): rgyaskyegs deng ni sin d+har+ya// dkar dmyur kha dog ny+tsi ma gyur// dpal ldan min+ti nI lA 'dra// kha tsug gis ni mthong ba la// ma'i d+ha ma mor+d+haHsa dkar 'ang+ga// khru cig gis ni gse byung chu dog/ khyed kyi gzugs ni sna tshogs
70a5(rgyud 'grel):  shel dang 'dra bar glang 'dod gzugs// ye shes mar me thams cad mkhyen// des ni thams cad gsal bar mthong // de nyid mkhyen pa dbang po gcig/ nges par khyod kyi yon tan no// gra snga las thams cad
70a6(rgyud 'grel): mkhyen pas shes// yang na de yis sras kyis mkhyen// bdag gis kha gdangs byas nas ni// bya rog kha 'dra'i sgra dang ni// sdug bsngal tshod pas byas tsam na// de skyes mtsho byung tsam no// bdag gis pho rog smra bzhin
70b1(rgyud 'grel): bton// gzhan gyi sems la gzhang gang rgyu// bdag gis zhus pa'i don 'di ni// ma zhus gong du lhag par mkhyen// khyed kyi mkhyen pa de la ni// bdag gis zhu ba don med gleng // 'o na'ang rang sems dga' ba'i don// nye ba'i gnyen
70b2(rgyud 'grel): gyi mdun du ni// dug dag skyugs pa smras pa bzhin// sdug bsngal don de shes kyang ni// rang snying yang zhing bde bo bzhin// phan 'dogs dga' ba rgya mtsho nyid// rab tu gsal ba zla ba'i cha// kye ma mdzes mas gzigs par zhu//
70b3(rgyud 'grel): gradams drag ye shes gnang bar zhu// snying che chen mo khyod nyid kyis// mun+da nag sems ni gasngal bar mdzod// khyed kyi bstod pa'i chu des ni// bdag gi sems ni gtsang bar bkrus// phan nas byung sa gcig rnyedado// bstod pa 'dis
70b4(rgyud 'grel): ni 'gro ba'i don// 'bras bu thob pa yod par mthong // rab tu bstod pa'i yon tan tshwa// bdag gis bsod nams bshad mi shes// bsod nams de yi stobs kyis ni// 'jig rten pa kun don grub nas// grol ba'i bde ba myong
70b5(rgyud 'grel): bar shog/ spyan ras gzigs kyi zhabs kyi mthil// de yi mtshan ma bkra shis kyis// de bkang yod pa de la ni// bde gshegs sras kyi sa ris yin// bde nas bde ru 'gro ba kun// myur bar song nas bde bar shog/ me tog
70b6(rgyud 'grel): phreng ba 'dzin pa'i bstong pa// slob dpon thams cad mkhyen pa'i bshes gnyen gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// // paN+Di ta zla ba gzhon nus rang 'gyur mdzad pa'o// /
71a1(rgyud 'grel): rnam mthams sa/ rgya gar skad du/ da bi d+hu raku bukya de shAnA ma sto/ bod skad du/ lham sgrol ma la smre sngags kyi gsol ba 'debs pa zhes bya
71a2(rgyud 'grel): ba'i bstod pa/ rje btsun ma 'phags ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo// phyag 'tshal phyag 'tshal 'jig rten kun sgrol ma// phyag 'tshal skyabs med 'phags ma kun khyab ma// phyag 'tshal yang yang dran pas rjes 'dzin ma// de
71a3(rgyud 'grel): ring da lta mgon med bdag la skyabs// khyod sngon skyob pa rnam gzigs spyan chab las// gang 'khrungs de tshe ngo ma thag 'di skyed// srid gnas gang su 'jigs pas 'jigs 'gyur yod// de kun da skyabs zhes gsungs
71a4(rgyud 'grel): zhes gsungs dam bca' dgongs// nam mkha'i thugs thob mkha' 'dra yis// mdog 'chad 'gro ba rjes brtse ma// srid gnas 'gro ba lag 'dzin par// zhal bzhes slu brla ma mdzad cig/ khyod nyid rig 'dzin lha tshogs nang // zag
71a5(rgyud 'grel): med dga' bdes rnam rol bgyis// khyod 'bangs bu ni me nang bsreg/ kye kye thogs med mkhyen ldan gzigs// bdag rang gi ni nongs bgyis nas// me chu dgra sogs 'jigs gyur pa'ang // gal te khyod sku rjes dran gyur// skyabs
71a6(rgyud 'grel): mdzad lags na bdag ci yin// nyid phyag mchod sbyin bdud rtsi la// rgyun 'bebs yi dgas 'du me phrag kyang // cig car tshim bgyid kho bo mes// lus bu thigs pa 'bebs mi lags// yid 'ong phyag mtshan ut+pal rtsi/
71b1(rgyud 'grel): mngar bsil grib ma bsil ldan pas// cung zad reg na'ang gdung sel ma// glus ldan bu bdag nyug mi mdzad// thugs rjes brkyang ba'i zhabs g.yas kyis// mthe bong rgyun bzang thur 'byebs mas// ngan 'gro'i gnas gsum tshim
71b2(rgyud 'grel): mdzad na// phongs pa bdag cag gyi nar dor// ting 'dzin g.yon ba spyi krung gis// gar gyis saM gsum bde mdzod ma// sbrang bu mer bcug kho bo lta// gar stabs rlung gis cis mi skyod// 'dzum zhal dgyes mas gang gzigs na//
71b3(rgyud 'grel): phag sdig gdol ba mdze can yang // lha gzugs sdug mdzes sgyur spyod na// kho bo gcig spyan yul ma gyur// sgeg ldem 'gying mdzes gzi 'od ldan// khyod sku sus mthong de don 'grub// don gnyer rtse gcig rjes slob du// bdag la
71b4(rgyud 'grel): nyid gzigs ston min nam// khyod spyan ut+pal dkris ring gis// zur gzugs 'dod pa'i lho 'drur 'gyur// rtag tu nyid spyan mdun gnas dag/ ji ltar snang yang mkhyen ma lags// lha snyanA mnga' ma sgra kun gyi// rjes zhugs
71b5(rgyud 'grel): yul dus kun rig ma// kho bo nyams thag nga ros 'bod// 'brug sgra brag ri ltar gyur gyis// skyob ma lha'i shangs dag pos// gang gA'i bye brgyal dri rA ba bsrung // bdog 'dir mes tshig sha tshil gsur// rgya chen phyogs khyab
71b6(rgyud 'grel): tshor ma lags// thub chen ma cig zla ba'i ljags// bung ba'i mchu rtse ro mkhyen na// seng ge 'phrog byed mchod sbyin rgyur // ro bro ba la ldegs rmongs srid // rdo rje'i lus mnga' rig mkhyen ma// sdig rgyal khros pas me lha mchod//
72a1(rgyud 'grel): m-i bzang reg byung rgyas // phyugs smras rnam na gas myeng pa // rnags rgya dgur spyad// sasmyon pa rlo stsa nga // kunas sgyus hU~M zlus dgangs// dang /
72a2(rgyud 'grel): zhig rang sdig rang spyod dum// gzhan stobs gzhan dbod gyur de yang // thabs stobs brgya mnga' khyod smrabs mdzad// bdag 'dir nongs pa gang mchis grong // gcig tu gzhan la phan zhugs pas// mi ni brgya rtsa brgyad bzhugs
72a3(rgyud 'grel): btsal// de dbus kho bo khyod 'bangs sreg/ kye ma yum gcig bdag yar cha// sngon las 'bras bu rjes gcod pa'i// gnas gyur de dang de las kyang // khyod thugs gsung dang sku 'jig 'gyod// de las gzhan bdag nyid cir dgongs/
72a4(rgyud 'grel): kyi hud khyod lha zhabs pad drung // bsil ba'i gnas nas 'bar ba'i mes// mi brtson ji bzhin dmyal med mchod// 'di ci su yi khur lags gsung // de bis mgon med mgon gcig ma// khyod thabs thugs rje thogs med de//
72a5(rgyud 'grel): bdag dang 'gro ba ci dga' yang // mdzad man mdzad srid khyed zhus pas// 'on kyang kho bo 'di re tshig pas// lus can kun gyi zug rngu dang // nyon mongs sdig las cig gyur cig/ da ni su la re bar bya// kha che'i slob dpon thams
72a6(rgyud 'grel): cad mkhyen pa'i bshes gnyen zhes bya ba// mi brgya dang bdun gyis bskor ba la// tsan dan gyi mes bsregs pa'i tshe// nyid kyi yi dam gyi lha rje btsun ma 'phags ma sbrel ma la smre sngags kyi tshogs su bcad pa 'dis gsol ba
72b1(rgyud 'grel): btub pa dang // spyad cig yud tsam thang cig la// 'phags mA'i phyug nas char gyi rgyun kany+dza nga tsam bab nas// tsho nang bad+ma gyur to/ grag+sa sa/ ba ta shUD+D+h+yak+Sh+ma dang l-i ts+tshab byam spangs bsgru ba rdzogs so//
72b2(rgyud 'grel): sgrol ma dkon mchog gsum la bstod pa// log tog ma rig gnyis spangs shing // blo mchog shes bya kun la khyab// yang dag rdzogs pa'i mchog brnyes ma// sgrol ma sangs rgyas khyod phyag 'tshal// badre chen zhi ba mya ngan
72b3(rgyud 'grel): 'das// dam pa'i chos mchog yi ge bcu// pha rol phyin pa bcu yi chu// sgrol ma dam chos khyod phyag 'tshal// dus gsum bde gshegs thams cad kyi// sku dang gsung dang thugs gsang po yis// 'dus pa'i ye shes mkha' 'gro
72b4(rgyud 'grel): ma/ sgrol ma dge 'dun khyod phyag 'tshal// sgrol ma dkon mchog gsum la bstod pa/ rgya gor gyi mkhan po dI ping ka ra shrI dz+nyA na'i zhal snga nas dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba nag tshe tshul khrims rgyal bsra bi mau kra ma shI la'i gtsug lag
72b5(rgyud 'grel): khang du bsgyur cing zhus te/ gton la phab pa rdzogs so// / rgya grar skad du/ sag bod skad du/ me tog phreng 'dzin gyi sgrub pa'i thobs// rje btsun ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal
72b6(rgyud 'grel): lha dang lha ma ni nor lho'i cod pan ston ka'i nyi 'od 'bar ba'i tshogs kyis zhabs kyi rdul la reg/ rnyog med gzigs pa'i shes rab mig ni snying rje'i rlon gyis rab tu gang zhing nyon mongs dra ba gcod// rmongs pa'i mthu yis srid
73a1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i mtsha chen mi zad skye 'cha'i rba brgal drag pos kun nas g.yengs gyur pa// skyob pa'i gzings chen dri med gzugs mdzes pa la kyi sring po me tog breng 'dzin de la bdag phyag 'tshal//
73a2(rgyud 'grel): gang zhig spros bral mkha' ltar dag pa'i dbyings su ro gcig pa// bsdam gtan+da sprin med a sogs yi ges snying kror rab brgyan cing // gus pa'i sbyor bas sna tshogs mthu ldan yon tan rin chen gter// drang srong tshe 'dzin
73a3(rgyud 'grel): bla ma'i gsung las bdag gis 'dir brjod bya// rab tu zhi la dga' ba'i bden 'dzin nags tshal lam// g.yeng ba'i rdul bral phug gam ljon shing dur khrod mchog/ chu 'gram dbyen pa'i sa phyogs rang bzhin nyams dga'
73a4(rgyud 'grel): bur/ chu gtsang spos kyi chag chag me tog dri zhim gtor// rgyal ba'i sku gzugs dam chos rin chen bzhugs pa dang // me tog bdug spos snang ba dri dang zhal zas mchog/ rgyal sras yum dang dkyil 'khor mtsho phyir
73a5(rgyud 'grel): legs ba zhig bya// ri dgas 'gan 'dzi sngon po legs par btags gyur pa'i// stan la 'dug nas bsam gtan bdag gis bsgom par bya// thog mar 'od gsal rten 'brel bden stong mi g.yo ba// gang zhig shar bas
73a6(rgyud 'grel): spyod pa'i dus ni yul rnams dang // dbang po'i tshigs dag rtog bral tshul gyis kun tu nub// rtog med rtog bral rdo rje'i mchog 'dzin kun du khyab// ji bzhin rtog pa'i mtha' yas rang sems sa bon mchog/ zla 'od
73b1(rgyud 'grel): dkar mdzeswa tAM la s+ya phyogs bcu na mkha'i mthur// shin tu rno ba'i 'od zer chen pos khams gsum gyi// mun pa'i tshogs bcom rgyal ba sras rnams na mkha' la// bzhugs par bltas la bdag yid rtse gcig dri med
73b2(rgyud 'grel): kyi// gang zhig sna tshogs ro gcig dbang po'i gzhu 'dra ba// nyon mongs rdul bral zhing bde sgrol bde 'gro zhing // ye shes rgyun 'byab rgyal ba'i sku mdzes pad+mo la// gus pa'i khur gyis mgrin pa smad nas bdag phyag
73b3(rgyud 'grel): 'tshalha// kha dog sna tshogs dri zhim dbyibs mdzes me tog dang // bdug spos a ka ru dang sbrul gyi snying po dang // snod mdzesu rin tshon sgrol mo snang ba dre ri bcas dang // chu gtsang dri zhom snying po sbyar ba dpag med dang // mdog
73b4(rgyud 'grel): bzang ro brgya ldan pa'i zhal zas mang po rnams// gus bcas yid 'ong rgyal sras khyed la 'bu'i lcags kyis// sems can tshogs rnams srid pa'i gdung ba zhi bar mdzod// oM badz+ra puSh+pa AHhUM oM badz+ra d+hU pa AHnAM/ oM ba
73b5(rgyud 'grel): A lo kA AHhUM/ oM badz+ra gran d+he AHhUM/ oM badz+ra nai bed+ya A hUM/ gnod pa byed rnams dge ba'i phyogs las nyams pa dang // sdig pa'i gzhir gyur bstan du mi rung ji snyed las// dug gri bsgrags pA sems gdung gyur pa bdag
73b6(rgyud 'grel): sogs kyi// 'phra rgyas tshon chen zag pa'i tshang tshim zad bar mdzod// gang zhig rgyal sras thub pa'i 'od tshogs mdzes pa'i tshal// 'bras bu yin pa'i ljid kyi zug rngu gnon mdzad cing // snying rje'i rgyun gyis nyon mongs tha ba brlan
74a1(rgyud 'grel): mdzad pa// dregs pa'i rdus bral sgrub pa'i mgon la sgrubs sum no// yang dag las b+h+ya ba lta ba'i drug gas sgyus rgyur cing // rnan 'arnal / phyogs byung ba rnams// gos
74a2(rgyud 'grel): gzings chen snying rje'i cha mi 'gyur mchog/ dri med yid 'ong zla ba'i mdangs gsal thob par bgyi// rab tu zab pa'i dka' thub dpal gyi 'bar ba dang // nyon mongs chags bral byams pa snying rje dga' ba drang // btang snyoms
74a3(rgyud 'grel): yid brtan rim gro byed pa'i bde ba mchog/ khams dang dbang po la sogs mkha' ltar ro gcig bde// bde gshegs byed pa sgyu ma'i yon tan dpag med rnams// srid gsum 'gro ba dbang po'i dri ma spyod byed pa// rab dga'
74a4(rgyud 'grel): sems kyi gru cheno na mkha'i dbyings su 'gyur// nyi zla'i sbyor bas mun pa zad 'gyur grong mchog lam// bdud rtsi sgrol mo chu gI tai rA yid bzhin rin po che// rdul mo rdul bral ye shes dbang phyug phyag rgya can+da// ye shes
74a5(rgyud 'grel): mthar son sna tshogs lus can kun ston pa// ting 'dzin dag pa'i lus can 'phags ma thob par shog/ de nas byams pa snying rje dga' ba btang snyoms bsgom// gdod nas sems ni ma skyes rang bzhin mi 'gyur ba//
74a6(rgyud 'grel): nges don bdud rtsi na mkha' las byung dag pa brten// rtog pa rgyun chad sems nyid de nyid gzhan ma yin// chu tshod thun dang dbyug gu skad cig rim pa med// mi 'jigs sgro skur mi rtsol rgyal sras thu bo ste// gdod nas ma skyes
74b1(rgyud 'grel): chos rnams byed pa thig la yin// spros bral chos nyid yang dag nyid ni snang bas dben// bskyed rdzogs theg pa'i mtha' bral rtog med bde chen po// oM shUn+ya tAdz+nyAnA s+yai b+hA ba At+ma ka ha// de nas snying rje'i shugs kyis rab tu bsgyu
74b2(rgyud 'grel): gyur nas// rong snying paM las sna tshogs pad+ma de steng ar+ya// lte ba zla bas brgyan cing dbyangs dang gsal byed kyis// kun nas bskor ba'i tAM las phyogs bcur 'di tshogs 'phros// 'gro ba'i don byas tshur la bsdus nas tAM la thim//
74b3(rgyud 'grel): de rnams skad cig nyid la sgroli ma'i sku lngar gyur// sngon mo'o zhil gcig phyag bzhi stag gi gos gyon mo// gri gug thod pa ral gri sdigs mdzub phyag rgya can// ser mo zhal gsum phyag drug g.yas sngo g.yin pa dmar//
74b4(rgyud 'grel): ral gri dgra sta mda' drang zhags pa gzhu dang dung // zhal gcig phyag bzhi brtsod kyi kha dog sna tshogs brgyan// mi 'jigs mda' dang gzhu dang ut+pal dmar po bsnams// sku mdog ljang ser chos kyi phyag rgyas thugs ka
74b5(rgyud 'grel): ru/ ut+pa lA sngo 'dzin shar srogs go ra ma~M tri bzhin du// sna tshogs rgyan ldan phyogs rnams sreg cing gsang sngags bzlas// rnam snang la sogs rgyal po'i rigs kyis dbu brgyan pa// nu ma rgyas shing mi 'jigs phyag
74b6(rgyud 'grel): dang ut+pal 'dzin// brtson pa'i lus ldan zla ba'i mdangs can dbus su bos me// oM tA re tut+tA re tu rai swA hA// oM tA ri tut+tA re tu ra niSh+Ta dA ru Na pra ta ha ta tsit+tA ush+ma ha na swA hA// oM tA re tut+tA re tu re b+ha ya ha ro Na rak+Sha pa ra Ne gu pa ti
75a1(rgyud 'grel): bad+d+hi s+yA ma he swAhA/ oM tA re tut+tA re a na b+hi pradz+nyA prA san+na ta a b+hi pra dz+nyA pra sA d+ha swAhA// oM tA re tut+tA re d+hu re b+ha ya ha ra Na hUM hUM hUM mr-i t+yudaN+Da ya mdat+ta ya ma d+h+ya swAhA/ de ltar gsang sngags bzlas pa'i
75a2(rgyud 'grel): 'od kyis phyogs khyab cing // gzungs kyi snying po mthu tshon 'di yang brjod par bya// na mau rat+na tri yA ya/ na maHAr+ya wa lo ki tri shwa rA yA/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwAM yau/ mr-i hA kA ru Ni kA yayai/ tid+ya thA/ oM tA re tut+tA re tu re sarba duSh+Ta
75a3(rgyud 'grel): pra duSh+Ta Na mo ma kr-i t+ye dza~M b+ha lA staM b+hA ya/ mo hA ya/ badz+rA ya/ hUM hUM hUM phaT phaT phaT/ sar+b+ba duSh+Tasta~M b+hA na tA re swAt+ma/ mang du bzlas la stobs bskyed cho ga 'di ltar bsam// snod mdzes nang du 'bras sogs kha zas bzang po rnams// mngon
75a4(rgyud 'grel): par bshams pa'i cha gnyis pad+ma kha bye ba'i// phyag rgya bcing zhing sku gsung thugs kyi snying po mchog/ lan bdun brjod pas kha dog dri ro phun sum tshogs/ oM ni maHsarba bud+d+he bo d+hi satwA nAM/ a pra hi ha ta sha sa nA nAM/ ho ha
75a5(rgyud 'grel): b+ha grA pra tI sa ma dA sar+b+ba bud+d+ha A bi lo ki te/ oM daM ba liM gr-ih+Na gr-ih+NA/ oM mr-i tA/ kha kha khA hi khA hi/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Thi hUM hUM phaT phaT swAhA/ oM a kA ro mu khaM sarba d+har+m+mAN+DaM A d+ya nut+pan+na tIti oM UHhU~M baTaT+Ta swAt+ma/ A mr-i ta khaM kha ShAH
75a6(rgyud 'grel): khA ti tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ 9/ ba~Md+d+he/ h+ya nA hA nA/ da hA da hA/ gar+dz+dzag d+hA/ ba~M smr-i Ta ya bi s+pho Ta ya/ sam+b+ha bag+h+nAM nA bi na ya~M/ mi hA ga na bi ta dzAM wi tAn+ta kaR+Sha ya hU~M hUM hUM phaT pheMT biT b+h+yohU~M/ dpag meng tshe gcig rig pa'i lha mo rnams la
75b1(rgyud 'grel): 'bul// cha gcig nang du 'od zer sbu gu bskyed byas te// nag po chen po tha kar dbyig gi snying po dang // lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin grul bum tshogs rnams la// 'dod pa'i gsol ba btab cing gus pas dbul bar bya// brgyad dang
75b2(rgyud 'grel): bcu bzhi bcu dang nyi shu gsum rnams lo// zhi ba dbang dang mngon spyod sbyin sreg dbul// dkar dang ser dang dmar dang nag po'i tshogs rnams kyis// rtse khru gcig dang gcig dang phyed dang rtse khru cig/ zlum dang gru bzhi zla
75b3(rgyud 'grel): gam gru gsum bri bar bya// thams cad sor bzhi bskyed cing 'od phreng phyi rol bri// 'khor lo dkar du sna tshogs rdo rje ser po dang // pad ma dmar dang gri gug sngon po thab rnams kyi// rim pa ji bzhin legs par nang du dgod
75b4(rgyud 'grel): par bya// mar dang zho dang 'o ma sbrang rtsi ga ra dang // 'bras til gro dang nas sogs 'bru yi rnam pa dang // dur ba ku sha la sngogs cho ga gzhan bzhin bsog/ de las gzhan pa'i sreg rdzus khyab par mang po rnams// nye bAr
75b5(rgyud 'grel): bshams la thog mar drang srong me lha mchog/ zhal gcig phyag bzhi sku mdog dkar po tshangs skud can// dbyug pa spyi blugs bgrang phreng mi 'jigs phyag rgya can// ral po'i cod pon dka' thub lus ring zla ba'i steng //
75b6(rgyud 'grel): mngon par bskyed la dgang blugs bdun gyis rab tu mchod// dzoHzhes brjod cing se gol gtogs la gshegs par bsam/ oM bah+ni rA dz+nyA pra tits+tsha swA hA/ de nas rdzas dang me thab dri che ba bzang pos bsang // oM prak+Sha
76a1(rgyud 'grel): bi shud d+he swA hA// mchod pa'i yo byad snying po'i sngags kyis dbul bar bya// mnyes par gyur nas smon lam btab cing mi snang sgom// rdo rje sems dpa'i dam tshig sems can+da skyong // ched du brjod
76a2(rgyud 'grel): la lus ngag yid gsum gyi// spyod lAm khyad par can gyi gnas bya zhing // de las gzhan pa'i bsod nams mang po bsag/ drang srong tshe 'dzin bu ma'i gsung snyan bdag la bsnyad gyur pa// byang chub myu gu'i phreng bas lus
76a3(rgyud 'grel): brgyan gzhan don 'brug sgra sgrogaso// snying rje'i shugs kyis bsod nams sprin chen grags pa'i char rgyun gyis// nyon mongs 'khrugs bu'i mtshan rab tu bsil bar byed par shog/ me tog phreng 'dzin sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs
76a4(rgyud 'grel): 'phags pa 'jam dpal dbyangs kyis byin gyis brlab pa baN+Di ta chen po ta thA ga tA rak+Shi tas mdzad pa rdzogs so// /
76a5(rgyud 'grel): cog ku lo tsa ba mya ngan med pa'i dpal gyis bsgyur ba'o// / rgya gar skad du/ shU n+ya tA b+hA bAn/ bod skad du/ stong pa nyid bsgom pa/ me tog phreng 'dzin sgrol ma la phyag
76a6(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal lo// gtu mo mo e yi sbyor ba yis// lus kyi ba spu cher ldang zhing // yang dag lta ba goms gyur pa// de nyid chos rnams chos nyid brjod// de ltar sgrub pa'i thabs lan mang du goms par byas la bsnyen pa 'bum phrag
76b1(rgyud 'grel): bcu sngon du song ba'i gang zag gis ri yi phug la sogs pa dben pa'i gnas su stong pa nyid bsgom pa'i rim pa la 'jug par bya ste/ de yang skad cig gis bdag gi snying kur paM las pad+ma a las zla ba'i steng du dbyangs dang
76b2(rgyud 'grel): gsal byed kyi yi ges trAM ku mu ta dkar po lta bu la kun nas bskor ba las 'od 'phros pas phyogs bcu'i sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal zhi ngar byas te slar log pa tAM la thim par blta'o// de ma thag tu bdag nyid
76b3(rgyud 'grel): 'phags ma sgrol ma me tog phreng 'dzin zhes bya ba sku mdog dkar mo ston ka'i sprin med pa'i zla ba lte bu lang tsho la bab pa'i cha lugs 'dzin pa// g.yas mchog sbyin pa g.yon pa ut+pal sngon po kha du mar gyes pa 'dzin
76b4(rgyud 'grel): pa// rin po che'i rgyan sna tshogs kyis sku mdzes par byasdu pa// pad+ma dang zla ba'i steng du sku brtson byas bzhugs pa la sems bsdud de bsgom par bya'o// de nyid 'od kyi rnam pa las// rang rig rnam pa gzhan med de// g.yas
76b5(rgyud 'grel): dang g.yon gyi lam gnyis dgag/ rang sems dbu mo'i lam du gzhug/ dpal ldan dus kyi 'khor lo las// bsam gtan gyis ni phyi rol dngos po btang nas sems de brtan par yang ni byed// srog dang rtso lnga bas nyi
76b6(rgyud 'grel): zla spangs nas mun pa can du srog rlung rgyu bar byed// 'dzin pa'i yan lag gis ni thig ler dbugs kyi 'byung 'jug dman par yang byas nas// rjes dran rang gi gzugs las mkha'i la ri bong can bzhin 'od zer
76'a1(rgyud 'grel): chen po 'byung // 'od kyi phung po sku la thim// sku yang pad+ma zla ba la// de nyid dbyangs drang gsal byed la// de yang yi ge tAM la bsdu// tAM yang thig le nyid la thim// thig le stong par yi med// de nyid sems kyi
76'a2(rgyud 'grel): mtshan nyid do// rang sems gdod nas ma skyes phyir// rtag sogs brtags pa grwa la 'jug/ de nyid spros pas dbyen pa'i phyir// cung zad bsgoms kyang bdag gzhan gyi// rtog pa sna tshogs 'gag par 'gyur// rgyun tu bsgoms pa
76'a3(rgyud 'grel): smos ci dgos// de ltar de bzhin nyid la blo// mnyam par gzhag pa'i mthu chen gyis// yang dang yang du goms byas nas// myur du byang chub reg par 'gyur// stong pa nyid bsgom pa rdzogs so// /
76'a4(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ ku dr-iSh+Ti dU Sha Na/ bod skad du/ log par blta ba sun dbyung ba// khro gnyer can gyi sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo// yang dag lta ba'i sbyor ba yis// sna tshogs las kyi rnam pa can// ji ltar mye yis bud
76'a5(rgyud 'grel): shing bzhin// khro gnyer can gyi sbyor ba bri// re zhig sgrub bI thab nas byung ba'i cho ga rnams dang bsnyen pa 'bum phrag bcus mthu thob par byas lnga// dur khrod la sogs pa shis pa'i gnas su skad cig gis khro gnyer can
76'a6(rgyud 'grel): sgrol ma sku mdog sngon mo zhal gcig phyag bzhi ma stag go na bza' can rus pa'i phreng ba can shas lus rgyas pa spyan dmar zhing gdang pa/ g.yos gnyis na gri gug dang ral gri/ g.yon gnyis kyis thod pa dang sdigs mdzub
76'b1(rgyud 'grel): bsgreng ba// pad+ma dang nyi ma'i steng du bsgoms la// de yi thugs ka'i tAM lA 'od 'phros pas ma dag pa'i las can gyi skyes bu la thim zhing bkug par bsams la/ oM tA re tut+tA re tu re niSh+Ta dA ru Na pra ti ha ta/ tsit+ta uSh+mAHhA ni swA hA/
76'b2(rgyud 'grel): zhes pa'i gsang sngags bzlas shing // rkang gnyis kyi khrag dang / rtsi nag pos 'khor lo rtsibs bcu pa bris la dbus su gzugs brnyan dang / rtsibs dang mu khyud la gsang sngags ming dang bcas pa bri bar bya'o// de
76'b3(rgyud 'grel): nas yungs kar gyis brab cing gsang sngags bzlas de'i rjes la sbyin sreg dang / gtor ma dang / mchod pas khro gnyer can lha mo la mchod la tsher ma can gyi mes spra tshul dang 'khor lo bsros la dug ha si nag po'i shun pa 'am/
76'b4(rgyud 'grel): rnga mo'i rgyus pas dkris pas bdag gam klu chen po'i gnas su bsgrol bar bya'o// smyo dang dbugs ni rtseg pa dang // gyen du blta zhing rgyug par byed// lus po skem dang mig ser dang // lus la sha bkra me dpal 'byung // gzhan
76'b5(rgyud 'grel): yang mdze dang shu ba dang / 'brum bu bas ljags 'byung 'gyur zhing // tshe yau dus kyang byed par 'gyur// gsang sngagaso sbyor ba'i tshe ba yis// gnod sbyin mkha' 'gros sems dkrugs shing // las kyi myu gu zad byed pa//
76'b6(rgyud 'grel): khro gnyer can gyi sbyor ba'o// lta ba ngan pa sun dbyung ba rdzogs so// 6// rgya gor skad du/ tse ra ban+d+ha/ bod skad du/ chom rkun bcings pa/ mya ngan med pa'i sgrol ma la phyag
77a1(rgyud 'grel): 'cha'o// klung chen stag dang mi nang dang // rgyas rgyun 'jigs pa bskyung bar gyur// rlung ga zung bas lus sbyong ba// mya ngan med pa'i skal ma mad// de yang sgrub pa'i thangs nas jis
77a2(rgyud 'grel): bshad pa'i tshogs 'phags ma'i tshigs yongasu mnyes par byas la// nags tshal lAMm rI khrod la sogs pa gnas khyad par rgyun du ri dgas kyi dgas pa 'am/ 'gran ji sngon po legs par btags pa la 'dug la/
77a3(rgyud 'grel): byams pad+mang snying rje chen po ston du song bas bdag go ste ga hU~M las pad+mA s+yA wAs zla ba'i phyi lci khyor gyi sbring du d+hi sa~M ba de lhas phyogs baDUr shing 'bras 'phags ma gyes pad sems can gyi don nus
77a4(rgyud 'grel): blos hU~M la thim pa dang bdag nyid myi ngan med pa'i sbrul mi sgra mdog gu ser bi ts+tsha ma'i mdog 'ang+gA ba rin po me sgra tshogs kyi dbu rgyan tsong pon dang ldan pa// zhal gsum phyag drug/ g.yas sngon gaman pa
77a5(rgyud 'grel): gr-id+yA g+h+ra s+thA dang sa // gzhan pos nag sna bye da gsung drung 'dzin par bsgoms la// u~M d+h+we d+hi/ Sh+Te d+hA d+hi d+hAm+mu hA NA~M ba~M khAr NA r+m+mA sa seM/ zhes 'i sdug sna ban+de nga sdug pa'i kun tugs la ga
77a6(rgyud 'grel): drig ci la ba ma chos sa rgya'i dang mos pa ba sasogasas kyi rgya sbyin sreg sa min mi / sdigs pa 'ong bar rgya bzhin gyi 'i kyil
77b1(rgyud 'grel): pa 'am// dpung pa la bcing bar bya'o// de nas 'brog dgon pa la sogs pa nyam nga ba'i gnas su sgrol ma gsal bar bskyed la sngon du goms par byas pa'i rlung bsri zhing snying po dang gzungs bzla zhing bdag gis grib ma bzhin
77b2(rgyud 'grel): du g.yas su 'od zer can mya ngan med pa'i cha lugs// phag bdun gyis drangs pa'i shing rta lnga bskyon nas mi 'jigs kyi sgras brgyan pa dang / g.yon logs na sdigs mdzub sgrol ma dmar mo zhal gcig phyag gnyis mra g.yas
77b3(rgyud 'grel): pas sdigs mdzub// g.yon Da ma ru'i sgra 'byin pa// lus gos dang bral bas/ mi 'jigs pa'i dbyangs sgrogs shing gshegs par bsam mo// de nas brag tsha ba'i sa phyogs su thar pa dang me tog phreng 'dzin l-i sogs pa'i bstod
77b4(rgyud 'grel): pa bya'o// gcan zan khro bo mang pos gang ba yi// tshang tshing nags chom rkun 'du ba'i gnas// lam med nyam nga'i gnas su bdag lus pa/ cho ga 'di nyid kyis ni yongasu grol/ chom rkun bcing ba rdzogs so// /
77b5(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ bid+d+ha bar+d+ha ni/ bod skad du/ rig pa bskyed pa/ rig byed sgrol ma la phyag 'tshalo// gang zhig rmongs pas blo ldongs pa// rig byed sgrol ma rig pa'i mchog/ rgyal po khyim bdag mgu byed pa// blang
77b6(rgyud 'grel): phyir bdag gis bris par bya// gzhan yang sgrol ma'i rig pa mchog blang ba'i slad du bsnyen pi grang tsha du son zhing sgrub thabs kyi cho ga blo 'dris pa'i rten gyi gang zag gis byams pa dang snying rje sngon du bskyed la skad cig gis rig
78a1(rgyud 'grel): byed sgrol ma sku mdog chos chen po lta bu zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa// g.yas kyi dang po mi 'jigs pa'i phyag dang / gnyis pas mnga' dang / g.yon gyis rin po che'i gzhu dang / g.yon gnyis pas u
78a2(rgyud 'grel): dmar po 'dzin pa/ rgyan sna tshogs kyis spras pa/ pad+ma dang zla ba'i gdan la skyil krung gi bzhugs pa/ de'i thugs kar paM las pad+ma/ a las zla ba'i steng du tAM dmar po byu ru'i mdog lta bu las/ phyogs bcur 'od 'phros tshur bsdus nas
78a3(rgyud 'grel): bdag gi kun du rmongs pa'i tshogs thams cad zhi bar bsam zhing sems gtad la bsgom par bya'o// de nas skyo bar gyur na gsang sngags rgyun mgal me'i 'khor lo lta bus sems sbyangs nas yar ngo'i tshes brgyad kyi nyin par nas
78a4(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal dang gu gum dang 'gi baM rnams sbyar la pad+ma 'dab ma bcu drug pa gnyis bris la/ oM tA re tut+tA re tu ro a ni b+hi pradz+nyA pra sA d+ha ne/ oM b+hi pra dz+nyA pra sA d+ha swA hA/ zhes bzla zhing bdag dang 'khor lo phan tshun thim zhing snying po dang
78a5(rgyud 'grel): dang gzungs dgod// 'khor lo gcig lo dbyangs dang gsal byed bri bar bya'o// de nas bcwa lnga'i mtshan phyed la zla bA la mngon du phyogs pas mchod pa rnam pa lnga dang sbyin sreg dang gtor ma rnams phul la me long gra ya' yongasu
78a6(rgyud 'grel): dag pa bu ga med pa la sin d+hA ra dmar po gdal la gser ram zangs kyi thur mas 'khor lo ji lta ba bzhin du phyi nang du gnyis bris la snying po dang gzungs dang / phyi ma la dbyangs dang gsal byed bkod de cung zhig bzlas pa
78b1(rgyud 'grel): bya zhing mchod pa rnam pa lhas yang dag par mchod la 'khor lo gnyis dril te mgul du gdags par bya// sin d+ha ra legs par bsdus te dug lang ka wa te'i sbu gur blugs la mchan khung g.yon par btags te thig lde dmar po sku
78b2(rgyud 'grel): mtshams su bya zhing / bstod snyoms kyi phyir grong khyer du zhugs na rgyal po dang khyim bdag dad cing 'dun par 'gyur ro// sgra dang bstan bcos mang po dang // rol mo sgyu rtsol ji snyed dang // lha dang gnod sbyin bu mo sogs// rig byed mthu yis
78b3(rgyud 'grel): 'dun par byed// rig pa bskyed pa rdzogs so// @6// rgya garaR+Sha skad du/ mI t+yu thA ki pa/ bod skad du/ 'chi ba bsgru pa/ dpal sgrilnga ma chen mo la phyag 'tshalo/ sgrol ma ljang ser cho gA yau sI// 'chi
78b4(rgyud 'grel): bdag chad pa zhi mdzad cing // mkha' 'gro srin po'i gnod pa rnams// sgrol mas sgrol ma mchog yin no// re shig rmo ltas dang lus kyi rnam 'gyur la sogs pa 'chi ba'i rtags rnams dmigs shing / dus ma yin par 'chi ba'i dus
78b5(rgyud 'grel): byed pa rnams kyi 'jigs pa chen po zhi bar bya ba'i phyir snying po'i grangs bgrangs shing ma yengs pa'i bsam gtan mang du goms pa'i rnal 'byor pas dben pa'i su phyogs stan badre ba la 'dug ste lus kyi 'jug pa sngon du btang
78b6(rgyud 'grel): byams pa dang snying rje chen po sems can la bskyed la sgyu ma lta bu'i blo cung zhig goms par byas te skad cig gis dpal sgrol ma chen mo sku mdog ljang ser rin po che sna tshogs kyis sku legs par spras pa/ phyag gnyis kyi thugs kar
78a1(rgyud 'grel): chos smra ba'i phyag rgyas ut+pal sngon po 'dzin pa/ pad+ma dang zla ba'i steng du skyil krung gis bzhugs pa// de'i thugs kar pad+ma dang zla ba'i steng du tAM ljang ser de lnga'o n+de phyo bcur 'phros pas dus ma yin par tshe'i dus byed
78a2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i sems can rnams kyi 'chi bdag gis mthu med par byas la tshur la bsdus la sgyu ma lta bu'i blos sdug bsngal gyis nyen po'i sems can rnams la dmigs shing snying po'i mchog 'di brjod par bya'o// oM tA re tut+tA re b+ha ya ha re Ne hUM hU~M hUM/
78a3(rgyud 'grel): mri t+yu daN+Da ya mA daN+Da ya ma d+hu na swA hA// zhes pa bzlas zhing / gzungs dang sbyin sreg dang gtor ma dang mchod pa phul la bstod pa bya'o// de'i rjes la gro ga la gu kum gyis 'khor lo rtsibs bdun pa bris la che ge mo'i sdig pa zhi bar gyur cig
78a4(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa spel la snying po dang gzungs dgod par bya'o// de nas rin po che'am rdza sar pa kha sbyar rAm/ rwa 'am shing gi za ma tog gi nang du 'khor lo dril la skud pa dmar pos snod lan mang du cing // dar ram ras dkar po'i nang na
78a5(rgyud 'grel): bza' g.yogs la dge 'dun gyi sde chen po'i gtsug lag khang gi shing ngam/ mchod rten gyi shing la bcings la/ dus khyad par can la mchod pa chen pos mchod cing sgom pa dang snying po dang gzungs dang bstod pa rnams
78a6(rgyud 'grel): brjod par bya'o// 'phags ma sgrol ma stobs mo che// khyed kyi gsang sngags rjes dran pas// 'chi bdag gnod pa zhi gyur nas// zhabs kyi rdul la reg par shog/ 'phags pa 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis byin gyis
78b1(rgyud 'grel): brlabs pa/ paN+Di ta chen po ta thA ga ta rak+Shi tas mdzad pa/ 'chi ba bslu ba rdzogs so// / cog kru lo tsa ba mya ngan med pa'i dpal gyis bskur ba'o//
78b2(rgyud 'grel): gas pa sgrol ma'o smod pa ga/ 6// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya tA ra de bi stotra sarba ar+tha sA d+hA nA nA ma sto d+ha nA dzA/ bod skad du/ 'phagaso mu lha mo sgrol ma'i bstod pa/ don thams cad grub pa zhes bya
78b3(rgyud 'grel): bstod pa'i rgyal po/ mgon po thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo// zla ba skar ma'i tshogs dang mkha' la mdzes// mgon po sems dpas bskor cing 'gro nang mdzes// zla
78b4(rgyud 'grel): ba d+hi med gdung ba sel ba bzhin// mi shes kun spangs 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal sel// byang chub phyogs chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang // bsam gtan ting 'dzin rnam thar mang po can// sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan gyis brgyan pa la// dpe byed
78b5(rgyud 'grel): bzang po brgyad cus rab tu brgyan// srung byed gsum dang ma 'dres dran gsum dang // mi 'jigs bzhi brnyes yongasu dag bzhi mnga'// stobs bcu'i rtsal ldan skye la thugs rje che// bag chags kun bcom mi brnye sna rnam kun bcom//
78b6(rgyud 'grel): rigs lnga nyon mongs lnga bcom ye shes lnga// sku lnga mngon par byang chub rnam lnga brnyes// lam lnga sbyong mdzad sangs rgyas lnga'i sku// phung po lnga spangs zag zod mngon shes lnga// dus gsum rgyal ba kun gyi snying po khyod// yon
79a1(rgyud 'grel): tan kun gyi 'byung gnas rgyu yi mchog/ tshugs sdang ma bral 'gro ba'i don gyi phyir// cha lugs rnam pa sna tshogs 'dzin pa khyod// sna tshogs 'phrin las sku mdog ljang khu can// dbu la 'od dpag med
79a2(rgyud 'grel): pas rab tu brgyan// 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i cha lugs can// 'gro ba'i ded dpon sgrol ma khyod kyi sku// mdzes pa'i ral pa dbu rgyan cod pan dang // dar dpyangs zla tshes sna tshogs rdo rjes mdzes// rna rgyan mgul rgyan dpung rgyan
79a3(rgyud 'grel): gdu bu dang // sko rags zhabs gdub pa nga'i smad dkris mdzes// rin chen nor bus spras pa'i do shal dang // dpung rgyan se mo ngos ni shin tu brgyan// bcos bu'i ras dang kha dog sna tshogs pa'i// dar dang lha yi der zab na bza'
79a4(rgyud 'grel): mnabs// pad+ma'i rigs ni pad+ma las 'khrungs can// sna tshogs pad+ma mchog gi gdan la bzhugs// chags sdang zho sdang gti mug la sogs kyis// ma gos pad+ma dmar po bzhin du dag/ dbang po gshin rje chu lha gnod sbyin dang //
79a5(rgyud 'grel): 'byung po me lha rlung lha srin po dang // sa bdag steng gi lha tshogs mA lus rnams// phyogs skyong 'gro don sprul mdzad khyod kyi sku// tshangs pa khyab 'jug dbang phyug lha chen dang // drag po zhi pa u ma la sogs las// rgyal
79a6(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur lha yi lha ste sgrol ma khyod// khams gsum kun gyi dbang phyug chen por grags// thod pa mi 'chang thugs rje'i thod pa can// ral pa rnams spangs shin tu dga' bas mdzes// g.yang gzhi dang bral mtshan dang dpe byad
79b1(rgyud 'grel): spras// thal bas ma bskus byams pas khyab pa'i bdag/ dbyug gu gsum spangs bslab pa gsum dang ldan// dur khrod gnas dor chos kyi dbyings su rol// rkeng phran cang te'u la sogs sgra spangs nas// gsung dbyangs ya lag dug rkus
79b2(rgyud 'grel): tshechos kun sgrogs// tshangs skyong mi bsnams mya ngan 'das pa'i sku// mtshan spyod spangs nas dus kun mnyam par spyong // ldog sred byung gdung ba'i dka' thub spangs// dam pa'i brtul zhugs ma lus rab tu ldan// mtshen cha der nas
79b3(rgyud 'grel): shes rab mtshon cha bsnams// zhe sdang rnams spangs sgrub pa'i rtse rgyun gtso ngo // phyogs 'dzin mi mnga' grub mtha' kun gyi bdag/ chags pa mi mnga' kun la mkha' ltar spyod// mtha' spangs na mkha' lta bur khyod kyi thugs
79b4(rgyud 'grel): shes bya'i dkyil 'khor thams cad khyod kyi sku// sgra dang brjod par snang ba thams cad gsung // sgrol mchis kun bsdus pa'i snying po can// zhi dang rgyas dang dbang dang mngon spyod dang // dgug dang dgar dang sde rangs bskyed pa
79b5(rgyud 'grel): dang / lcags dang tshig 'phrog gzugs sgyur bsrung la sogs// dus gsum rgyal ba kun gyi 'phrin las can// sku yi dbang phyug gsung gi dbang phyug dang / thugs kyi dbang phyug 'dod yon dbang phyug ldan/
79b6(rgyud 'grel): 'phrul kun 'gro yon tan brgyad dang ldan// chos sku mkha' ltar dbyer med rtogs gyur kyang // gzugs sku 'ja'i tshon lta bur 'gro la ston// ji srid dkyil 'khor kun gyi bdag po mchog/ sgrol ma 'gro ba 'khor
80a1(rgyud 'grel): ba'i gseb lam sgrol// gang gis dran na ngan song 'jigs pa dang // rgyal po rkun po me chus 'jigs pa dang // seng ge stag sbrul srin po'i 'jigs las sgrol// 'byung ba 'khrugs dang gdon gyis
80a2(rgyud 'grel): skyed pa yi// srog 'phrog nad kyi bye brag ma lus dang // drang srong mkha' 'gro'i dmod gyur kun las sgrol// nor bu sngags dang sman sbyor 'dod pa bzhin// 'gro la 'jig rten 'das pa'i dngos grub kun// mos pas dran pa rnams
80a3(rgyud 'grel): lo stsol ba yin// rgyal srid 'dod pas g.yul ngor rgyal ba dang // longs spyod grags pa 'dod pa de dgu dang // bkur ba'i dri ngas bral 'dod sbyong ba yin// gang gis bstod pas bde gshegs kun la bstod // dus gsum sangs
80a4(rgyud 'grel): rgyas kun gyi bskyed mdzad ma// sangs rgyas sras bcas ma lus khyod kyi sku// rje btsun sgrol ma yon tan phung po can// tshangs pa khyab 'jug dbang phyug la sogs dang // drag po u ma ka ra sham la sogs// skul byed
80a5(rgyud 'grel): lu gu rgyud dang khyo gnyer can// mA ma k+Shi dang spyan dang gos dkar mo// 'gro ba gang gis 'dul ba de don du// ji ltar khyad 'phags brjid pa'i cha lugs can// thabs tshul rnam pa mtha' yas ston pa'i sku// 'gro
80a6(rgyud 'grel): ba'i skyabs mchog rje btsun sgrol ma mchog/ spyi bor 'od dpag med bzhugs phyag 'tshol lo// 'jigs pa brgyad skyob sgrol ma'i sku la 'dud// grags pa mtha' yas sgrol ma'i sku la 'dud// 'gro don sgrub
80b1(rgyud 'grel): pa sgrol ma'i sku la 'dud// sdug bsngal nges sel sgrol ma'i sku la 'dud// phyag stong spyan stong sgrol ma'i sku la 'dud// mkha' ltar mtha' yas sgrol ma'i sku la 'dud// mtshan la dpes brgyan sgrol ma'i sku la 'dud// zla 'dra'i
80b2(rgyud 'grel): yan lag sgrol ma'i sku la 'dud// nyi ma ltar gsal sgrol ma'i sku la 'dud// dus gsum 'gyur med sgrol ma'i sku la 'dud// sa ltar rten 'gyur sgrol ma'i sku la 'dud// chu ltar 'dzin mdzad sgrol ma'i sku la 'dud// me
80b3(rgyud 'grel): ltar smin mdzad sgrol ma'i sku la 'dung // rlung ltar rgyas mdzad sgrol ma'i sku la 'dud ga rgyas sgral skul 'a sa na la sgrol ma'i sku la 'dung // thugs rje'i chu rgyun sgrol ma'i sku la 'dud/ 'dul ba'i thabs mkhas sgrol ma'i sku la 'dud/
80b4(rgyud 'grel): sgeg kyang chags bral sgrol ma'i sku la 'dud// thar pa'i lam ston sgrol ma'i sku la 'dud// stong nyid na mkha' lta bu'i chos kyi sgra// 'gro ba ma lus pa la nges sgrogs pas// mu stegs ri dgas skrag mdzad seng ge che/
80b5(rgyud 'grel): btsun sgrol ma'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo// mi phyed rdo rje 'dzin pa'i zhags pa dang // chos sgrogs dung dang shes rab mda' 'dzin drang // 'dren pa'i lcags kyu yid 'ong ut+pa la// snying rje gzhu dang lta ba'i sdigs mdzub mdzad// thug
80b6(rgyud 'grel): kyi rnam par dag pa brda tshul du// rdo rje la sogs rtags su byin brlabs pa'i// phyag brgyad mtshan ma brgyad kyis rab brgyan pa'i// rje btsun sgrol ma'i sku la phyag 'tshalo// rdo rje sgrol ma rin chen sgrol ma dang // pad+ma'i sgrol ma las
81a1(rgyud 'grel): kyi sgrol mu dang // bdug pa'i sgrol ma me tog sgrol ma dang // mar me'i sgrol ma dril bu'i sgrol ma dang // lcags kyu'i sgrol ma zhags pa'i sgrol ma dang // lcags sgrog sgrol ma dril bu'i sgrol ma dang /
81a2(rgyud 'grel): bcu gnyis 'khor lo'i tshogs kyis rab bskor ba'i// rje btsun sgrol ma khyod la phyag 'tshalo// mgon po 'od dpag med la phyag 'tshalo// phyag na pad+ma khyod la phyag 'tshalo// spyan ras gzigs dbang de la phyag 'tshalo// 'jig
81a3(rgyud 'grel): rten dbang phyug khyod la phyag 'tshalo// don yod zhags pa khyod la phyag 'tshalo// khro rgyal rta mgrin khyod la phyag 'tshalo// 'jigs pa brgyad skyobo khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// phyag stong spyan stong khyod la phyag 'tshalo// thugs rje bcu
81a4(rgyud 'grel): gcig zhal la phyag 'tshal lo// dbang phyug chen po khyod lo phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje chos chen khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// de nyid don mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// 'jig rten dbang rab khyod la phyag 'tsho lo// rdo rje spyan rgyas khyod la
81a5(rgyud 'grel): phyag 'tshal lo// ral pa gcig ma khyod la phyag 'tshol lo// lha mo khro gnyer can la phyag 'tshal lo// thugs rje chen po khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// bud med sgyu 'phrul khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// ku ru ku li khyod lo phyag
81a6(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal lo// lha mo gos dkar khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// oM tA re tut+tA re tu re swA hA// gang zhig sdom pa de bzung nas// sgrol mo'i sku gzugs spyan sngar ni// khrus byas dad pas rtse gcig gis/ bstod pa'i rgyal po 'dis
81b1(rgyud 'grel): bstod nas// gsang sngags bzlas brjod 'di byas na// rje btsun sgrol ma zhal bstan nas// gdung ba thams cad sel ba dang // dngos grub ma lus byin brlab 'gyur// zla ba yang ngo'i tshes brgyad la// lci ba'i dkyil 'khor
81b2(rgyud 'grel): dbus su ni// rje btsun sgrol ma mchod byas nas// bskyod dang gsang sngags 'di bzlas na// mgon po bzhin du bdag 'gyur te// sgrib pa rnams dang bral ba dang // dri ngas bskur ba dgra pa dang // rgyud gsum yon tan ma
81b3(rgyud 'grel): lus 'grub// rgyal po g.yul du 'jug po'i tshe// spyi bor snying po 'di bcangs na// bstod dang gsang sngags 'di brjod na// dgra bo 'dod bzhin dbang du 'gyur// bud med gang zhig bud med kyi// dngos po las ni bral 'dod
81b4(rgyud 'grel): dang // 'jig rten dgos pa mchog dang ni// 'jig rten 'das pa grub 'dod pas// khrus byas dgos dkar bgos nas ni// bsnyen gnas bsrung bar nges gnas te// yar ngo'i tshes brgyad mchod bstod bzlas// de dag
81b5(rgyud 'grel): the tsom med par 'grub// 'phags ma lha mo sgrol ma la bstod pa don thams cad 'grub pa zhes pa/ bstong pa'i rgyal po rdzogs so//
81b6(rgyud 'grel): slob dpon mA tr-i tsi Tas pastong pa'o//
82a1(rgyud 'grel): 'phags pa sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i rim pa bzhugs//
82b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ AR+tha mA yA dz+wA la kra min ba tA re ga sA d+ha na/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i rim bras rje btsun sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs/ rje btsun sgrol ma la phyag 'tshalo//
82b2(rgyud 'grel): zhig dang por rnal 'byor pas yid dang rjesu mthun pa'i gnas su stan bde ba la 'dug la/ sems can thams cad la dmigs nas/ byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms kyi mtshan nyid kyi tshongs pa'i gnas
82b3(rgyud 'grel): bzhi bsgom par bya'o// de'i rjes la rang gi snying gar sna tshogs pad+ma'i steng du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la yi ge tAM marka ta'i mdog can 'od zer lnga 'phro ba 'od zer gyi rtse mo las byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pas nu mkha' grang bar bsgom
82b4(rgyud 'grel): la/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams// dzaHhUM baM hoHzhes bya ba'i sngags 'dis go rims bzhin du/ dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / bcing ba dang / gnas pa'i ngo bor gzhug par bya'o// bcug pa'i rjes la yi ge tAM las
82b5(rgyud 'grel): byung ba dzA gyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa dang in+d+ra nI la'i 'od lta bu bsgoms la/ rdo rje de lngas rnam par sming mdzad la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa na mkha'i lam ma lus pa kun tu khyab par spros la bsgom mo// de bzhin
82b6(rgyud 'grel): gshegs pa rnams la yang // rdo rje de nyid las byung ba'i me tog dang / spos dang / mar me dang / dri dang / lha bshis dang / na bza' dang rgyan la sogs pa dag rgya che ba bsnams pa mtha' yas pos mchod nas/ de rnams kyi mdun
83a1(rgyud 'grel): du/ sdig pa bshags pa dang / bsod nams la rjes su yid rang ba dang / gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba dang / byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang / theg pa chen po la yang dag par
83a2(rgyud 'grel): gnas par byas la// sems can thams cad 'khor ba thog mu med pa nas lta ba sna tshogs pa'i dra bas bcings pa'i sems kyi rgyun la dmigs nas/ stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i rang bzhin
83a3(rgyud 'grel): byang chub kyi sems bsgoms la sngags 'di brjod par bya'o// oM shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko hUM/ de nas rgyu ba dang mi rgyu ba 'di thams cad rang gi lus dang lhan cig tu na mkha'i rang bzhin du bsgom par bya'o// de nas sngags
83a4(rgyud 'grel): 'das sngar bshad pa'i rdo rjer nga rgyal bya'o// oM badz+ra At+ma ko haM/ de nas yi ge hU~M las rdo rje'i bdag nyid kha dog ser po'i sa gzhir bsgom mo// de nas steng du sna tshogs pad+ma la zla ba'i dkyil 'khor// de yi steng du yi ge
83a5(rgyud 'grel): tAs byin gyis brlabs pa'i rdo rje/ de las byung ba'i bac+doMs ma sgrol ma'i ngo bor bdag nyid bsgom par bya'o// zhal gsum pa phyag drug pa nor bu marka ta'i mdog 'dra ba// de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i cod pan can// rtsa ba'i
83a6(rgyud 'grel): zhal don yod grub pa'i dbu rgyan dang ldan pa sems pa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa'o// de la dbus ma'i zhalI nor bu marka ti'i mdog can/ g.yas pa nag po/ g.yon pa dkar po'o// g.yas pa'i phyag dang po mi
83b1(rgyud 'grel): 'jigs pa sbyin la/ gnyis pa la rdo rje nag po/ gsum pa na mda' 'o// g.yon pa'i dang po sdigs mdzub mdzad pa/ gnyis pa la ut+pa la sngon po/ gsum pa la gzhu bsdams pa'o// ba spu'i khung bu re re
83b2(rgyud 'grel): nas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyis na mkha' gang ba sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpas 'gro ba rnams kyi 'jigs pa thams cad sel ba'i bcom ldan 'das ma bsgoms la/ de nas byin gyis brlabs
83b3(rgyud 'grel): par bya'o// de la spyi bo'i dbus su oM gyi ngo bo sku rdo rje'o// mgrin par AH'i ngo bo dmad+mo gsung rdo rje'o// snying gar hUM gi ngo bo nag po thugs rdo rje'o// brang la nor bu marka ta'i mdog can gyi yi ge tAM ye shes sems
83b4(rgyud 'grel): dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs dpag tu med pa 'phro bar bsgoms la/ de nas sngags 'dis bzlas par bya'o// oM tA re tut+tA ra tu re swA hA// bzlas pa byas nas dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo spros la ji
83b5(rgyud 'grel): ltar nus pra tsi yod kyis mchod par bya'o// de la dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bcom ldan+d+ha 'das mu rje btsun sgrol ma sngar bshad pa'i rim pas so// de la sharar+ya gyi 'dabA mu la// oM sar+b+ba badz+ri hUM/ lho'i 'dab ma la
83b6(rgyud 'grel): oM rat+na badz+ra hUM/ nub kyi 'dab ma la/ oM d+har+m+ma badz+ra hUM/ byang gi 'dab ma la oM karma badz+ri hUM/ me'i phyogs su oM mA l+ye badz+ri hUM/ bden bral gyi phyogs su oM d+hU pa badz+ra hUM/ rlung gi phyogs su oM gan+d+ha badz+ri hUM
84a1(rgyud 'grel): dbang ldan gyi phyogs su oM nA sa badz+rI hUM/ sharA la sogs pa'i phyogs su/ oM badz+ra aM ku shi dz+dza/ oM dz+nyA pA shrI d+d+ha/ oM badz+rA s+pho Ti b+h+rUM/ oM badz+ra sa b+hi shrI d+d+ha/ bsgom pa rlung bzlas pa byas
84a2(rgyud 'grel): lA/ de nas gshegs su gsol bar bya'o// bsam gtan las langs nas kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa dang / mchod rten pa la nus pa ci yod kyis mchod par bya'o// oM bAdz+ra ar+g+ha hUM/ oM badz+rI puSh+pa hUM/ oM badz+ra d+hU pa hU~M/
84a3(rgyud 'grel): oM badz+ra A lo ke hUM/ oM badz+ra g+he hUM/ oM badz+ra a re hUM/ oM sarba ta thA ga tA a nut+ta ra pu dza me g+ha pra sa ra sa mu dra hUM/ 'phags pa sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i rim pas rje btsun ma sgrol mu'i sgrub bI thabs rdzogs so//
84a4(rgyud 'grel): rgya grar gyi mkhan po ma hA dza na dang / lo tsa ba gzhon nu 'od kyis bsgyur ba'o// / rgya gar skad du/ Ar+yA tA ra maN+Dal bi d+hi nI ma sA d+ha nAM/ bod skad du/ 'phags mA sgrol ma'i
84a5(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor gyi sgrub thabs cho ga zhes bya ba/ dpral dgyes pa'i rdo rje la phyag 'tshalo// bla ma dam pa'i zhabs kyi ni// pad+ma la gus phyag byas te// 'phags ma sgrol ma'i sgrub pa'i thabs// man ngag rgyud la brten pa bri// bla ma
84a6(rgyud 'grel): la gus dad pa che// byang chub sems dpa' snying che// rtog pa legs par 'joms pa des// rje btsun mnyes byas man ngag mnos// dang por dben zhing nyams dga' bar// nyer spyod yo byad rdzogs par bya// de nas byang chub
84b1(rgyud 'grel): sems bskyed la// phyag dang mchod dang gsol bya gang ba// rjes yi rang bsngo ba sogs// byas te tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi bsgom// de nas gzung 'dzin brtan g.yo kun// skyong bur byas te sngags bzlas bya'o// oM swA b+hA bA
84b2(rgyud 'grel): shud+d+haHsarba d+har+m+ma/ swa b+hA shud+d+ho&haM/ zhes pas stong par bya'o// de yI dang las hUM bsams te// ra bA gur dang phyogs mtshams bcing // khro bA ba tsu yi srung 'khor bsgom// de steng e los chos 'byung bas ma// laM bai raM daM yaM las ni//
84b3(rgyud 'grel): sa chu me rlung dkyil 'khor bsam// de steng bruM las 'khor lo'o// der nI nA da babs pa las// bsgyur te gzhan yas khang bsam bya// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// ka ba brgyad mdzes rgyun ldan bsam// oM sarba ta thA gra ta a ta la
84b4(rgyud 'grel): badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ zhes brjod par bya'o// de nang paM las pad+ma ni// 'dab ma brgyud pa 'phoT ma gnyis// dbus su A liM kA li lAs// nyi zla ga'ur bsdamA par bya// dbus su yAM gI tAM sder bsam// de ltarar+ya kA lI ar gyur
84b5(rgyud 'grel): bas// mnyam sbyar de gnyis gyur par bsam// oM sarba ta thA ga ta a nu rak+to badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM zhes brjod par bya'o// de ltar dbus kyi tAM las ni// shar gyi nyi ma'i bor du ni// yi ge oM gyi rnam par sproswa// lho ri ni tA dang nug tu/
84b6(rgyud 'grel): re// byang du rgyu yi yo ge spro// de nas sgo yi phyogs dag tu// tA re tu re bzhi po spro// steng du tA dang re gnyis spro// 'od zer 'phros pas sems can sbyangs// lhar byas sa bon thim pa las// rang ring sa bon gyis mtshan pa'i// rdo rje
85a1(rgyud 'grel): phreng ba yis// mar me skong bu dung chos dang // lcags kyu zhugs pa lcags sgrog dang // dril bu rnams su gyur par bsam// de lngas 'od 'phros sbyang bsdus la// lha mo rnams su bsam par bya'o//
85a2(rgyud 'grel): de'adabus su lha mo sgrol ma ni// phyag brgyad zhal bzhi kha dog ser// rgyan ldan mdangs sdug lang tshor ldan// mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos brgyan// g.yo zhing pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs// rdo rje de bzhin zhags pa dang // mdung dang
85a3(rgyud 'grel): mda' ni g.yas na bsnams// rdo rje lcags kyu ut+pa la// gzhu dang sdigs mdzub g.yon pa na// skyil krung phyed pa'i gar gyis bzhugs// sa gsum dbang du sdud pa bsam// de yi shar du me tog gI/ sgrol ma dkar mo zhal
85a4(rgyud 'grel): gcig ma// phyag gnyis me tog phreng ba 'dzin// rgyan rnams kun gyis spras par bsam// lhor ni spos kyi sgrol ma ste// kha dog nag mo spros 'dzin ma// nub tu mar me'i sgrol ma ste// ser zhing mar me'i snod 'dzin ma//
85a5(rgyud 'grel): byang du dri yi sgrol mA ste// ljang gu dro yi dung chos bsnams// dkyil 'khor dbus su bsgom par bya'o// de nas shar sgor sgo skyong dkar// lcags kyu 'dzin pra bsam par bya// lhor ser zhags pa ma bsam bya// nub dmar
85a6(rgyud 'grel): lcags kyi sgrog 'dzin ma// byeng du ljang gu dril bu'o// de rnams zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma// rin chen rgyan gyis legs spras shing // g.yo bcas gser gyi rna chas brgyan// spyan gnyis lang tsho phun sum tshe gas//
85b1(rgyud 'grel): steng du rnam par sgrol mA ste// 'og tu gnod mdzes sgrol ma'o// 'khor lo sbrul zhags bsnams pa bri// de ltar thams cad mtshan nyid mtshungs// de nas skye mched dag la ni// mig gnyis rna ba gnyis drang ste// lce dang lus dang
85b2(rgyud 'grel): yid rnams su// maM daM i dang raM saM naM// ga ni mug zhe sdang ser sna la// 'dod chags phrag dog bdag med laM// gnag dang dmar dang ser mo ste// ljang gu dkar mo rnams bsams te// zhal gcig phyag gnyis ldan pa'o//
85b3(rgyud 'grel): sku la oM las mkha' spyad ma// sa sbyong bdag med ma gsum las// rdo rje gsum po bsam par bya'o// de nas 'od zer rab 'phros pas// rang bzhin gyis ni zhing khams nas// ye shes sems dpa' spyan drangs te// dzaHhUM ba hoH
85b4(rgyud 'grel): sa lha mo rnams// 'gugs pas dgug gzhug bcings mnyes bya'o// de nas sems dpa' gsol brwa lta// slar yang 'od zer 'phros pa las// sangs rgyas rigs lnga spyan drangs la// mchod bstod gsol ba gdab par bya//
85b5(rgyud 'grel): de nas dbang bsgyur rgyas btab skye// rtse moM rigs lnga rnam par mtshan// gzhan rnams rang gi rigs kyi sa gang ba// oM sarba tA thA ga d+hA a d+hiSh+Tha/ badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+makro hU~M/ zhes brjod par bya'o// de nas sa bon lus
85b6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i// lha mo rnams kyis mchod par bya// oM sarba te thA ga ta pu dza me g+ha badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko ha zhes brjod par bya'o// de nas rigs kyis sa bon las// bdud rtsi lce la blangs bya ste// oM sarba ta thA ga tA a mri ta badz+ra
86a1(rgyud 'grel): swa b+hA ba At+ma kro ha zhes brjod par bya'o// de nas bstod pas legs bstod de// oM sarba ta thA ga ta t+ya sti badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko he zhes brjod par bya'o// gsal la yang dang yang du blta'o// de nas sngags bzlas
86a2(rgyud 'grel): pa ni// na ma.Ar+yA ba lo ki te shU rA ya/ bau d+hi sa twA ya/ ma hA so twA ya/ mahA kA ru NaM kA ya/ tad+ya thA oM tA re tut+tA re tu ri/ sarba duSh+TAna?/ pr-i duSh+Tan/ ma ma krI te/ dzam b+hU ya/ staM b+hA ya/ mo hA ya/ ban d+hA ya/ hUM hUM hUM/ phaT phaT phaT/
86a3(rgyud 'grel): sarba duSh+Tan s+t+waM b+hA ni tAM re swA hA/ oM tA re tut+tA re tu re swA hA/ phar phyin bicu yi lha mo la// yi ge bcu pas 'grub par 'gyur// bsnyen pa bye bas 'grub 'gyur zhing // las la rang sngags khri bzlas so// de nas skyo na rnam drag bsgom/
