115a1(rgyud 'grel): 'byung 'gyur ba'i// nges par bzung ba'i dgongs pa brjod pa'o// 'di dag la sogs pa bde bar rtogs pa'o// de nyid sbas pa bdag gis rgyas ma byas// bla ma'i drin bzung yang
115a2(rgyud 'grel): dag mtha' la mos// sems bzung ba yi dge ba bsags stobs kyis// rgyas ma byas zhes pa lnga sogs de cig/ de nyid pa'i de kho na nyid ma brjod sbas pas bla ma'i drin gyis sems can bzung ba'o// bya shes gnyen
115a3(rgyud 'grel): mi 'gyur rjes yi rang / de kho na nyid man ngag yang dag bris// dge ba bdag gis gong thob 'di yis sems can gyi// snying po sgom mchog spyod bzang myur du dga'// ma 'ongs pa na mi brtan pa la gsol 'debs
115a4(rgyud 'grel): 'di brjod// sems gyis bsags pa zhes pa ni bsags pa'i sems ni dus ring por dge ba 'phel ba'i rnal 'byor pa'i lami byas pa'o// de dag thob par gnas pa 'di yis sems kyis rlabs 'phel ba 'di/
115a5(rgyud 'grel): ltar byas pa sred cing zhen pas grub pa thob pa'o// myong ba gang yin pa byung ba brtan pa mi rtog pa byed pa 'di lnga yid la byed pa bzong po 'di/ thams cad du thams cad rlabs byed pa'o// de kho na nyid kyi man ngag
115a6(rgyud 'grel): yang dag par bris pa'i bdag gis bsod nams 'phel ba de yis 'jig rten thams cad la de kho na nyid kyi rin po che ltar gsal ba rab tu 'byung bar gyur cig/ de kho na nyid kyi man ngag bris pa'i bsod nams
115b1(rgyud 'grel): gang des thob pa 'di brjod pa'o// de kho na nyid 'dri zhes pa la sogs pa legs par go ba rdzogs so// / de kho na nyid kyi man ngag mkhas pa chen po slong
115b2(rgyud 'grel): dpon su dza ya shrI b+ha dra'i zhabs kyis mdzad pa'o// rgya gar gyi mkhas pa rin chen dpal gyi zhabs lnga gtugs pa/ paN+Di ta pa ra he ta dang / lo tsa ba nag tshe dge slong shes rab rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur ba'o//
115b3(rgyud 'grel): @rgya gar skad du/ pi thi kra ma tA da bi sto trAM/ bod skad du/ gnas chen gyi rim pa lha mo sgrol ma'i bstod pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'phags mA lha mo sgrol ma la phyag 'tshalo// skye drang mtha' dbus
115b4(rgyud 'grel): rnam pa med// e yi yi ge'i rigs las skyes// ye shes bdud rtsi'i khu bas myos// zhing gnas lha mo nyid phyag 'tshal// bco lnga'i dus kyi rnam pa med// dus med thig lo'i tshul gnas pa// skyil krung phyed pa'i gar gyis
115b5(rgyud 'grel): gnas// zhing gnas lha mo nyid phyag 'tshal// drang po mtha' dang dbus ma'i tshul// rigs lnga'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa yi// ye shes lnga ni gcig gi tshul// zhing gnas lha mo nyid phyag 'tshal// sa dong chu dang me dang rlung //
115b6(rgyud 'grel): nam mkha' rnam pa thams cad du// khams lnga yi ni rnam pa'i tshul// zhing gnas lha mo nyid phyag 'tshal// A li kA li las byung ba// dbyangs dang gsal byed thams cad la// yi ge med pa'i rnam pa thob// zhing gnas
116a1(rgyud 'grel): lha mo nyid phyag 'tshal// sku gsum rigs la 'jug pa'i tshul// thar lam rab tu 'byung ba yi// rigs kyi tshul med lhag pa'i tshul// zhing gnas lha mo nyid phyag 'tshal// stong
116a2(rgyud 'grel): phrag bdun cu gnyis gnas pa'i// rtswa yi bu ga'i sbungs kyi nang // oM ba d+hU tI'i dbus gnas pa// zhing gnas lha mo nyid phyag 'tshal// stong pa shin tu stong pa dang // stong pa chen po grong du gnas// thams cad stong
116a3(rgyud 'grel): pa steng na gnas// zhing gnas lha mo nyid phyag 'tshal// brjod pa tsam las skye 'gag med// brjod pa'i mtha' la gnas pa dang // tshig bzhi dag go gong du 'pho// zhing gnas lha mo nyid phyag 'tshal// nang du rang la
116a4(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa yi// 'khor lo bzhi yi rnam par gonas// byang chub lhag pa'i tshul gnos pa'i// zhing gnas lha mo nyid phyag 'tshalnga// nyi shu rtsa bzhi dag gi yul// zhing gi 'dren pa'i lha mo de// lcing bzhir snyoms par gnas pa yi//
116a5(rgyud 'grel): zhing gnas lha mo nyid phyag 'tshal// mu stegs lta ba khyab 'jug ma// nyi ma tshangs pa'i rang bzhin kun// ci yong med pa'i gzugs 'dzin ma// zhing gnas lha mo nyid phyag 'tshal// oM gyi gsang sngags 'di nyid la//
116a6(rgyud 'grel): bdag gis mos pa'i sems kyis ni// mi bskyod rdo rje byis pa yis// sems can rjes su 'dzin pa shog/ gnas chen gyi lha mo sgrol ma la bstod pa rdzogs so//
116b1(rgyud 'grel): baN+Di ta pa ra he ta dang / lo tsa ba tshul khrims rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur ba'o// / 6// rgyu gar skad du/ pi thi shwa ra sto tra/ bod skad du/ zhing gi dbang phyug ma'i bskyod pa/ btsam
116b2(rgyud 'grel): bcom ldan 'das zhing gi dbang phyug ma la phyag 'tshal lo// kun rtog thams cad yang dag 'phrog/ dngos rnams rang bzhin ngo bo ni// sems can kun la phan don du// snying rje'i mchog la phyag 'tshalo// 'khrul pas
116b3(rgyud 'grel): khyab pa thams cad du// zhabs kyis mnan nas rnam par spangs// nyon mongs thams cad bsal ba yi// zhing gi dbang phyug phyag 'tshal bstod// thams cad gnyis med mchog tu spangs// don rnams thams cad yongasu
116b4(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs// rnam pa can ni rnam pa med // byang chub gzugs la phyag 'tshal bstod// sku mdog dmar mo zhal bzhi ma// dga' bya la sogs pa gzigs pa yi// khro mo'i zhal gsum 'od 'phro ma// zhi ba'i gzugs la phyeg
116b5(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal bstod// phyag 'tshal mgo bo'i phreng ba me// lnga lnga steng du yongasu 'dzin// skyil krung phyed pa'i gar gyis gnas// g.yon du gzigs la phyag 'tshal bstod// snying gi pad+ma'i dbus su ni// zla ba'i dkyil
116b6(rgyud 'grel): 'khor yang dag gnas// snying rje yis ni khros pa'i thugs// zhing gi dbang phyug phyag 'tshal bstod// lhung bzed ral gri rdo rje dang // Da ma ru ni g.yos su gnas// g.yon na kha T+wAM dril bu dang // rin chen ut+pal
117a1(rgyud 'grel): bstod phyag 'tshul// rlung gi dkyil 'khor nang na granas// stag gis pags pa'i sham thabs can// sna tshogs pang zla'i dkyil na gnas// spyan gsum ma la phyag 'tshal
117a2(rgyud 'grel): bstod// rtsa gsum pa yi nang na gnas// dgug pa gsum ni yang dag 'phrog/ ngo bo gsum ni yang dag len// sku gsum bsnyems la phyag 'tshal bstod// de nyid gsum gyi gzugs mdzes mo// sdug bsngal gsum po
117a3(rgyud 'grel): spangs pa yi// sa 'og sra steng sa bla khyab// rang bzhin ma la phyag 'tshal bstod// nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i zhing rnams su// rnal 'byor ma ni nyi shu bzhi// nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i gnas na bzhugs// nyi shu rtsa lnga phyag 'tshal bstod//
117a4(rgyud 'grel): pu li r+yA lA ba'i zhing // legs dga'i rnal 'byor dbang phyug ma// lha mo dkar mo phyag bzhi ma// spyi bor gnas la phyag 'tshal bstod// legs dga' 'dzin ma rnal 'byor ma// dz+wA laM d+ha ra spyi gtsug bzhugs// ljang gu
117a5(rgyud 'grel): mgo bo'i phreng ba can// rnal 'byor dbang phyug phyag 'tshal bstod// u rgyan du song ze 'bru la// legs par dgo' ba zla ba mA// sku mdog dkar mo urbu'i ste// legs dga' phreng po ser mo nI// go tA ba ri nye ba'i
117a6(rgyud 'grel): zhing // rna ba g.yas la yang dag gnas// legs par dga' ma zar ma ni// sku mdog ser mo phyag 'tshal bstod// ra me shwa ra smin mtshams su// dkar me legs dga' 'dod ma ni// de bi ko Ti mig gnyis la//
117b1(rgyud 'grel): dmar mo legs dga' khro mo'i gzugs// dpung bu'i rtsa gnyis yang dag gnas// ma lwa zhing gi 'dren pa mo// lha mo sku mdog sngon mo'i 'od// phyag 'tshal legs bla med ma// zhing dang nye ba'i zhing dang brgyad// zhal
117b2(rgyud 'grel): gcig phyag ni bzhi ma'o// thams cad thod pa'i phreng ba 'dzin// phyag 'tshal bla med rnal 'byor ma// spyan gsum thod pa kha T+wAM ga/ dril bu Da ma ru 'dzin ma// thams cad ngo rang bzhin bdag/ phyag 'tshal rnal
117b3(rgyud 'grel): 'byor mo phyag 'tshal// phyag 'tshal kA ma rU ba la// zhing dang mthun gaucod ces bya ba// mtshan khung gnyis la gnas pa'o// lha mo gtsug tor bstod phyag 'tshal// phyag 'tshal o Te 'thung gcod la// nu ma gnyis na
117b4(rgyud 'grel): gnas po yi// zhing na yong dag ye shes gzugs// rnal 'byor 'jigs ma phyog 'tshalo// nye zhing tri sha ku ne ru// gtsug tor cung zad ces bya ba'i// rnal 'byor lte ba'i yul na bzhugs// phyag 'tshal thams cad
117b5(rgyud 'grel): 'dod ma la'o// ko sa la ni nye ba'i zhing // rnal 'byor ma zhes bya ba yi// sna rtser gnas pa'i yid kyis bsam// phyag 'tshal mchog ni dbang phyug ma// ka ling+ga ni khwa la gnas// phyag 'tshal rnal 'byor ral
117b6(rgyud 'grel): tshogs ma// tshan+do bzhugs pa'i lha mo la// phyag 'tshal lhan cig skyes ma la'o// 'thung gcong tshan+do lam pa kau/ drag mo mgrin par gnas pa ste// ral can nye ba'i tshan do lo// kany+tsi snying ga bla na med//
118a1(rgyud 'grel): d+ha hi ma la yi gnas// u pa tshan+dor gnas pa'o// phyag 'tshal rnal 'byor gtum mo la// yang dag rtog pas thams cad bsreg/ 'du ba pre ta pu ri pa// thod can ma ni gsang bar
118a2(rgyud 'grel): gnas// srin po'i zhal ni gnas pa yi// rnam par 'gyur byed ma phyag 'tshal// sau raSh+Ta nye 'du ba// thor tshugs brla gnyis yang dag gnas// gser gling rje ngar gnyis su ni// nye ba'i 'du gar mkhan ma'o// phyag
118a3(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal sku gsung thugs bdag la// rnal 'byor ma ni btso gnyis dran// thod pa khA nAM gI 'dzin ma// 'khor lo rdo rje kun tu bsnams// thams cad mgo bo'i phreng ba 'dzin// spyan gsum skra rtse 'bar ba can// garo ma
118a4(rgyud 'grel): dpa' mo chen mo ni// bzhad pa'i gsung gi 'or can// thabs dang shes rab rang bzhin gyi// phyed ni dmar la phyed ni ljang // ske brdzes legs pa'i spyan mnga' ma// phyogs kyi gos can mchog 'dzin pa'o// phyag
118a5(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal phyogs skyong ma rnams la// kaM pu dzaM la sogs pa bzhi// zhal gcig spyan ni gsum ma'o// phyag bzhi ma ni mdzes ma ste// sna tshogs pad+ma'i stong na gnas// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa// bdud bzhi
118a6(rgyud 'grel): yi ni gdon la bzhugs// sna tshogs mdog can phyogs kyi gos// rngam po'i zhal can 'jigasau pa'i gzugs// g.yas brkyang zhabs kyis yang dag bzhugs// dur khrod nye ba'i dur khrod gnas// mgo bo'i
118b1(rgyud 'grel): phreng bas kun nas brgyan// thod pa khA T+wAM ga 'dzin pa// gri gug mi yi mgo bo bsnams// rkang pa'i bol gol yul du ni// kaM pu dzaM la phyag 'tshalo// phyag 'tshal lha mo puk+ka si// rkang pa'i mthil du kun nas
118b2(rgyud 'grel): bzhugs// si d+hu'i zhing du bzhugs pa ni// rnal 'byor dbang phyug phyag 'tshal bstod// de bzhin ma ro'i yul song ba// phyag 'tshal rnal 'byor lto ba mod/ pus mo gnyis ku'i yul gnas pa'i// mu taM gau l-i phyag
118b3(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal bstod// ze 'bru'i dbus na bzhugs pa yi// 'khor ba'i 'dren pa rnal 'byor ma// thams cad 'byung ba'i nang na gnas// sgrol mi'i gzugs la phyag 'tshal bstod// 'khor lo bzhi yi ting 'dzin gnas
118b4(rgyud 'grel): tshangs pa yi ni gnas bzhi ma// snying rje chen po yI ni thugs// rang bzhin med lho phyag 'tshal bstod// drang po'i yi ge man ngag zhal// A li kA li la gnas gzhan// ro ma rkyang ma a bi na// gnyisu med la
118b5(rgyud 'grel): phyag 'tshal bstod// rdo rje pad+ma yang dag bsdus// snying gi gnas las bzhengs pa yi// stong pa snying rje gnyisu med// byang chub sems la phyag 'tshal bstod// bsam gtan thams cad zla phyed spangs// dgra
118b6(rgyud 'grel): bzhi po rnams rtogs pa yo// sku rtse brgya che'i rnal 'byor ma// mtshan nyid med la phyag 'tshal bstod// rtog med mtshams ming brten pa med// rtog med gnas pa med pa yi// thogs med yon tan ram mis
119a1(rgyud 'grel): legs// rgyud med rnam pa phyag 'tshal bstod// rnam par mi rtog brten pa med// bsam gtan bzlas brjod spangs pa yi// spangs pa nga rgyal med pa yi// rtog
119a2(rgyud 'grel): tu shar la phyag 'tshal bstod// rtog med bcom pa rnam btsam med // spring bya med cing gnas pa med// rang bzhin med pa snang ba med// the tshom med la phyag 'tshal bstod// mchog tu zhi ba phra rags med//
119a3(rgyud 'grel): mchog dang bar dang tha ma spangs// kun nas ngo bo thams cad bzhugs// thams cad 'dus ma phyag 'tshal bstod// thams cad sems kyi gzugs can ma// thams cad mchog tu yongasu ste// bgegs
119a4(rgyud 'grel): rnams rab tu zhi ba ma// bgegs med ma la phyag 'tshal bstod // tshad med longs spyod med pa lo// sa 'og sa bla rnam par khyab// gnyis med 'chi med ma mo ni// mthong+ga med lnga phyag 'tshal bstod// ston
119a5(rgyud 'grel): nas spangs pa med pa 'dzin// gnyisu med dus gzi brjid can// tshad med kun nA sA ro gis rig/ ngo bo med la phyag 'tshal bstod // grangs med pa yi mi bzang pa// shes mig 'jigs pa spangs pa'o// 'icha
119a6(rgyud 'grel): ba spungs pa'i dbang phyug mtha'// dga' ba ma phyag 'tshal bstod// bla me'i drin gyis gdul bya bzhin// rnal 'byor ma mos spyod lam gyis// sems can kun la phan don du// zhing gi rnal 'byor la phyag
119b1(rgyud 'grel): 'tshalnga lo// mos pa chen pos rjesu chags// bstod pas bstod pa'i rkang pa 'di// sgra dang sgra med shes pa med// bzod pa mchog gi dbang phyug ma// bdagra ni byas pa rmongs bu ste// mos byas bstod pa shin tu dga'
119b2(rgyud 'grel): zhing gi dbang phyug ma'i bstod pa 'ad blon po'i rigs shin tu dga' ba'i paN+Di tas mdzad pa rdzogs so// / paN+Di ta ye shes rdo rje dang / lo tsA ba nag tsho chen pos bsgyur ba'o// /
119b3(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ badz+ra g+haN+Da lak+Sha Na nA ma/ bod skad du/ rdo rje dril bu'i mtshan nyid ces bya ba/ sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje'i grub pa bshad par bya'o// de 'dzin pa la rtag brtan pa// sngor
119b4(rgyud 'grel): bzhi dang bzhi dang bcu pa bcu gnyis pa dang bcu drug pa dang / brgyad pa dang / nyi shu'i rgyud kyi gser gyi rdo rjes su'i gtso bo'i rig po 'dzin pa nyid dang / rtag tu rab tu bzang po thob bo// rgyal po rang gi rgyal po gong ma nyid zad
119b5(rgyud 'grel): kyi rdo rje yis 'dod pa 'grub bo// rdo'i rdo rjes lha ma yin gyi drabang po kun dang / granod sbyin rnams kyang bskyod pa'o// don thams cad 'grub par 'byung ba lcags kyis te/ lcags gcig gis dpal tsho nad med pa nor kun
119b6(rgyud 'grel): thob pa'o// gza' thams cad dang seng ljang gis so// ma du ka'i shing gis gnod sbyin bsgrub po// des chos kyi don bsgrub po// lha'i shing gi sgra med par 'gyur ro// mi'i rus pa yis mi'i srog 'phrog go/ shel gyis thams
120a1(rgyud 'grel): cad dbang po'i gzhu ltar snang ngo // zhe sdang gi las la nimA pa yis so// wa'i b+hU sha'i shing gis gsad pa dang skams pa dang // sha za 'grub rtag tu rab tu bzung ba'o// dri
120a2(rgyud 'grel): za gnod sbyin kun 'grub po// su ru tsan dan gyis so// sa yis gzugs gzhan du rnam par 'gyur ro// srin pos skye gnas 'grub bo// mya ngan med pa'i shing las byas pa'i rdo rjes nor 'phelo// dmar po 'am dkar po
120a3(rgyud 'grel): tsan dan gyos gang 'dod pa rab tu thob po// rtse lnga pa sran te shel gyis rtag tu bsrung ba rgyal ba'i zhabs drung bzlas pa byas na 'grung bo// dri zhim pos mchod pas zhi ba'i sems dang ngag gang bzlas pa rdo rjer bzung nas
120a4(rgyud 'grel): byas na 'grub po// sgrub pa pos sngags pas gzung ngo // ming med pa rdo rje dri cang ba byas te sems rtse gcig pas so// rdo rje'i rgyu gang las byung ba'i mtshan nyid rab tu btus te phyag 'tshal nas shes rab ye shes
120a5(rgyud 'grel): byob tu byi ba med pa'o// rdo rje'i mtshan nyid brjod nas dril bu'i mtshan nyid 'og nas 'byung bas shes so// gser gyis byas pa rtse lbu ba 'od bzang po rgya gsum pa gzung ba'o// rtse mo bye ba rnams bye brag tu'o// dang
120a6(rgyud 'grel): po dril bu gdong bshad pa ni// dpal gyi gdong dang / pad+ma'i gdong dang ba lang gi gdong khog pa bsil ba'i dbyibs su'o// de lta bu'i dril bu phun sum tshogs pa 'byung ngo // dpal gyi gdong gis rgyas pa'i las
120b1(rgyud 'grel): thams cad 'grub po// pad+ma'i gdong ni pad+ma'i dbyibs su byas pa ste// dbang gi las byed do// ba lang gi gdong du byas pa'i dril bus zhi ba'i las ster bar byed do// sor bdun pa dang / brgyad pa dang / sor bcu gnyis
120b2(rgyud 'grel): pas shes rab dang thabs kyi bdag nyid kyi'o// rang 'byung gi shes rab kyi rnam pa ni dril bu'i khog pa chos 'byung po'i dbyibs dran pa'o// ye shes ldan pa lha'i thabs kyis rdo rje steng na gnas pa'o// chos 'byung gi nang du
120b3(rgyud 'grel): hriM gi yi ge las de bsgom par bya'o// dril bu de chos kyi dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yum mo// yi ge hUM la rdo rje ye shes lnga'i ngo bo dran par bya'o// de ni rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad kyi rgyal po
120b4(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gnaso so// 'di skad 'byung ba'i dril bu de lus ngag yid gsum gyi rnam pa'o// khog pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku rdo rje'i gnas dran pa'o// de'i steng du pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa gsung
120b5(rgyud 'grel): dran pa'o// de'i steng du pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa gsung rdo rje'o// de'i steng du bum pa'i bsam gtan te byang chub kyi sems kyis yang dag parar+ya gang ba'o// de'i steng du sems kyi rdo rje bsgom mo// pad+ma'i steng du de
120b6(rgyud 'grel): bzhin gshegs pa bzhi'i mtshan ma'i rnam pa'o// 'khor lo rin po che/ pad+ma sna tshogs rdo rje'o// lnga pa spyi bor yang dag par gnas pa'i rdo rje 'dzin pa rang gi rnam pa'o// sa gzhi khog pa'i rnam pa ni lha mo
121a1(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas spyan yang dag pa'o// chu'i rnam pa nI mA ma k+Shi bum pa yang dag gnas pa byas pa'o// me'i rnam pa ni gos dkar mo'i rang bzhino// khong pa'i rlung gi
121a2(rgyud 'grel): rnam pa dbus su bltas pa sgrol na'o// stong pa'i dbus na rdo rje lce g.yo ba'i gsung ngo // na mkhA'i ni bum pa'i stang na rdo rje 'dzin pa'i mgon po yang dag gnas pa'o// sa'i snying po dang 'jig rten dbang phyug
121a3(rgyud 'grel): mgon po ni rdo rje 'dzin pa gzhan no// mtshan ma'i steng du phreng bas bskor ba ni gsum po de'i tshul gyis brjod pa'o// spre'u yi gdong ni byang chub sems dpa'i lha'o// de'i gdong ni steng du rdo rje'i phreng ba'i rnam pa
121a4(rgyud 'grel): ni sgo skyong dang dpa' bo chen po khro bo bcu dran pa'o// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam pa'i dril bu shes rab kyi sgra'i rnam pa de'i rdo rje sems dpa' snyoms par 'jug pa'i rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma'o// chos
121a5(rgyud 'grel): 'byung ba'i maN+Dal gyi zhing du gnas pa sna tshogs pad+ma'i steng du gnas pa/ sku mdog dkar mo// bsgom mo// rdo rje dang dril bu'i mtshan nyid rdzogs so// / paN+Di ta~M pa ra he drang nga / lo tsa ba nag tshe dge
121a6(rgyud 'grel): slob shes rab rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur ba'o// / rgya gar skad du/ ka pA la pU dza bi d+hi nA ma/ bod skad du/ thod pa mchod pa'i cho ga zhes bya ba/ zhing chen gyi rnal 'byor ma la
121b1(rgyud 'grel): phyag 'tshal lo// lhung bzed chen po'i mchod pa'i cho ga'o// de nyid bdud rtsi lngas gang ba'i snod dang / gzhan gnyis kyang bshams la// rang rang gi cho ga ltar byin gyis brlabs la/ de'i steng du mchod pa'i gnas la//
121b2(rgyud 'grel): rong gi yi dmA lha gang yin pa'i gdun pad+ma dang / nyi ma 'am zla ba 'am bdud dam ro la sogs pa la/ rang rang gi sa bon gyi yi ge las phyag mtshan sa bon gyis mtshan pa/ de las spros bsdus pas yongs
121b3(rgyud 'grel): gyur pa las dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo 'am/ lha brkyang pa bskyed la/ ye shes pa dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang bcing ba dang dbang du bya'o// dbang bskur nas rigs kyis bdag pos rgyas gdab po// g.yon
121b4(rgyud 'grel): gyi la yi dam gyi lha gzhan bsgom// g.yas kyi la paM las pad+mo// raM las nyi ma'i steng du hUM las sna tshogs rdo rje'i lte ba la hUM gis mtshon pa de las spros bsdus pa las// bcom ldan 'das bdud rtsi 'khyil
121b5(rgyud 'grel): pa zhal gsum phyag drug pa g.yas dkar+ya g.yon dmarA dbus s+ho// spyan gsum dmaR+Sha ba// mchi ba gtsigs pa/ dbus skra dang sma ra ser ba/ g.yas dang po na sna tshogs rdo rje/ gnyis pa
121b6(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo/ gsum pa na ral gri/ g.yon dang po na sdigs mdzub dang dril bu/ gnyis pa na zhags pa/ gsum pa na dgra sta/ zhabs g.yon bskum pa/ g.yas brkyang ba/ steg gi sham thabs
122a1(rgyud 'grel): can// sbrul gyis brgyan pa/ me dpung 'bar ba'i dbus na bzhugs pa bsgom mo// de nas me tog la sogs pas mchod do// de nas bar chad zhi bar gsol
122a2(rgyud 'grel): ba gdub bo// mthe bo dang srin lag skyurar+ya bcug la/ oM AHhUM lan gsum bzlas pas bdud rtsir+ya zhu bar bsgom mo// de nas dbus ma'i maN+Dal la me tog la sogs pas mchod do// de nas bdud rtsi'i mchod pa'i
122a3(rgyud 'grel): rang gi lugs ltar bzla zhing dbul lo// yang lha gzhan gyi la me tog la sogs pas mchod pa dang / yang bdud rtsis mchod do// de zhu bas yang dbus ma la mchod do// de ltar ma 'byor na yang bci
122a4(rgyud 'grel): 'byor pa'i snod gcig tu bdud rtsi byin gyis brlabs pa/ lhung bzed la mchod ngo // de nas 'dod pa'i don la gsol ba gdab bo// thod pa mchod pa'i rim pa rdzogs so//
122a5(rgyud 'grel): sarba mang+ga laM
123a1(rgyud 'grel): rmi lam sgom ma'i sgrub thabs bzhugs/
123b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ sUb+hA tA ra no bi ka/ bod skad du/ rmi lam sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs/ 'phags ma rmi lam sgrol ma la phyag 'tshalo// sprin bral mkha' dkyil zla rgyas gzugs// rab dkar
123b2(rgyud 'grel): bsil ba'i 'od ldan ma// ma lus rmi lam gsal mdzad de'o// zhabs la mgos btud de bsgrub bshad// dge bas rab tu sngar langs te// gdong sogs dag byas dri zhim byug/ rje btsun de rton mdun bdar la// yid
123b3(rgyud 'grel): 'od mchod pas mdzes par byas// skabs gsum lha mor bcas pa la// skabs gsum 'gro la phan yid kyis// mi dge med pa'i sems ldan pas// thog mar bsod nams tshogs bsags bya// oM a mr-i ta/
123b4(rgyud 'grel): kuN+Da li ha na hA na sarba bag+h+nAn tau DA ha ta DoM ha sarba pA paM hUM phaT swA hA/ 'khyil po khros pa'i sngags 'dri yis// rmi lAm bar chad bgegs bsal la// dri med bai dUr+ya 'dra yi// mkha' la 'phags ma bsgom par bya//
123b5(rgyud 'grel): rab mdzes paM lasa'i chu skyes snum 'jam gsal zhing gsar ba'i 'dab tshigs rgyas// de steng dkar bsil ri bong 'dzin 'khyil de dbus khams gsum rgyas 'gengs tAM// kun nas mun sel skar ma'i
123b6(rgyud 'grel): rgyal po 'od bzang mdog can rab 'ablos las// yongs gyur 'phags ma rmi lam sgrol ma zhi ma dge ma mdzes ma blta/ rab dkaro lang tsho rgyas pa'i gzugs// zhal gcig phyag gnyis mchog sbyin mdzad/
124a1(rgyud 'grel): ut+pal sngo 'dzin 'gying tshul sgeg/ mtshungs med gcig pos kun khyab ma'o// dri zhim dbu skra bzang 'khyil li// lha rdzas rin chen du mas brgyan// mthing kha'i dar gyis
124a2(rgyud 'grel): stod g.yogs shing // sna tshogs kha dog sham thabs man pas// mu tig phreng ba'i dra ba yis// mnyam par mdzes pa'i ska rags dang // ga shau se ral khar bcings shing // cod pan don yod grub pas brgyan/
124a3(rgyud 'grel): g.yas bskum g.yon brkyang skyil krung gis// srid dang zhi la mi gnas shing // sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs// spu sgo kun nas rab 'phro ba'o// ci 'dra'i ye shes lha mo 'di// bkug la mchod pas
124a4(rgyud 'grel): mnyes byas bstim// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yis// byin brlabs phyogs bcu'i rgyal bas bsgrags// de nas maN+Dal mchod bcas pas// gus par phul la gsol/ gdab// zhal zas btung bla bzang ldan pa//
124a5(rgyud 'grel): dkar gsum mngar gsum me tog dbul// rin chen phreng ba dkarau thogs te// ma yengs blo yis 'phags mo la// rtse gcig yid bstang gsang sngags mchog/ 'bum phrag nyi shu rtsa bzhir bzlas// oM
124a6(rgyud 'grel): swab+hU ta re swA hA/ de nas zang zing med par ni// rang gzhan don du rmi ltas brtag/ grong pa'i chos kyis ma sbags pa'i// bu mo dus bzang dag la mchod// dri zhim khrus byas gos brgyan mdzes// rang lo'i
124b1(rgyud 'grel): grangs sam brgyad dam bdun// ar+g+ha la sogs mchod sngon 'gros// zas dkar zho dang 'o ma sbyin// 'gron bu dar sogs yon byin la// dung chos chus gtor ci bder dengs// de rjes byi dor drir ldan pa'i// khangs
124b2(rgyud 'grel): par tshangs spyod brtul zhugs gnas// sngas su me tog dri zhim gyis// byugs pa'i maN+Dal bzang byas la// mchod pa lnga dang khyad par du// gu gul mar me dbul bar bya// 'jim rim sran ma'i tshad bcos te//
124b3(rgyud 'grel): kuN+DA li yi sngogs bdun gyis// btab la nyi shu rtsa gcig ni// phyogs bcur gtor bas bar chad zlog/ gsum bdun gcig ni rin po cher// bsgom pas maN+Dal steng du dbul// stan la dgram dang gzung b.rarla bya//
124b4(rgyud 'grel): de rjes gang 'dod gsol btab nyal// oM swadz+dza d+hA ra swab+hA A pA lo ki ni// trai lo kya ni daR+sha ni/ trai lo kyaM d+hi dz+nyA ra ni/ b+hU te b+hA baM b+hA ba si sha ma/ shu b+hA shu b+hA taM mi sa t+ye kA~M tha ya~M swAhA// brgya rtsa brgyad dam nyi shu gcig/
124b5(rgyud 'grel): yang na lan bdun bzlas par bya// gsol btab sngags 'di yid ches pasna// lan cig bzlas kyang mi 'grub med// de tshe 'phags ma bdun gyi mkha' las phyogs bcur 'od mdzad thugs ka lus phyung
124b6(rgyud 'grel): bsil zer gyis// bdag snying gdung gsal thab thib dra ba ma lus spangs te sprin med mkha' ltar dag byas nas// glang chen sna 'dra'i phyag mdzes ring brkyang bdud rtsi can las bdud rtsi'i rgyun phab snying sogs bkang //
125a1(rgyud 'grel): de mthus lus kun kun nas dri med brel bum mchog ltar gtsang zhing rab dag yid byeng 'gyur// de 'og rtsa ba'i rlig pa brgyud// lha mchog la rtse gcig d+hA// ma g.yengs sam/
125a2(rgyud 'grel): kyi dal bus ni// ji srid gnyid log byar du bzlas// seng ge'i nyal stabs dge bas nyal// phyag yod dran dang ma bral ba// dngos sum brda 'am tshig dag gis// dge drang mi dge mthong bar 'gyur// thub pas sna tshogs

129b6(rgyud 'grel): phreng ba dang ldan pa/ zhabs g.yas bskum zhing g.yon brkyang ba/ sku lus sbom thung / gsus khyim che ba/ ut+pa la'i phreng bas brgyan pa/ zhal gcig ma/ lha'i gzugs can ma/ gzhad pa'i gang rgyangs can/
130a1(rgyud 'grel): dgyes par mdzad ma// ro'i gdan la bzhugs pa/ klu chen po brgyad kyis nye bar brgyan pa/ spyan gsum dmar la zlum pa/ stag gi pags pa'i sham thabs can// lang tsho gzhon
130a2(rgyud 'grel): sha dang ldan pa/ phyag rgya lnga yis yang dag par brgyan pa/ ljags 'dril ba/ mche ba drag tu gtsigs pa/ rtsa ba'i phyag gnyis kyi gri gug dang / thod pa thugs kar 'dzin cing / 'og ma gnyis kyis ral gri dang
130a3(rgyud 'grel): ut+pa la 'dzin pa/ dmar ser dang ldan pa'i ral pa gcig ma/ ral pa'i khrod na rigs kyi bdag po mu bskyod pas dbu brgyan par gyur pa'i lho mo skur bsam par bya'o// de ltar lha mo'i skur bsgom pa nyam su blangs
130a4(rgyud 'grel): pa ny-id kyis bsgrub pa po ni snyan dngags mkhan chen por 'gyur ro// de nas bzlas pa bya ste/ hrI tI hUM phaT/ ces pa snying gu'i gnas su 'od zer rnam pa lnga dang ldan pa bsams nus/ yi ge rnams kyi 'od zer lnga yis mi shes
130a5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i bud shing bsregs shing / ye shes kyi snang ba bskyed par bsam mo// g.yos ral gri'i gnas su mi rus kyi phreng ba 'chang bar mos la bzlas pa bya'o// de ltar 'di'i sngags 'bum phrag gcig bzlas pa tsam gyi
130a6(rgyud 'grel): 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi gsung gi dbang phyug thob par 'gyur ro// 'od zer sgro bsdu'i sbyor ba nyid kyis yid rtse gcig tu mnyam par bzhag la sgom zhing / rang nyid snyan ngag mkhan chen po rig pa'i gnas lnga pa chen po
130b1(rgyud 'grel): baN+Di ta yin snyan du nga rgyal bya'o// de ltar bsgom pa lnga rtse gcig tu gnas pa nyid kyis/ the tshom med par snyan dadwags mkhan chen po dang / gnas lnga pa'i paN+Di ta chen por 'gyuraro// gtor ma gtong bar 'dod na/
130b2(rgyud 'grel): gtor ma bsangs/ sbyangs nas/ AHlas byung ba'i thod par oM AHhUM/ las byung ba'i ye shes kyi bdud rtsi bsams la/ sngags 'di nyid kyis gtor ma dbul lo// oM hU~MHe ka dzA Te/ ma ma u pa nI tA ya/
130b3(rgyud 'grel): sarba satwAn+taM/ shAn+tiM ku ru/ puSh+paM ku ru/ rak+ShaM ku ru/ ma hA ta k+Sha kA/ nA gI d+hi pa ta ye/ i maM ba laM gr-ih+Na gr-ih+NA pa ya pa ra bi d+yA kaR+Sha ya kaR+Sha ya/ tra Ta tra Ta/ ts+tshe da ts+tshe da/ ts+tsha da ya ts+tshe da ya/ oM AHhUM phaT swA hA/ zhes pa
130b4(rgyud 'grel): lan gsum mAM bdun gyis so// mchod pas mchod nas/ hUM gi yi ge las byung sngo zhing sdom thung ral pa'i thor tshugs ldan// g.yon brkyang mchog gis mi ro mnan cing mi zid mchog gi ga rgyangs can// ral gri
130b5(rgyud 'grel): ut+pal drang ni gri gug thod 'dzin klu chen brgyan dang ldan// 'gro ba'i mi shes mun pa 'joms mdzad sgrol ma drag mo khyod la 'dud// tsos pas bstod do// gal te dngos dang rmi lam la sogs par 'byung po dang /
130b6(rgyud 'grel): sha za 'jigs su rung ba dang / bud med shin tu rid pa dang / sbrul la sogs pas 'tshe ba dang / yid mi phebs pa dang / bsgrub snying mi 'dod pa rnams byung na gegs yin pas/ 'di'i gtor sngags kyis
131a1(rgyud 'grel): gtor ma gtang zhing // rje btsun lha mo'i rnal 'byor la yid brtan pas/ thams cad stong pa nyid du byas ma zhing / nyam nga ba dang / bag tsha ba nyid du mi bya'o// de dag thams cad rab ni bar 'gyur/
131a2(rgyud 'grel): bsgrub pa po yid spro ba dang / sems dpa' ba dang / bsgrub pa la blo brtan pa dang / rmi lam du ma dang / sring mo dang / rje mo la sogs pa'i bud med rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang // lus sgom 'ong brjod pa dang / dr-i dang ldang ba
131a3(rgyud 'grel): sngags pa'i bud med kyi tshogs kyus phyag mtshan kro ta la~M sogs pa skyed bya dang / rang gis rnying pa dang / hU~MnA shar ba la snog 'i mtshan ma ni grub pa'o rtags so// rjes yi ge brgyu pas nongs pa bshagas+t+ya shing / dge ba'i rtsu
131a4(rgyud 'grel): sems can thams cad dang thun mong du yongs su bsngo bar bya'o// lha mo'i nga rgyal la gnas pas spyod lam thams cad yongasu bskyang bar bya'o// lha mo u grA tA ro'i sgrub thabs rgya gar shar phyogs kyi paN+Di ta chen po shI nga
131a5(rgyud 'grel): na rat+na'i zhabs kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// / paN+Di ta de nyid dang chos 'khor lo tsa ba 'jam dpal ye shes zhes bya bas dpal 'khor bde chen du bsgyur cing zhus pa'o//
131a6(rgyud 'grel): yi sa gra ma ga sa sa pa ba rgyal// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya u gra tA ra sA d+ha nAM nA ma/ bod skad du/ 'phags ma sgrol ma drag mo'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba'o/ rje btsun ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo//
131b1(rgyud 'grel): sgroslob ma srid pa gsum sgrol u gra tA ra la btud de// bla ma'i man drag ji bzhin de yi sgrub thabs bdag gis brjod// ling ga gcig dang de bzhin dur khrod yang na khang pa sbyong bar ni// gnas der srid gsum grol ba'i rig
131b2(rgyud 'grel): mernal 'byor pA yis bsgrub// 'jam par 'gyur ba'i byis pa'i ro'am yang na 'ja ma~M byA yi// spyan la sogs la mnyam gnas dngos grub mchog ni bsgrub par bya// thog mar kha gdong dag par rab byas gsum la skyabs
131b3(rgyud 'grel): 'gro/ mdun gyi na mkhar bla ma mchod la sdig pa bshags pa dang // rje su yi rang bsod nams yongs bsngo lam ni rab tu bsten// tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi rjesu dran pas byang chub sems ni bskyod// skad cig rnam
131b4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i sbyor pos rdo rje gsum mi bde mnyam bzhag/ de ni gnas gsum bsam bya de las 'od zer rab 'phros nas// srid gsum spyod pa'i sems can gsal bar mdzad nas slar yang ni// khams gsum mtha'
131b5(rgyud 'grel): drag bsngos nas stong pa nyid du bsam par bya// dwe naswa shU n+ya tA sogs rang bzhin rgyal ba'i gasdang sngags brjod// de nas nA mkhar a yig lngas byung chu skyes dmar po bsam// slar yang de steng tA yig las
131b6(rgyud 'grel): ni pad+ma'i snod bsam bya// de dbus hUM yig mthon mthing ngag dang mtshungs pa bsams nas ni// hUM yig de las skyes pa'i gri gug sa bon gyis brgyan blta// gri gug yongs gyur bdag nyid sgrol ma mtshungs
132a1(rgyud 'grel): par bsgom pa ni// g.yon brkyang zhabs can mi bzang mgon po'i phreng ba rab tu 'phyang // chu skyes sngon pos rnam par brgyan cing thung zhing lto 'phyang 'jigs byed ma// bzang
132a2(rgyud 'grel): mo zhal gcig spyan gsum gang rgyangs 'od dang ldan// rab tu dgyes shing ro man+dan klu brgyad kyis ni rnam par brgyan// dmar zhing zlum po'i spyan can stag gi lpags pa rked la bsnamaso// lang tshe gzhon zhing phun
132a3(rgyud 'grel): tshogs phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par brgyan// ljags ni rab 'khrug mche pa gtsigs shing 'jigs chen 'jigs byed ma// phyag g.yas ral gri gri gug g.yon na ut+pal thod pa bsnams// ral gcig dmar
132a4(rgyud 'grel): ser gyen brdze sde mi bskyod ma yis dbu brgyan ma// bsgoms pas stobs ni rab rdzogs rnal 'byor snyan dngags chen por 'gyur// gal te blun rmongs gyur kyang sgom pa'i ro la 'bad byed na// bzlas pa 'bum
132a5(rgyud 'grel): phrag gcig gris 'jam pa'i dbyangs nyid thob par 'gyur// snying gar yig gsum sngags chen rlob bkod phaT yig mtha' ru'o// yang dag 'od zer lnga ldan mi shes bud shing rab tu bsreg/ rnal 'byor spyod pa'i
132a6(rgyud 'grel): rjes 'brang de nyid btu ba'i cho ga brjod// dang por sa yi pha rol dbyangs yig bzhi pas rnam brgyan cing // ra yig zhon zhing 'od 'phro zla ba thig le yang dag ldan// de bzhin bzhi pas ta yig brgyan te rnam par yang
132b1(rgyud 'grel): dag sbyin// slar yang haM yig las sbyor yang dgra u yig ring por ldan// phaT yig+na de nas sbyin zhing yongs rdzogs sgrub pa'i sngags nyid do// ral gri'i gnas su mkhas pas mi mgo'i phreng ba rnam par bsam//
132b2(rgyud 'grel): yang dog spyugs mchog bzla zhing spro dong bsdu ba'i sbyor ba yis// brtan pa'i sems kyis brtag byas bdag nyid mkhas shing snyan dngags che// rab tu bsgom la goms pas de nyid the tshom med par 'grub//
132b3(rgyud 'grel): hUM gi yi ge las byung sngon zhing sbom thung ral pa'i thor tshugs ldan// g.yon brkyang mchog gisau mi ro mnan cing mi zad mchog gi gad brgyangs can// ral gri ut+pal gri gug thod pa 'dzin cing klu chen rgyan
132b4(rgyud 'grel): dang ldan// 'gro ba'i mi shwas mun pa 'joms mdzad sgrol ma drag mo khyod la 'dud// sgrol mA'i sgrub thabs rab byas dge ba bdag gis gang byasags pa// de yis 'gro ba ma lus rgyal ba'i bstan la mkhas par
132b5(rgyud 'grel): shog/ de 'dir rtag pa'i rdo rjes blo 'phel sgrub thabs byas pa yi// zab mo l-i ni mkhas pa rnams kyis 'di la bzod po mdzad rigaso// 'phags ma sgrol ma drag mo'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba/ slob dpon rtag pa'i rdo rjes
132b6(rgyud 'grel): mdzad pa rdzogaso// / rgya gar shar phyogs kyi paN+Di ta chen po shrI bAn rat+na'i zhal snga nas dang / lo tsa ba many+dzu shris slad nas bsgyur ba dge'o bkra shis phun sum tshogs//
133a1(rgyud 'grel): ral gcig ma'i sgrub thabs bzhugs//
133b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ e ka dz+nyA TI swa d+ha nAM/ bod skad du/ ral gcig ma'i sgrub thabs/ ral gcig ma lnga phyag 'tshalo// g.yas bskum g.yon brkyang zhabs kyis ro yi snying dang rkang mnan khro bo'i
133b2(rgyud 'grel): gad mos bsdigs mchog ma// ral gcig ut+pal gri gug thod pa g.yas g.yon phyag ldan hUM yig sa bon las byung mchog/ mi thung thod mo ral pa kham pa rgyas pa'i thor cog drag mo klu yIs rab brgyan ma// 'gro ba
133b3(rgyud 'grel): gsum gyi mun pa la gang+ga ro la gdan// sgrol ma drag mo rang gi bsod par shog/ rgyan nag las byung srid pa gsum// sgrol byed sgrol ma lnga btud de// bla ma rnams kyi man ngag bzhin// de yi sgrub thabs bdag gis
133b4(rgyud 'grel): brjod// mtshan ma gcig gam+ba dur khrod dam// dus kun du ni khang stong du// rab tu mkhas pa'i rnal 'byor pas// spyod pa mthar phyin rig mu sgrub// bu chung ro 'jam la gnas sam+ba// yang na gdan 'jam 'bol
133b5(rgyud 'grel): ba la// kun tu gnas te rnal 'byor pas// dngos grub mchog ni bsgrub par bya// skad cig rnam pa'i rnal 'byor pas// yang dag rnal 'byor la 'dug nas// gnas gsum rdo rje gsum bsgoms la// de nas
133b6(rgyud 'grel): 'od zer 'phro bar bya// srid gsum spyod pa'i sems can rnams// gsal bar byas la tshur dgug cing // bsngos rjes yang ni bsgom par bya// sna tshogs kun las stong pa nyid// de nas rgyal ba'i sngags brjod
134a1(rgyud 'grel): stong nyid sgom zhing de dang las// A las mtsho skyes dmar po blta// de yi steng du yang bsgom pa// D+haM yig las byung pad+ma'i snod// de yi dbus su yang ni bsgom// hUM mdzad yi ge sngon
134a2(rgyud 'grel): po ste/ de nas hUM mdzad las skyes pa'i// gri gug sa bon gyis brgyan pa// gri gug yongasu gyur pa las// bdag nyid sgrol ma rab tu bsgom// g.yas bskum g.yon brkyang 'jig su rung // mgo yi phreng ba 'phyang bra mo// mi'u
134a3(rgyud 'grel): thung 'jigs byed gsus pa sbom// sngon mo mtsho skyes kyis brgyan ma// zhal gcig spyan gsum ldan ma ni// khro bzhang sdigs byed shin tu gsal// kun nas dga' byed ro la gnas// klu brgyad rnam parla brgyan pa ste// spyan rtsa
134a4(rgyud 'grel): dmar zhing zlu mo pa'o// sku smad stag gis pags po g.yogs// lang tsho dar bab phun tshogs ma// phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par brgyan// zhal nas lcags 'gril 'jigs ldan ma// mche ba gtsigs shing g.yon du gzogs//
134a5(rgyud 'grel): g.yon du gzigs// g.yas pas ral gri gri gug 'dzin// g.yon pas ut+pal thod pa 'dzin// dbu skra kham pa drag pos brgyan// spyi gtsug mi bskyod rnam par brgyan// sgom gyi stobs kyis rdzogs pa na// rnam
134a6(rgyud 'grel): 'byor mkhas pa chen por 'gyur// gal te rmongs pa bems po yang // sgom gyi ro la dbang gyur nas// 'bum phrag sngags ni bzlas pa yis// 'jam pa'i dbyangs dang mtshungs par 'gyur// sngags chen
134b1(rgyud 'grel): 'di ni yi gsum// phuT yig mtha' can snying la gnas// 'od zer lha dang yang dag ldan// mi shes bud shing sreg byed pa// rnal 'byor spyod pas rjes 'brangs nas// de yi bsdu ba'i cho ga brjod// dang po sa yi phyi ma
134b2(rgyud 'grel): gzung // dbyangs kyi yi ge bzhi pas brgyan// gsal zhing 'bar ba ra la zhon// zla tshes thig les rnam par brgyan// de noswa taM yig sbyin par byas// dbyangs kyi yi ge bzhi pas brgyan// haM yig dbyings yig drug pasgo brgyan
134b3(rgyud 'grel): yang dag nyid du sbyin par bya'o// de nas phaT yig sbyin par bya// grub pa 'am sngags ni yongasu rdzogs// mkhas pas rwal gri stod sa ru// mi rus phreng po bsgom par bya// spro dang bsngo ba'i rnal 'byor gyis// sngags mchog
134b4(rgyud 'grel): yang dag bzlas pa byA// brtan pa'i sems kyis bsam por bya// paN+Di ta bdag snyan ngag mkhan// sgom stobs rgyun ni ma chad na// 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med// sgrol ma'i sgrib thabs byas pa yis// bdag gi bskyod
134b5(rgyud 'grel): nams gang bsags des// rgyal ba'i bstan par skye bo rnams// snyan ngag mkhan du 'gyur bar shog/ 'di ni blo gros rab bsgrub ma// rtag pa'i rdo rjes byas pa yin// mkhas pa chen po paN+Di tas+t+ra// 'di la shin tu bzod
134b6(rgyud 'grel): par 'os// rgya nag las ni byung ba yi// sgrol ma'i sgrib thabs yongs su rdzogs// / rgya gar shar phyogs kyi paN+Di ta chen po dA na shI las 'on 'da'i sku grong du lha'i skad las bod kyi brda' la 'khrul pa
135a1(rgyud 'grel): med par bsgyur ba'o// / lha mo ral gcig ma la phyag 'tshal lo// sgrol ma khro mo'i ba ling gi gtor ma lA sngags 'dis lan gsum mAm/ bdun gyis dbul bar bya ste/
135a2(rgyud 'grel): sngags ni 'di yin no// oM hrIHI ka dz+nyA Ti sa mo ya/ na b+h+r-i na sA ha nA s+thA g+h+ri ku ru puny+tsi ku ru ma he dak+Sha ka nA gA rI pa ta yau/ i maM ba l-I gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na/ gr-ih+Na pa ya/ gr-ih+NA pa ya/ pa ra mir+ya kra sa bru Ta bru Ta/ ts+tshin+da tshin+da/ bin+da bon+da/ oM AHhUM phoT
135a3(rgyud 'grel): swA hA zhes pas phul la/ de nas rdo rje dbyangs can ma la bdag gi don la gsol ba gdab// rjes mi dmigs pas rgyas gdab// dge ba'i rtsa ba sems can thams cad kyi don du bsngo// sgrol ma khros po'i ba ling gi gtor ma rdzogs//
135a4(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar shar phyogs kyi paN+Di ta dA nA shr-I las/ 'gren gyi khyad gsar du rang 'gyur du mdzad pa'o// / 'phags ma sgrol ma rdo rje dbyangs can ma// ba ling gtor ma phul ba bzhes nas su// 'gro rnams ma
135a5(rgyud 'grel): lus ma mun po bsalA nas// shes rab blo yi pad+ma kha 'byed shog/ dmar mo rab+hi 'jigs na mkha'i mdog/ zhal gcig phyag bzhi spyang stabs mdzes// myi shes yid 'joms lnga btung // gzhung don bsgom rim 'di
135a6(rgyud 'grel): gsal bya// dang po kho nar rig pa dang ldan pa'i gang zag gos// dur khrod ngam phyi nang gi rten stobs ldan bzhugs pa 'am// rab tu dga' zhing dben pa'i sa phyogs su gnas khang byi dor bya// rten dang mchod pa dngos sam
135b1(rgyud 'grel): yid kyi rnam 'phrul gyis bkod de/ bu chung gi ro 'jam zhing gnyen pa dri zhim po'i chus bkrus la// mye tog gi phreng ba btags la/ rang nyid bde bar gnas pa 'am/ de med na yang stan 'bol ba la gnas te/ bdag gis ral
135b2(rgyud 'grel): gcig ma bsgrubs la/ rang gzhin gyi mi shes pa'i mun pa rnam par gzhom par bya'o snyam du bsam mo// de nas skad cig gis rnam pa kun tu rtog pa'i tshogasu rang sarar+ya dag pa'i ting 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag go/ de'i
135b3(rgyud 'grel): rjes la spyi bo mgrin pa/ snying ga gsum du/ oM dkar po dang / AHdmar po dang / hUM skyon po dang gsum shin tu gsal bar blta zhing / 'od zer gyi tshogs spros pas 'gro ba'i mi shes pa'i mun pa rnar bcom nas
135b4(rgyud 'grel): gnas gsum gyi yi ge la bsdus la/ sku gsung thugs rnam dag cing 'pho 'gyur med pa'i ting 'dzin bsgom par bya'o// dngos po 'am mtshan ma thams cad rang gi ngo bos stong pa'i don de nyid blta bar bya ba'i phyir/
135b5(rgyud 'grel): oM shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba It+ma ko hri/ zhwa brjod cing / dngos po dang mtshan ma'i bag la nyal phra mo tsam yang med pa'i ting 'dzin la gnas par bya'o// de'i ngang lus AHdang Ta rim gyis gyur pa las/ pad+ma domar
135b6(rgyud 'grel): po dang thod pa khrag gis bkang ba/ de'i steng du nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la hUM sngo zhing dngas par blta bar bya'o// hUM yongasu gyur pa las gri gug gi yu ba nas nyi ma'i steng na hUM gnas pa'o// de yongasu gyur pa las
136a1(rgyud 'grel): bcom ldan 'das ral pa gcig ma sku sgom zhing thung ba/ mdog bai DUr+ya wAr spro zhing dngas pa/ zhal gcig phyug bzhi ma/ dang po gnyis ral grwa dang ut+pal bsnams pa/ 'og mA gnyis
136a2(rgyud 'grel): gri gug dang thong khrag thugs kar 'dzin pa/ zhabs g.yas bskum g.yon brkyang bas dbugs bral gyi snying dang rkang pa mnan pa/ phyag rgya lnga dang / brgya phyed dang / stag lpags dang / klu brgyad sbrul sngon po'i gzugs kyis dbu
136a3(rgyud 'grel): rgyun dang / rna rgyani dang / mgul rgyan dang / dpung rgyan dang / phyag gdub zhabs gdub dang / sku rags dang / se ral kha rnams kyis rab tu dpa'i ba'i chos su zhugs pa/ spyi gtsug na thub po mi bskyod pa bzhugs pA spyan gsuM
136a4(rgyud 'grel): mem mdag ltar dmyur zhing 'khrug pa cung zad g.yon du gzigs pa/ mche ba gtsigs pa/ lce glog ltar 'khyug pa/ gang rgyangs chen po sgrogs pa/ phyi nang gi bdud thams cad brlag par byed par bsgom mo// de'i thugs
136a5(rgyud 'grel): kar pad+ma dmar po 'dab ma bzhi pa'i steng du nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i hUM sngon po blta zhing / mdun gyi 'dab ma nas g.yas bskor du/ hriM tra~M hUM phaT rnams bsgom zhing // yi go 'bru de dag las drapag tu med
136a6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i 'od zer gyi tshogs 'phros pas 'gro ba'i mi shes pa'i mun pa thams cad bsreg par bsam zhing / 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das po'i yon tan blo gros kyi snang ba thams cad tshur 'dus te rang la
136b1(rgyud 'grel): bstim zhing bradag nyid yon tan dang blo gros kyi snang ba thams cad phun sum tshogs pas brgyan par bsam mo// de nas bzlas par bya ste/ g.yas dang po'i ral gri maM rus kyi phreng bar bsgyur la/ thugs pad+ma nyi mar rigs
136b2(rgyud 'grel): sngags kyi ting 'dzin las ma g.yos pa'i ngang lis/ hr-i traM hUM phaT ces ci nus su bzlas// de las skyon par 'dab kyi yi ge hUM la bsngo/ bdag gzhan gyi blo gros ngan pa'i mun pa thams cad gtan nas dag par gyu cig/
136b3(rgyud 'grel): snyem pa'i smon lam drag po gdab po// rjes shes kyi skabs su yang rtag tu dpa' mo'i nga rgyal dang ma bral bar bya'o// de 'dra'i ting nge 'dzin bzlas par bsam// brtan zhing tshad du skyol gyur na// mi shes sbyin tshogs
136b4(rgyud 'grel): dpag med mis// dbyar zad bzhin du dengs par 'gyur// sgrol ma'i blo 'phel slob dpon klu sgrub kyi man ngag mkhan rtag pa rdo rjes tshig lde'ur byas pa/ rgya gar shar phyogs kyi biN+Do nga che no d+ha na shI la'i gsung lhag chad
136b5(rgyud 'grel): med par bkod pa rdzogs so// 6// rgya gar skad du/ shu kle e ka dz+nyA Ti sA d+ho naM/ bod skad du/ ralo gcig ma dkar mo'i sgrub thabs/ ral gcig
136b6(rgyud 'grel): ma la phyag 'tshal lo// pad+mar gnas pa'i snod mchog la ni yi ge hUM las byung ba'i dkar mo ni/ g.yas brkyang g.yon bskam zhabs kyis gnas ma nu ma rab rgyas spyan gnyis yang dag dmarau// g.yas pas mi rus
137a1(rgyud 'grel): phreng 'dzin g.yon pas kha ma bye ba'i ut+pal sngon po bsnams// rab pa khyam pa dang ni ldan pa'i lha mos rtag tu khyed la skyong gyur cig/ klu brgyad 'jigs rung dang bcas sems
137a2(rgyud 'grel): kyi dbang phyug dbu rgyan can// snying rje ro yis kun nas gang ba'i ljags bskyod bzhad mdzad ma// ri dregs dgra bo yi ni pags pa'i na bza' 'chang ba mo// de lta'i sgrol mas mi shes mun pa gsod par byed par shog/ dpal
137a3(rgyud 'grel): ldan gnyis med rdo rje yis// bla ma'i zhabs kyi chu skyes la// btud de rol po sbas pa yis// sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs brjod par bya// dang por re shig sngags pas kha bshal ba la sogs pa byas te stan bde ba la nye bar 'dug
137a4(rgyud 'grel): nas 'dug nas me tog dri zhim po bkram pa'i sa phyogs su ji ltar 'byor pa'i mchod pa bshams lA/ rlung gi snying gar hUM dkar po nye bar blta'o// hUM dkar po de las rang gi ba spu'i bu ga dang / kha la sogs pa'i
137a5(rgyud 'grel): sgo nas 'od zer rnam pa lnga 'phro bar bsams te/ 'od zer de dag gis god+hA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yis pa snang bar byas nas/ dri ni 'og min na bzhug pi bcom ldan 'das ma 'chad par
137a6(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur ba'i sku mdog la sogs pa dang ldan pa/ gang yang bdag la gsol ba 'debs pa'i sems can de dag la byin gyis brlab par bya'o// zhes pa cig char mdun na 'dug par bzhugs par bsams la/ de
137b1(rgyud 'grel): nas yi ge hUM las me tog bdug spos dri dang phreng ba la sogs pa spros pas mchod do// de nas byams pa dang snying rje dang dga' ba dang / btang snyoms dang / mchod pa dbul ba dang / sdig pa bshags pa dang /
137b2(rgyud 'grel): bsod nams la rje su yi rang / gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba la sogs pa bya'o// oM badz+ra puSh+pe/ A~MHhUM zhes pas bsgrags pa'i me tog la sogs pa ming sbal dang bcas pas dbul lo// de nas bdag dang chos thams

144a1(rgyud 'grel): phyin las kyi rnal 'byor dang ma bral bar bya'o// de ltar bsgom bzlas kyi rnal 'byor 'dris pa dang / dngos sam+ba rmi lam gyi rtags rnams 'byung ste/ yid gzhung dran bzung
144a2(rgyud 'grel): drag rgod spyan ngag mkhas/ gzhan byams nang zhi stobs dang longs spyod 'phel// zhing mthong phyag yul rin chen rin dang khyi/ chu 'thungs brgyan gnyis zag pa mi rtags brgyan// de ltar rtogs rnams ma byung na sbyin
144a3(rgyud 'grel): sreg bya zhing sngags kyi bsgrub pa la 'bad par bya'o// chos rnams gdong nas ye stong phyir// bsam brjod bral ba'i don 'di la// sna tshogs lta ba kun spangs la// mchog gi rnal 'byor yid la gyis// mchog
144a4(rgyud 'grel): gi sgrol ma ral pa gcig pa'i man+da dag gi sgrub thabs/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal g+ho zhal gyi bdud rtsi/ bdag nyid chen po klu sgrub kyi mchog gi rim pa// tshe'i dngos grub mnyes pa/ 'chi med go cha las brgyud
144a5(rgyud 'grel): pa/ snyan ngags mkhan po rtag pa'i rdo rje'i man ngag/ lnga rig lkog du gyur pa b+ha gu pa paN+Da Di ta'i khyad chos/ rgya gar shar phyoT kyi paN tshin dA na shI la las/ shAkya'i dge slong rig pa 'dzin pa khu rnal 'byor pa las
144a6(rgyud 'grel): 'on d+ha ra sang skr-i ta'i skad las rang 'gyur du gsungs so// / rgya gor skad du/ tA ra de ba pany+tsa sA d+ha nAM/ bod skad du/ sgrol ma lha lnga'i sgrung thibs/ thugs
144b1(rgyud 'grel): rje chen ldan ma'i dpal ldan ye shes ma// gsal ba'i thugs rje 'gro la ston// bdud bzhi tshar gcod ston pa'i mchog/ lha mo rtse ldan ma la nyer btung ngo // 'gro ba'i gdugs gcig ma la phyag 'tshalo// de yi bsgrub//
144b2(rgyud 'grel): thabs cho ga bshad// bas mtha' shing gcig lha yi gnas// dur khrod dben pa kra shis pa// dang ldar dbang thob dam tshig ldan// gsang thub gus la shes rab che dpa' la brtson 'grus blo ldan pas// ma
144b3(rgyud 'grel): Tal mchod pa bdud rtsir ldan// rten dang mchod pa'i yan lag bcas// lha gsar spyan drangs phyag 'tshal te// mchod pa bdun po tshad med gsal// 'od spro bsdu dang stong par gsal// oM mA hA shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na
144b4(rgyud 'grel): swa b+hA ba At+ma ko hi/ de las taM sa bon las// yaM dang baM gis rlung dang chu// saM dang r-i gyi sa dang me// de stengs bruM las gzhal yas khang // klu ba'i rta 'byas pa'i dang ldan// mu khyud lte brtsibs bzhir ljon//
144b5(rgyud 'grel): cha sgo bzhi rgyan dang ldan// dbus su pad+ma dur khrod gdan// rtsibasi la dur khrod pad+mas mdzes// de snang ta wu hUM du gsal// de la thod pa dz+nyA gis mdzes// sgo bsdu stor bas sku bskyed // mthing nag zhal gcig
144b6(rgyud 'grel): phyag bzhi ma// spyan gsum rngam pa'i nga ri tsin// sbrul dang sdug pags rus pas brgyan// ral gri rus phreng gr-i gug bsnams// ut+pal thod pa g.yon par 'dzin// thod phreng bongs thung 'gying bag can// nu 'phyang
145a1(rgyud 'grel): bcu drug lo ltar mdzes// me ri phyag rgya lnga yis brgyan// dbus sgra dung khwa thod pas brgyan// shin tu gsal bar mngangs ldan bskyed// de nas thugs ka'i sa bon las// shar gyi rtsib
145a2(rgyud 'grel): lnga oM 'phros pas// dkar po 'od ldan gsol bar bsam// zhu bas rdo rje sgrol ma bskyed// mdog dkar zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma// rus pa'i rgyan dang sbrul gyis brgyan// stag lpags thod pa'i phreng ba can+da// phyag yas
145a3(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje g.yon pa ni// ut+pal dkar po 'dzin pa bskyed// lho phyogs rtsibs laM hrIH'phros pas// ser po 'od ldan zhu ba yis// rin chen sgrol ma gser mdog la// rgyan ldan phyag g.yas rin po che// ut+pal ser po 'dzin pa
145a4(rgyud 'grel): te/ brkyang bskum khro mo'i cha lugs la// dges pa'i gar dang ldan pa bskyed// nub phyogs rtsibs lA tr-i 'phros pas// pad+ma'i sgrol ma thugs rje can// mdog dmar zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma// phyag g.yas pad+ma dmar
145a5(rgyud 'grel): po 'dzin// g.yon pa ut+pal rang rtags te// rgyan ldan gong dang mthun par bskyed// byang phyogs rtsibs la phaT 'phros pas// las kyi sgrol ma sna tshogs mdog/ phyag g.yo sngo ral gri 'bar po ste// g.yos pi ut+pa
145a6(rgyud 'grel): rang rtags te// phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par brgyan// bskyed la ye shes spyan drangs lo// mcho ngo bstod byas la gnyis meng bstim// byin brlabs dbang bskur rdzogs byos la// mi gsal bar du gsal bar bsgom//
145b1(rgyud 'grel): smyo na bzlas pa 'bad bar bya// snying ga' dkyil du yig 'bru lta// kha dog lta ru gsal byas lA// lU las 'od lnga spro byas la// lnga sbyangs tshur 'dus lnga ru gsal// rab 'bring tha ma gsum dang drug/ bcu gnyis bar du 'grub
145b2(rgyud 'grel): par 'gyur// thabs dang shes rab gsal bar bsgom// bzhi po sreg gso bde ba rgyas// rdo rje nor bu'i rtse la drang // bskyil zhing bde ba nyid la blta// mtshan ldan snod du bzung pos dgang // lnga las 'od 'phros 'dod lnga
145b3(rgyud 'grel): dgug/ gnyis med bstims la longs spyod bya// mi rgod sa dang skye tshe dang // sngags dang ting 'dzin bcas pas bcing // oM a mu ki pA sha mA nA ye swA hA/ zhi bai dkar po 'od 'phro 'dus sbyar// rgyas pa ser po bsod na/
145b4(rgyud 'grel): brgyus// mi rmongs dbang du dmar pos bsngos// mngon spyod nag po'i 'od kyis gsang // shes rab 'phel ba'i 'jam pa'i dbyangs// nyi shu bar du bsgrub par du// dkar gsum chu gtsang sgyur rtsis dgang // sngags
145b5(rgyud 'grel): bzlos tho rangs dus nyid du// gsol btab de dus bza' bar bya// oM pradz+nyA pA ra ta ra sa twa muM phaT swA hA/ 'jam dbyangs she sau rab lta bur 'gyur// brtson 'grus ldan pas sbyor ba bya// lha nyi 'dod pa'i sbyor ba ni// tha
145b6(rgyud 'grel): ka lugs sku ras ris la// rab gnas byas la lhar bskyed la// ye shes pa stims la mchod bstod bya// bdag nyid tha mal nyid du ste// bzlas pa khri bya gsol btab 'grub// oM rata ni si tu bI ra sti hUM phaT/ mi gsal
146a1(rgyud 'grel): gsal bar 'dod pa yi// rin chen snod du 'o mas dgang // na le sham gyi rdzus kyang blugs// rten gyi mdun du gnag byas la// lhar bskyed gsang sngags 'bum du bzlas// oM ta ra
146a2(rgyud 'grel): tsak+Shu sa ma ti hUM phaT/ srid gsum gsal ba'i shes rab 'char lha klu gnod sbyin 'byung po dang // ro langs mkha' 'gro mi ma yin// gnod par mi 'gyur dbang du 'du// bdud dang mu stegs pham par byed// 'jigs chen
146a3(rgyud 'grel): brgyad las rnam par thar// 'dod pa'i longs spyod zla bzhin rgyas// shes rab nyi ma lta bur 'gyur// nyon mongs bag chags mkha' bzhin 'gyur// gang 'dod thams cad dbang du 'gyur// mi mthun phyogs las rnam par
146a4(rgyud 'grel): rgyal// gzugs dang sgra dang dri rnams dang // ro dang reg las phun sum tshogs// zhi rgyas dbang dang mngon spyod las// skad cig ma lus 'grub par 'gyur// nad kyi rigasu gang gtogs pa// me dang rtsi sbur lta bur 'gyur/

146a6(rgyud 'grel): ni bskur byas la// dus bzang mchod dang gtor ma dbul// me ti go sngon pos maN+Dal dbul// de ltar lha rnams lung ston 'gyur// 'bad par gyur kyang rtags med no// nyams dang sdig pa che ldan pas// sbyin sreg tsho
146b1(rgyud 'grel): 'khor maN+Da DA la dang // sku gzugs bzhengs la bshags pa bya// lha yi spyan sngar gsol ba gang ba// bzlas pa nyis 'bum bsgyur la 'bad// bdag wa bri ba'i mthu med kyang // sgrol ma rul gcig gtso bcus la// mos 'di
146b2(rgyud 'grel): gang zag dngos grub 'dod// de yi don du rnam par bkrod // dngos grub lha yi zhal mthong shog/ sgrol ma lha lnga'i sgrub thabs rin po che gsal ba zhes bya ba/ slob dpon rtag pa'i rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzog so//
146b3(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar gyi mkhan po paN+Di ta rat+na d+ha ti dang / bod kyi lo tsa ba rma ban chos 'bar gyis bsgyur ba'o// / rgya gar gyi yul shar phyogs na skyob dpor rtag pa'i
146b4(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje chos bshad kyi nA yod pa la// phag rdzi ma rgan mo cig der+ya btud nAs/ res zhing ni hUM/ res zhing rgod pa la/ slob dpon gyis mkha'agro ma cig yin par shes nas/ khyod re so ngu res rgod pa tsi nyes byas pas
146b5(rgyud 'grel): nga rgod pa khyod phyin ci ma log par bshad pa la dga' nas rgod pa yin// ngu ba khyod rlung gi rgyud la yang mu thebs par 'dug/ slob ma la yang khyed glags phyir la nyan gyi na 'dug pa la ngu ba yin zer/ der phyag
146b6(rgyud 'grel): dang bskor po byas// maN+Dal phul nas gdams pa zhu byas pas/ 'phag rdzi ma rgan mo cig la chos ci la yod/ nga khyod la lung bsten gyis/ zangs ling phyi'i yul na/ rnal 'byor pa jo mo sgrol ma bsgom po cig
147a1(rgyud 'grel): yod kyi sa// der song la gdams bzhus cig zer nas/ smyob dpon gyis gas+ye m+b+ha b+hU bsnams nas byon pas/ zang ling gi rtul pa cig la 'di na rnga masbrel ma bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor bcig
147a2(rgyud 'grel): yod par 'dug pa/ gang na yod dris pas/ de nga'i mchod gnas yin lung pa'i phu ya gi na yod zer/ der rgyalnga po la gser zhi gcig phul nas/ nga dang 'jal bar zhu bya ba'i zhu ba 'bul dgos byas de byar mi 'dod khong gi tra

147a5(rgyud 'grel): la bskor ba mdzad nas rdo'i steng du bzhugs pa la gser phul nas gdams pa zhus pas/ gser bsnams nas slob dpon la phyi rgan rgyab nas nang du gshegs so// der zhog gsum la gsol ba 'de bos kyin bsdad

147b1(rgyud 'grel): byas pa gsum gyis yul gzugs/ des smrang thags las chags thams cad mdzad/ nga'i slob ma a ma~M g+ha brda chen po// de'i slob ma tha ma rdo rje glangan pa/ des zlum par la tsa ba dang / rma chung ma tsa ba la gyurang
147b2(rgyud 'grel): des bla ma sprul pa dang gung ston gnyis la gi nang // des bla ma d+harma kIr ti la gnang // / dus mtshams nag mo zhes bya ba dang / bdud kyi sring mda' nag po zhes bya'o//
147b3(rgyud 'grel): stsog gnang la dbab pa nag po de ba ta la phyag 'tsha'o// sde brgyad 'thab pa'i nyi mA la// 'brung khung gru gsum pa brtsigs la/ dur khrod sol bas byugs pa la// ming dang rus su bcas pa bri// 'brub khung nog
147b4(rgyud 'grel): po'i nang du gzhug/ bya nag mo yi sgo nga la// dgra yi ming rus bris pa la// rkang gis skang brgyus pA yi thag/ thong tshal khung du gzhag byas la// dug+na dang mi khrag yungs kar lnga// myong byed yu yis byugs byas
147b5(rgyud 'grel): la// smyug sdong nang du blugs byas la// zhag gsum bar du sngags 'dis gang ba// hi badz+ra ma hA kI lA ni swa la he rak+Sha hu hUr pa ha na d+hi ru mA ro ya phaT/ 'od dang sgra ni de la 'byung // de nas sgo ngo'i grag sngags so//

148a1(rgyud 'grel): 'phrul zhi bar 'gyur// sngags des skyong lci bar 'gyur// 'brub khung rlung du lhung ba dang // thun brab gsang pa'i sngags 'di'o// sa ma yA che ge mo mA rA ya song // bdud po srog la
148a2(rgyud 'grel): hedzadza/ dadung po srog na d+ha ru ma/ his kA la sa ma ya dza dzi/ zhag bdun par du gsad pya brtsam// de zhes dri ni chu l-i dror// de yis bzas pa brlag par nges// dus mtshams spyad mda'i lus// guR+YA l+yA sho ris

150a3(rgyud 'grel): pr-i ti ha ta stA swa nAM/ he he b+he gAM ba ti/ ma hA satwa swan+ni bud+d+ha/ a ba lo ki taM/ mAM saM laM b+ha ta ra e ka dza Ti/ i daM ba li gr-ih+NA ya hUM/ sarba bi sa ra swA hA/ hUM pad+ma rigs kyi lha tshogs dang / thugs rje chen po spyan ras gzigs
150a4(rgyud 'grel): rje btsun sgrol ma ral gcig ma/ mchod pa dam la dbul ba ni/ dkar mo dang nI stobs chen mo// rtsub mo dang ni brlag byed ma// nag mo chen mo nag maM dang // srung ba mong dang stod byed ma// tshangs mo dang ni rigaso byed ma// gsung

150a6(rgyud 'grel): ma/ ral pa gcig ma 'khor dang bcas// dur khrod brgyad kyis mkha' 'gro me// ma mo mkha' gro ma lus dang // lha dang lha min thams cad dang // mchod sbyin gtor ma 'di bsnams la// bdag la dngos grub gsol
150b1(rgyud 'grel): 'debs pas// zang zing lo tog 'bras bu rnams// ri po che ni sna tshogs dang // dud 'gro rkang 'gro mi nor phyugs// ro brgya'i zas ba sna tshogs zas// btung ba kha mngar chung sna tshogs// gos bzang srab 'jam sna tshogs dang //
150b2(rgyud 'grel): cang shes glang chen 'dod 'jo ba// zhing dang khang bzang 'dod 'jo ba// 'jigs pa brgyad dang bral bar mdzod// bcud lan tshe ring nang med mdzod// phyogs skyong bde brgyad tshogs rnams dang // 'chi bdag bdud las rgyal bar
150b3(rgyud 'grel): mdzod// ral gri mig sman bum pa bzang // rkang mgyogs gter dang longs sbyong dang // blo rno shes rab tshig bshad dang // snyan dwags ma thos chos shes shog/ rgyal rigs la sogs rigs bzhi rnams// 'gro ba dbang du 'du bar
150b4(rgyud 'grel): shog/ rigs drug ngan song lcags grol shog/ gnod dang bdud rnams par chad zhi// tshe dang stobs dang 'khor rgyas shing // tshe dang chos dang bstan pa dang // bla ma'i sku dgra skad cig sgrol// rtag tu gar skyes gur gnas
150b5(rgyud 'grel): kyang // gsang sngags lam drang mi 'bral zhing // chos kyi 'khor lo longs spyod shog/ mdor na radwa la ci 'dod pa// bsam pa yid bzhin grub pa dang / mi 'dod thams cad myur bral nas// sems can kun gyi don grub shog
150b6(rgyud 'grel): thugs rje chen po spyan ras gzigs// rje btsun sgrol ma'i zhal mthong shog/ ral pa gcig pa'i dngos grub gnyis// bsams shing bsgrubs pas myur tho chog/ rje btsun sgrol ma'i nang gi gtor ma'i cho ga/ slob
151a1(rgyud 'grel): dpon tsan+d+ra go mis mdzad pa rdzogs so// / yul bal po rdzod du bsgyur ba lags gsung ngo // / rgya gar skad du/ ta li sa ti tsakra/ bod skad du/
151a2(rgyud 'grel): phyir zlog pa'i 'khor lo// rje btsun ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo// bsnyen pa yongs rdzogs rnal 'byor pas// bar chod bzlog pa'i cho ga brtsam// dben pa'i gnas su maN+Dal dang // mchod pa gter ma bshams la ni// bskyed
151a3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i rim pa rdzogs bsgoms la// mchod pa bstod pa dus gsum dbul// de nas snying gar rtsa bsams la// zhu bas 'khor lo rtsibs bzhir gyur// lte ba stong pa'i nang nyid du// bdag nyid lha yi rnal 'byor gnas// rtsibs
151a4(rgyud 'grel): g+hanyis rtse la gri gug byasam// gnyis pa ral gri me 'bI rI bAsama?// 'bar ba me dang 'od 'khrugs nas// 'khor lo de la mtshon cha ni// char pa bab pas gsod par bsam// de nas sngags 'dis 'khor lo bskor// oM
151a5(rgyud 'grel): h+yaM tr-i d+ha ra d+ha ra/ tsikre lo ga mA ra ya mA ra ya/ b+h+rUM b+h+yAM/ tsI ri tsi ri/ ta ra ta ra/ phaT phaT swA hA/ de ltar drag po'i sngags bzlas pas// 'khor lo skad cig mi sdong 'khor// mtshon cha'i char dang 'od 'khrugs pas// gzhan
151a6(rgyud 'grel): rigs sngags smod pa dang // gdon dang bar tshong gong yin pa// bkug la 'khor lo mtshon chas btul// dong 'dzin gsal dang bzlas pa 'o// brtson pas rab tu 'bad par bya// de ltar zhag ni lnga 'am bdun/
151b1(rgyud 'grel): gsum gsum bar du byas gyur na// phyag na rdo rje'i stobs kyang rdugs// phyir bzlog 'khor la slob dpon rtag pa'i rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogasas/ mkhas pa chen bau rma ban+d+ha
151b2(rgyud 'grel): chos 'bar gyis bsgyur po'o// // / rgyu gor skad du/ tA ra gu d+ha rasA d+ha naM/ bod skad du/ sgrol ma'i gsang ba'i sgrub thabs/ mgon po spyan ras gzigs la phyag 'tshalo// mchog
151b3(rgyud 'grel): dang thun mong 'dod pa drang // bar chod nyer 'tshe zhi ba dang // 'dod pa'i yon tan 'di la 'gyur zhing // phrin las rnam bzhi bsgrub pa'i phyir// lha mo gsang ba'i sgrub thabs bshad// dang po nyams pa'i skyon bral zhing /
151b4(rgyud 'grel): brtson 'grus ldan pa'i skyes bu yis// shin tu dben pa'i sa d+yo gsu/ muN+Dal khru gang tshad du bya// dri chen dri chus chag chag gdag/ mchod pa lnga ldan ras ris dgram// phyi nang bar chod zhi bar blta// stan la legs
151b5(rgyud 'grel): 'dug nub tu lce// skad cig lha bsam 'od kyis su// srid gsum zhing sbyang spyan drangs la// yan lag bdun po bre yis bya// tshad med bzhi pasame stong nyid sgom// a las me byung gru gsum dbyibs// dkar po
151b6(rgyud 'grel): bsams la ngo stengasu// a bsam zhu bas lha mo bskyed// mdog smug bang thu theng phreng can// zhal gcig phyag gnyis rgod pa'i gdangs// rus pa'i phreng bas sku brgyan cing // mi dpung 'bor ba'i gdam la
152a1(rgyud 'grel): bzhugs// phyag g.yas mnga' gzhu rab tu 'dzin// ut+pal thod pa byang sems gang // g.yon pa tha~Md dkar 'dzin pa bstang snying gar e yaM cha byad la// a ya~M mtshan ma 'od
152a2(rgyud 'grel): 'phros pas// ye shes dra ngas pa mchod pa ni// tshig tu ma yin blo yis dbul// bzhis bstim byin brlabs dbang bskur bya// bskyed la gsang sngags yid la bzlas// kha dog lnga ldan snying gar bsam// bsnyad la
152a3(rgyud 'grel): la bzlas pa bya bA ni// oM AHaM d+hi sitwa hUM// 'bru bdun dngos grub 'byung bar byed// bzhi 'am gcig d+ha bdun na 'grub// thun par gautor ma yang yang dbul// ming dang gtam yang gsang spyod bya// ba'i las ma sur
152a4(rgyud 'grel): bAde ba dbab// bsgril la lhan skyes bde ba bde ba bsgom// e yi e lA sa 'od 'phros pas// 'dod pa'i yon tan de bkug la// mtshan ldan snod du bkug byas la// rtags rdzogs longs spyod gzhan du min//
152a5(rgyud 'grel): phrin las rnam bzhi skabs dang sbyar// rin chen dang 'dra bsgrub pa'i thabs// 'jigs pa kun sgrol bde ba ster// nad med gdon rnams ring bzhin 'gyur// phongs pa kun sgrol 'byor par ldan// spangs
152a6(rgyud 'grel): rgyas kun gyi dbang bskur 'gyur// sgrub thabs 'gro la phan phyir bkod// lhag pa'i lha yi zhal mthong shog/ bar chod nye bar zhi gyur nas// 'gro rnams de yi zhal mthong shog/ sgrol ma gseng ba'i
152b1(rgyud 'grel): sgyu sa// dpal rtag pa'i rdo rje lung bstan pas ba ga gsang ba d+hog+sanas bya ba rtags pa// rtag kyi mnyanapa dang / 6
152b2(rgyud 'grel): baisgyur ba'o// // / r+g+ha gAraskad du/ kU ru Na sA d+hA nAM kArmabau/ bod skad du/ thugs rje sbrul ma las sna tshogs pa'i sgrub thabs/ rje btsun ma sgrol la la phyag 'tshalo// dbes pa'i
152b3(rgyud 'grel): gnas sam sa phyogs su// srog chagasna sbyangs pa'i sa la ni// rin chen 'bru la dri dang bcas// chu gcing la ni sngags ni bzlas/ oM hAM traM hUM phaT oM AHhUM/ brgya rtsa brgyad dang bzlas la gdab// de nas 'jam
152b4(rgyud 'grel): pa sbyang byas la// rang nyid lha yi nga rgyal gyis// snying ga'i sngags la lnga 'phros pas// 'jim pa 'od lnga dag tu 'gyur// de las 'od 'phros 'jam pa yi// phyin brlabs bsdus te de la bstim// de nas 'ab 'bi
152b5(rgyud 'grel): pa dang // sgrol ya sngags kyis 'od kyis sbyang // sngags 'dis tsha cha gdab par bya// oM hr-i tra~M hUM phaT hrIHA yuM badz+ra kA ya tsid+ha hUM/ sgrol ma 'od kyi sgor gsal nas// ye shes dgug dang gzhug pa dang // mchod
152b6(rgyud 'grel): pa bstod pa rgyas par bya// me tog la ni rten 'brel sngags// lan bdun bzlas te gtor bas ni// rab tu gnas par bye ba'o// rten la bskor ba byed pa ni// lha yi nga rgyal ldan pa yis// snying ge'i sngags las
153a1(rgyud 'grel): 'od 'phros pas// rten de stong pa nyid du bsam// stong pa'i dang las maM las ni// pad+ma 'dab brgyad bsam par bya// de steng hUM sngon zhu ba las// thod pa gri gug sku ru bsam// snying gar sbyar
153a2(rgyud 'grel): kyi 'khor lo lus// 'od 'phros sangs rgyas thams cad dgug/ bstim la mchod pa bstod pa bya// de nas bskor ba thu mal gyis// bstod dang sngags bzlas gus par bya// ting 'dzin lce yi thugs ka nas// 'od
153a3(rgyud 'grel): byung bdag la phog pa yis// sgrib dag sgrol ma'i sku ru gsal// sngags 'dis rab tu bskor bar bya// oM hrIM traM hU~M phaT oM Ar+thahUM s+ya ti sa ma ya hUM phaT/ de ltar bskor ba'i cho ga'o// sbyin sreg cho ga bya ba no// ya
153a4(rgyud 'grel): gyi dro yi tshes brgyad nas// nya yi bar du brtsam par bya/ snod gcot+pa ras kyi sdong bu la// mar dkar gyis ni mAri me sbar// me long khung du til la ni// sdig pa ya na gzugs byas la// mdun du bzhag la spyi
153a5(rgyud 'grel): borar+ya ni// kaM bsams zhu bas lus la thim// de yi 'od kyis bdag gis ni// sdig pa thams cad bshang ba yi// lam nas sdig gzugasde de la bAstimA// me mar hUM las sgrol man bskyed// ye shes dgug
153a6(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa ni// sngon gyi ji bzhin shes par bya// de nas sdig pa sngags 'dis bsreg/ oM hrIHtra~M hUM swar+b+ba b+hA ba da ha shAn taM kuM swA hA/ mthab srin gnyis kyis sdig pa bsreg/ brgya rtsa brgyad du bya bar gsungs
153b1(rgyud 'grel): ser ba srung ba'i cho ga ni// bsnyen pa mngon rdzogs rnal 'byor pas// yungs kar me tog sngon po la// sngags btab na mkha'i phyogs su gtor// oM hod+d+hi hUM rak+Sha sa mA ya b+hU tI d+ha re hu~M huM hU phaT phaT rAwA ya~M nga rgyal ldan pas
153b2(rgyud 'grel): su// sku gzugs mdun du mchod pa dang // gsol ba gdob cing 'bad pa bya// khro mo lha la bstod pa// chos nyid mnyam pa'i ngang las kyang // mdzes ma sgril ma mchog/ ye shes lnga yi ngo bo nyid// sku mdog drag po'i
153b3(rgyud 'grel): khro tshul can// bong thung gsus 'phyang 'gyang bag can// mgo phreng brgya yis sku la brgyan// dur khrod ro yi dkyil na bzhugs// sku gsum 'chang ba'i lha mo khyod// zhal gcig spyan gsum he he'i sgra// yan lag klu brgyad
153b4(rgyud 'grel): rgyan+da dang ldan// sku smad stag gi pags pas dkris// ljags 'dril mche ba rab tu gtsigs// phyag bzhi dang po phreng ba ste// thugs rje 'gro 'dren gri gug gis// nyon mongs bag chags rtse du nas gcod// mdzes
153b5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i rang rtags ut+pal dang // thod pa dug lnga rnam 'joms rtags// khro mo khyod la dus gsum du// bdag ni dran bgyid skyabs su mchi// dus rnams gdug pa'i bar chad rnams// zhi bar khro mo khyod kyis mdzod//
153b6(rgyud 'grel): rma gar bsil ba'i sang ldeng phug du slob dpon rtag pa'i badz+ras mdzad pa rdzogs so// / mkhas pa chen po ba ri lo tsa bas bsgyur ba'o//
154a1(rgyud 'grel): dur khrod 'jigs pa'i gnas nyid du// drag po bdud kyi nyi ma la// dkyil 'khor bca' dang mthun rdzas bsog/ lha mo srang mnga' bca' byas la// bdag nyid gtso bo'i nga rgyal bya// sgo
154a2(rgyud 'grel): byA ba rdzogs pa dang // thun rdza sa rnams la sngags 'di gdab// oM khA tAr wa ra ti rbad dza dza/ zheg bdun bsngags la thun rdzas 'di// dkyil 'khor byang gi phyogs su gzhag/ de nas sgo nga'i steng nyid du// kha los lha mo
154a3(rgyud 'grel): boskyed byas la// gdugs pa'i sdigs rgod 'di yis gdab// he khA ta he badz+ra ma nus rba thang car// sgo nga li ni zla phyed par// drag po'i sems kyis gdab par bya// sgo nga 'brub khung lhung ba dang // gri gug dag gi btol byas
154a4(rgyud 'grel): lnga/ thun gyis brab cing sngags 'ongs gsang // dzA dza thang thang rbang // he mugs srog mA ra ya thun ni rbang hUM hUM srog la he kha ta badz+ra rbad// bcu gcig bar du thun gyis brab// de nas mnan dang bsreg par bya// lha mo ngan gsang
154a5(rgyud 'grel): gi lase ga las la sbyar// kha yaM gdod pa srung mnga' nag mo zhes bya ba/ slob dpor rtag pa'i badz+ras mdzad pa// / rje btsun sgrol ma thugs rje sgrol// dngos grub sgrol ma
154a6(rgyud 'grel): gus btad de// phyag 'tshal skyabs 'gro byin gyis rlobs// bla ma rnams la phyag 'tshalo// rje btsun sgrol ma dngos grub bla na med pa'i gsang ltar bsgrub pa'i/ sgrub thabs kyi man ngag me tog gi phyed pa lta bu'i man ngag ni/
154b1(rgyud 'grel): 'dir ches 'di la mos shing gus pas// skye ba 'di nyid la sgrol ma'i go 'phang thob par 'dod pas/ rgyu bzhi ste 'khor ba la gshed mar mthong ba dang / zas nor la dug du mthong ba dang / 'khor ba'i las 'bras bu ngan song
154b2(rgyud 'grel): gsum du mthong ba dang / byis pa don med cing 'bral zhing mi rtag par shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos 'dod pa tshad pas gdungs pa chu 'dod pa lta bu brtson 'grus can de la 'byung gi/ gzhan la ma yin pas/
154b3(rgyud 'grel): kun la spel na rang gi dam+ba tshig nyams shing dngos grub ring la don med par 'gyuraro// de yang sdom pa gsum gyi lung sgrub thabs ji lta ba bzhin du byas la/ lam du blangs nas sangs rgyas sgrol ma thob par 'dod pa la don
154b4(rgyud 'grel): gsum ste/ bskyed pa'i rim thun mong pa yin pa'i tshogs lam dang // rdzogs pa'i rim pa thun mong ma yin pa ye shes kyi lam dang / gzhan mo dad pa bzlog pa las tshogs yid bzhin gyi nor bu lta bu dang gsum mo// sgru
154b5(rgyud 'grel): thabs bzhin bskyod rim rdzogs nas rang gi thugs ka'i nyi zla'i steng du taM ljang sngon mtha' mar dpe' mo 'bru lnga'i 'od zla 'dog lnga'i 'ad kyil rlon lngar bsams nas/ sngags bzlas te/ dmigs pa de la bltas pas 'od 'phros te/ 'gro
154b6(rgyud 'grel): ba lnga'i rgyud sbyangs pa dang / rang gi dug lnga sbyangs bsregs te/ 'gro ba drug gi sa bon ye shes lnga'i 'od kyis bsregs pas/ sems can gyi don tha mi dad pa'o// slar 'dus pa las/ rang gi phung po lnga rdo rje sgrol ma dang /
155a1(rgyud 'grel): kha ma skal myu dang / na chen snal ma nga la dang / las r+b+ba sgrol mar gyur pa dang // snrung la ra banan mang pa dang / gsal la 'dzin pa med pa bsgom/ thun pa nan
155a2(rgyud 'grel): bas bya'o// de'i grogs gtor ma dang / mchod pa dang / bskor ba dang / maN+Dal dang / bstod pa dang / gzungs dang tshe tsha gdab pa la sogs pas bskangs te/ bskyed rim lam du bslang ba'o// rdzogs pa'i rim pa bsgom
155a3(rgyud 'grel): pA la don bzhi ste/ sna tshogs lam khyer dang / nyi ma lam khyer dang // na mkha' lam khyer ro// sna tshogs ni rgya che ste/ skar mA ltar snang ba sna tshogs 'di// gzung ba'i yul tshogs sdang gnyis la brten nas/ ngan song
155a4(rgyud 'grel): gi sdug bsngal myong bar byed pas/ de zil gyis mnan pa ni chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bur shes par bya'o// mya ngan 'das pa'i chos kying rmi lam lta bur shes par bya// de las ches lhag pa'i chos cig yod na'ang / sgyu
155a5(rgyud 'grel): ma lta bu rmi lam lta bur shes par bya'o// dngos por rlung rgyud pa'i zhen pa log ste/ rgyu mar shes pas gzung bas stong zhing 'dzin pas dben pa thabs lha'i rnal 'byor dang / shes rab stong pa de rgyu stong pa dbyer med
155a6(rgyud 'grel): pa lam yin par rgyal ba'i bka' los gsungs so// de bas na lha'i lus sgyu ma lta bu dang / ngag sngags 'brug sgra lta bu dang / sems tinge 'dzin gsal ba na mkha'i ngo bor 'das pa ni/ rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i lam dang
155b1(rgyud 'grel): po'o// lam gnyis pa nyi ma ni/ lus kyi sgrol ma bsgom ste/ 'byung ba rim par brtsegs la sgo gnyis bcung la// bdag po nang du bsdang la/ khang pa dbus mar me sgron btang la gdugs kyi 'od phabra la/ lam
155b2(rgyud 'grel): po che nas 'thon te/ yul bzhi ru gnas la/ phyi rol thams cad la mi sprad par byas lnga/ mar me rlung gis bskyod par byas la/ rAng gi dgos pa nor bu rin po che de la rkun mos mi khyer ba'i mel tshe la brtson
155b3(rgyud 'grel): par byas la// dbul 'phongs par mi 'gyuraro// gsum pa thabs khyad par can gyi lom gyis// sangs rgyas myur du thob par bya ba ni/ mi'i bu mo shes rab sgrol ma bstan la bya ste/ dbang po 'bring po rtog pa zil
155b4(rgyud 'grel): gyis mnan pa ni/ tshad dang ldan pa'i bu mo dang / dam tshig tu ldan pa gsang spyod kyi rten dang // 'ba' yul los suM rlung ba'i pho nyas/ steng 'ogo las thams cad bya ste/ kun rdzob byang chub kyi sems skye chu bzhin phra ba
155b5(rgyud 'grel): nas don dam dang gnyisu med pa'i sems rdzing bzhin du bskyil la/ phyi nang gzung 'dzin sna tshogs thams cad skad cig ma ye shes kyi 'ong du bsdus nas/ bde bo chen por bsgom/ sgo lnga yul thams cad bzhi ru
155b6(rgyud 'grel): bsdus la de yang gcig gi ngo bor gsal ba thur dang thun mtshams su bcad la bsgom mo// dbang po rab kyi dbang du byas na/ nam mkha' lam khyer bsgom par bya ste/ rten med lam du 'jug pa ni/ nam mkha' rnam
156a1(rgyud 'grel): pa gsum ste/ rlung gi na mkha' dang / phyi'i na mkha' dang / bar snang gi namakha'o// nang gI na mkha' la gnyis te/ shes par bya ba la gsum dang / bzhug par bya ba la gsum mo//
156a2(rgyud 'grel): shes par bya ba gsum ni/ phyi nang bcud kyis bsdus pa'i chos thams cad rang gi sems su shes par bya ba dang / sems nyid spros pa nye bar zhi ba dang / de bde tshon zung 'jug 'od gsal ba'o// bzhag par bya ba gsum
156a3(rgyud 'grel): ninang zab mo'i gdan tshi gos gsum ste/ bla mi dam pa'i gdams ngag gis thog ma par gsum dbyibs dang kha dog dros gzung rten btsal ba la sogs pa dang / zab mo dbang gi dus dang / snang stong dbyer med kyi
156a4(rgyud 'grel): mtshams ni gnyug ma'i sgrol ma ste/ 'khor ba las sgrol ba'i sgrol ma'o// phyi'i na mkha' la bzhi ste/ dpe don la bsre ba dang / dron dpe la bstim pa dang / de gnyis dbyer med du gnas la gnas pa dang /
156a5(rgyud 'grel): nyid gsum gcig tu go bar bya ba'o// bar snang gi na mkha' la drug ste/ bemos po'i sna rtse dang / 'od kyi sna rtse dang / dran pa'i sna rtse dang / dus kyi sna rtse dang / dbyibs kyi sna rtse dang / myong ba'i sna rtse dang / thun
156a6(rgyud 'grel): du bcad la bsgom pa'o// de dag la 'bad pas bskyed pa'i rim pa brtan zhing zhal mthong ba dang / snang rtags thams cad sgyu mar myong ba dang / ngo bo ma skyes pa'i chos la mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob nis/ mthong ba
156b1(rgyud 'grel): ngag nas sa dang lam la 'jug ste/ mthar phyin par 'gyur ro// da ni gsum pa las kyi tshogs kyi sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pas/ 'gro ba ma dang pa dad par bya ba dang / dad pa phyir mi ldog par bya ba
156b2(rgyud 'grel): dang / skye bo ngan pa bstan pa lnga sdang ba tshwar bcad par bya ba'i phyir/ phan gdags dang tshar bcad par bya ste/ rgyal ba'i bka' dang bla ma'i gung mas ngag gi rje su 'brang ste/ snod dang mi mtshungs pa rnams
156b3(rgyud 'grel): bstan po na rang ngan song du 'gro ste/ sngon gyi paN+Di ta rnams song ba'i gtam rgyud las shes par bya'o// mtshams med pa byed pa'i skye bo bu ma dang chos kyi bar chad byed pa de/ kha sbyor dbye bar 'dod na/ bdag rje
156b4(rgyud 'grel): btsun ma'i bsgreng rims brtan pa dang / thugs ka'i 'khor lo 'bum tshe drug 'thon pas des shes rab ngos ni dus kyi gning dang sbyar ba ste/ rje btsun ma 'byung ba lnga'i lha mo des yang mo lha gtam gyi ngo byor rgyu
156b5(rgyud 'grel): bA rI/ khro mo tshun mo dbyings kyi 'od kyis gri gug gis snying nas dAl/ sngags la che ge mo a lu ka mA ra/ zhes pa ni gnyis zhes bya'o// bkug ste ka pU lAr bcug ste/ ral gris gtub sA la/ kho'i srog rlung
156b6(rgyud 'grel): gi don snying lnga srog pa rtso nas drangs nas/ khro mo'i zhal du gsol te/ sha zos khrag rngubs rus pa 'ches/ shes pa rlung la bstims pa ste/ lha mo'i thugs na mkha' stong par phyal gyis gtang ste/ nam
157a1(rgyud 'grel): phyed na/ brgya 'am stong du bya/ nyin phyed dang / tho rangs su byas na/ bsgrub bya lus sems kha sbyar phyed par 'gyur ro// da ni 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga ste bza' ba dang btung ba dang / dri zhim
157a2(rgyud 'grel): pa dang gos dang / yul dang mi yid du 'ong ba dang / dgra dang thams cad dbang du rang ji lta bar bsgrub pa nI/ yid bzhin nor rnyed pa lta bu ste/ rnal 'byor pa chos kyi bar chad 'tsho bas mi 'byung ba ni/ sngar bstan pa lta bu
157a3(rgyud 'grel): thugs ka nas nyi zla'i steng na 'od zer lde'i 'khor lo gnas pa las/ 'od zer lnga 'phro ste rang gar 'dod pa'i rang gi ka pA la dum bu gcig pa mdzes shing rgya che ba'i nang du 'ongs par bsams te/ thams cad rang gi
157a4(rgyud 'grel): sid+d+hi hUM zhes 'ongs par bsams pa tsam gyis// rgyal po'i bsod nams tsam yang 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de bas na yid du 'ong ba thams cad la zhes pa'o// de gang gis 'grub na lha gsal ba dang / ngag
157a5(rgyud 'grel): brtan pas ste bzlas pas 'grub pa dang / dus kyi gnad la dal so nus pa nges so// da ni rnal 'byor pa 'jigs pa chen po brgyad dang / mi rgod ma rungs pa bcing zhing bzlog par bya ste/ dben par bag
157a6(rgyud 'grel): yongasu rgyu ba ni/ bdag gang yang rung ba'i lam du rgyu ba'i dus su/ gom pa 'bor khar rje btsun sgrol ma yang la dran par wal gyis bya ba dang / g.yas pa'i rogs po spangs la/ de ma yin pa'i rogs

157b3(rgyud 'grel): bdun nam nyi shu rtsa gcig brjod // mdud pa dmar po bcings la sngags a mu kaM pA shaM ma nA yau swA hA/ de rnams ris 'jog ma yin par dus gcig tu bya ba'i man ngag go/ 'jigs pa thar nas mdud pa ma dkrol na

157b5(rgyud 'grel): gcig nas gzung na/ tsan tra rus pa'i bar du sgrub par bya ste/ zhag lngar chu gtsang la sngags btab te/ tho rangs dus kyi gnAd l-i sbyar ste btung ngo // de nas zhag lngar dkar gsum la btags te dus gsum du btung ngo //
157b6(rgyud 'grel): de nas zhag lngar skyur rtsi gzhan gyis ma 'bags pi la sngags btab la btung ste/ de'i sngags ni 'di'o// oM prad+d+hi puSh+TiM puSh+TiM ku ru swA hA/ zhes mthar rten gyis bzlas te/ tho rangs 'thungs na 'grub po// nA ma re rAsh+lo ka
158a1(rgyud 'grel): sum stong zin no// gal te ma grub na yon tan la sogs pa ste/ sngar bstan pa ltar bsnyen pa grub nas/ rang ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du 'dod pa bzhin du 'drod pa thams cad bsgrubs nas/
158a2(rgyud 'grel): rten lha mo byin brlabs ldan pa la/ g.yon pa'i sa dang / me'i dus su mchod pa dang / gtor mas mnyes par byas la/ bstod pa dang gsol ba btab ste/ sngags kyi mtha' rten/ de ma ta re e kaM dza Ti ma ni sad+d+hi hUM zhes pas 'grub
158a3(rgyud 'grel): po chu shel gyi sbyor ba bzhin no// gzhan yang 'gro bu thams cad dbang du bsdu bar 'dod na/ sngags 'di mthar brten bya ste/ na mo b+ha ga wa te/ uSh+NI Sha sa d+hA re d+ha ra na tri yai swA hA/ ga wa~M la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bsngags nas dpral bar
158a4(rgyud 'grel): thig le byas na/ gang la lngas pa de dga' bar 'gyuraro// mig rdzas la l-in brgya rtsa brgyad bsdigs te/ mig la bkug ni gang 'phred pa de dga' bar 'gyur// chu khyor gang laM sngags lan bdun bzlas te/ 'thungs na mra slang bar zas
158a5(rgyud 'grel): rnyed par 'gyuraro// tshogs kyi nang du 'gro na/ rang gi gos kyi mtha' ma nas/ log pa g.yon pas bzung la nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlasna te phyin na tshig btsan zhing bden par 'gyuraro// shags 'debs na lan thebs shing mi 'da' bar

158b4(rgyud 'grel): bca' dang bla ma gus sngon la// zhus pa rin chen lte bu 'di// sgrol ma'i zhabs l-i gtugs par smon// / @// rgya gar skad du/ se dan+ta shrI yaM yo gnirma sh+lo shA na

161a5(rgyud 'grel): rtogs dka' thabs mang rgya mtsho las// mchog gyur mgon pos gsungs pa'i don// bla ma'i gsung las blangs pa brjod// 'di na gang dag nyon mongs spong ba nyon mongs 'gyur// ji ltar bkres pas kha zas da //

162b1(rgyud 'grel): mos cung zad drung pa dang // ma mchu so yi btsir bar bya// mig ni rab tu bsgyur bya zhing // lce yang lce yis bskyod par bya// mgrin pAr+ra da ros dgang ba dang // gshub pa 'am yang na gsal po ru// chags pa'i tshig gis sbyor

163a6(rgyud 'grel): glang po'i sna yi sbyor ba ni// lag pa glang po'i sna lto bu// sna lnga sbyar bar byas pa yis// de ru sems 'gag the tshom meng // spu yi rtsa ba brdungs pa ni// lcags kyi snod du yun rings btsos// rtsigs ma phung kau ra //
