163b2(rgyud 'grel): brla sbyar// 'di ni bcud len mchog tu bshad// thig lde 'dzin pa nyid yin no// bya yi brun dang mi khyi yi// rus pa bzhibs pa'i lde gu yis// rdo rje rtag par bsgo byed pa'i// sa bon 'byung bar mi 'gyuraro// khyim bya'i tshol
163b3(rgyud 'grel): bu til mar dang // byi'u ye sha rnams yang dag sbyar// de yis pad+ma la bskus na// tsho ba'ang zum nas thig le 'dzin// ldum gyi rtsa ba brlanges pa yis// pad+mar bskus na de 'dzin to// sa bon mi 'byung thabs kyi mchog/ khyad
163b4(rgyud 'grel): pAr rdzas kyi sbyor ba'o// sna tshogs thabs la ma rmongs pas// nan tan byas te bzung ba de// myur du 'bad pas lus drag dang // sems kyi rtsal gyis bzlogs par bya// lus kyis rtsal gyis lto ba brdebs// de tshe ngag stobs
163b5(rgyud 'grel): yaM ge hUM/ lam yig phreng bar rgyud mar ni// drangs pa bsams pa sems kyi stobs// minyam gnas bskyod pa'i sbyor ba ni// dgu po lus stobs dz+dza yig gi/ nga ro drag pos mgrin pa dgang // ma yig phreng d+ha sams
163b6(rgyud 'grel): kyi rtsal// snying gnas lus stobs smrig pa dang // ngag gi 'dren pa yi ge A// pi yig phreng bar bsams pa yi ni// gsung gi dbang phyug gnas su drang // lus kyi rtsal gyis mgrin par dgug/ ngag ni oM yig
164a1(rgyud 'grel): 'dod la brtson// taM yig phreng bar bsams pa yis// phyag rgya chen po'i gnas su drang // sgo dgu dgag pa'i sbyor ba yis// rlung dang de bsras rtsa mig dgang // sdigs mdzub 'phen pa'i
164a2(rgyud 'grel): rtsal gyis kyang // yang dang yang du spro bar bya// de ltar sbyor ba de dag gis// spu yi khung bu'i gnas yang // bde ba'i yang shes g.yos gyur te// kun rtog rdul dang bral bar 'gyur// de nas rnal 'byor mkhas pa yI/
164a3(rgyud 'grel): d+hU tI dkar po stong pa ru// snying gi lom nas sems bcug pas/ sna tshogs rtog pa nub par bsgom// d+hU tI'i nang du rang gi sems// thig le'i gzugs kyis gnas pa ni// thur du phab ste ner bu yi// nang du yang
164a4(rgyud 'grel): dge gnas par bsgom// thams cad stong pa bde ba che// brjod med ring bzhin shes dka' zhing // rnam rta gaM rba rlabs nyar zhi ba// gsal ba'i ro ldan nyamasu myong // ba spu gyen du log pa dang // lus ni drug tu 'bar
164a5(rgyud 'grel): ba dang // 'dad dang gA.o 'gyur mchi ma 'dzag/ rdul bar 'gyur ba de dag rtags// yang na rtag par brgod pa dang // ngu ba'am brgyal zhing 'gyel bar 'gyur// rog pa la sogs rkyen ngag lnga// bde ba bzod dka' skye
164a6(rgyud 'grel): bar 'gyur// rtog med nyam de rnam par spangs// dga' ba rgyas shing ngo tsha mang // klu len sgra 'byin 'dor pa'i sems// rang 'byung bde ba'i ros myos rtags// de ltar yang dag goms pa las// snang ba yis chen
164b1(rgyud 'grel): por 'char// phyag rgya ma la bltos med par// sgrib bral bde ba rgyas par 'gyur// bzang ngan bdag dpa gzhan la sogs// yod dang med pa'i sbyor nyid dang // 'dir ni skyon dang yon tan skyegs// bde ba che lnga mi mnyam med
164b2(rgyud 'grel): bstod grags rnyed ldan bder gyur pa// 'dir ni smad cing ma grags dang // dbul po sdug 'phongs gang gyur pa// bye brag med pa rtogs pa'i gdengos// mdor na gang tshe rnal 'byor pas// rtsol dang mi stsol nyer zhi zhing //
164b3(rgyud 'grel): blang dor med par gang spyod pa// byang chub spyod pa rlabs chen po// da ltar ma nyid bde ba che// mtha' bral rgyun mi 'chad pa i// nyam su myong ba ma bstan par// skya 'phrul phyag rgya bzang mo brten// mi mo mtshan nyid rab ldan zhing //
164b4(rgyud 'grel): rigs kyi dbye bas phyung po ni// rgyud las gsungs bzhin rnal 'byor pas// kha dog mtshan ma kun shes bya// 'gro tshegs chags sogs nyon mongs dang // sdug bsnol gdung ba bsil byed pa// rnal 'byor mchog gi rgyu
164b5(rgyud 'grel): rnams las// rgyal pos gcig tu bka' stsal pa'o// dam pa'i mon ngag la brten te// gsang chen theg pa'i lam gyi tshul// yang dag sbyar ba byas pa las// 'jig rten 'khor ba nub paro shog/ paN+Di to chen po don yod
164b6(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa/ rjes chags kyi sbyor bas de kho na'i rnal 'byor la 'jug pa'i man ngag ces bya ba rdzogs so// / @rgya gar skad du/ karma mu dra pa ri k+Sha u
165a1(rgyud 'grel): de shA nA ma/ bod skad du/ las kyi phyag rgya brtag pa'i man ngag ces bya ba/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tsha lo// mA mo drung gI rnam bkrod dang // ba lang pad+mo'i rigs las
165a2(rgyud 'grel): byung / dbye ba saM n+du rtsa gnyis las// bla ma rnam par spang bar bya// de dag so so'i spyod pa dang // kha dog dbyibasngo dang mtshan ma dang // ngang tshul rnams las so so yi// rigs kyi mtshan nyid shes par bya// sir zhing dmar ba'i/
165a3(rgyud 'grel): bud med gong // tshig snyan rtag par spyod lam mkhas// skad gdangs mthon pos smra byed cing // tsog tsog paur ni 'dug la dgra'// lta ba zur gyis gsal por 'dzin// tshig kyang zur gyis nges rtogs pa'i// bud med blo
165a4(rgyud 'grel): mchog de lta bu// rtag par dngos grub rnams kyi rgyu// ser zhing dkar ba'i bud med gong // lus ni dgye min+da sgyu bo min// byin du yan ldeg thams cang legs// khyad par du yang smin phrag mdzes// bzhin 'phel chung
165a5(rgyud 'grel): zhing rngom chung lnga// os ko'i dbyibs ni chung dgye yi// mdza' bo rtag tu bsdug gyur pa// dbang phyug mi mo gnyis pa yin// bud gang ser ba'i mdog ldan zhing // rtag par de'i mig po mche// bya byed mang zhing 'gro 'dug dga'//
165a6(rgyud 'grel): nam yang de yi tshig mi brtan// dbang po rno zhing brjed ngas chung // yid du 'ong ba'i skyes bu la// lha brtson byed kyang chang mi btsan// mi mo rten bya min par gsungs// yid 'ong sngo bsangs kha dog can// mig dkyus ring zhing/
165b1(rgyud 'grel): de rab mdzes// byad kyis bzangs ring mchu skur rtse// basbyin dang rkang lag ri mo myang // rdul zhing dag spyan+ta mnyan des che// chos sam 'jig rten mthun 'jug gis// 'dris pa rnams la gzhung bzung zhing // bkru shis
165b2(rgyud 'grel): yan lag mi mo mchog/ bud med ut+pal+le mdog 'dra zhing // lus gzar 'dril zhing sen mo zlum// mig yangs dkar zhing yid du 'ong // skra mnyen skya ba nyung ba'i bdag/ skyes bu rnams la gus byed cing // brtsom pa
165b3(rgyud 'grel): mthar phyin byed la brtson// khong yangs ston la mkhas gyur pa// bsten na dngos grub 'phel bar 'gyur// byin du mdog gnag dpral ba ser// mtshams mtha' dma' zhing rdzi ma 'thug/ bong thung yan lag rtsub pa dang /
165b4(rgyud 'grel): mig mi sdug cing smra ba mang // 'dun kha yang zhing chags la dga'// gang la skyes bu bzang ngam med// dri dang mi bzod par ldan pa'i// bud med bsten pa nyams par 'gyur// bud gang bzangs 'od rab mdzes shing /
165b5(rgyud 'grel): gang gi mgul ba yan lag ring // thung du rnying po mya yin zhing // smin+d+ra ma phra zhing smin+da phrag yangs// khyod dal rtag par spyod lam gtsigs// rna ba bzung dang rab ldan zhing // so thags mnyam pa'i bud med ni// rtag tu
165b6(rgyud 'grel): yon tan ring mi 'gro/ dmar ba'i zangs kyis mtshon pa yi// bzhin bzangs sdom zhing cung zad sbom// drang zhing lus khyim legs pa dang // shin tu brla dang ro spang rgyas// rang don nyams pa rnam par spang // bsu
166a1(rgyud 'grel): ba'i mi nus khong shes che// sgra dang ba spu ring ldan pa'i// bu mo ljongs spyod sa zhig yin// mdog dmar spyod lam chos la dga'// mtho dmun tshig drang spyod lam can// rtag par sgyu la
166a2(rgyud 'grel): dga' byed cing // phyin ci log tu ston par byed// brnab sems rtag tu sten byed cing // gtong dang mi ldan 'jungs pa dang // chags dang sdong ba mang ba yis// bud med skyon gyis dri ma can// dmar zhing dkar ba'i bud med
166a3(rgyud 'grel): gang / sdom zhing phra ba'i skabs dang ldan// nu ma brla dang ro smang rgyas// ske dang sked pa sor mo ring // so dang sen mo mnyam ldan zhing // tshig zlum byin pa bags kyi phra// lte ba'i 'og phyogs drang ldan pa'i// ba spu'i phreng ba
166a4(rgyud 'grel): gyen du langs// lte khung zab cing pad dbyibs 'dra// skye gnas mtho zhing bu ga rub// dal gyis mig ni rdob byed pa'i// me mo dbang phyug drang la gyi gzhi// bud gang kun da ltar dkar zhing // rus pa rigs shing lus stobs can//
166a5(rgyud 'grel): rtag par mngal du bu pho 'chags// spyod lam dral zhing mdzes dang ldan// 'jig rten bya ba 'jug mkhas shing // phrad par dka' zhing bral dka' ba'i// bu mo gsang thub blo gros can// sngags pa rnams kyis smad mi bya//
166a6(rgyud 'grel): bud gang dkar zhing dregs dang ldan// de ni ngo bzhin skyon med kyang // skyes bu rnams kyi spong bar 'gyur// phra zhing mig ni bsgyur la dga'// rkang rags rked pa sbom pa dang // byang sogs 'chos shing byi dor brtson// rgod cing
166b1(rgyud 'grel): bslu bar sla ba yi// bu mo bsten par ma gsungs so// rigs rnams las ni thams cad la// bsten dang bsten min shes byas nas// yon tan ldan pa'i skye gnas su// mkhas pa rnams kyis badre ba btsal// de rnyed gyur nas
166b2(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor pras// bun long g.yeng ba kun spangs nas// kun stong rab tu zhu mnyam pa// man ngag can gyis rtag tu bsamau// 'jig rten kun nas khyab gnas pa'i// ji snyed mi mor 'gyur ba yi// b+ha ga rtsa yi khyad par gyis
166b3(rgyud 'grel): bcu phyed du ni rnam par grags// rlugs mA dung dang kha gAdong dang // za byed gdong dang pad+mo can// grang zhig pad+ma'i rtsa sbubs ni// shin tu yangs ma rlugs mar brjod// rtsa sngags 'bros shing dog pa yis// zug rngu skye
166b4(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur dung can ma// bud med glang gi pad+ma'i nang // rtsub cing tshwa ba kha gdong can// bde ba yod dang med pa'i bdag/ rtsa sbubs zha bo za byed gdong // b+ha ga pad+mo ltar sdud cing // padad+ma snal ltar phra pad+mo can// de ltar pad+ma'i
166b5(rgyud 'grel): khyad par las// b+ha ga rab 'bring tha mar 'gyur// pad+mo can mchog rlugs ma dang // dung can ma ni bar ma'o// za byed gdong drang khA da'i gdong // skyon rnams spangs par dka' ba'i phyir// b+ha ga rnams las tha mar 'gyur/
166b6(rgyud 'grel): tha ma smad pas mi blang ngo // b+ha ga'i nang na gnas pa yi// rtsa yang rab 'bring gsum du gyur// rab tu shin tu pra ba'i rtsa// ring po 'bring du gsungs pa yin// de ltar rigs dang b+h+r-i ga dang // rtse rnams rab 'bring the ma
167a1(rgyud 'grel): las// rab dang 'bring po'ang bsten bya zhing // tha ma rtag tu spang bar bya// tha ma rnams kyis lus zungs nyams// de nyams bde ba nyams par 'gyur// de yis ting 'dzin mchog las nyam//
167a2(rgyud 'grel): de phyir mkhas pas smad pa yin// rnal 'byor ma yi rgyud chen las// rigs kyi dbye ba rgyas pa dang // mtshon ma la sogs gsungs pa las// 'dir na man ngag bsdus pa yin// las kyi phyag rgya brtags pa'i man ngag
167a3(rgyud 'grel): ces bya ba/ paN+Di ta a mo g+ha badz+ra las byung ba rdzogs so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po de nyid dang / bod kyi lo tsa ba mgos lngas btsas kyis bsgyur ba'o//
167a4(rgyud 'grel): rgyu gar skad du/ d+harma a b+hi She ka margas hU~M/ bod skad du/ dbang chos rten 'brel 'gro ldog/ drangu la rdo rje mkha' 'gro mya rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// bla ma mkha' 'gro rdo rje 'chang dbyer ming // gaR+Sha sgom gnad kyi yul byer
167a5(rgyud 'grel): 'dud// bla med rgyud rnams bcud bsdus pa'i// dbang chos rim pa bshad par bya// dbang bzhi'i gdams pa zab mo yis// rang gzhan lhan cig skyes pa des// gzhan rnams dbong du sdud pa yi// srog sngags thob mo
167a6(rgyud 'grel): 'di nyid la// dbang bzhi'i gdams pa med pa yis// rnam rtog dbang du rnam rtog song // rang nyid gzhan gyi dbang du 'gro/ rang srog gcod pa'i ste re yin// dbang po gcig dang tshe gcig la// gang zag bzhi dang rigs can bzhi// /
167b1(rgyud 'grel): mchog dbang bzhi yis the tshom med// dug gsum lam dang rnam rtog lam// mchog thun dngos grub gang bsgrub pa// bsnyen sogs bzhi bcu gnang bces// rang rkyen dag las gzhan rkyen 'byung // ltas gcig rtags
167b2(rgyud 'grel): bzhin shes byas la// bsgrub dang ldog gzhag gdams ngag ces// bla ma sangs rgyas dbyer med mchog/ gar bsgom rigs lnga'i sker ldog sogs// mchog thun gnyis kyis bye brag gis// ting 'dzin lnga
167b3(rgyud 'grel): ldan gdamasasr-i pa gces// gzhan yang ting 'dzin du ma las// 'jug par byed pa ma shis na// mchog dang thun mong de la med// de bas gnad kyis gdams pa gces// lus ngag yid gsum rten 'brel
167b4(rgyud 'grel): kyang // ye shes gcig gis 'gro ldog nges// dang gus bdagra gzhan 'gro ldog nges// cig la gcig rten mtshungs ldan 'gro// 'phrin lasa? bzhi dang bsdu ba bzhi// rigs lnga ye shes lnga la sogs// stan
167b5(rgyud 'grel): thog gcig tu sgom pa gces// bzhi pa phyag rgya chen po gces// khyad par ting 'dzin lnga ldan gces// mi 'gyur bla ma gdams pa gces// 'khrul 'khor nyes nang dgra gdon 'byung // zhi dang dngos
167b6(rgyud 'grel): grub 'byung ba la// lus rtsa ngag rlung sems thig le// dbyer med lhon cig skyes pa yi// dbang bzhi dag las skyes pa'i bu// gegs sel bogs don dag tu 'gyur// phyag rgya nyer gnas phye 'khor sogs// lus
168a1(rgyud 'grel): ngag yid sogs 'dra mthun dang // kha dog dbyibs sogs rgyad sde bzhin// gang la gang shis rten 'brel gnad // rnal 'byor blo sems mthun pas 'grub// ci bsams 'grub

168a3(rgyud 'grel): dang sgyu rtsal shes// 'khrul 'khor gnad dang yon tan sogs// tha mal spangs pa gnad du gces// bla med snod rung smod byas nas// nyon mongs rang dbang lam dang 'dres// srid sel rigs rgyud sbrel zhes bya// bzhi
168a4(rgyud 'grel): ldan gind dang mthun pAs bsgyur// mthu duman skyon yom bzang ngan sogs// mdun pa'i sems kyi bsgyur bar bya// spros bcus spros meng shin tu spros med dang // phyogs las rnal 'byo don gyi spyod pa bya//
168a5(rgyud 'grel): phyi nang gsang ba de nyid rig ma yin// bstan thabs dus tshod gnas skabs 'dod yon dang // khyad par ro drug rig ma gnad kyis bcang // 'bras bu bzhi dang dbyer med phyag rgya'i gnang // la lnga nyon mongs 'bur

168b1(rgyud 'grel): bzhi dang sdom pa bzhi// dam bca' bzhi bcas mchog dbang bskur// phyogs bcu'i dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma// 'dus na dza lan+d+ha rar thim// pad+ma bzhi lnga thig le ba ni// bde ba bcu drug skyes par 'gyur// rang snang ye
168b2(rgyud 'grel): shes gzugs can gyis// pad+ma lte ba'i dbus na gnas// nor bu'i rtse mor gnas pa'i tshe// mir mo lta bur mya ngan 'das// phyag rgya bzhi dang sku bzhir bstan// sangs rgyas rnams ni chos sku yin// gsing sngags
168b3(rgyud 'grel): tshul chen theg pa 'dir// bla mi bzang pos bzung ba rnams// zla ba drug la sogs pas ni// 'grub pas su zhig 'dir mi 'jug/ rnon 'brel rdo rje'i tshig drug 'di// ma byung 'byung bar mi 'gyur// tshig don 'brel bI/

168b5(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs so// rgya gar gyi b+h+ra m+bA te phu ba dang bod kyi lo tsa ba rma ban chos 'bar gyis bsgyur ba'o// rgya gar
168b6(rgyud 'grel): spyad du/ pro d+hA tsiSh+Tha ma hA su kha A na ya/ bod skad du/ byang chub kyi sems bde ba'i man ngag/ bde ba chen po byang chub kyi sems la phyag 'tshalo// gsang rgyud mtha' dag las man ngag gang ba'i don// byang chub
169a1(rgyud 'grel): kyi sems 'da' ka ma'i man rAg 'dri ltar lags te/ 'chi 'pho dus su 'di ltar ro// da ltar bdag gi lus khyab par gnas pa'i sems 'di ni/ khubs kyis 'dus nas/ snying
169a2(rgyud 'grel): ga'i dkyil nA 'od mtshon gang ba cig gnas so// yi ge shen pas 'od du mi blta ste/ hUM yung 'bru tsam zhig lhang nger gnas so// de nas tshor bA dang bral drod shorA te// 'jig rten pa'i spyod yul dang bra'o// de tsAm na 'od
169a3(rgyud 'grel): mthing kha de snying gi dkyil nas// byang chub kyi sems kyi gsang ba'i lamA// g.yas kyi srog rtsi dar da kAr gyi skud pa 'dra ba'i nang nas yar yengs kyis byung ste// spyi bo gtsug tu byung // ril gyis dril nas// lhang gis shar
169a4(rgyud 'grel): tsam na// de nas yar 'dom gang tsam gyi tshad nas rnam par dag pa chos kyi pho brang // rang bzhin lhun gyis grub pa'i gnas na// dpal kun tu bzang po bzhugs te/ rang gos khyab gdal pa dang bzhin lhang nge bar te/ sku la

169a6(rgyud 'grel): 'dres pa'i tshul du// kun tu bzang po dang gnyis gcig tu lhang ngo // gnas par gyur to// de ltar chos kyi dbyings kyis gar khyab par/ kun tu bzang pos khyab/ kun tu bzang pos gar khyadab par bdag gi
169b1(rgyud 'grel): sems kyis khyab ste// gzung 'dzin gyi rnam rtog dang bral nas/ chos kyi sku thob ste/ skyid pa chen po g.yu drung gi gnas su khyab gdal lhung de bar gan so// de'i ngang las ma 'gyur lhang te gnas pa ni// rdzogs pa chen po'i
169b2(rgyud 'grel): lta ba mur thug pa'o// de'i ngang lus sa la gnas pa ni// rdzogs pa chen po'o sgom pa mthar phyin pa'o// de'i ngang las yud tsam/ bar mi 'da' ba ni/ rdzogs pa chen po'i dam tshig mthar phyin pa'o// de lta bu yi

169b5(rgyud 'grel): mAn dge bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa 'jam dpal la phyag 'tshalo// bcom ldan stug pa bkod pa nyid du don dram thugs chud cing // dga' ldan skye bo'i don mdzad phyira'aM nI nr-i dam pA tog dkar gyur// de nas 'dir
169b6(rgyud 'grel): ni 'gro ba'i don du shAkya'i tog gyur gang // 'chi bdag las rgyal sgyu ma kun sngon de ni rgyal gyur cig/ rga dang 'chi ba med pa brnyas// rga shi med par mdzad pa las// rga shi med pa thob pa'i phyir// rdzogs sangs
170a1(rgyud 'grel): rgyas la gus par 'dud// blo dman rnams kyis rtogs dka' zhing // gla yo ba'i sems la dga' ba yi// 'chi bdag bru ba 'chi ltas bcas// bstan bcos dang 'brel bshad par bya//
170a2(rgyud 'grel): bdag rnam kun b+hA ba ni// grol ba nyid la rigs pa yin// ma grol bA ni thams cad kyi// cung zad dus su bsrings pa yin// tshe dang dbang po rnams dang sems// 'gag pa 'chi ba'i mtshan nyid yin// thabs kyi sa yun ring
170a3(rgyud 'grel): 'tsho ba ni// 'chi ba bru ba zhes bshad do// chos spyod dbang po thul ba ni// 'khor ba ru ni ji srid 'tsho// ngo srid bsod nams la sogs tshogs// byang chub sgrub byed rab tu skye// 'khor bar srog las gces pa ni// tsa yang
170a4(rgyud 'grel): yod par ma mthong ste// de bas myur du thabs mang pos// 'tsho ba bru ba kun du spyad// gang phyir rigs par thabs sbyar ba// dka' ba cung zad yod ma yin// nor bu sngags dang sman rnas kyi// mthu ni thams cad 'dod pa yin/
170a5(rgyud 'grel): 'chi ba'i mtshan nyid las ring nas// shes par byas nas rigs pa ga tso// s+t+rI bIr thog ni 'bab pa la// rab tu mkhas kyang ci byar yod// phyi dang nang gi dbye b+ha yi// 'chi ba'i mtshan nyid rnam pa gnyis// gang gi 'chi bar
170a6(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur ba ni// shes 'gyur brtson pas de shes bya// gal te 'ga' zhig 'chi bo yi// mtshan nyid shes par 'dod gyur na// dor ni bder gonas lus las ni// shes bya gzhan du yid gnyis 'gyur// khams mi snyoms
170b1(rgyud 'grel): dang 'dod chags dang // rab rib la sogs dbang gyur dang // 'jigs dang mya ngan sogs pa'i rgyus// gang phyir gzhan du so sor snang // lha dang 'byung ba gnyi ga ni// 'khrugs par 'chi ba'i mtshan nyid gsum// 'thob las
170b2(rgyud 'grel): 'tsho ltas byung gyur pa'i// dbye ba de bas shes par bya// phyi dang nang gi dbri bya yis// lha 'khrugs pa ni gnyis su 'dod// de bzhin 'byung ba'i khrugs pa ni// rnam pa gnyi su brtag par bya// lha rnams kun 'khrugs las
170b3(rgyud 'grel): 'cha ba// lI las gyur pa yin par bya shang // lU 'khrugs pa lus su go sogs// thog+sa pakris la sogs mtshan nyid yin// 'byung ba 'khrugs pas 'chi ba ni// 'byung ba las gyur zhes bya ba shad// 'byung ba 'khrul
170b4(rgyud 'grel): pas mkhris sogs dang // me drung chu sogs 'tsho ba ya ni// gnyi ga 'khrug sna pas 'chi ba dang // gnyi ga las gyur pa zhes bshang // gnyis ka 'khrugs pas thog 'bab sogs// mkhris pa dang kan sogs
170b5(rgyud 'grel): gnod pa'o// 'chi ltas rnams ni mtha' yis phyir// gcig ca 'byung byar myi 'dod la// kun la'ang rim gyis ma yin gyi// 'on krung gcig sogs grang swaM gas so// gang du mtshan nyid mthong gyur kyang // la la
170b6(rgyud 'grel): 'chi bar mi 'gyur sdeng // 'khrul med de ni chos la sogs// gnod pa'i bar ched yin par brtag/ gang du mtshan nyid ma man / la'ar 'tsho ba snang gyur pa// der ni nges med par nges kyi// mtshan
171a1(rgyud 'grel): nyid med pa nyid ma yin// 'chi ba thag rnying nas nges byed// grags pa chen po nyid du 'gyur// ci nus par ni yongs su gtong drang // gso ba'i thabs la'ang 'jug par byed// rtag tu mnyam par
171a2(rgyud 'grel): gzhag gyur pas// der gtong rtse gcig yid du bya// dang po re zhig phyi yi ni// mtshan nyid nye bar brtag par bya// mtshan nyid kyis ni yongs nges pa'i// dus ni rnam pa gnyi su 'dod// de yang nges dang mo nges pa// zhes bya/
171a3(rgyud 'grel): 'bad de shes par bya// 'pho ba dang ni bco lnga sogs// nang par la sogs skad cig bdag/ dus ni dris pa zhes bshad de// go bzlog pa las ma nges pa'o// 'gram pa'i mtshams ni rab g.yo na// 'chi bar rab tu ston pa
171a4(rgyud 'grel): yin// rlung dang grong sogs phrad pa las// mtshan nyid 'di las gzhan du brtag/ dbyar zla 'bring po kar kwa'i khyim// dgun zla 'bring po chu srin 'dod// kurka Ta dang chu srin la'ang // 'chi ba'i mtshan nyid 'byung ba
171a5(rgyud 'grel): yin// dbyer zla 'bring po 'pho ba'i zhag/ nyi ma phyed la rkang pa'i tshad// byang du bltas te gnas pa yi// grib mau rang gi rang bzhin yin// dgun zla 'bring po 'pho ba'i zhog/ de nyid rkang tshad bdun du 'gyur// sprin med
171a6(rgyud 'grel): nam mkha' nyid phyed na// grib ma dag ni brtag par bya// zla ba re re rkang re 'phel// zla ba re zhing rkang re 'grib// 'di las gzhan du 'gyur na ni// 'chi ba'i dogs pa rab tu bskyed// dbyar zla 'bring nas chu srin par// rkang pa
171b1(rgyud 'grel): re re 'phel ba yin// chu srin nas ni rkang pa'i bar// rkang pa re re 'grib par 'gyur// dbyar zla 'bring nas rims kyis 'phrul// de bzhin dgun zla 'bring rim 'grub// grib ma'o 'gyur ba mthong nas ni// zla ba gcig
171b2(rgyud 'grel): na 'chi bar nges// 'grib pa'i dus su 'phel ba dang // gal te 'phel pa'i dus su 'grib// dus de nyid nas brtsams nas ni// zla ba gcig ni 'chi bA ra nges// 'phel ba'i dus su rlob 'phel na// sna tshogs nad kyis
171b3(rgyud 'grel): gtses par 'gyur// 'grib pa'i du su 'ang rab 'gribs na// 'chi ba nyid du the tshom med// dbyer zla dgun zla 'bring gi mthar// dang po karka Ta dang nya'i// nyi ma drug drug gang yon 'dir// dus dang dus min nges par
171b4(rgyud 'grel): rtag/ dbyar zla 'bring sogs nyin zhag duswa// dbyar zla tha chung sogs bzang ngan// dkun zla 'bring po'i zhig lhag la'ang // dgun zla tha chungs sngogs bzang ngan// rkang mA thil dag tu phug snyam dang / ts+tsho tshos bdus d+ha rtsug N+DInag
171b5(rgyud 'grel): byi 'og tu ni// 'chi ba nyid du 'gyur ba yin// rkang pa dag ni mthil phug nas// gal te mig kyang phug snyam nu// de tshe zla ba gsum gyis ni// rjes la gshin rje'i khyim du 'gro// gal te rkang mthil gnyis
171b6(rgyud 'grel): phug nas// sna rtse'i bar du phug snyam na// de tshe nges par zhag gsum nas// gcig tu 'chi bar 'gyur ba yin// bshang dang gci ba'i dus dag tu// dus mtshungs sprad pa byung gyur na// dus ni de nyid nas
172a1(rgyud 'grel): bzung ste// de na lo gcig drag na 'chi// ltag khung dag tu phug snyam pa// lo ldan ni 'chi bar 'gyur// mig gis lce rtse ma mthong na// zhag gsum na ni 'chi bar 'gyur// sna rtse
172a2(rgyud 'grel): rgyun du 'bigs snyam na// zla ba bzhin 'chi bar 'gyur// mdzod spu'i gnas su phug snyam na// nges par 'phral du 'chi bar 'gyur// gang tshe g.yas dang g.yon par ni// dus mtshungs par ni zug 'gyur ba// de tshe zla ba gaN+DI

172b6(rgyud 'grel): de tshe zla ba phyed na 'chi// mgrin pa'i ngos gnyis rtse dag ni// chad pa dag kyang zla phyed na'o// gal te lce yi dbus na ni// ri mo nag po glo bur byung // so dag dam du 'thams pa ni// de tshe nyon zhag gnyis na 'tsho//
173a1(rgyud 'grel): rna ba'i 'khor nang rgyud kyi ni// rtswa ni chad par snang gyur na// nyin zhag de 'am yang na no// zhag ldan ni 'tsho bar 'gyur// sen mo'i kha dog dmar po dag/ 'phral du med pa
