355b6(rgyud 'grel): yod pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang bcas pa byon par bsam mo// de nas na mkha' la spyan drangs nas/ mdun du e'i dbusu sngags kyi sa bon dang b+h+yo la so sor thim pas sku phyag rgya bzhengs par bya'o// de la dgug pa
356a1(rgyud 'grel): dang gzhug pa dang bcings pa sngags 'dis bya'o// dri sh+ya dzaHhUM baM hoHsa ma ya s+t+waM sa ma yA s+t+waM zhes brjod nas// de nas gzugs la mngon du sku ston pa gcig bsgom mo// de ltar mI
356a2(rgyud 'grel): ston na/ oM hUM b+h+yo e a ra la li hrIHdzAHzhes brjod cing gzi ro// mngonA du mA byung no bdag gau sems la ci 'dod pa de ni khyod kyis bsgrub par gyisra shig ces bsgo'o// de yang las byed pa'i tshe rig sngags kyi dam tshig
356a3(rgyud 'grel): sbyin te/ dAm tshig kyang gur gum chu ldi sngags kyis btab la sbyin// dam tshig gi sngags 'di'o// oM ha na ha na badz+ra sa ma ya a d+hi kra ma nan hU~M phaT/ dam tshig gi chu sbyin nas bsgo ba/ lha mo khyod dam tshig 'di las 'das nas/
356a4(rgyud 'grel): bsgri ba bzhin du ma byas pa rab tu gzir ba chen po byed pa dang / dam tshig gi chu 'di yang ha la ha la chen por 'gyur te/ mthong bas khrag skyug pa dang / rdo rje chen pos dral te dus ma yin par 'chi bar 'gyur ba dang /
356a5(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi gsod pa la sogs par 'gyur ro// khro bo za byed chen por 'gyur ste/ rdo rje me 'barla bas dam chog nas thal byar byas te// so so rang gi rnam pa gsal ba bzhin du dmyal bya 'bod sgrogasu skyes par
356a6(rgyud 'grel): 'gyuraro// zhes dam tshig poro// de nas lha mo la mchong pa lnga dang gtor ma dbul// oM hUM shrI ya de bi kA li kA li ma hA kA li hUM b+h+yo/ oM badz+ra puSh+pa pu dza s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM phaT ces brjod do// me tog dbu'o// oM badz+ra d+hU pa pu dza/
356b1(rgyud 'grel): s+pha rA nA sa ma ye hUM ces brjod de/ bdug spyos shangs la dbu lo// oM badz+ra dI paM pu dza s+pha ra Na sa mA ye hUM zhes brjod/ mur me spyan la dbulo// oM badz+ra gna? d+he pU dza s+pha ra Na sa mu ye hUM zhes brjod de/ dri thugs kar dbulo// oM
356b2(rgyud 'grel): badz+rA nai wi t+ye pu dza sA ra NA sa mu yaM hU zhes brjod te/ lha ba no yai phyag tu dbulo// de nas ra reg po'i sha khrig dang / bya mo nag me'i sha khrag dang / gzhan gyi yang sha khrag smra tshogs gang 'byer pa dang / chang la sogs pa bzla
356b3(rgyud 'grel): sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i gtor ma dbul bar bya ste/ ma hA maM sau khA ha/ ma hA go ro tsaN+Da khA hi/ mahA tsit+ta khA hi/ ma hA ba su tra khA hi/ oM daM ba ling gr-i h+NA pa ya hUM phaT swA hA// zhes brjod gtor mi dbul bar bya'o// de ltar mchod
356b4(rgyud 'grel): pa rdzogs par phul nas bstod pa bya'o// glid+d+hi bu bud pa'am/ mi'i rkang bud pa 'am/ cang te'u 'am/ mi thod kyi rnga brdung zhing dbyangs snyan pos bstod pa bya ste/ oM dpal ldan nag me mo pham srid gsumo bdag/ rang don du
356b5(rgyud 'grel): cing rnam thar sgor gzhol kyang // snying rje'o dbang gi gzhon don rje swa thob cing // shes rab sna tshogs dag gis 'gro dron byed// lha mo sku mdog nag po char sprin mdog/ mtshan mo nag mo shin tu gtum pa'i gzugs sha/
356b6(rgyud 'grel): shin tu ring cing keng rus lus can ma// zhal gcig phyag bzhi zhabs gnyis brjid pa'i sku// ral pa gyen 'greng lan bu g.yon du 'khyil// skra rked sbrul dang thod pa'i phreng thod can// rna lhag me teg dar nag tsid phan can//
357a1(rgyud 'grel): khrag gis chang gis ra re spyan rtsa mar/ mi re rangs pa khar bcug mche ba bzhi/ rnam par gtsigs nas khrag lnga shin tu dgyes// snyan g.yas sbrul gyi mgul nas dril gsil zhing //
357a2(rgyud 'grel): gdug pa btul nas/ tshangs pa'i sgra sgrogs ma// skan cha g.yin ma seng+ge ral pa dmar// dpa' bo khams gsum seng+ge'i dgra spre ru shing // phyag bzhi gra yas kyis dang phyi ral gri 'dzin// 'og ma ban+d+ha rak+Sha dmar skyil 'dzin//
357a3(rgyud 'grel): g.yon gyi dang po shak+ti mtshon cha 'dzin// 'o ga ma tri shul mgul na dAr dpyangs 'dzin// shak+ti ral gri mtshon gyis bsad pa'i tshe// lha ma yin gyis mgo sogs do shul byas// glang po che yi kau rlon stong g.yog byas//
357a4(rgyud 'grel): smad ni ba lAng ko rlon drus pa la// phyed nI re lde ser po'i sham bus dkris// klu yi dbang po gzhebs pa'i rked chings can// zhabs gnyis lcags sgrogs ngag gis mdzes par brgyan// khrag zhag mang po'i tshom bus
357a5(rgyud 'grel): thig ler bris// byeng bu'i rmigs po glo gi shugs can ma/ kham+bas gsum skad cig tsam gyis bskor bar byed// skad ni dung dang 'brug gi sgra ltar sgrogs// mya me mkha 'gro sha za dbang du sdung // lho phyogs gshin rje'i
357a6(rgyud 'grel): pho brang gan su byon// dam pa'i sa nas gzugs sku gnyis gzigs ma// ting 'dzin dbang thob gzugaso khams gnasu byen// tshangs pa'i rgyal po la sogs phyag byas ma/ gzhan la dbang sgyur 'dong kham
357b1(rgyud 'grel): ya mthar byon// dbang phyug chen po'i sku la dgyes 'khril ma// sum cu rtsa gsum tshal bzhir byon pa'i tshe// lha rnams dbugs phyung brgya byin phyag byas ma// lA mra yAn rnams phung bar byas pa'i tshe// lha min dbang po kun gyis
357b2(rgyud 'grel): phyag byas mi// sku mchog ri rab che dang 'gran pa'i tshe// lte ba'i thod ki'i phyogs nas nyi zla 'o char// rgyal chen bzhi la sogs pas phyog byas mi// rgya mtsho'i gting nas me sbar mtsho skems nus// sa 'og dbang po kun gyi
357b3(rgyud 'grel): phyag byis ma// lha mo khyed kyis che 'phrul 'di snyan pas// bdud dang gshin rje'i rgyal po 'dar zhing 'dud// ma mo srin mo'i tshegs rnams rngam zhing rgod// tsi d+ha'i rin chen gur phub gzhal yas nas// nyi ma'i dkyil
357b4(rgyud 'grel): 'khor sogs pa'i 'od zer 'brar// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten dug gis bcud bsdus nas// nyi mu'i dkyil 'khor dag la thimA mdzad ma// dug gis rlangs pas nag po'i phyogs rnams kyi// bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi'i
357b5(rgyud 'grel): nad rnams slong mdzad ma// de phyir nad kyi bdug me dam la 'du// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten bdud rtsi'i bcud bsdus nas// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dag la thim mdzad ma// bdud rtsi'i rlangs pas dkar po'i phyogs
357b6(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyi// bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi'i nad kyi rtsad gcod ma// bdud rtsi sman gyi rgyal mo ngam la 'du// gang zhig khyod la dang ni ma bas byams// de phyir nad bdag ma gcig sman gyi gtso// bdud rtsi'i lha mo khyod la rtag tu bstod//
358a1(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa'i spyan snga ru// bdag gi ding nas 'khor ba ji srid bar// dka' bo'i phyogs kyi nang dang sdug bsngal sogs// zhi bar bya phyir tshe dang bsod nams spel// nag po'i
358a2(rgyud 'grel): phyogs ni bkug cing dbang du sdus// skyo 'bog bsad la sogs pa'i las 'di rnams// bstun pa bsrung phyir lus 'di bsgrub par gyis// 'di las 'gal n+ya rgyal ba'i sgo bslus pas// dus gsum rgyal ba'i rdo
358a3(rgyud 'grel): rjes mgo 'gas so// de skad rgyal ba'i sprin sngar ngam bcas pas// dam bcas bzhin du phrin las myur du mdzod// rnal 'byor bdag dang bdag gi 'khor bcas la// zhal nas bdud rtsi'i rgyun gyi char phab la
358a4(rgyud 'grel): nad sogs sdug bsngal tshogs rnams zhi bar mdzod// tshe dang dbang thang longs spyod rgyas par mdzod// zang zing lo tog 'bru yi phung po dang rin chen rkang 'gro phyugs rnams 'phel bar mdzod// bla ma smod cing dkon mchog dbu
358a5(rgyud 'grel): 'phang spyod// bdag gi dge ba'i bar chad byed pa rnams// che ge mo zhes bya ba'i los ngan 'di// khyod kyi khong nas dug gi rlung bus la// 'du ba rnam bzhi'i nad rnams khong nas slong ka/ bag gzhi sa le lhung la rdebasu chug/ don snod
358a6(rgyud 'grel): lnga po khong khrag skyug du chug/ las ngan 'khor bcas brang chen rdung du tshug/ smre sngags cho nge gnom du 'bong du chug/ 'chi bdag gsang skyo 'bog pas gsad par mdzod// gcan zan mkha' lding la sogs ltos ngan phog//
358b1(rgyud 'grel): bstan pa bsrung ba'i las 'di myur du mdzod// oM ru ru ro ru be ti staM b+ha to si kA ma la rag sha si hUM b+h+yo/ che ge mo mA ra ya hUM phaT ces bzlas shing dmar rlob cing gtor ma sbreng zhing brgya rtsa brgyad dam// yang na nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas/
358b2(rgyud 'grel): gzhan yang lha me'i gzungs la sogs pa la bstod pa mtha' dag bya'o// de nas lha mo'i sbyor ba la gnas nas// don thams cad grub par byed pa'i snying po'i sngags 'od bzlas par byas te/ myur bar ma yin bul ba min
358b3(rgyud 'grel): mi gsal ma yin gsal bar min// gug bskye de nyams pa ma yin pa// g.yeng ba'i rtog po spangs pas bzlas// oM hUM shrI ya de bi kA li ma~MhA kA li hUM b+ho/ a ri li hrIHdzaHzhes yi gau 'bru gsal bas lha mo bzlas par
358b4(rgyud 'grel): byas te/ sngags kyi bzlas pa thams cad kyang lha'i mo'i tshig yin par che ba'i nga rgyal bya zhing / rang gi sprul pa'i lha mo thams cad kyi zhal nas kyang sngags kyi sgra 'byung bar bsam zhing bzlas pa la sogs pa bya ste/
358b5(rgyud 'grel): de lta bu thams cad kyis bzlas par 'gyur// de ni sngon du bya ba sngags te/ 'bum phrag bdun bzlas pa 'am/ yang ni gsum bzlas pas lus thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// de yang sngags khri phrag bzlas nas gaut+tar
358b6(rgyud 'grel): ma re re btang ste/ khu tshur bcings te sngags mdzub sgrengs la/ kha 'gram g.yas g.yon du mtsho ba ltar byas la/ oM bya bA bat+ti li bat+tA li tshe gcig lan bdun nam gsum bzlas nas 'di skad du/ dur khrod ma mo
359a1(rgyud 'grel): dngos grub zhal// gtum mo gtsigs byed yi dgas kha// dam tshig srung ma khrag dga' mo// kri li sgra sgrogs sbyor 'dzin lnga// dur khrod re yi mtshe dbus na// tshegs dang pho nya bcas pa ru// gcig
359a2(rgyud 'grel): byed gtum dud sol ba mo// gsol cig bzhes cig dam tshig lha// gnas nas gan su mdzod du gsol// bdug gi bsam pa ci 'dod pa// de ni khyod kyis 'grub par gyis// bdag gi las 'di ci byed kyang // dwe lA kun
359a3(rgyud 'grel): gyis grogs gyis shig/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na/ sarba duSh+man/ pra duSh+Tan/ b+hak+Sha b+hak+ku/ puM puM phreM phaT swA hA zhes brjodade/ se gol lan gsum brdabs la btang bar bya'o// 'dzab ma rdzogs kyi bar du de ltar shes par bya'o// ji srid
359a4(rgyud 'grel): skye bar ma gyur gyi bar de srid kyi bar du bzlas la/ skyo bar gyur na yAng bstod po byos la mchid yon phul te mchod la phyag byas la/ lha mo slar gshegau su gsolo// dpal lha mo lA sngon du mchod pa phul zhing bsnyen
359a5(rgyud 'grel): pa rdzogs par byas la/ lha mos lung bstan cing mtshan ma thob pa'i rnal 'byor pas kyang dang po nyid du snying po'i sngags 'bum bzlas te/ de nas bzod cig las la sbyar ro// de la mi skyer zhing bsad pa'i las bya ste/
359a6(rgyud 'grel): grog mkhar gyi sa dang / chu 'gram gnyis kyi sa dang / dur khrod kyi sa dang / dur khrod kyi thal ba dron po dang / dur khrod kyi sol ba dang / rdzas de dag gi gcig tu bsres te/ zhing tu btags la/ lung bong gi gcin gyis spras te/
359b1(rgyud 'grel): bsgrub bya'i gzugs brnyan byas la ldum bu dang ldum bu med na yang / lung tAng tshe'i 'bras bu dang / dug dang / ske tshe dang / lan tshwa dang / ra khrag sbyar la mi de'i rus/ rigs bla gang yin pa'i gzugs/ gro kha la bris la/ bla de'i
359b2(rgyud 'grel): lus lo de'i maung rus dang / sed cig pa'i bskul tshig dang ldan pa bris te/ 'di skad du/ hUM che ge mi mA ra ya un man+ta ku ru hUM phaT ces bri/ bla rdo dang sgrags la gzugs brnyan gyi snying gar gzhug/ gzhan yang gong gi
359b3(rgyud 'grel): rdzas dang / tsha ba gsum dang / mu zi nag po bsres te zhi ba du btags la/ lung bong gi gcin dang sbyar te/ gzugs brnyan khyab par bskya'o// de na sde gcan zan gyi thod par bcug lnga maN+Dal gyi dbusu gzhug/ de nas gang
359b4(rgyud 'grel): la byA bA da bkug cing gzugs brnyan la bstims te/ mi ngo yin pa kho nar bsam la bya'o// gsong shing la bskyen laM gsad pa'i tshul du/ 'dir lcags las gsad shing gcig pa brdungs la bya'o// byas pa bzhi
359b5(rgyud 'grel): lha mo yin te/ gzugs brnyan gyi khaM ru rku ba nas gyen du btsugs khar phyung la gzugs// de nas sngags 'bum phrag gsum bzlas nas dgra bo brlag par 'gyuraro// de dbus bsam par bya ba ni/ bsgrub bya de'i
359b6(rgyud 'grel): snying ga'i dbusu yi ge kaM las gyur pa'i sdig pa kha dog nag po mi sdug pa cig/ snying gi khar me'i dbusu zhugs nas/ snying khrag 'thung zhing sha za bar bsam mo// gzhan yang dpal lha mo nog mo bsgom pa'i thugs
360a1(rgyud 'grel): ka'i mar me lA/ nang gi hUM gi 'od zer lhas dza dmar po sgril mar phyogs bcur 'dus pa las/ de yongasu gyur pa las/ lcags kying spyang mo ral pa can gcig tu bsgomo// des bsgrub
360a2(rgyud 'grel): bya'i snying rtsa'i dbus nas khrag rngub par bA sam zhing sngags bzlas te/ oM hUM shrI de bi kA li ma hA k+Sho si hUM b+h+yo/ maM ma? shwa druM a mu kaM mA ra yAM hUM hUM phaT phaT tsaswa brgya rtsa ro bzlas nas/ rdzas ni ka na ka'i rtsa ba dang / zi ra na
360a3(rgyud 'grel): po dang / dbang po'i lag pa dang / gnod sbyin gyi lag pa dang / be'u rgyug pa dang / skye ba dmar pi dang duro khrod kyi sol ba dang / lan tsha'i phyed ma rnams zhib tu btags pa'i phye ma sbyar ba byas la/ sngags bzlas
360a4(rgyud 'grel): nas gzugs brnyan la dbang / phur pa lho dwe bsregs la snying khar gang ba/ de ltar mtshon rnon pos gzugs dum bur gtubs la/ phyi mar byas la/ da d+hA ra'i 'bras bu yod n+yA ra bo/ med nau yang lung tang tshwa'i
360a5(rgyud 'grel): 'bras bu brgya rtsa brgyad blangs lA/ rtsub mo'i nang du btsags nas gzugs brnyan gyi phye ma dang bsres nas dpal lha mo'i sbyor bar sba bai shi gau gcer bur phyung nas/ khA lho phyogasu bltas te tsher maM la sbyin sreg
360a6(rgyud 'grel): bya'o// de nas sngags la/ oM hUM shrI de bi kA li kA li ma hA kA li hUM dz+yo/ mo ma sha truM a mu kaM mA ra ya un man+ta ku ru hUM phaT zhes brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas shing / rdzas dang bskrun cing bo sreg par bya'o// de nas byas nas skye
360b1(rgyud 'grel): nas 'chi bar 'gyur ro// haM gis thal ba de nyid blangs te/ de nyid spyi bor btab na la nyi na shu rtsa gcig tu myos par 'gyu ro// zhes kyang bshad// gzhan yang bdag gi rmis ltas// bu mo nag mo khros pa yis// gang zhig 'tshangs pas
360b2(rgyud 'grel): bcings gyur na// mtshan mA nag mor de shes bya// bsgrub bya nyi mo bdun na ni/ 'chi ste go shin rje'i yul du 'gro/ gal te re zhig cung zad 'gor na yang // nyin zhag bdun du bsam gtan 'di bya'o// bsgrub bya lus po
360b3(rgyud 'grel): skams pa/ ring pa/ sgra 'jongs pa/ sbub pa/ khu bA dang / rdol dang khrag 'dzag pa/ dmar ba'i cha byad can zhag bdun bsam mo// yang na mngon sum du bsam mo// bdag gnas pa'i hUM l-Is 'od zer nyi ma dang me rta
360b4(rgyud 'grel): ltelta bu 'byung ba las/ bskal pA'i me bzhin 'bar zhing / 'ur 'ur+ya dang / tog tog dang / tsham chem can du drag pa'i yi ge hUM du gyur nAs/ hUM de las rdo rje khab tu gyur par bas mo// rdo rje 'bar ba'i khab de bshang khung gi sgo
360b5(rgyud 'grel): bzhugs te/ snying phub nas kha'i nang nas sam/ spyi gtsug nas kyi tshangs bu ga nas phyung nas cher 'bab par bsams te/ snying po'i sngags kyi 'jug lA/ tsha gI mAM hwa na hA na/ da ha d+ya he/ hUM hUM phaT phaT ces bya'i sngags kyis
360b6(rgyud 'grel): khas bu du lhung bar bya'o// de lta bus bsam gtan gyi lha yang 'chi na gnas pa'i mi lta ci smos// lha me mu stegs kyi sgrub lugs/ slob dpon lo ka shAM yis bsgyur ba rdzogaso// // oM swa ste/ re ma
361a1(rgyud 'grel): ti'i dmag zor gyi man drag 'di la/ man ngag cig la khungs gnyis te/ dang po A tsar+ya dmar po la lce 'byung gnas bzang pos gser srang lnga phul nas zhus/ ngag bshas lce
361a2(rgyud 'grel): la zhang shes rab bla ma dang / snrubs rgyale gnyis kyi rta gcig spyi mar phul nas zhus sbubs la skyabs kyi ma mo khrag mig ces par grags// gnyis pa ni lo tsa ba shes rab bla mas gu ru A tsar+yaM dmar po nyid
361a3(rgyud 'grel): gar du gshegs pa la bal po tshun chud skyel thung mdzad nas zhus nas khyad byung ste/ zhal gyi man ngag ma lus pa yid ches par gnang ste/ khungs gnyiso// dmag zor zhes pa'i de tshig gtams der rtsad
361a4(rgyud 'grel): ched do// gzhung ni sdom brgyad po 'di nyid yin te/ khungs mthun no// man ngag 'di yi bya thabs la// mchod pa bshams rten bca' ba dang / ma mo bskyed cing ye shes dgug/ mchod cing bzlas pa bya ba dang /
361a5(rgyud 'grel): bstod cing las la bsdu ba'o// de lnga mchod pa bsham pa ni// dur khrod la sogs dben pa'i sar// maN+Dal khru gsum chag chag bya// mdun du gru gsum ling ga gzhug/ maN+Dal steng du ga sogs pa'i rjes// phud
361a6(rgyud 'grel): dang gtor ma rak+ta bsham// khram shing byang dmar nang rgyal dang // sho rje tshon gyi dru bu sogs// sha sna rnyed tshad mi dbang sha/ gsuro chen ma mo mnyes par bya// de nas rten gyi bya thabs ni// dkyil 'khor dbang ldan mchis
361b1(rgyud 'grel): su ni// 'bru nag 'jim nag bsres pa la// dre rta la zhon nag mo ni// mthing nag rgyan gyis brgyan pa mo// rma bya'i gdugs kyis phub pa ste// bdud phyug mtshon thogs mang pos bskor// 'jig su rung bas bskor bar bya// da ni ma mo
361b2(rgyud 'grel): babaskyed bar bya// rang gi cho ga rdzogs byas la// byang shar mu le ding su bsam// rlung nag tshub mo'i nang shed du// k+Sha zhes brjod pas skad cig gis// dmag zor nag mo re ma ti// dre'u rta la zhon thod pa can// phyag g.yas be
361b3(rgyud 'grel): snron 'dzin po la// phyag g.yom thong po khrag gong bsnams// dmod mo'i mtshon cha lnga dang bcas// sgra aM swa sha na nga rkyal la// sga yi phyi ru dru bu ste khram shing rkeng la gzer ba dang // byang dmar sho rde sngu sha la// dar nag gi
361b4(rgyud 'grel): kyi chas kyi brgyan// rma bya'i gdugs 'og chud par bsam// bdud phrug tshegs ni dus mnyam du// g.yon pa thod khrag yungaswa karI can// g.yas pa mtshon cha sna tshogs can// de ltar dam tshig bskyed byas la// rang
361b5(rgyud 'grel): bzhin gnas pa gzhugro par dzaHhUM zhes ni sngags la gdagos// byang shararu nas byin rang rang thim// bzhugasu gsil ba'i tshig 'di brjod// hUM nag mo gdug cu ni dregs pa can// kun tu khyab pa'i gzugs ston ma//
361b6(rgyud 'grel): nag mo gtso mo dre'u rta chings// 'dir spyan dre'u rta'i gdan la bzhugs// rag mo dzaHhU~M baM hoHsa ma ya s+t+waM zhes brjod// de nas de la mchod par bya// za byed nag mo mche ba can// rgong byeng ho ho nag mo khyod// gsod la
362a1(rgyud 'grel): dga' bar byed pa mo// bdag ni brda yi phyag bye // rag mo a ti pu dza ho// phra mo sbom pa las byung ba'i// bdud rtsi bram pa'i dza gang 'di// dmag zor nag mo la 'bul lags// bstan pa bsrung
362a2(rgyud 'grel): phyir bzhe su gsol// yi ge sum cu gtsog pa la// pany+tsa a mr-i te hau gdogaso// shaM khrag la skyegs bdud rtsi lnga dang sbyar// 'bru sna lnga la sbyar ba'i gtor ma 'di// dmag zor nag mo khyod la dbul lags kyis
362a3(rgyud 'grel): baustan pa bsrung phyir bzhe su gsol// sngags kyi 'jug la ba li ta kha raM Ta pA hi zhes gdagaso// chu dang ma 'dres dang sau ma'i khrig/ dadas mi yi ni khrag chen po// dmag zor nag mo l-i dbul lags// bstan pa
362a4(rgyud 'grel): bsrung phyir bzhi su~M gsol// sngags kyi mjug la ma hA rak+ta kha raM khA hi zheso// lha mo'i la bu ldog mi yeng bar bya ba'i phyir// byang chub kyi sems dkar dmar lce la bzhag cing mcho ngo // de ni dam bsre ba'o// de nas smon
362a5(rgyud 'grel): lamo godab pa ni/ bdag cag dus 'dir tshe ri zhing / bu dang tsha bo rgyus pa dang / longs spyod thams cad rgyas po dang // log por lta ba'i dgra dang bgres// thams cad rtag tu brlag par byed// da ni bzlas pa brtsam
362a6(rgyud 'grel): par bya// rten gyi lha mo'i thugs ka ru// rgyus pa'i srang bu de la gdags rnal 'byor snying ga'i sa bon las// 'od zer dkar po 'phros pa yis// lha mo'i thugs kar ma la thim// 'od zer sngagos kyis mchod par bsam/
362b1(rgyud 'grel): 'od zer dkar po sngags kyi gzugs// bdag la slar thim dngos grub byin// de ltar yang dang yang du bsam// de yi thun smad dgu la ni// bdag dang ma mo bdud phrug bcas// thams cad dus mnyam sngags zlos pa'o//
362b2(rgyud 'grel): 'od zer dug mnga' 'dra ba yis// 'brub khung yungs thun khrag thun byo// bzas pa'i lus kyang brlag par bsam// mgon po de la gzungs thag bstad// bskyed pa dung zad cung zad bya// re ma ti ni spyi dang mthun//
362b3(rgyud 'grel): de nas las la bsdu ba ni// bdud phrug tshogs dang khrag rnams ni// sle'u khung du khyer nas nI// bsgrub bya'i phyogasu kha bltas la// skra bcings 'gram pa sol bas byug// dpung pa g.yos pa phyung na so// yugs skyes
362b4(rgyud 'grel): byas pa'i 'ur rdo'am// yang na lag pa rang gis te// zor lam spyi dang mthun par dbye// dmag gi tshogs ni mi thub sbyin// dug lnga bkang ba mang po dang // yungs thun thogs pa mang po dang // mtshon tsho thogs pa mang po yi/
362b5(rgyud 'grel): drogra lus yul 'khor bcom pa dang // thams cad gsod cing za bar bsam// gau yang gzhi drag tu brdab par bya// log la lha m+me la yang mchod// bdud phung mang po 'phangs pa'i tshe// bdud phrug gzugs rnams
362b6(rgyud 'grel): mi snang na// las rnams 'grub par gdon mi za// bdud rnams 'dug na cung zad dka'// cung zad bstod pa byed po ni// hUM b+h+yo dpal gyi gzugs can 'dod khams gtso mo khyod// rta mchog dre'u rta zhen nas dpag tshad lnga
363a1(rgyud 'grel): brgyar rgyug/ be con thod pa dam pa rang rtags 'dzin// re ldes stong dkris sbrul gyi sham bu can// lte bar nyi shar gtsug na zla rgyas ma// khrag nad bdag mo dbyings phyug dpal 'bar ma// lha mo ro//
363a2(rgyud 'grel): ma ti lo bstod pa dbul// rag mo b+h+yo/ rig mo b+h+yo b+h+yo/ rag mo thun b+h+yo/ kha la rag chen ma/ reg mo a byA ti byA phun b+h+yo/ ru lu ru lu hUM b+h+yo hUM/ che ge me mA rA yau/ bong rbang gsad gsum de la tshang // bzlas pa la nI 'grus par bya
363a3(rgyud 'grel): ma mo'i bstod bskul spyi dang mthun// gser mkhor ram dus bzhi'i rgyal mo'i bskul la sogs pa bya// da~M pal lha mo dmag zor gyo man ngag rdzogaso// // a tsar+ya dmar po la shes rab bla mas zhus pa'i lu Da yin//
363a4(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ shrI mo hA kA la sA d+hA naM/ bod skad du/ dpal nag mtshan po'i sgrub thabs/ rdo rje nag pa chen po la phyag 'tshalo// sngar gsungs pa'i cho gas// stong pa nyid bsgoms pa'i dang las/ sna tshogs pad+ma dang
363a5(rgyud 'grel): nyim+b+ha la hUM yIg nag po de nyid las yongasu rdzogs pa'i rje btsun dpal nag po chen po zhal gcig/ phyag gnyis po/ mdog nag gi spyan gsum pa/ 'bar ba chen po/ phyug g.yas pa gri gug g.yon gyis thod
363a6(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin pa/ mi mgo'i rgyan can/ sgra kham pa gyen du 'greng po// sma ra kham pa can/ mche ba bcigs pas 'jigs par byed pa yan lag tha~Md la sbrul gyis brgyan pa bong thung ba/ zhal nas khrag 'dzag par bdag
363b1(rgyud 'grel): nyid skad cig tu rdzogs par byas nas sngags bzlas par bya'o// de la sngags ni 'di ltar ste/ e ma hA kA la hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ dug dang khrag sgog pa yungs kar rnams kyi spos phul nas// sha dang sran chen myos byed dang //
363b2(rgyud 'grel): me tog bdug spos byug pa daung // sha lI dad ni bdud rtsi lbos// nag po chen po'i gter ma bya// de yi sngags nI 'di lta ste// oM ma hA k+Sha la ya sha sa nai pa ka rA yA sar+ya muk+Sha sh+ma shA na pA si mA s+thi tA ya ai Sho a pany+tsi
363b3(rgyud 'grel): ma kA lo yaM/ ya di tI prI ta dz+nyA s+ya pi da hA i maM rat+na traM yU paM ka ri Na myA mu ka na mAny+tsaM kha kha khI hiM khA hi/ ma rA ma rA gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na/ ban+d+ha par+t+ta/ ha na hA na/ da hA nga ha/ pa tsa pa tsaM/ dI ni mo ke na/ ma rA ya/ hU~M hUM phaT phaT/ sarba yak+Sha
363b4(rgyud 'grel): rAk+Sha/ sarba b+hU tA pre ta pi shA tsa na/ ba li gr-ih+na/ mI mA sid+d+hi ku ru shAn+ti ku ru rak+Sha ku ru/ zhes bya pra gat+ne ra ma'i sngags// de la ny+dza bar spyad pa 'di yin te/ ku sha las sgrub bya'i// gzugs baR+Shan la/ tshwa ba gsum dang dug dang
363b5(rgyud 'grel): sgo che rnams ra tsi ka che ga bzhin du bskul nas cang gis khrag thim par btsugs te gang gi ming gis me la bdugs na de ni skad cig de nyid la mi snang ba dang nyams par 'gyuraro// de bzhin gang zhig slob dpon la sdang
363b6(rgyud 'grel): dang / rtag tu dkon mchog gsum la slong / sems can du ma 'joms byed pa// nag po chen pos gsol bar mdzad// de bzhin mag la 'dug na su// til 'bru tsam du gtub par byed// ces bya ba la sogs pa dpag
364a1(rgyud 'grel): tu med pa rtog par bya'o// dpal nag po chen po'i bsgrub thabs rdzogas+ho// / rgya gar spyad du/ mahA kA la sA d+ha naM/ bod skad du/ nag po chen po'i bsgrub thabs/ nag po chen po la phyug
364a2(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal lo// nim+b+hi shi la nag po bya ste gri gug drong thod pa rnams pa skra gyen du langs pa thod pa'i stod pan can// sbrul gyis brgyan pa/ sbyin dmar bya/ mche ba gtsigs pa'i zhal/ stug gi pags pa'i sham thobs
364a3(rgyud 'grel): can mi mgo'i phreng ba'i do shal dong ldan pa/ yi dgas kyi gdan lnga bzhengs par gnas// mun pa mi bzang pa'i rang bzhin du bsgrims lo nag po'i ches nas sgrub pa brtsams te/ de'i zhal lhor bstan la gzhag/ khwa
364a4(rgyud 'grel): shar du bsnun la// sngags stong phrag bcu bzlas par bya'o// dam tshig gi rdzas kyis gtor ma phul la/ gu gul gyis bdug spos dbul bar bya'o// me tog sna tshogs pa gtor nas// oM A s+thA mu sa shA lA tri
364a5(rgyud 'grel): shu la/ oM h+ye hI/ ma hA kU lA sAr+b+bA sha dzAM/ nar+g+ha ya/ nar+b+hu da ya/ dz+wa ra NA/ gr-ih+NA pa ya gr-ih+NA pa ya hU~M phaT// bza' ba spangs lnga bzlas pa bya'o// tshangs par byas la mngon du phyogs pas sngags bzlas par bya'o//
364a6(rgyud 'grel): sngar bzhin gtor ma dbulo// aM ma hA kA la ha na ha na badz+ra Na swA hA/ zhes bya ba 'bum phrag gcig bzlas par bya'o// oM ma hA kA la ho na ha na badz+ra Na mo ma kar+yaM ku ru ku ru swA hA/ zhes 'bum phrag gnyis bzlas
364b1(rgyud 'grel): pabapar bya'o// oM mahA krA ma ha na ha n+yA/ badz+ra NA e dang pre Sha yA mi ka ru Sh+Te thA swA hA/ zhes 'bum phrag gsum bzlas par bya'o// oM ma hA kA la ha nu ha na rak+Sha rak+Sha b+ha gr-ih+Na kar+yaM ku ru dza dza zhes bya ba gter ma'i sngagaso// rdo rje rnal
364b2(rgyud 'grel): 'byor mo dang sgrub pa byis la nag po chen po sgrub par bya'o// nag po chen po'i sgrub thabs rdzog so// // rgya gar skad du/ shrI mA hA kA la s+yai any+dza maMn+tha stau tA nA ma/ bong stong du/ dpal na ga chen po'i steng pa rka
364b3(rgyud 'grel): papA rgyad bA zhes bya gau/ dpral nag po chen po la phyag 'tsho lo// oM grub par gyur cig/ trUM hUM phaT ces drag po'i sgra yi srid pa gsum gyi khengs nI mi lus 'gengs nus pa'i// ha ta Ta Ta zhes brjod pa gang zhig dus kun du
364b4(rgyud 'grel): shin tu 'jigs mdzad cing // kaM kaM kaM zhes bong pa'i phyeng bras dbu la spras shing nag po'i mchu dang mtshungs pa'i sku// bruM bruM bru~M zhes khros pa'i mchog gi khri gnyer 'jigs mdzad 'jigs pa khA gdangs sha za zhing //
364b5(rgyud 'grel): dbus skra dang ni sma ra che ste nye bar sbyong pa'i zhing skyong khyod kyis bsrung bar mdzad// r-I r-I rAM zhes spyan dmar 'byug cing sbyor mdzad / kruM kr-i kruM zhes rab sgregs spyan gyis gzigs// smin ma ser zhing mche ba gtsigs
364b6(rgyud 'grel): ro yaM gdan la dgyes pa'i zhing skyong khyod kyis zhing skyeng mdzod// ha ha trUM dang kI li kI li zhes sgrogs phyag g.yon khaM T+wAM gar bca sa thod pa bsnams/ ru ru ru zhes khrag gi rgyun 'bab phyag gis bsnams shing
365a1(rgyud 'grel): gsol ba 'thung ba dgyes shing // kaM gaM baM zhes gtum po'i phyag g.yas gri gug ral gri bgegs rnams la ni rol mdzad pas// raDa Da zhes DA mA ru can 'di yis 'dul mdzad 'khor
365a2(rgyud 'grel): bcas zhing skyong khyod kyis bsrungs// rab tu rngam zhing mgo bo rnams kyi phreng bas gshin rje dang mtshungs 'jigs pa'i sku brgyan cing / k+ShaM k+ShaM k+ShaM zhes gzugs can ca co sgrogs par byed pa'i gdug pa rnams bzung
365a3(rgyud 'grel): skye/ gcig pus sna tshog sna mAnan nas kA ha ka ha brjod mjed char sbyin sngon po'i mdog/ sku la mi yi shwa dang rgyu mas 'brel bas kun nas birgyun cing zhal du gsol// drag shul phyag gis 'dod pa'i gzugs dang
365a4(rgyud 'grel): me gdug gzugs can gyi ni 'byung po ro langs tshogs// mA lus gzung nas myur du bsrud pa rnams kyi mgo bi'i khrag rgyun 'bab pa rab tu gsol// hrI k+ShaM shrI zhes sngags kyi gsung can pa tsa pa tsa'i sngags kyis
365a5(rgyud 'grel): bgegs rnams rab tu bsreg/ rol pas rol pa sel cing mi yos gang ba'i mtshol zhing skyeng khyod kyis bsrung ba mdzod// phreM pheM phaT ces sgrogs pa so sor bskyed pa'i me dpung chen po'i dbusu bzhugs nasu/
365a6(rgyud 'grel): rigs kyi lus can skrod par mdzad cing bsgrub pa rnams kyi zhing rnams nges par zhing skyong mdzod// phyugs rnams kyi ni nyin re bzhin du bgegs dang sdigs 'joms dri med bsnyems pa chu nye bzhin// tsi tse tsi zhes gtum pa'i
365b1(rgyud 'grel): shugs kyis rab dbye rmad byung 'od kyi 'jig rten snang mdzad pa// kr-i kr-i kr-i zhes gshegs pas dgra po nyon mongs pa rnams nges par nyon mongs 'joms mdzad cing / saM saM saM zhes tshogs pa'i bdag nyid dam tshig
365b2(rgyud 'grel): thos 'dzin zhing skyong grong yin khyod kyis skyongs// baM pA baM zhes gshin rje lngar 'gro dri ma med pa'i sna tshogs chu bzhin gzigs mdzad cing // yaM yaM yaM zhes rlung gi shugs kyis myur du rgyu zhing nyon mongs 'jig rten
365b3(rgyud 'grel): gnod byed mkhyen// kli kle kla zhes gdug po'i gzugs kyis srid gsum nyin mtshan dus kun nyon mongs gyur pa gang // paM paM paM zhes thugs rje'i zhags pas byol song rnams 'dzin phyag gis gdul bya rnams
365b4(rgyud 'grel): sbyang lo// sngagos pa dgA sngags kyi lus can thugs kyi sngags pa rnams la 'bras bu blo gros mtshungs med ster/ zhing rnams skyong byar mdzad pa khyod kyi 'gro bo'i lus rnams ma lus bskyung du gsuM'o// sgrub pa po
365b5(rgyud 'grel): 'am slob dpon 'ga' zhig thos 'dzin ga zhes blo ldan nus pa dang / thun gsum du ni stegs rnams brgyad po klog byed de ni byosod nams ldan por 'gyur ba dang / tshe dang dpal dang grags dang 'byor pa 'dzin
365b6(rgyud 'grel): dadagani dzing rgyas pa dang / mtshungs med dang / sa steng dang ni mtho ro su 'ang de yi bgegs kyi tshogs rnams rtag tu nyams par 'gyuraro// dpal nag po chen po la bstod pa rkang pa brgyad pa zhes bya ba/ slob dpon 'phag pa
366a1(rgyud 'grel): klu sgrub kyi mdzad pa rdzogaso// / rgya gar skad du/ shrI mA hA kA la ste tra/ bod skad du/ dpal nag po chen po la bstod ga/ dpal nag po chen po lnga phyag 'tshalo// hUM srin po'i gzugs
366a2(rgyud 'grel): kyis gdug bya can// cher gcod byang chub sems dpa' ste// grong khyer sum rtsig 'jig byed pa'i// gtum po khyod la bdag bstod// mdog nAg gzugs thung gla zi brji da can+da/ gdug po tshar gcod gr-i guH
366a3(rgyud 'grel): g.yas// g.yon pa gdug pa'i khrag bkang snod// thod 'phreng can la bodag bstod de// khros pos zhabs brdabs sa gzhi g.yo// 'jigs pa'i glad myos ri rab bsgyel// dam tshig nyams pa'i snying 'byin pa// dam tshig can
366a4(rgyud 'grel): la bdag bstod ngo // hUM zhal gcig pa la phyag gnyis pa// gri gug thod pa lag na 'dzin// ral pa kham nag gyen du 'khyil// spyan gsum me yi mdog 'dra ba// mtsho ba zla ba tshes pa 'dra// thod pa'i phreng bas do shal byas
366a5(rgyud 'grel): gsus khyim che la 'phyang ba po// mi thung khros pa'i gzugs 'dre ba// 'das dang ma byon+da da ltar gyi// bstan pa bsrung b.ro zhal ba zhes po// nag po khyed ni yin pa ste// bdug pa tshor gcod 'jigs pa'i gzugs// dbu
366a6(rgyud 'grel): kham nag gyen brdzes po// steng gi lha tshogs 'jigs par byed// spyan dgrang mche gtsigs ljags 'dril bas// bar gyi gdon tshogs bsdigs par byed// g.yas ni gri gug bsnams pa ni// dgra bgegs 'dul zhing
366b1(rgyud 'grel): bdud mgo gcod// g.yon pa thod pa bsnams pa ni// gnod sems can gyi khrag rkang gaspel// khros pa'i zhabs gnyis brdabs pa yis// gnod sems can gyi lus la rkang // khyed kyi thub pa'i bstan bsrungs//
366b2(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor pa yi bar chad sbyangs// ches dang dpal 'byor rgyas par mdzod// lus dang grib ma bzhin du 'grogs// dpal nag po chen po la bstod pa slob dpon mchog skyed kyis mdzad pa rdzoms//
366b3(rgyud 'grel): rgyu gar skad du/ mahA kA la ste traM/ bod skad du/ dpal nag po chen po la stong pa/ dpal nag po chen po la phyug 'tsha lo// bcom ldan dpal chen glags pa yis// sku gsung thugs las sprul pa
366b4(rgyud 'grel): nyid kyi thugs ka nas byung ste// sprul pas 'dul la phyag 'tshal bstod// hUM gi de nyid las bzhengs pa'i// zhal gcig phyog ni gnyis pa ste// sku mdog nag po 'bar ba che// bstan pa bsrung la phyag 'tshal bstod/
366b5(rgyud 'grel): thod pa rnam gsumA 'byer ba yi// gzhal yus gur gyi nang na bzhugs// g.yas bskum g.yon brkyang bdud rnams mnano// 'gying bag brjid la phyag 'tshal bstod// ma tshugs thabs kyi pod+ma mdzes// shrI/
366b6(rgyud 'grel): rab ye shes nyi ma'i dkyil// hUM las skyes pi bo ni// bstan pa bsrung la phyag 'tshal bstod// g.yas kyi gri gri ga gdengs pa yis// dgra bag gas 'dul zhing bdud mgo gcong / nyon mongs dug gsum rtsang nas
367a1(rgyud 'grel): 'joms// dpa' bo khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// bdud kyi thod pa bdud rtsis bkang // nyid kyi zhal du gsol ba mdzad// sgrub pa po la dngos grub stsol// byin brlabs 'bebs la phyag 'tshal bstod
367a2(rgyud 'grel): zhal nas khrag gi rgyun 'dzag pa// bskrun pa lo gnod de la yams 'bebs// dam tshig bsrung la dngos grub stsol// thugs rje che la phyag 'tshal bstod// srid gsum sems can thams cad kyi// mgo bo'i phreng
367a3(rgyud 'grel): bas do shal byas// dug lnga rtsad nas gcod pa ste// dug gsum 'joms la phyag 'tshal bstod// mche ba gtsigs pas bstan pa la// gnod pa'i klad pa 'joms par mdzad// til tsAm dag tu brlag par mdzad// mi/
367a4(rgyud 'grel): mthun 'dul lnga phyag 'tshal bstod// gdug pa mA lus 'dul mdzad po'i// rkang med 'gro bas sku la brgyan// zhe sdang cad pa nas bcad pa ste/ klu chen 'dul la phyag 'tshal bskyed// stag ni dpa' brjid rdum pa'i chas// sham
367a5(rgyud 'grel): thabs rkeng la ci ngas pa yi// grags pas lha chen zil gyis gnon// dpal chen 'dul la phyag 'chil bstod// bskal pA me dpung 'bar ba yi// srid po'i rtse mor rab tu 'bar// bstan pa la gnod sgrol mdzad pa//
367a6(rgyud 'grel): 'bar ba'i rgyal po khyod la bstod// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// tha ma'i bstan pa srong mdzad pa// thod pa lnga yi dbu la brgyan// 'jigs 'god gshegs la phyag 'tshal bstod// la pa kham nag skyen
367b1(rgyud 'grel): du 'khyil// bstan pa phun sum tshogs pa yi// man mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam pa'i rtags// rtags lnga ldan la phyag 'tshal bstod // spyan gsum dug gsum rtsang nas 'joms// 'dul ba rnam pa bzhi gzigs nas// gang
367b2(rgyud 'grel): la ciso 'dul ji bzhin du// de 'dul khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// dpal nag po chen po la bstod pa slob dpon chen po a po d+hA ti pas mdzad pa rdzogaso// // #// rgya gar skad du/ shrI b+haT+TA ra ka ma hA kA la
367b3(rgyud 'grel): sto tra/ bod skud du/ rje btsun dpral nog po tshon po la bstod pa/ dpal nag po chen po la phyag 'tshal// bdud drang bdud kyi phyogs kyi sems can ma lus myur du tshar btsang busrad nas khrag rgyun gsol
367b4(rgyud 'grel): mdzad nug po chen po ni// rab 'jigs mdog gan ga gzugs thung gsus pa 'phyang zhing dbu skra dmar ser 'jigs pa'i mi dpung nang bzhugs khros pa'i gad mo ni// ha hUM phyo gi sgra yis lha dang lha mo skrag
367b5(rgyud 'grel): nas 'bros shing 'gyel ba'i mgo bcang zhabs kyis mnan pa drag po'i tshul// bdud drang bdud kyi phyogs kyi sems can ma lus myur du tshar bcang bslang nas khrag rgyan gsol mdzad nag po chen po ni// ske
367b6(rgyud 'grel): rags dril bu g.yer kha sil sil Da ma ru ni Di Di hUM ha sgra sgrogs thog gi nang gi thog gi ni// sgra rnams sgrogs shing mnyam dang mi mi nyam gar byed pa yi lha dang lha mo'i tshogs kyis bskor nas dur khrod
368a1(rgyud 'grel): gan su rol// bdud dang bdud kyi phyogs kyi sems can mA lus myur du tshar bcad bsang nas khrag rgyun gsol mdzad nag po chen po ni// thung la sbom zhing spyan gsum me tog ban+d+ha ra ltar dmar bas bags
368a2(rgyud 'grel): rnams skrag cing sngangs mdzad lcogs ni glog ltar 'khyu'o// mche ba rnam par gtsigs pas ma rung gdug pa can gyi sha dang rus pA kruM kru 'cha' zhing lbu bzhag 'dza bo pra// bdud dang bdud kyi phyogs kyi sems can+da ma lus myur du tshar
368a3(rgyud 'grel): bcad bsdang nas khrag rgyan gsi lnga mdzad nag po chen pa ni// phyag rgya lnga dang klu brgyad kyis brgyan stug pa gas ska rags dang ni sgo slong dkris shing mi bskyod pa ni spyi bor bzhugs// de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshogs rnams
368a4(rgyud 'grel): sku la spro zhing mi yi rgyu mas sbrel ba'i mgo bo'i phreng ba rab 'phyong dr-i shal byas// bdud dang bdud kyi phyogs kyi sems can ma lus gyur du tshar bcad bsang nas khrag rgyun gsol mdzad nag po chen po ni// drag pa
368a5(rgyud 'grel): dang ni chu bdag bzlog par dka' ba'i tshogs rnams zhal du gsol mdzad phyug g.yon rtse gsu mo 'dzin cing thong khrag 'thung // gshin rje'i lce 'dra'i gri gug dang ni ral gri phyag g.yas bsnams shing gdugs
368a6(rgyud 'grel): pa can rnams brlag mdzad sdig pa ring du spong // bdud dang bdud kyi phyogs kyi sems can ma lus myur du tshar bcang bsad nas khrag rgyun gsal mdzad nag po chen po ni// rig byed ces pa'i lha mo brgyad dang rol pa'i
368b1(rgyud 'grel): rje btsun rdo rje nag po chen po'i sangs rgyas grags pas bskul ba ni// gang gi nyin mtshan rtag tu 'di bton bsgrub pa'i don rnams grub dang sems can ma lus khyad par sA la gnas par mdzod// dpal rdo nag po chen po la
368b2(rgyud 'grel): phyag 'tshalo// bung thung gsus 'phyang mdog gnag ral pa/ kham nag gyen du brdzes// 'bar ba'i tshogs kyis lha min dgra bgegs ma lus sreg par byed// drag po'i zhal gyis bdud rtsi gsol mdzad mgo po gcod mdzad pa//
368b3(rgyud 'grel): bzhad pa'i tshul gyis khro zhing gdug pa'i dgra rnams skrag mdzad pa// rked pa byin pa dril bu ga yer ka'i tshogs kyis sgra sgrogs shing // Di DI dang ni hU~M ha Da ma ru yi sgra sgrogs pa// zhal nas te ra ke na te ra ra ki nA ki sgra ni// sgrog
368b4(rgyud 'grel): shing zhabs kyis mnyam dang mi mnyam tshul du gar mdzad cing // ma mo'i tshogs kyis yongasu bskor nas dur khrod gnas na rol// ha ka hUM ka pheM ka'i sgras ni lha dang lha min bsreg/ ma lus dgra bA gegs tshogs kyi srog la
368b5(rgyud 'grel): myur du spong byed cing // nag po'i phyogs kyi dgra bgegs khrag gi rgyun ni zhal du gsol// nag po chen pos sgrub pa po yi bsam pa myur du skyabs// spyan gsum me tog ben+d+ha ka ltar dmar zhing sminA ma 'khyog/ ljags ni
368b6(rgyud 'grel): glog ltar 'khyog pas bgegs kyi tshigs ni 'jigs shing sgru ga/ zhil nas mche ba rnam par gtsigs pas dgra bgegs ma lus pa'i// sha rus rkang dmar kruM kruM gso la zhing lha bzhag ni 'jib// stog gi lpags
369a1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i sham thubs kyis ni sku smad yongasu dkris// phyag rgya lnga dang klu brgyad kyis brgyan nyid kyi spyi bo nas// mi bskyod la sogs de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par 'phro bar byed// rgyu ma mi mgo rlon pa'i phreng
369a2(rgyud 'grel): bas sku la do shal byas// nag po drag po chu bdag la sogs zhal du gsol bar mdzod// rtse gsum drang ni gdug pa'i khrag bkrong thod pa g.yon na bsnams// gnod sbyin lce 'dra'i gri gug ral gri g.yas kyi phyag na
369a3(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin// gdug pa'i dog rnams ring du sbyong zhing brlag par mdzad pa khyod// lha mo brgyad kyis bskor zhing 'dir ni gar gyi tshul gyis bzhugs// nyin dang mtshan du bsgrub pa'i don rnams ma lus mdzad pa la// sangs
369a4(rgyud 'grel): rgyasna grags pa yis ni 'jig rten mgon po la zhus pa ma lus sems can 'di dag rdo rje sa la rab dgod mdzad// rje btsun dpal nag po chen po bya rog ming tson dang // gdong can la bstod pa mkhas pa chen po
369a5(rgyud 'grel): rtsa mi sangs rgyas grags kyis bstod pa rdzog so// / 'di dag prakl-i ta'i skad du yod pa lngas si lo tsa bas bod skad du bsgyur ba'o// // rgyo gar skad du/ shrI ma tA kA la di bi sto dra aSh+Ta nA maH/ bod skad du/
369a6(rgyud 'grel): dpal lha mo nag mo chen mo la bskyod pa brgyad pa zhes bya ba/ dpal phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshalo// til mar gyis bskus lan bu gcig pa ro nya'i rna chas sgeg cing cha lu gis me lus 'amang // rgyan du rkeng sgrogs lcags
369b1(rgyud 'grel): las byas pa gcig gis rang gi rgung pa mdzes par byas pa de// gcer bu bong bu zhen zhing 'gro ba 'di ni rgyu ba de ni lha mo khyod nyid kyis// bdag nyid mdzes par shes kyis gzhan ltas khyod kyi spyod pa'i mtsho chen don
369b2(rgyud 'grel): dag su yis shes// 'khor pa 'jig pa'i tshe na mi lus dag las khrag dang zhog 'jig dud pa 'thul ba na// lha mo mchi ba mi bzang khyod kyis zhal du 'gro kun skad cig tsam gyis zhu gso par 'gyur// nags
369b3(rgyud 'grel): myo mi thod theDa pa khyod ni rnal 'byor grub pa'i nor can te dur khyod dgyes// khyod ni g.yo byed mnan cing nad chen 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa gsal zhing zhi la mi bzad dril yang sgrogs// dpa' bo dag gi mgo bro'i cod pan gyis
369b4(rgyud 'grel): ni legs sgras g.yul du mtshon gyis bcad pa yi// 'phreng ba thogs shing gor byed lag pa mnyen brkyang rkub chos che lA klu dbang bshibs pa yi// ska rags 'chang zhing lag nA mdung dang ral gri thogs lnga
369b5(rgyud 'grel): khrag gi chang gis myos par 'gyur// mig rtsa dmar por gyur cing mtshan mo du rau khrod 'gro ba 'byung po phal chen rnams kyi mthong // kro rlon chen po 'dral te brgyangs pa'i gos kyis mnabs shing phyed g.yoT phyed ni
369b6(rgyud 'grel): re ldes dkris// mi yau rgyu ma gsar pa'i sbubs kyis zhal gyi zla ba brgyan cing dril bu 'gran par 'khrol// lus ni snum gyis gsar du byugs shing khrag dang zhag la sogs pa'i thig les tshom bur bris// mi yi sha la sau yis/
370a1(rgyud 'grel): chem chem gcod byed thod ba can ni bdag la bskyong gyur cig/ drag po drag mo mi bzang mi sha kha na thogs pa sngan chad ma byung khyod mthong nas// ma mo rnams kyang skrag cing rta bsnga la rngam pa mthon cing
370a2(rgyud 'grel): mig rtsa rig rig khyod la bdud// nag mo bzang mo lus mdog gnag cing bzod par dka' ba khyod la brgya byin la sogs kyang // nyin gcig bzhin du bstod pa byed de bshin rje nyid kyang rtag tu 'drar zhing 'dud par byed// mi rnam
370a3(rgyud 'grel): dang ni 'gro ba ma lus pa dag 'jug btul ba ni rna pa ya gcig la// brang gis 'gro ba mgo bo'i gdeng ka stong dang ldan pa rgyab nas rgyan dus byas nas gnos// ya gcig la ni sang+ge mtshungs meng thogs shing rgyo mtshos bskor
370a4(rgyud 'grel): ba'i sa gzhi ma lus gnon// steng na rgyu ba'i nyi ma 'od zer stong ldan khyod kyi lte ba'i thang kA'i phyogasu gzhag/ rgyu mtsho'i gling nas me 'bar khyod// chu rna mos skams par nus pa ste// bud med thams cad zhi bya'i phyir// lha chen sku yi phyed
370a5(rgyud 'grel): du gzhugs// rjod dang dka' zlog nag mo che// lha dang lha min phyag byis pa// mI nad gang yin khyod ming shes// de ni 'jigs pa med par mdzod// gshin rje'i lham mo bdud kyi yum 'dod khams dbang phyug mo nad de tsi ga gi bdag
370a6(rgyud 'grel): mo dpal nag mo chen mo la bstod pa brgyad pa zhes bya ba bram ze mtsho sred kyi mdzad pa rdzogs// / dge'o//

371b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ shrI mang+ku kA la pad any+dza ka ste tra nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpal nag po chen po'i bstod pa rkang pA brgyud pa zhes bya ba/ dpal nag pa chen po la phyag 'tshal// oM grub par gyur cig/

371b3(rgyud 'grel): bcas phyag bcas phyag g.yon mi yi thod pa bsnams// smin ma ser zhing mtsho gtsigs ro yi ge dran la skyes pa'i zhing skyong khyod kyis zhing skyong mdzod// pho pheM po zhes sgrogs par byed cing so sor skyes pa me dpung chen
371b4(rgyud 'grel): po'i dbus na ni// mgo yi rnams kyis mgo'i phreng byas rabro gsawa 'jigs pa'i sku brgyan gshin rje dang mtshungs shing drog shul phyag gis bsad pa rnams kyi mi mgo'i moM lus 'dzin cing khrag skyugs 'bab
371b5(rgyud 'grel): pa gsol// rol pas rol pA sel macing mi yi so gang gis la zhing skyong khyod kyis srung bar mdzod// k+Sho k+ShAM k+ShaM zhes brjod pa'i sku con ca co sgrogs par byed pa'i gdug pa rnams bzung te/ gcig pu snong+ga mnan
371b6(rgyud 'grel): cing mnan nas ha ka ha brjod cing char sprin sngon po'i mdog/ hr-i k+ShaM shri gi sngags kyi rgyu can pa tsa pa tsa rigs kyi sngags kyis kun bsregs/ bgegs rnamos rab tu bskrad par mdzod cig sgrub po rnams kyi zhing
372a1(rgyud 'grel): gnas nges par zhing skyong mdzod// gang zhig dus kun du ni hA ha Da Da zhes bzhad shin tu 'jigs mdzad cing // phyug rnams kyis ni sdig dang dgrag 'jig nyi ma re re dri med mnyes pa chu 'dzin mdog/
372a2(rgyud 'grel): hUM hUM phaT ces drag po'i sgra yis srid pa gnyis po'i khong ni ma lus 'gengs nus shing // dbu skra dang ni rma ra cher ser nye bar spyod pa'i zhing skyong khyod kyis bsrung bar mdzod// khaM kha khaM zhes phyag g.yas gri gug ral gris
372a3(rgyud 'grel): bgegs rnams rol khrag 'thung ba la dgyes// raM raM raM zhes spyan nam du ru ru zhes phyag ni khAg gis rgyan cing stu pa'i shugaso// kruM kruM kruM zhes khros pa'i spyan ni byas gzigs par mdzod tsocig/ bgegs rnams khyod kyi
372a4(rgyud 'grel): sbyar bar mdzang+ga/ d+h+waM trUM d+h+waM zhes 'di yis 'dul mdzad N+Da ma twA dang bcu sna pa'o zhing skyong khyod kyis srungs/ kr-i kAM kre zhes na mnan pas dgra'o nyon mongs pa rnams dris par nyon mongs par mdzod cig/ kr-i kaM kaM zhes tha~Md phreng
372a5(rgyud 'grel): sku la spras shing neg po'i mchu dang 'dra ba'i sku// tsi tshA tsI zhes s+t+waM pI shugs kyi swa rob g.yo rme du byung ba'i 'jig rten snang mdzad cing // saM saM saM zhes 'tshogs pa'i bdag gi dag thos 'dzin zhing skyong gang yin
372a6(rgyud 'grel): khyod kyis skyongs// yaM yaM ya zhes stong gshin rje ltar 'gro dri ma med pa'i chu bzhin gzigs mdzad cing // khaM baM baM zhes rlung gi shugs kyi myur du rgyu zhing nyon mongs 'jig rten skyong ba mnyes// baM baM baM zhes 'jigaso pa'i khro gnyer
372b1(rgyud 'grel): mchog gi 'jigs mdzad nus pa'i khA sha za zhing // k+ShaM k+ShaM k+ShaM zhes phan par mdzad cing gnod pa skad cigs sel zhing skyong khyod kyis skyongs/ kl-i kl-i k+saM zhes gdug pa'i gzugs kyi srid gsum nyin mtshan dus kun nyon mongs pa
372b2(rgyud 'grel): mdzad pa gang // paM paM paM zhes thugs rje'i zhags pas byol song rnams 'dzin phyag gis gdul bya rnams skyong ba// stsogs bdag sngags kyi sku tsanI blo yis sngags pa rnams la blo gros 'bras bu mtshungs med ster// zhing
372b3(rgyud 'grel): rnams skyong bAr mdzad pa khyod kyis 'gro ba'i lus rnams ma lus yun ring bskyong du gsol// bsgrub pa po'i slob dpon blo ldan pa dag gis thos 'dzin gzhi gus dang ldan pas// thun gsum du ni sngags rnams brgyad po
372b4(rgyud 'grel): klog byed de ni bsod nams ldan par 'gyur ba dang / sa stengs dang ni mtho risuM ni de yi rtag tu gegs rnams nyams 'gyur zhing / tshe dang dpal dang grags dang 'byor 'dzin stongs dang / mthu dang gzi brjid rgyas par mtshung
372b5(rgyud 'grel): memid 'gyur// dpal nag po chen po la bstod pa sngags rkang pa brgyad pa zhes bya ba/ slob dpon 'phags pa klu sgrub kyi mdzad pa'o// @#// rgya glar skad du/ shrI ma hA kA la s+yASh+Ta man+ta ste tr-i nA ma/ bod
372b6(rgyud 'grel): skad du/ dpal nag po chen po la bstod pa rkang pa brgyad pa zhes bya ba// dpal nog po chen po la phyag 'tshalo// oM grub par gyur cig/ hUM hUM phaT ces drag po'i sgra yis srid pa gsum gyi khong ni ma lus 'gengs nus pa'i//
373a1(rgyud 'grel): d+hAr+m+mA T+Ta zhes bzhang gang zhig dus kun du ni shAn+na tu 'jigs mdzad pa// kaka kl-i zlos thod pa'i snang bas dbu la smras shang nag pa'i mchu dang mtshungs pashI s+yA// d+hA r+d+ha thA zhus zhus pa'i mchud/
373a2(rgyud 'grel): gi khri gnyer 'jigs mdzad 'jigs pa'i gdangs sha zla zhing // dbu skra dang ni rma rA tshwar serar+ya ny+dza bar spyad pa'i zhing skyong khyed kyis srungaswA bAr mdzod// ra re raM zhes spyan dmar 'khrug cing skyur mdzod klo kr-i kle zhes rab sgrog
373a3(rgyud 'grel): spyan gyis gzigs// sbyin+d+ra ma ser zhing mchu gtsigs ro yi gdan li dgyes dA'i zhing spyong khyod kyi so zhang stong mdzod// ho ha d+h+ye dang ki li ki lI zhes sgrogs phyag gau yan kha T+wAM gaur bcas thod pa bsgoms// rUru ru zhes
373a4(rgyud 'grel): khrig rgyun 'bab pa phyug gis bsnams shing gsol de 'thung ba la dwagyes shing // kho bA lo zhes gtum pA'i phyag g.yas gri gug ral g+hi bgegs rnamos lha nI rol mdzad pa// rAD+ga Da zhes Da ma ru can 'di yis
373a5(rgyud 'grel): 'dul mdzad 'khor bcas zhing sgying khyod kyis srungs// rab tu rngam zhing mgo bo rnams kyi phreng bas gshin dang mtshungs 'jigs pa'i sku brgyan cing // k+Sh+mAM k+Shu~M k+ShaM zhes bzod pa'i gzugs can tsa ce sgrogs

376a1(rgyud 'grel): khrag ltar dmar ba raM raM raM dang ru ru ru// de mtshar snang mdzad gtum po'i shugs can khro bo'i lta bas khro gnyer mdzod cig g+h+raM kr-I k+ShaM// 'khor bcas skyong ba'i zhing skyong ma lus bdud dang ro langs 'dul bar mdzad pa Da DaM raM//
376a2(rgyud 'grel): nges par gnod pa'i bdud dang nyon mongs bag chags gcod byed gri gug 'dzin pa hri hriM hriM// nag po'i mchu dang 'dra ba'i sku ni rtso dang nyes 'phrog thod pa'i phreng can kiM kaM kaM/ rmad byung 'od kyis 'jig rten g.yo zhing snang bar mdzad pa gtum
376a3(rgyud 'grel): po'i shugs can tsa tsa tsa// lha mchog dam tshig ldan pa khyod kyi tshogs kyi mchog dang zhing rnams skyongs shig sa saM so// 'gro ba sna tshogs dri med chu bzhin gzigs nas nges par gshin rje 'gog byed ya yaM yAM// rlung gi shugs bzhin myur du
376a4(rgyud 'grel): rgyu bas nyon mongs 'jig rten snang bar mdzad pa baM baM bau// smin ma gya gyu'i khro gnyer bskyer bas 'jigs par mdzad kyang 'jigs las thar byed b+h+rUM b+h+rUM b+h+rUM// sgrub pa po rnams la phan dang byung mdzod gnod pa'i sgo rnams bsrungs pa'i zhing
376a5(rgyud 'grel): skyong k+ShaM kAM k+ShaM// bzod pa'i lus can k+ShaM k+ShaM k+Shi zhes gdug pa rnams kyis bzad par dka' ba'i tsa co sgrog/ ka hA ka ha'i gsung gi rgyun dang char sprin ston pa'i lus tsen gcig pus tha~Md gnon// hrI k+ShuM shri gIs sngags dang pa tsa pa tsa'i sngags rnams kyi
376a6(rgyud 'grel): nolus can thal bar byed// sgrub pa po rnams la kun tu gnod pa'i bgegs rnams nye bar zhi bar mdzad cig zhing sbyong che/ hU~M kr-I kl-i zhes rtag tu nyon mongs gyur pa'i lus can skying gsum 'gro ba'i nyon mongs rnams// rnam par gsal nas
376b1(rgyud 'grel): phyag gi zhags pas sbyong zhing srung ba la phan phyugs bdag paM baM baM// sngags kyi bdag nyid sngags kyi sku can sngags myos sngags kyis zhi ba'i bde ster 'bras bu'i phyag/ mtha' dag rgyal ba'i sku bzhin mdzes pa zhing rnams skyong bar mdzad
376b2(rgyud 'grel): gopo khyod kyis de rnams srungs// sgrub pa po'am slob dpon gang zhig dam tshig dge mchog mkhas pa'i blo can thun gsum du/ sngags kyi bstod pa brgyad po klog byed de rnams bsod nams ldan zhing rgyal bar 'gyur ba dang // tshe dang dpa
376b3(rgyud 'grel): dang grogs dang 'byor ldan mnyam ming stobs kyis rnam par gnon pa'i gzi brjid rgyas// thams cad shes shing de yi nyin mtshan rtag tu bgegs kyi tshogs ni myos shing nyams par 'gyur// rdo rje nag po chen po'i bstod
376b4(rgyud 'grel): brgyad pa slob dpon chen po klu sgrub kyi zhal snga nas mdzad pa'o// / dge'o//
377a1(rgyud 'grel): dud sol ma'i sgrub thabs bzhug so//
377b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ shrI ya de bi ma hA kA li sA d+ha nI bi ka/ bong+ga skad du/ dpal lha mo chen me'i sgrub thabs/ dpal lha mo nag mtshan mo la phyag 'tshalo// dngal lha mo sgrub par 'dod pa'i rnal 'byor pas// yo byad
377b2(rgyud 'grel): phun sum tshegs pa dang ldan par bshams li// de nas dur khrod dam shing gcig gi drung ngam/ gcong rong ngam khang stong ngam dben pa'i gnasu phyin la// de nas dang po phyogs skyong bcu l-i sogs pa 'jig rten po'i lha 'dre tha~Md
377b3(rgyud 'grel): la gtor ma byin zhing / gser skyems rgyas par gtang // de nas e'i maN+Dal kun tu khru ra la/ 'phang su khru gang gi tshad du bya'o// de la stegs bu sum rim du bya/ bar ma zla gam gsum du byaM/ tha ma gru gsum du byA/ tha mA'i gru gsuM
377b4(rgyud 'grel): re re la rabs chad kyi thod pa'am/ yang na gang yang rung ba'i thod pA re re gzhug ste/ de yang thod pa steng mngon par bya ga/ theng po'i nang du yaM ge ya nag po ra re rdo sol gyis bri'o// thod pa'i phywa la yi ge ma dmar po re re khrag gis bri'o// zla gas
377b5(rgyud 'grel): gsum yang dmar por byug/ gru gsum dmar por chen gtang ste/ ma legs na yang 'di lta bu'i skyon yode tshe nau sboms na slob dpon slob bu la nad myang du yod// tshon 'phros na slob dpon slob bu nor yal ba 'ong // ya yer gyur na yul
377b6(rgyud 'grel): du 'khrug pa 'ong // bar chad par gyur na slob dpon slob bu myur du 'chi bar 'gyur// de bas re kha skyeg ma 'bring po tsam pa byas la// g.yas nas bskor zhing bris te/ chen dgyes pa yang gru gsum nyis 'gyur gyi bar du dgye ste/ nang
378a1(rgyud 'grel): gi gru gsum nag por bya/ phyi'i gru gsum dmar por bya/ nang gi gru gsum gyi rtse mo re re la/ rdo rje phyed pa re res mtshan par bri/ thal chen dang khrag skams pa bsres pas e'i dbusu sngags kyi sa bon hUM bri// nang gi
378a2(rgyud 'grel): zur gsum la ma mo thams cad kyi srog gi snying po phulA ba b+h+yo re re bri bar bya'o// de nas da du ri'i khu ba dang rwa reg po'i khrog dang / bya mo nag mo'i khrag dang / de dag cha bsnyams nas bsres la zhib tu btags la chen rtsi dang sbyar nas/ dur
378a3(rgyud 'grel): khrod kyi ras la dpal lha mo'i sku la bris la/ o'i maN+Dal gyi dbusu bzhugasu gsol te/ der yang spos la sogs pa'i mchod pa'i yo byad lnga tshang byar bar bsngags la mchod pa 'bul te/ de yang bdag dam tshig gi lha mor bsgoms te/ dang
378a4(rgyud 'grel): por rnal 'byor pa'i snying ga'i dbusu pad+ma 'dab ma bzhi pa'am/ yang na 'dab ma brgyad pa snying po dang bcas pa zhig bsam/ pad+mo de'i snying po'i dbu su yi gi aM klad kor dang bcas pa la 'od 'bar ba zhig bsam/ de'i steng du yI
378a5(rgyud 'grel): ge r-I rAM gyi gozi brjid kyis raM nyid mi ltar 'ab ba zhig bsam/ me des bdag gi rnam par rtog pa can gyi lus bsregs nas thal bar gyur par bsam+ba// de nas yang thal ba de'i dbus zhi ba'i yid kyi bsam par bya ba/ sngon gyi
378a6(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma'i snying po la gnas pa srog gi rang bzhin yi ge aM/ de'i steng du yi ge baM bsam mo// de nas baM de yongasu gyur pa las/ bum pa dkar po kho nas bdud rtsi'i chu rgyun 'bab pa cig bsam/ de nas sngon gyi srog du bshad pa'i yi ge oM
378b1(rgyud 'grel): da la/ bdud rtsi'i chu rgyun bab cing sbrengs pas yi ge kun gyi mchog tu bshad pa'i A zhes pa chu des lhag par yang brtan zhing brtas par byas nas gzi brji da dang ldan par gyur nas/ zla ba dang kha pa dang 'o ma dang / kun da dang sprin
378b2(rgyud 'grel): dkar po dang dud lta bur bsams te/ de nas dpal lha mo'i mtshan gyi sngags/ oM ma hA kA li de bi ka ra la/ bi krin+ta/ kA la rA tri/ tsaN+De ru pi Ni hUM phaT/ ces btsong pa'i sgo nas/ sngags kyi sa bon aM de las sa bon lhar bslu
378b3(rgyud 'grel): te/ dpal lha mo chen mo'i skur bsgyur zhing bsgom par bya ba ni dud pa'i sel ba sku mdog nag mo// nag po'i sprin dang bung ba lta bur gnag pa/ shin tu spags pa/ keng rus kyi lus can/ zhal gcig phyag bzhi/ zhabs gnyis po/
378b4(rgyud 'grel): g.yas kyi dang po na ral gri/ 'og mo na ban+d+ha dmar gyis bskyil ga skra 'khrol ba/ g.yon gyi dang po'i phyag nA sha ka ti/ 'og ma na tri shu lus mgul pa na dar dpyangs phyar ba thogs pa/ mi ro rengs pa khar btsug nas mche ba bzhi gtsigs
378b5(rgyud 'grel): gA spyan gsum pa dmar po bzlog nas dulAM ba/ dbu skra ral pa gyen du brjes shing lan bu g.yon du 'khyil gad bu sgra la sbrul dang thod phreng gis brgyan po/ rma byi'i rgyal mtshan btsugs nas 'char ba snyan cha g.yas na sbrul gyi mgu
378b6(rgyud 'grel): ni dril bu gsol ba/ snyan cha g.yon pa na sang+ge'i ral do mar 'phyog/ rna lhag gnyis na me tog dang dar domar po'i cod pan 'phur ba/ lha me yin la sogs pa'i thod pas do shal du byas la/ glang po che'i ko rlon gyis stod g.yog byas pa
379a1(rgyud 'grel): ba lang gi ko rlon chan pas dras+t+ra pa la/ re lde ser po sham bur btags pas sku smad dkris gakhrag dang zhag gi thig les dum+b+ha bur bris byA/ k+Sha'i rgyal po gshibs pas ska rags byas pa/ zhabs gnyis
379a2(rgyud 'grel): lcags sgro gis brgyan pa/ bong bu ga pa'i steng na btsan skyil du bzhugs pa/ dur khrod brgyad kyi dbus na skad dung dang 'brug gi sgra lta bu sgrogs shring // ma mo dang mkha 'gro dang / shu za thams cad dbang du sdud pa zhig tu bsgom// de ltar
379a3(rgyud 'grel): glagasal ba de'i thugs kwa'i dbus/ thugs me 'am mo stag 'dra ba la/ radwa gi sor bzhi'i tshad tsam du dbyibs sgo nga'i gzugs dang 'dra ba zhig gsal bar bsgom// skye ba de'i dbusu hUM nyi ma dang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dang ldan pa
379a4(rgyud 'grel): thig bsgo mo// de yang hUM gi thig le ni nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor du bsam// hUM gi zla chos ni zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du bsam mo// de'i 'og tu hUM de las 'od zer byung bas/ dgra bgegs thams cad tshar bcud tshur 'dus pa las bzlas pa'i
379a5(rgyud 'grel): yig 'bru rnams kyi 'phreng bar gyur par bsam/ d+hU de nyid kyi mtha' myur bskor bar bsgoms zhing / hUM de nyid las blta zhing gsal ba dang 'dris shing goms pa'i sbyor bas rtse gaN+DIg pa kho na bsgo mo// de ltar bdag dam tshig gi
379a6(rgyud 'grel): mor gsal ba dang / grub pa'i gnas nas rang bzhin gyi lha mo sngon gyi dang 'dra ba zhig/ 'khor nag mi gcer bu ral pa can/ thod pa se ral khar brgyan ga/ lag pa g.yas pa na mi'i snying thobs pa lag pa g.yon pa na ban+d+ha rak+tas
379b1(rgyud 'grel): bkang ba 'dzin pa snying gi dbus na sreg gi snying po yi ge b+h+yo re re yeng ba bsam gyi mi khyab pa dang bcas te byon par bas mo// de ltar nA mkha' la spyan b+h+ya sa naka/ mdun gyi e'i dbus kyi sngags kyi sa bon hUM dang b+h+yo la so sar
379b2(rgyud 'grel): thim pas sku phyag rgyar bzhengs par bya'o// de yang dgug po dang / gzhugs pa dang bcing pau dang dbang du bya ba'i sngags 'dis bya'o// shrI sha dz+dzaHhUM/ baM hoHswa ma ya s+t+waM/ sA ma ya hoHzhes brjid nas/ de nas gzugs dngosu ston cig
379b3(rgyud 'grel): pAr bsgre'o// de ltar mi ston+da na aM hUM b+h+r-i/ e a ra li hri dzaHzhes sngags de brjod cingadu gzi ro// mngon sum du ma byung na yang nga'i sems la ci 'dod pa dr-i ni khyod kyis grub par gyis shig par bsgo'o// de nas yang las byed pa'i tshe rIg
379b4(rgyud 'grel): kyi dam tshig byin te/ dam tshig kyang gur gum gyi chu lA sngags kyis btab la sbyino// dam+ba tshig gi sngags 'di'o// oM ha na hA na badz+ra sa ma ya a ti kra mau nan hUM phaT/ dam tshig gi chu byin nas bsgo gal+yA mo khyod dum tshig 'di
379b5(rgyud 'grel): las 'das no// bsgom pa bzhin du ma nyan gyi bar du gzir ba chen por byed pa dang / dam tshig gi chu 'di yang du ga ha la ha la chen por gyur te/ mthong bas khrag du bskyug pa dang / rdo rje tshon pos snying dral te/ me sgrol rdo rje 'bar
379b6(rgyud 'grel): bas tshig nas lus thal bar byas te/ so so rang rang gi mna' bor ba bzhin du dmyal ba 'bod grogasu skye bar 'gyuraro// zhes dam tshig boro// de nas dpal lha mo la mchod pa lnga dang gtor ma dbul te/ oM hUM shrI ya de bi kA li
380a1(rgyud 'grel): kA li ma hA kA li hUM b+h+yo/ oM badz+ra puSh+pe pu dza me g+ha s+ya mu drA s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM phaT/ ces brjod de me tog dbulo// oM badz+ra d+hU pe pu dzA me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra NA sa ma ye hUM phaT/ ces brjod de bdug spos shang la dbulo// oM
380a2(rgyud 'grel): badz+rA dI paM pu dz+ra me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sma yi hUM phaT/ tsA sa mar mo spyan li dbulo// oM badz+ra gan+d+he pu tra maM g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma yai hUM phaT/ ces dri chab thugs kar dbu lo// oM badz+ra nai pi d+ye pu dza me g+ha sa mu drA s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM phaT/ ces
380a3(rgyud 'grel): brjid de lta bI shos phyag du dbu'o// de nas ra rog po'i shwa khrag dang / byA mo nA ga m+b+ha'i sha khrag dang / gzhan gyi yang shA khrag sna tshogs gang 'byor 'byor dang chung la sogs pa bza' ba sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i gtor ma dbul bar byas te
380a4(rgyud 'grel): mahA mAM sa kha'i/ ma hU~M go raM tsa naM kha'i/ ma hA ba su ta kha'i/ oM dam pa ling gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na pa ya hUM phaT swA hA// zhes brjod de gtor ma dbul bar bya'o// de nas mchod pa rdzogs par phul nas/ bstod de gling bu 'am mi rkang 'bud/ cang tre'u'i myi
380a5(rgyud 'grel): snod kyi rnga brdung zhing dbyings snyan pas bstod par bya ste/ oM dpal ldan lha mi mi 'pham srong gsum+b+ha bdag/ rang don bskrang phyir rnam thar lo gzhol kyang // snying rje'i dbang gi sna gzhan don rjes thob cing // shes rab sna tshogs dgu gi 'gro dun
380a6(rgyud 'grel): byed// lha mo sku mdog nag mo cher sprin mdag/ mtshon mo nag mo shin tu gtum pa'i gzugs// shin tu sgeg cing rke rus lus can ma// zhal gcig phyag bzhi zhabs gnyis brjid pa'i sku/ ral pa gyen 'greng lan bu g.yon du 'khyil
380b1(rgyud 'grel): sgra rgod sbrul dang thod pa'i phreng ba can// rna ltag me tog dar na gcod pan can// khrag gi chang gi sA ra ro spyan rtsa dmar// mi ro rengs pa khar bcug mche ba bzhi// rnam par btsigs nas khrag la shrIn tu dgyes// snyan g.yas sbrul gyi mgul
380b2(rgyud 'grel): nas dril gu si lnga zhing // gdug pa btul nas+tha tshangs pa'i sgra sgrogs ma// skan cha g.yon pa seng+ge'i ral pau dmar// dpa' bo khams gsum sweng+gi sgra sgrogs ma// phyag bzhi g.yas kyi dang pe ral gri 'dzin// 'og ma ban+d+ha rak+Sha s+ya dmar bskyil
380b3(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin// g.yon gyi dang po shak+ti'i mtshon cha 'dzin// 'og mA traM shu'i mgul na dar dpyangs 'phyar// shak+ti ral gri'i mtshon gyis gsad pa yi// lha ma in gyi thod sogs do shal byas// glang po chu yi ko rlon steng g.yogs 'dzin// smad ni nga
380b4(rgyud 'grel): lang ke rlon dras pa la// phyed nI rI lde ser po sham bur dkris// klu'i dbang po gshi bos pa'i rgong bcings spyan// zhabs gnyis lcags sgrogs drag gi mdzes par brgyan// khrag zhog mang po'i tshem bus thig ler bris// drong bu ga bzhon
380b5(rgyud 'grel): mtshan mo dur khrod rgyu// bong bu'i rmig pa glog gi shugs can+da ma// khams gsum skad cig dag gis bskor bar byed// skad ni dung dang 'brug gi sgra lta bus// ma mo mkha 'gro sha za dbang du sdud// lho phyogs gshin rje'i pho brang rtag tu
380b6(rgyud 'grel): gnas// dam pa'i sa nis gzugs sku gnyis gzigs ma// ting 'dzin dbang thob gzugs khams gnas byon// tshongs pa'i rgyal po la sogs phyag byas ma// gzhan la dbang sgyur 'dod khams yi mthar phyin// dbang phyug chen po'i sku
381a1(rgyud 'grel): la dbyes 'khril ma// sum cu rtsa gsum gnas bzhir byon pa'i tshe// lha rnams dbang phyug brgya byin phyag byas me// lha ma yin rnams phung bar byas pa'i tshe// lha min dbang po ka gyis phyag byas ma// sku
381a2(rgyud 'grel): mcheg ri rab che dang bsgril ba'i tshe// lte ba'i thad kyi phyogs nas nyi zla 'char// rgyal tshon bzhi la sogs pa phyag byas ma// rgya mtsho'i gtong nas me 'bar mtshe skems nus// sau 'og dbang po kun gyis phyag byas ma// lho mo khyod kyi cho 'phrul
381a3(rgyud 'grel): 'a'adi bstan pas// bdud dang mu stegs rgyal po 'angar zhing 'dung // ma mo srin mo'i tshogs rnams rngam zhing rgod // rIn chen gur phub tsit+te'i gzhal yas nas// nyi zla'i dkyil 'khor brtsegs pa'i 'od zer 'bor// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten du ga
381a4(rgyud 'grel): gi bcud bsdus nas// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dag la thim par mdzad// dug gi rlangs pas nag po'i phyogs rnams kyi// bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi'i nang rnams slong byed ma// de phyir nad kyi bdag mo dam la 'du// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten bdud rtsi'i bcud
381a5(rgyud 'grel): bsdus nas// zla ba'i dkyil lta b.rar+ya dag la thim par mdzad// bdud rtsi'i rlangs pas dkar po'i phyogs rnams kyi// bzhi brgya rtsa ba ni'i nang ni rtsang gcod mo// bdud rtsi smon gyi rgyal mo dam la 'dra// gang zhog khyod la ded na ma pas byams// de
381a6(rgyud 'grel): ma gcig nad bdag sman gyi bco// lha mo khyod la bdag gis rtag tu bstod// sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa'i spyan snga ru// bdag gis 'di nas 'khor ba ji srid par// dkar po'i phyogs kyi nang dang sngags bsngal sogs// zhi bar bya phyir
381b1(rgyud 'grel): tshe dang longs spyod spel// nag po'i phyogs ni dgug cing dbang bu bsdu// skyo 'bog gsang pa la sogs las 'di dag/ bstan pa bsrung phyir las 'dri grub par bgyi// 'di las 'gal na rgyal ba'i sku bslus pas// dus gsum rgyal gyi
381b2(rgyud 'grel): rdo rjes mAg+ho 'goms shog/ de skad rgyal ba'i spyan sbyar dam bcas phyed mo bcas bzhin du phrin lngas myur du mdzod// rnal 'byor bdag dong bdag gi 'khor rnams la// zhal nas bdud rtsi char ba'i rgyun pha pa la// nad sogs sdug bsngal
381b3(rgyud 'grel): tshogs ni zhi bar mdzod// tshe dang dbang thang ljongs sbyong rgyas par mdzod// zang zing lo tog 'bru yi phung po dang / rin chen rkang 'gro'i phyugs rnams 'phel bar mdzod// bla ma smod cing dkon mchog dbu 'phang smod// bdag gi dge ba'i
381b4(rgyud 'grel): bar chad byed pa'i ngag/ che ge mo zhes bya ba'i las ngan 'di // khyod kyi khong nas dug gi rlung bus la// 'du ba rnam bzhi'i nad rnams khong nas slong // khag bzhi sa la lhung nis brdebasu chug/ don snying snang ldi'i khong khrag skyug tu
381b5(rgyud 'grel): chug/ las ngan+ya bal byor bcas brang tshon brdung du chug/ skye sngags tshod chen gnam du 'bong du chub// 'chi ba'i dug lnga skyo 'bogs gsang par mdzod// gcan zan mkha' lding la sogs ltas ngan pho ba// bstan pa bsrung ba'i las
381b6(rgyud 'grel): 'ding myur du mdzod// oM ru ru ro ru pe ti ta ba to so// ka ma la rak+Sha si hUM b+h+yo/ che ge mo mA ra ya hUM phaT/ ces bzlas shing / dmar brlab cing gtor mar sbreng zhing / brgya rtsa brgyad dam yang na nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas la gzhan yang
382a1(rgyud 'grel): lha me'i gzungs la sogs pa bstod pa mtha' dang bya'o// de nas lha me'i sbyor ba la gnas nas// thams cad don ni grub byed pa'i// snying po yi ni gsang sngags 'di// rtag par bzlas pa bya ba ste/ myur ba yang
382a2(rgyud 'grel): ni ma yin pa// thogs pa yang ni ma yin pa// mri gsal ba yang ma yin pa// guMg skye nyams pa a in par// g.yeng ba'i rtog pa stangs la bzlas pa'o// au hUM shrI ya de bi kA li kA li ma hA k+Sha li hUM b+h+yo// I a ra li hri dzaHzhes yig
382a3(rgyud 'grel): 'bru gsal bar lha mos bzlas te/ sngags kyi bzlas pa thams cad kyang lha mo'i tshe gro yin ne bar chang che ba'i nga rgyal bya zhing / rang gi sprul pa'i lha mo thams cad kyi zhal nas kyang sngags kyi sku byung bar zhing / bzlas pa la brtson par
382a4(rgyud 'grel): byas pas de lta bu thams cad kyis bzlas par 'gyur ro// des ni sngon du bsnyen pa bya ba'i sngags te/ 'bum phrag bdun bzlas pa'am/ yang na 'bum phrag gsum bzlas pas las thams cad 'gru'o// de yang sngags khri phrag re re bzlas
382a5(rgyud 'grel): nos gtor ma re re gtang ste/ khu tshur gnyis bcings mdzub mo gnyis bsgreng lo/ kha 'gram g.yas g.yon du mtsho ba ltar byas la/ oM b+hu byA b+h+r-i ta li b+ha ti li tshe/ zhes lan bdun nam gsum bzlas nas/ 'di skad du/ dur khrod bdag
382a6(rgyud 'grel): mo dngos grub zhal// gtum mo 'jigs byed yi dgas zhal/ dam tshig srung ma khrag dga' mo// ki li sgra sgrogs sbyor zin mo// dur khrod ro yi tshol dbus na// tshegs dang pho nyar bcas pa ru// gtsigs byed gtu mo dud sol ma// gsol
382b1(rgyud 'grel): cig bzhes cig dam tshig lha// gnas nas gnasu mdzad du gsol// bdag gi sems la ci 'dod pa// de ni khyod kyis grub par mdzod// bdag gi las ni ci byed kyang // de la kun gyis thogs gyis shig/ hUM gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na sarba duSh+TAn/ b+hak+Sha/
382b2(rgyud 'grel): d+hak+Sha/ phreM phreM phreM phaT swA hA// zhes brjod/ sa gol lan gsum gdab ste btang bar bya'o// 'dzang ma rdzogs kyi bar du rgyun de ltar shes par bya'o// ji srid skyo bar ma gyur gyi bar du de ltar bzlas la// skyo bar gyur na yang bsted pa byas
382b3(rgyud 'grel): la mchod pa phul te/ phyag byas te lha me slar gshegasu gsol// dpal lha mo nag mo sngon du bsnyen pa chen po dbul zhing / bsnyen pa rtogs por byas la/ lho mos lung bstan cing mtshan ma thob pa'i rnal 'byor pas kyang / dang po nyid
382b4(rgyud 'grel): du snying po'i sngags lho 'bum phrag gci ba du bzlas lnga/ de nas bstod cing las la sbya ro// de nas skye zhing glasang ba'i las bya na// grog mkhar b+hau sa dang / chu phyar 'gram tshur 'gram gyi sa dang / dur khrod kyi sa dang / dur khrod kyi thal
382b5(rgyud 'grel): ba dron me da // dur khrod kyi sol ba dang / rdzas dri dag gcig tu bsres te zhing tu btagos la// bong bu'i gcin gyis spras te bsgrub bya'i gzugs brnyan pa'o// 'dum pu dang / 'dum bu med na lang thang ci'i 'bras bu dang dug dang
382b6(rgyud 'grel): ske tshe dang lan tshar khrag dang sbyar bas/ mi de'i ming rus rigs kyi bla gang yin pa'i bla gzugs gro gsal bris la/ bla ngo'i lus la dgra po de'i ming rus ngango sod cig pa'i skul tshig dang bcas pa bris te/ 'di skad du hUM che ge mo mA
383a1(rgyud 'grel): ra ya phaT/ un man taM ku ru phaT/ ces bris la bla rdo dang skyugs la gzugs brnyan gyi snying gar gzhug/ gzhan yang gong gi rdzas dang tsha ba gsum mu zi nag po rnams bsres te/ zhib par btags te bong
383a2(rgyud 'grel): bu'i gcin dang sbyar te/ gzugs brnyan gyi kun tu khyab par bsku'o// de nas gcan zan gyi phred pa'i kha nang du bcug la mAN+Dal gyi dbusu gzhag/ de nas gang la bya ba de bkug cing gzugs brnyan la bstiH// de yin pa kho nar bsam la
383a3(rgyud 'grel): las bya'o// rgya gaur phan chad na mi gsod pa'i gsol shing rtse gcig pa byed pa de/ 'dir gri lcags las gsol shing rtse gcig pa brdungs la bya'o// byas pas ni lha me yin te/ gzugs brnyan gyi rkub kha nas gyen du btsugs
383a4(rgyud 'grel): te kha rI phyung lnga gzugaso// de nas sngags 'bum phrag gsum bzlas na dgra bo brlag par 'gyur ro// de'i du suM bsam par bya ba ni bsgrub bya de'i snying ga'i dbus kyi yi ge kam las gyur pa'i sdig pa kha dog nag po mi sdug pa zhig
383a5(rgyud 'grel): gis snying ga'i mar me'i dbus nas snying khrag mthung zhing za bar bas ma// gzhan yang bdag dpal lha mo bsgoms snying ga'i mar me'i nang gi hUM gi 'od zer las dza dmar pos bsgral ma phyogs bcur 'phros 'dus pa las/
383a6(rgyud 'grel): de yongasu gyur pa las lcags kyi lcang mo ral pa can tsog tu bsgom// des bsgrub pa'i snying rtsa dbu mar thon nas khrag brngubs pa bsam zhing sdug bzlas te/ oM hUM shI ya de bi kA li kA li ma hA kA li hUM b+h+yo/ ma ma sha tre a mu ka mA ra ya
383b1(rgyud 'grel): mA ra ya hUM hUM phaT phaT/ brgya rtsa brgyad 'or re bzlas nas// rdzas ni ka na ka'i rtsa ba dang / zir nag po dang / dbang po lag pa dang / gnod sbyin lag pa dang / bye'u rug pa dang / skyi ba dmar po/ dur khrod sol ba dang / lan tsha bsreg pa'i phye ma de rnams
383b2(rgyud 'grel): zhib tu btags pa'i phye ma'i sbyor ba byas pa la bsngags nas gzugs brnyan la gdab/ phur bu rdo rje drag po dmar lhag go bsregs la snying gar gdab/ de nas gzugs brnyan mtshon rnon pos gtubs la phye ma byas la
383b3(rgyud 'grel): skyeskyo shing gis 'bras bu yod no rA ba/ maud na lang tAnga? thang tse'i 'bras bu brgya rtsa brgyad btsag mo'i nang du btags nas gzugs brlan gyi phye ma dang bsres la/ dpal lha mo'i sbyor bas skra bshig gcer bur byas nas/ kha~M lho phyo
383b4(rgyud 'grel): su bltas nas tsher ma'i me la sbyin sreg bya'o// de'i sngags la/ oM hUM shrI yu de bi kU li kA li mu hA kA li hUM b+h+yo/ mA ma shA truM/ a mu kau mA rA ya phaT/ u na man taM ku ru hUM phaT/ ces brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te/ rdzas dang
383b5(rgyud 'grel): bstun zhing brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlos par bya'o// de ltar byas na skyo bar 'gyur ro// haM gyi thul ba d+mo nyid blangs te/ de nyid kyi spyi bor btab nA lo nyi shu rtsa gcig tu skye bar 'gyur ro// zhes kyang bshad// gzhan yang bdug gi rmi
383b6(rgyud 'grel): lhalta su bu mo nag mo khros pa yis// gang zhig 'chings pos btsongs gyur na// mtshan mo nag mo der shes bya// bsgrub bya nyi ma bdun na ni// 'chi ste gshin rje'i yul du 'gro/ gal te cung zad 'gor na yang // nyin zhag
384a1(rgyud 'grel): bdun du bsam gtan 'di bya'o// bsgrub bya'i lus po skams pa ring pa/ mdog nyams pa dri ma can// skra 'dzidras pa snum pA/ khu ba rdul dang khrag 'dzag pa/ 'dar ba'i cha byad can+da zhig tu bsam
384a2(rgyud 'grel): yang na mngon sum du bsams te/ bdag lha mer gnas po'i snying gi'i hU~M las 'od zer nyi ma'i zer dang me stag lta bu las/ bskal po'i me bzhin du 'bar zhing 'ur sgra dang tog tog dang chem tsham can du drig po'i yi go hUM du
384a3(rgyud 'grel): gyur te/ hUM de las rdo rje 'bar ba'i khab tu gyur par bsam/ rdo rje 'bar po'i khab de dgra bo'i gzhang kha'i sgor zhugs te/ snying phug nas khwa'i nang ngam spyi bo tshangs pa'i bu gar phyung nas cher 'bar bar bsams te/ snying po'i
384a4(rgyud 'grel): sngags kyi 'jug la/ che ge mo ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ phaT phaT kyi sngags kyis khas sgrub du lhung bar bsam me// de lta bu'i bsdam gtan gyis/ lha chen po yang 'chi na/ 'on kyang 'khor ba na gnas pa'i mi lta smos kyang ci dgos
384a5(rgyud 'grel): mkha' 'gre ma dud sol gyi sgrub thabs/ mkhas pa chen po nA ros pas mdzad pa rdzogaso// / lo ka shrIs bsgyur ba'o// / rje ma pa la ci'i phyag dpal zhus pa sha nA~M/
384a6(rgyud 'grel): 6'ad rnams sto sa rgyas kyis mtshan mar gyur 'gro ba yis/ tshe rangs du par bsan pa'i sdig sgrib ma lus kun// dag 'dis dug lnga'i me lce mu yis bcil ba tsa nis/ ri 'i min byang chub snying po'i go 'ayang myur thong shog ces mi dbang po lhabs sgo gsu tshig dril gyi smon la btab pa'o/
